Not sure why people are complaining about noise, our room was right next to the road and we got a great nights sleep, and people seem to have moaned about hearing Disneyland's fireworks, but the hotel does mention being able to see them from the hotel so of course they'll be heard and its not late anyway, I thought it was lovely! The service at the hotel was fantastic, everyone was so friendly and helpful! We didn't get a chance to eat at the hotel as we had all our days
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: "This Will Be 4 Rating Hotel Once Renovation Are Complete"
Summary: Very friendly staff who made us feel welcome during the renovation.  The beds are so comfortable, would have made the stay better if the pool and spa was finished including the outdoor setting.  The resturant and staff where great and the food was good also, cheap beer and selected meals during happy hour.  We walked over to Disneyland as it's only 15 minutes otherwise you paid for the shuttle per person.
Manager Response: Hello Tatkins2017,   Thank you for taking the time to give us some feed back on your recent stay with us.  We are glad to see you enjoyed your stay with us and we are excited to finish up our renovations. We will hopefully see you next time you are in the area.   Thank you,  Carolynn Front Desk Supervisor

Summary Heading: Kind staff, clean property, but not a good nights sleep.
Summary: We stayed at Hotel Menage during Dapper Day weekend. We were thrilled with the kind staff and the clean room. However, the noise was unbearable. None of our party slept well that night. The room we were placed in was right on the freeway and there was very little that muffled that sound. The air conditioner was also very noisy but given the heat of the night it needed to be on.   We would visit again once the construction was completed in hopes that the noise issues are resolved.
Manager Response: Theprincesscoll,   Thank you for taking the time to gives us some feedback on your recent stay with us. We are sorry that we fell short this time and we hope that once our renovations are complete you will come back at stay with us. We are renovating all guest rooms, pool area and lobby. Hope to see you soon!  Thank you,   Carolynn  Front Desk Supervisor

Summary: At time of booking we were told there would be renos going on due to be completed in early May.  Thought a visit at end of April they would be close to done.  We were wrong   Only some rooms completed.  We did get one we were told but they sure didn't do a remake. Pool and hot tubes closed as well and don't look like it will be open any time soon.  Option to use an other properties pool with limited shuttle    Notice of this was just days before our arrival with no time to rebook and get good price in room.  Poor treatment for a SPG GOLD member folks.   Was not recognized as a SPG member or a good for that matter other than did I want points or drink for stay.  Hmmm what's up with this.  Have always felt special upon n arrival before not so this visit  Disappointed to say the
Manager Response: Hi Buttercup5687,  We are truly sorry about your visit at the Hotel Menage. We have been working hard but some delays have been happening. Pool will be up soon according to the contractor but that can always be delayed. Please email me at Skylar.Knowlton@hotelmenage.com about your SPG benefits. I will be looking into why the lack of SPG acknowledgement and ensure your points are put onto your account.  Thank you,  Skylar L Knowlton Operations Manager

Summary: Booked in for a 4 night stay as part of our honeymoon. Two days before arrival we received a message to say the pool was under construction. Arrived to find the entire hotel was under construction. We circled the entire property try to find check in. At check in I voiced my frustration was offered two days free breakfast. Begrudgingly I accepted same. Went up to our room. It was not the room we had booked and all you could hear was drills, grinders and the noise of construction. Went back to reception where they offered a refund but no solution for our stay. They were in no way helpful. We had to contact our agent back in Australia at 8am on a Sunday morning to find a solution. The place was dirty, noisy and had no facilities yet we had paid full price and they couldn't even get
Manager Response: Hi Lowey17,  We are truly sorry that you felt that we didn't assist you in making things right. We did try to accommodate you by offer multi-able ideas. I am sorry I couldn't of been their but tried to help when I was off. I am very happy that you were able to work something out with your Travel Agent that you paid and hope that your Honeymoon went well after. We can't wait till after these renovations when everything can calm down and we can do what we do best with our guest!  Thank you,  Skylar L Knowlton Operations Manager

Summary: My husband and I come to Anaheim at least 1-2 times a month to visit Disneyland because we are annual pass holders. Our timeshare World Mark was booked so we decide to choose a hotel that had a nice pool since we knew it would be hot this past weekend. Well if we had known the hotel was being renovated we would have chosen one of the other hotels with a nice pools and similar rates.   Only Pro: we stayed in a renovated hotel room   Cons: *Pool was closed, had to drive to a partnering hotel to use their pool. (2            different hotels)            *Hotel was in the middle of renovation, plastic tarp everywhere, certain paths            and stairways were closed.            *Customer service was lacking energy and was not helpful at all            *Husband asked house keeper
Manager Response: Hi Krystle A,  Please email me at Skylar.Knowlton@hotelmenage.com. I would like to discuss more with you.  Thank you,  Skylar L Knowlton Operations Manager

Summary: The hotel is absolutely dirty - we had some underwear from the guest before in our room as well something which looked liked old bones?? in the bathroom.  Located beside the Highway, it ist realy loud. The hotel itself has some doors made of iron which should be for more safety, but there are rooms directly beside those doors which ist realy noisy if people pass this place the whole day long.   The only thing which was nice - the hotel is located very vlose to disneyland - so you can see the firework from the hotel.
Manager Response: Hi Sandra,  Please email me directly at skylar.knowlton@hotelmenage.com. We would like to find out more information on the room.   Thank you,  Skylar L Knowlton Operations Manager

Summary: Not the best hotel experience I've ever had.  The ROOMS NEED A SERIOUS OVERHAUL!   The towel racks looked like they could come off the wall any moment and the bath,shower,and floor need to be re-tiled. The cleaning crew should be told that if four people are checked into a room they really should provide four towels.  Also, had to tell the staff to come clean our room even though we were not in our for most of the day.  They also didn't take away a plate and bowl we used in the morning when they did come to clean our room.  It is close to a major street and the freeway so was somewhat loud.  The hot tube needs to be cleaned daily maybe even more than once a day when there are a lot of guests staying here because it was brown by the end of the day and sure to cause some kind of
Manager Response: Hummmm2017,  Thank you for taking the time to give us some feedback on your recent stay with us. We currently are renovation our guest rooms, pool area, and lobby. We would like to apologized for the experience you had at our hotel and have already informed our Operations Manager about your concerns. We are glad you like our restaurant and hope you got to try our Happy Hour menu. We hope that once back in Anaheim you will give us another try.   Thank you,  Carolynn  Front Desk Supervisor

Summary: Booked a room for 5 nights, checked in to our 5th floor room mid-afternoon. Renovations were in progress on second floor, but it sounded like someone was using a jack hammer on the outside wall / floor / ceiling of our room.   Called front desk, clerk was busy but said she would call back in a few minutes. Never did.   Bathroom was tiny. Could barely turn around.   Parking filled up quickly, had to drive to far side of property and park under the freeway overpass.   Pros: bed was comfortable, room was newly renovated.
Manager Response: Jmsgaz,   We pride ourselves on making sure every guest has a wonderful stay with us and we are sad to see we feel short this time. We would like to apologized for the noise of the renovations and the customer service you received. We have inform our Operations Manager about your concerns. We are also done with our renovation this summer and hope that once we are done you will come back and stay with us.   Thank you,  Carolynn  Front Desk Supervisor

Summary: -Showed up at 11am on Saturday, no 'Welcome' from the staff. No eye contact whatsoever. Room was not ready yet, no problem.  -Front desk guy asked for our email and signed us up for a Starwood Preferred Guest thing without asking us first and gave us an expired 20% card for the hotel restaurant, so thanks?!?!  -Was told we would receive a phone call when the room was ready. No phone call.  -Showed up at about 7pm to check in. 3 guys working, no one looked up from their computer. Again, no 'Welcome', no eye contact.  -Room was nice looking. Good size TV. TV didn't work. So that was no fun.  -Go to bed and fire goes off. . . Twice.  -Clock alarm for some reason was set for 6am, so that woke us up early and then 10 minutes later because I was half asleep and didn't turn it off.
Manager Response: Dear TravelingWineJedi,   Thank you for taking the time to complete the Guest Satisfaction Survey in regards to your recent stay at the Hotel Ménage.   As we pride ourselves on delivering a memorable hotel experience during your travels, we have unfortunately fallen short of our goal during your recent stay. Please accept our sincere apology for our staff not making you feel welcome at your arrival, the tv not working in your room, and the alarm going off. We have shared your feedback with the appropriate hotel team to ensure that this was an isolated issue that is corrected moving forward.   Upholding our commitment to provide a memorable experience with exceptional service, we hope to have an opportunity to better your experience with us whenever your travels bring you back to Anaheim.   Sincerely, james chu Front Office Supervisor Hotel Menage soon to be Four Points by Sheraton james.chu@hotelmenage.com 714-758-0900

Summary: I have stayed here before but this time was the last.  There is some kind of remodel going on I think.  The front desk clerk was friendly but not very clear regarding what was taking place with the remodel.  My shower head leaked, the bathtub was stained and the bedding was musty smelling...yuck.  The final straw was my beautiful car was parked by the valet under a tree which leaked or dripped all over the back end.  I had to have my car washed for a second time in 3 days.  Something positive...The cookies at the front desk were yummy.
Manager Response: Dear calb797,   Thank you for taking the time to complete the Guest Satisfaction Survey in regards to your recent stay at the Hotel Ménage.   As we pride ourselves on delivering a memorable hotel experience during your travels, we have unfortunately fallen short of our goal during your recent stay. Please accept our sincere apology for not giving you more information on our renovations, the tree sap that leaked onto your car, and the room not being up to standard. We have shared your feedback with the appropriate hotel team to ensure that this was an isolated issue that is corrected moving forward.   Upholding our commitment to provide a memorable experience with exceptional service, we hope to have an opportunity to better your experience with us whenever your travels bring you back to Anaheim.   Sincerely, james chu Front Office Supervisor Hotel Menage soon to be Four Points by Sheraton james.chu@hotelmenage.com 714-758-0900

Summary: We stayed at the Hotel Menage for 3 nights at the end of March of 2017.  We were put in a horrible room.  There was no carpet or tile on the floor of our room!!!  Really?!?  The floor was painted like my grandpa's garage (see pictures).  It was so nasty.  Chips in the floor, missing garage paint everywhere (see pictures).  The bathroom was even worse.  Disgusting mold and poor caulking everywhere (see picture).  Cracks in the tub (see picture).  The towel rack fell off the wall and stayed that way for our entire stay (see picture).  You would think the house keeper would notify maintenance about the towel rack.  Nope, she just stacked the towels on the toilet.  Nice.  Coffee maker didn't work.  Hair dryer didn't work.  I'm not making this up.  Worst hotel room we have every
Manager Response: KJ_IN_CA,   Thank you for taking the time to give us some feedback one your recent stay. We are sorry that we fell short this time. We are currently undergoing renovations of all guest rooms, lobby and public areas. We haven't gotten to the room you were in and we are sorry about that. Please let us know when you are unhappy with your stay or room so that we can room move you to another room. Rest assure we have told our Operations Manager about your stay and we will be looking into and following up with your concerns that you have mention to us.   If you have any questions or concerns please reach out via email or phone number.   Thank you,  Carolynn Front Desk Supervisor carolynn.terry@hotelmenage.com 714-758-0900

Summary: We booked this hotel expecting to stay there.  Got a call the day we were to arrived saying the hotel was being renovated so they needed to relocate us to Residence Inn.  This was a huge upgrade and we appreciate them doing this.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel is well located to the parks. It is next to the interstate and quite noisy even thought the rooms are reasonably well sound insulated. Current refurbishments are making individual spaces nice. Reserve as far away from the interstate as possible.   Super nice helpful staff and good facilities beyond the rooms.  For a visit to a park and the price for a night or two I would return.
Manager Response: Good Day touareg2,   We are glad to hear that you liked our staff and we do try to ensure our rooms are as quite as possible. We can't wait till our transformation is over and hope to see you again.  Thank you,  Skylar L Knowlton Operations Manager

Summary: I got there on Friday afternoon Right when we got there,the valet guy welcomed us with a big smile and told us where to go At the front desk with got lucky to have Mike Garrett(amazing guy) We were so disparate for a room that you have no idea  He helped us in any way possible I come from Vegas and I work at the venetian and my wife works at bellagio,so we know a lil about customer service,and I can tell that mike could work anywhere with no problem The hotel was nice and clean,we had no problem at all For sure I will go back If you go,just ask for mike or the guy that was working with him BEAUTIFUL PEOPLE Mike you made our vacation great Thank you
Manager Response: none

Summary: We were pleasantly surprised by the upgrade to a room with a view of the Disneyland fireworks! The extremely thoughtful staff member who checked us in put us in that room because it was our sons birthday, how awesome! The newly renovated suite was very pleasant, and I especially loved the blackout blinds on the windows! Another plus was the breakfast offered for an additional charge, delicious French toast and potatoes as well as other options filled us up before a long day at Disneyland. Will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Hello Sandy C.,    THANK YOU FOR YOUR FIVE STAR REVIEW!!!!!!!!!  With a mission to provide superior customer service, we take great pride in serving your needs and are delighted to hear that we have met your expectations. As a valued guest your feedback will be shared with the team to continue to inspire and motivate them to deliver exceptional customer service.   Thank you for staying at the Hotel Ménage and we hope you choose to stay with us again whenever your travel needs bring you back to Anaheim.   Happy Traveling!  Sureya Atoura Front office Supervisor  Hotel Menage  sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com 714-758-0900, Ext.7600

Summary: The positives, the staff at this hotel are very friendly, the hot tub and pool is open 24 hrs which is nice because you can soak in the hot tub after long day at Disney, it's a  10 min safe walk to Disney, the beds are comfortable, the hotel has a lot of freeway noise but it is right next to a 10 lane freeway this is to be expected and it's not as bad as some reviews make it out to be.  The negatives, I stayed in a recent renovated room, the little things add up to give it a dirty feeling, paint pealing, dirty rug, sloppy paint job, dark lighting and only a few tv channels, the evlavotors had rug that has a lot of stains it gives a dirty feeling before you even get to the room, I searched for bugs in hotel and found none which was good, the restaurant has good service but very
Manager Response: Hello John B,   Thank you for sharing your experience with us. Hotel Menage works to make each guest stay a positive one, we sincerely apologize this was not the case with your stay. As our hotel renovation continues, our team is working hard at refreshing the public spaces and Guest rooms in our hotel. We will be beginning with our lobby renovations this Monday which will enhance our overall appearance. We have shared you recent stay experience with the proper department heads, Feedback like yours works to promote our overall hotel experience.  If you would like to further discuss your stay please feel free to contact us using the information below.   Best Regards,   Sureya Atoura Front Office supervisor sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary: I guess most people book this hotel for disney. However, its location is bad. It's encircled by highway and major intersections, so it's very noisy. The shuttle to disney is not free, it ask for >$5 per person. You can save to walk 10 to 15 minutes to the front door of disney.
Manager Response: Hello Jian C,   Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience at the Hotel Ménage with us.  Every process put in place is aimed at providing you with an unforgettable hotel experience. From your recent feedback, We are disappointed to learn that we fell short of your expectations.   I would like to take this time to apologize for the noise disturbance caused by the near by highway. Our front desk is 24 hours, and is always able to assist with placing you in a room that better accommodates your preferences. Rest assured, we are taking steps to help ensure problems of this nature do not occur in the future.   As a valued guest, thank you again for your feedback and we hope to serve you again whenever your travels bring you back to Anaheim.  Best Regards,   Sureya Atoura Front office Supervisor  Hotel Menage  sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com 714-758-0900, Ext.7600

Summary Heading: Ok, But Not a restful Stay
Summary: Our first room was on the freeway side and way too noisy.  We requested and received a switch and thought..problem solved.  Not so fast, someone pulled the fire alarm at 5am the next morning.  We were rousted out of bed and to the lobby.  Staff gave us zero feedback until I asked and was told it was a just a false alarm and we could return to our room--at our own risk.  The next day we tried again to sleep-in and the construction noise was both above and behind us. Felt like a war zone. Finally, parking fees aren't justified since you'll get fairly worn out walking to the Disney from this property.
Manager Response: Dear Papa505,   Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience at the Hotel Ménage with us.  One of our key priorities is to provide the highest level of guest service satisfaction. While it was a pleasure having you here as our guest, your feedback regarding your overall stay caught our attention.We are very sorry to learn your stay with us did not quite meet your — or our — expectations. Please rest assured that your comments have been shared with the team in an effort to improve our overall stay experience.   Thank you for being a valued guest with us and we hope to serve you again whenever your travels bring you back to Anaheim.   Best Travels,   Sureya Atoura Front office Supervisor  Hotel Menage  sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com 714-758-0900, Ext.7600

Summary: Dirty. Waited 30 min to get checked in. Very noisey. Plug in shower full of hair. TV terrible reception. No exhaust in bathroom. Aircon in room doesn't work. Never been to such a terrible hotel. It isn't as advertised at all.
Manager Response: Good evening Ms. Cusack,   Thank you for sharing your experience. We strive for all our guest service experiences to be a positive one, we apologize this was not the case with your stay. Our operations manager has been made aware of the concerns you have informed us of, we sincerely hope we have the opportunity to speak with you before you depart from our hotel.  Best Regards,   Sureya Atoura  Front Office Supervisor Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary Heading: Daughters birthday and trip to disneyland
Summary: I did notice some bad reviews about this hotel, but thought you can't believe everything you read. Every hotel has good and bad.   Staff were really helpful. My door jammed and when they couldn't get into our room they apologised and gave us free breakfast.  Rooms were always cleaned well. Beds really comfortable and bathroom clean. Wish that USA had a kettle in room but that's in all hotels not just in this one.
Manager Response: Hello Michelle J,   THANK YOU FOR YOUR FIVE STAR REVIEW!!!!!!!!! We appreciate the kudos you gave our staff members and will make them aware of your kind words! We are delighted t hear we were able to resolve your concerns in a timely manner and overjoyed you enjoyed your stay with us while celebrating your daughters birthday! We sincerely hope to see you soon whenever your travels brings you back to the Anaheim area.   Best Travels,   Sureya Atoura Front office supervisor sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary Heading: Steer clear of this hotel - not a hotel....a motel instead
Summary: Our travel agent booked us into the hotel as it was close to the Disney land theme parks. We were checked in by Sureya, who had no idea of customer experience- pathetic.   When we complained about the room, she said it was a newly furnished room. The room was facing the freeway....with consistent traffic throughout the nite.   Cold wind kept gushing through the door making the room icy the entire nite. My daughter was hurt by the wardrobe door that came crashing down on her when she opened it.   Basic amenities like toilet paper was missing, had to keep calling guess services for it. Phone and shower broken.  The walls are so thin that the couples augments next door was a form of entertainment.    Stayed at the MGM in Las Vegas ......an awesome experience!   Don't stay at the
Manager Response: 480ameerad,  Thank you for taking the time to give us some feedback on your recent stay with us. We do apologized that your stay was disappointing. We have notified the Operations Manager about your concerns and they will be addressed. We are still undergoing our renovations of the guest rooms and public areas. We hope that once we are completely done with renovations  you will come back and stay with us.   Thank you,  Carolynn  Front Desk Supervisor

Summary: We booked through Hotwire and received the hotel menage as our hotel.  The rooms were older but they were clean and did just fine for our two night stay! We weren't there to lounge around in the hotel. We were there to go to Disneyland. If you want a sweet weekend escape, I wouldn't recommend if. But if you're looking for someone to shower rest and regroup for the house of mouse, then this place is perfect!  The best part of the hotel and our stay was the heated pool with the amazing fireworks view, and the location to Disney! Minutes walking and a short ride on the ART.  Oh, and The hotel staff was very friendly.
Manager Response: Hello aMarie8706,  Thank you for stay with us and we are in the process of getting NEW rooms. We hope that you will comeback when we convert to Four Points by Sheraton!  Thank you,  Skylar L Knowlton

Summary: Let me start by saying that we picked this hotel because it is listed as one of the Disneyland "Good Neighbor" hotels.  Disney should be ashamed and embarrassed for having endorsed this hotel.  The only reason I gave it 2 stars is because the hot tub is open 24 hours a day and it does have a great view of the fireworks. However that does not make up for the short comings.   Like several reviewers we started out with no plug for the tub.  We requested a blanket; they brought towels.  These are minor and could easily be over looked, the rest of it not so much.  The room was in horrible condition and not worth $50/night much less the $140 we paid before taxes and fees.  We left 1 night early because we refused to stay.  1: The entry door to our room was broken.  There is a greater
Manager Response: Good Day Stacy,  We are sorry about your experience. We are talking to the contractors about all issues. Thank you again for letting us know! We are excited about the full renovation to the Four Points by Sheraton.  Skylar l Knowlton.

Summary: Stayed here early December as I was celebrating my birthday at Disneyland. Was a bit disappointed on the first day due to misunderstandings. We arrived at 10am and told we couldn't check into the room till 3:00pm which was fine as we understood this was Hotel policy but we were told at the time that we would be offered a pool side room on a high level. When it came to 3:00pm we were given a room facing the trash cans on the second level. We complained citing our previous conversation but told that the hotel was full. Was feeling very disappointed and pointed out that we waited since 10am and that we were there for my birthday and was begrudgingly offered a better room. I was made to feel like the hotel was doing me a big favour at no extra cost even though they were offering
Manager Response: Hello Vivacious_Lady,   Thank you for your four star review. On behalf of the hotel and Staff we would like to wish you a sincerest belated Birthday. We appreciate you taking the time to share you stay experience with us. We are delighted you enjoyed our firework view and close proximity to the Disneyland resort area. We appreciate the feedback you have provided and will work with our staff to ensure the up most guest satisfaction. We appreciate you choosing to stay with us during a special time. We hope to see you soon.   Happy Traveling,   Sureya Atoura Front Office Supervisor Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary: when i checked in she asked if i wanted anything special.  i said a quiet room and she put me on the freeway.  the phone didnt work so i couldnt call the desk.  i went down and got a quieter room (111).  the heter didnt work and the maint man started mocking my voice ( my voice is different) then after we went to disney there was a new heater and i thought of taking a bath.  there was no stopper in the tub.  maint brought 1 but it was too big. but it didnt really matter becuse the hot water was lukewarm. the shower pressure was pretty bad too.  the jacuzzi was nice.  the pool was cold.  i liked the shuttle to the park and a ticket kiosk in the hotel.  it was fine for under $100 a nite
Manager Response: Hello Sgtwrench,   Thank you for sharing your experience with us. Feedback like yours helps us improve our guest satisfaction. We are so sorry that you did not have a stopper in your bathroom. We have informed the proper department managers of your overall experience. If you would like to further discuss your stay please feel free to contact us using the email below.   Best Regards,   Sureya Atoura Front Office Supervisor Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary: HORRIBLE HOTEL. I've never gone as far as to write a bad review in my life, but this is ridiculous. I stayed here on my birthday with my boyfriend, he went downstairs to use a microwave and while he was gone, a maintenance man walked in on me while I was in my underwear. He didn't even knock though he claimed he did. Yes, he was very apologetic but didn't report the incident to staff. It was 8PM and I was more than two hours from my home so I couldn't just "drive home" I stayed in the hotel and when my boyfriend reported what happened in the morning, the staff basically said we shouldn't have stayed there if we had that issue. Okay, picture this, it's my birthday and I'm really going to drive two hours at night in traffic and rain home after I paid $160 for a night in this
Manager Response: Hello kaseylomax,   Thank you so much to reaching out to us. We are delighted we were able to resolve all your concerns to ensure the up most satisfaction.  Best Regards,   Sureya Atoura Front Office Supervisor

Summary: We've stayed at worse but for the money & location this hotel really needs to step it up! It was clean, but lacked basic amenities such as an in-room microwave. We had to ask for more towels & water glasses on our 3rd day there. No breakfast option except for the $13 buffet style offered on-site. We used the Starbucks & mini-mart across the street.  We also asked for a wake-up call on our last day & it never materialized. Our friends stayed in a street level room and there were NO carpets--only cement floor! I feel they should have been informed of this.  We will not stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello oregontraveler2016,   Thank you for sharing your experience. We apologize about your wake-up call not being received. We have addressed your concerns to the proper department managers. If you would like to further discuss your stay please contact us using the email below.   Best Regards,   Sureya Atoura Front Office supervisor Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary: Had to wait 3 hours for my room.  Agree I arrived 8am but as a Platinum member I am used to early check in across Hotels in Asia.   Condition of the room  Feels wet & old  Noisy with the highway.   This is more of a motel.   Poor food options.   Housekeeping takes forever n first day did not even make my room even when I called for assistance.   Not sure how is this a SPG hotel.   Terrible
Manager Response: Hello Sukhbir,  Thank you for taking the time to give us feed back on your recent stay with us. We are sad to hear that you weren't happy about your stay. We are training everyday to ensure all guest have a great stay. We will make sure the right managers will hear your concerns. We are under going renovations to convert  to a Four Points by Sheraton in mid 2017. We would love to welcome you  back after our upgrading is complete.   Thank you,   Carolynn  Front Desk Supervisor

Summary Heading: Excellent service at the front desk!
Summary: I was here for the weekend of the Disney / Avengers Super Hero run (November 12, 2016).   One thing to note: I booked a stay from November 9-12 using Hotwire. I decided a week or so later to arrive on the night of the 8th but I couldn't add the extra night via Hotwire, and needed to book it directly through Hotel Menage. The only room I could book on the 8th was a single bed, but we'd have others joining us from the 9th-12th. When I called Hotel Menage initially, they said I'd have to check in on the 8th, check back out the morning of the 9th (and remove our belongings from the room), and then check back in the afternoon of the 9th.   We drove down from the bay area and arrived around 2 or 2:30 am. I was exhausted and the idea of checking out to check back in and move our bags
Manager Response: Hello Claire F,  THANK YOU FOR YOU FIVE STAR REVIEW! We are overjoyed that you enjoyed your stay with us! Thank you for the Kudos to our staff member Rodney, we will make him aware of your kind words. We hope to see you again this year for the Disney/ Avengers Super Hero run come November!  Happy Traveling!   Sureya Atoura Front Office Supervisor Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary: Yes the staff were friendly, and yes we had high thread-count sheets, and yes you can walk to Disneyland in 10 minutes, but that doesn't make up for the extreme highway noise that comes from being located right next to the 10-lane highway I-5. When the door to your room is closed, it's a bit quieter, although you can still hear it. However, since all doors open to the outside corridor (like a motel) the highway noise hits you right as you open the door. And yes, there is a nice pool area, but the hotel is designed so that the pool is on the highway side, so it's hard to hold a conversation over the highway noise. For us, it's hard to relax with that kind of noise.  Another disappointment for us was that when we told the staff that we were traveling with a dog (to its credit, the
Manager Response: Dear Ted G,   Thank you for sharing your experience. As a pet-friendly hotel, our first floor loft style  rooms accommodate all of our pet enthusiast guests. We apologize if your room type was not what you reserved. Our 24-hour front desk is available for guests anytime during their stay for assistance. Our staff works hard to ensure each guest stay is a positive and memorable one. We apologize if this was not the case with you. If you would like to further discuss your stay please feel free to contact me at the email below.  Regards,   Sureya Atoura Front Office Supervisor Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary: Our party of 6 stayed at the Hotel Menage for our family trip to Disneyland.  My wife and I with our daughters family chose the hotel due to its location to the park.  The Anaheim Resort Transport (ART) was easy to catch as it pulled into the Hotel parking lot and was handicap accessible as our son-in-law is confined to a motorized wheel chair. We stayed in rooms 115 and 116 with 116 being the accessible room with a roll in shower.  The only issue with the room was the bed was not high enough to fit the lift required to get our son-in-law in and out of bed.  I called the front desk and explained the situation.  They said they would look into it and get back to us.  They did just that.  They had nothing to elevate the bed so they went out and purchased raisers to lift the bed far
Manager Response: Good Morning Mr. Don D,   THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR YOUR FIVE STAR REVIEW!!!!! We are overjoyed we were able to accommodate you and your family during your stay! Our staff members go above and beyond to provide a guest service satisfaction that goes above industry standards. We thank you for your review and will absolutely inform our staff about your kind words.   Best Travels,   Sureya Atoura Front Office Supervisor Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary: This Hotel is an excellent Hotel.  Great, friendly service.  Great location for Disney.  Very clean.  Fun, nice pool area.  Great view of fireworks.  I read some negative reviews before coming and was pleased that was not our experience at all.
Manager Response: Hello Joe V!  THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR YOUR FIVE STAR REVIEW! We are delighted you enjoyed your overall stay with us! We appreciate the kind words about our staff and sincerely hope to see you soon!  Happy Traveling,   Sureya Atoura Front Office Supervisor Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary: We stayed in this hotel for 2 nights. The quality of the hotel is average, their gym is quite small and old, I would probably rate this place two to three stars. However, it's the service from one of the workers called A.J. impressed me. It was our first time to L.A. so we asked him many questions over the two nights of our stays. A.J. was nice and patience when helping us and he really Improved the quality of our trip! Definitely worth booking this hotel as long as they have good workers like AJ!
Manager Response: Hello Anceintzz,  THANK YOU FOR YOUR FIVE STAR REVIEW! We greatly appreciate the positive feedback you left our night audit AJ and will make him aware of your kind words. Our employees go above and beyond to provide a guest service satisfaction that goes above industry standards.  We hope to see you soon!   Happy Traveling!  Sureya Atoura Front Office Supervisor  Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary: If you want to be near Disney, I strongly recommend that you stay here. The pool will be an excellent option to rest after a long day at the park, also the staff is incredible, they were really helpful. Try to chose upper side rooms, because the noise from the traffic may be annoying.
Manager Response: Dear ROdonez,   Thank you for your four star review! We are delighted you enjoyed our close proximity to the Disneyland Resort area and 24-Hour pool access. Thank you for the kind words about our staff, our team ensures each guest stay is a positive and memorable one. We sincerely hope to see you soon!  Best Travels,   Sureya Atoura  Front Office Supervisor  Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights in early December.  The hotel is a bit run down but looks similar to all the other hotels in the area and is in process of an upgrade. We had a ground floor room on the quiet side and we were fine with the sound. All hotels in this area are next to a major road so I would ignore most noise reviews. The room had no carpet which was odd but everything else was standard and fine. The room was cleaned each day and our towels changed and bed made. The hotel is a short walk to disney and a lot of food places. If you have a car the road it is on takes you easily to a lot of places and right near the i5. Location suited us perfectly for our trip to disney as we could walk home midday and go back at night. Bed was comfy and shower hot and clean. Fridge in room
Manager Response: Dear Jcat85,  Thank you for taking the time to share you experience with us. As our renovation process continues, our guest rooms, lobby, and outside areas are beginning to transform into a Four Point by Sheraton- Anaheim. We are delighted you enjoyed our comfortable bed and close proximity to Disney! We hope to see you soon!  Best Travels,   Sureya Atoura Front Office Supervisor Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary: Before choosing to stay here, I reviewed my fellow travelers reviews, and really wasn't sure if I wanted to book 3 rooms for myself and family to celebrate my granddaughters 4th birthday at Disneyland.  So many negative reviews, and occasional good ones. Knowing the property had recently been purchased, and was being upgraded to meet SPG  standards was also a contributing factor on booking a week long stay.   I made the right decision.  2 things first to understand: (1) the property is located 15 minutes walking distance to Disneyland but located at the intersection of a major California freeway and 2 heavily trafficked arterial streets so the traffic does cause noise depending on your room and time of day.  (2) this 5 story hotel is undergoing a top to bottom remodel/upgrade
Manager Response: Dear Don B,  THANK YOU FOR YOUR FIVE STAR REVIEW!!!!!! As our renovation is underway we are excited our guests are already seeing a beautiful, positive difference being made. Our team is doing their best to limit construction noise/ hours to an acceptable time of day. Guests are still able to enjoy the 24-hour pool, and fantastic Disneyland holiday fireworks! We thank you for taking the time to share you experience and look forward to your future stay with us.  Happy Traveling!    Sureya Atoura Front Office Supervisor Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary: After reading the reviews, I was wary about staying here. Sure, the rooms are dated but are in the process of being updated. I found the rooms to be comfortable after a long day at Disneyland. There was some noise from the freeway but nothing too disruptive. I found the staff to be very helpful and friendly.  The hotel is only around 10-15 minutes walk to Disneyland (depending on how fast you walk) or you can catch the ART shuttle which comes every 20 mins. You can buy the tickets from a machine in the hotel next to the vending machines.
Manager Response: Hey Claire B,   Glad you did join us! We are excited about our renovations and it has already been a long processes. We hope that after we transform you will come back and see us!.  Thank you,  Skylar L Knowlton Operations Manager

Summary: Perfect location and fabulous staff! Geoffrey is wonderful! The pool is 24 hours and has the best view of the Disneyland fireworks. Disney is just a 15 minute walk away or there's a shuttle that comes every 20 minutes for $5/person. The rooms are super old and need updating but we weren't there to spend time in the room. My only complaint would be the cleaning... or lack of. We had to ask for towels, facecloths and coffee everyday and our room was super dusty. There was a table of dishes left pool side in the morning and were there that evening.  But we had a fabulous time and would stay again because I know they are renovating in the new year.
Manager Response: Hello Loriaclark!  Thank you so much for taking the time to review our property! Our proximity to the Disneyland Resort Area assures our guests will having an amazing view of the Disneyland fireworks. Our Hotel is currently undergoing a renovation which will refresh our guest rooms, lobby, and more! We apologize for the lack of cleanliness you had during your stay. We have reached out to the proper department heads and informed them of your concerns. We greatly appreciate your review and look forward to seeing you stay with us again soon!  Best Travels,   Sureya Atoura Front Office Supervisor  Sureya.Atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary: the rooms are at a motel six quality levels , shower curtain pole broken .....water spilled all over the bathroom. The second morning water pressure was just bad . Bar and  Restaurant areas are OK , the pool area looks great. Never told us about parking fee we ended up paying $14 Dl a day
Manager Response: Hello Joseherrera71,   Thank you for sharing your experience. Our property is currently undergoing a complete renovation that will refresh our guest rooms, lobby, pool and more. We would love to welcome you back in 2017.   Best Travels,   Sureya Atoura  Front Office Supervisor Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary: We booked the menage with the recommendation of STUDENT FLIGHTS Fountain gate  It was horrible the pool was closed the spa was closed the poolside bar was closed.  The room over looked 3 industrial waste bins. This was our once in a lifetime holiday and this place was bad. Enamel peeling off the bath and shower. The floor mat in the shower was stuck down with liquid nails. They cleaned the room one day with what i can only describe the smell as nail polish remover. I asked for a refund for what i can only describe as a dump and have heard nothing. student flights are now arguing that i should not have stayed there as by staying there i accepted these conditions.  They couldn't even get the room number on the room right DO NOT GO TO THIS PLACE
Manager Response: Dear Alannicholls61,   Thank you for taking the time to review our property. We apologize your stay was not an enjoyable one. Please use the email below to contact me at your earliest convenience. Our hotel is undergoing a full renovation which may include partial closure of our amenities. I look forward to hearing from you.   Regards,   Sureya Atoura Front Office Supervisor Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary: We checked into the Hotel Menage from 11/14-11/20.  The hotel runs with minimal staff but are very efficient.    Got to our rooms which were near the freeway.  The AC Is the old type with push buttons for cold high/low or hot high/low.  So the plus, the AC kinda blocks the sounds of the freeway.  The room had a small refrigerator, which turned out to be a huge plus.  Chevron is right across the street so you can stock up.  Our room had a king bed and a couch and coffee table.  The king bed was comfy.  What wasn't comfy was the bed frame which stuck out from the mattress.  My husband hurt himself twice hitting the corner on his shin, ouch!  It hurt me too.  My grandson also hurt himself on the bed frame.  I felt that too!  So the prevent anymore accidents, we put a pillow on each
Manager Response: Dear Lisa R,   Thank you for your four star review! Our property is in the Middle of a wonderful transformation process. We will be replacing all items in room as well as a fresh new look. We are delighted you enjoyed our overall stay with us. We sincerely hope you come re-visit with us once we are transformed into a Four Points by Sheraton-Anaheim!  Happy Holidays & Best travels,   Sureya Atoura Front Office Supervisor  Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary Heading: Great place and value for money
Summary: Short walk to Disneyland but there are shuttle services that come every 20 minutes which we took advantage of on some days.  Good value for money, clean rooms, friendly staff and kids enjoyed the pool area.  They had some minor renovations around the pool but it did not affect our stay.  Breakfast at the American tavern was great too. Nothing negative to say about this hotel.
Manager Response: Hello Ghie18,  Thank you for your four star review. Hotel Menage is a great and affordable hotel located in the heart of Anaheim. We are delighted you enjoyed your stay and look forward to seeing you very soon!   Happy Holidays,  Sureya Atoura Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com Front Office Supervisor

Summary: I have to say I really enjoyed my stay here. We walked to Disney all three days we had tickets the walk was short and pleasant. The service at the hotel was great and staff went out of their way to get the family to Legoland at short notice. The rooms are comfortable we had connecting doubles. All in all it was a great stay and I would highly recommend. We ate at the restaurant  twice and enjoyed it as well.
Manager Response: Dear Damon S,   THANK YOU FOR YOUR FIVE STAR REVIEW!!!!!!!!!! Our staff goes above and beyond to provide a guest service level that goes above industry standards. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your overall stay with us and look forward to seeing you soon!   Best Travels,   Sureya Atoura Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com Front Office Supervisor

Summary: Stayed here for 4 nights recently with my partner. Was a good value hotel with a nice staff (both could be improved tho).  The current renovations look to be due as aside from the amazing entrance lobby and pool area, the internal areas of the hotel could use an upgrade.  Parking was plentiful for $14 a day but by far the best part of the hotel is the amazing view of the breathtaking Disneyland fireworks nightly.   Would recommend staying here for sure, but keep an eye out for the end date of the renovations
Manager Response: Dear JamesNZL,   Thank you for your four star review. Our completion date for our renovations is set to be early 2017. The renovation will refresh our guest rooms, lobby, pool and more. We would love to welcome you back in 2017! We sincerely hope to see you soon!  Best Travels,  Sureya Atoura Front Office Supervisor  Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary: Stayed here for a trip to Disney with the kiddos. Booked on hotel.com and got a killer rate. We would have walked to the park every day, but my eldest had a stress fracture and was in a boot so we used the convenient ART bus. The hotel is set up to help you do that and the bus stops directly at the hotel. Huge benefit! Beds were very comfy. Hotel is under renovation, some guests said they had a concrete floor, we still had carpet, but the room can do with a little sprucing up. Just don't change the beds.  The staff was very good, kind, concerned and prompt! Had some great conversations with them. Loved that the pool was 24 hour access, and we could see the fireworks from it! Would recommend staying here.
Manager Response: Dear Lizylizy,   Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel! We are delighted to hear you enjoyed our 24-hour pool access. With our renovations under way keep an eye out for some great up and coming renovations! We hope to see you soon!  Best travels,   Sureya Atoura Front office supervisor sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary: we stayed at hotel ménage for Disneyland purposes!  The location was so easy, and the bus from the hotel to Disneyland was perfect! You can purchase the shuttle tickets in the hotel lobby, where the vending machines are! I highly recommend doing this!  I didn't have too much expectation as I had read a lot of reviews previously!  The lobby/entrance at the hotel is lovely, Geoffrey at the front desk was so helpful, and hilarious as well as professional!  The room itself was nothing to be excited about, and in my opinion could have done with a good dust, it was quite thick around the walls etc, there was also a pretty gross smell in the room which we think was from the bathroom/toilet. Bed was comfy, and if your coming here purely for a place to stay and not planning to spend much
Manager Response: Hello Rachh92!   Thank you for you four star review. Our proximity to the Disneyland Resort ensures guests are just one shuttle stop or ten minute walk away. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed the fantastic firework view our hotel offers! We would like to apologize for the cleanliness concerns you had during your stay and have notified the proper department managers regarding your concerns. Keep a look out as our hotel is currently under renovation in becoming a Four Points by Shearton- Anaheim come early next year! We hope to see you again soon,   Best Travels,   Sureya Atoura sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com Front Office Supervisor

Summary: We came to Anaheim for a Disneyland holiday. We found this hotel to be comfortable for the most part with friendly staff. The hotel needs upgrading and renovations but it is advertised it will become a Four Points Sheraton soon. We found the breakfast buffet reasonable and convenient before to heading into the park for the day. We had supper one evening on our arrival day which was ok other than my daughter finding a long hair in her fish fillet. The overall price for the hotel was at par compared to other hotels in the area. The walk to Disneyland seemed a bit long but only because we were fatigued from the long day in the park. There is a fair amount of traffic noise from the street and freeway but we knew that prior to booking the hotel. The 24 hour pool was nice to have at
Manager Response: Hey FishermanDarryl,  It was great to have you at our hotel and we are excited about our transformation! We hope to see you again soon.  Thank you,  Skylar L Knowlton

Summary Heading: Solid choice with pool and hot tub
Summary: The hotel room was comfortable enough, the furniture looked a bit run down but overall it was not bad. The view of the pool from the room was nice. The hotel is conveniently close to the Disney park. Customer service was mostly good, they were helpful with the check in and the check out and we were really impressed by the patience and professionalism displayed by the night auditor Rodney Aj Ullah! However, one of our party booked the airport shuttle but missed it and the hotel arranged alternative transport. He was told that it would cost just a little bit more than the $15 shuttle.  It actually cost $105. The staff member really ought to have checked the price before saying that. This was the only negative but it left a bad impression.
Manager Response: Dear j462,   Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We appreciate the kudos you have left our night auditor AJ, and will inform him of your kind words. We apologize for the miscommunication with transportation pricing and will inform our staff member properly explain all rates/costs to our guests. We thank you for your recent stay with us and look forward to your return!   Best Travels,   Sureya Atoura Front office supervisor  Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary: You can tell this place was bought as a fixer upper, but nothing has been done to maintain it since the initial coat of paint and fixture/furniture replacement. You walk into the lobby and you're fooled because that's the one area they've continued to spend tie on, go past that into a hall or elevator, and the mirage starts to fade. Paint is chipping everywhere, carpet is stained in the elevators, graffiti scratches are in the elevator, everything is drab and dirty, ice makers don't work, there's wires sticking out of walls all over the place. Our basic level room was horrible. The beds were comfy enough and fine, but the white washed walls were dingy and dirty,the carpet was pulling up on the sides, you could see poorly done crack repairs all over the drywall. The tub was
Manager Response: Dear Superkfk,   Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. Hotel Menage strives for each guest experience to be a positive one. We apologize if this was not the case with your stay. As our hotel is underway with our renovation process we are happy to reveal some of our newly renovated rooms will be available exclusively for our starwood preferred guests come late December.   Please feel free to contact me at your earliest convenience if you would like to further discuss your stay.   Regards,   Sureya Atoura Front Office Supervisor  Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary: Where to start?    Maybe the bare, cold cement floor with a crack running the entire length of the room?    Or the lumpy pillows, sagging bed and ill-fitted & coarse sheets?    Maybe the bedside electric outlets in the lamp fixtures that didn't accept standard charging cords for popular devices (android and Apple)?    Or the torn shower curtain or thread bear towels?  No, I think I'll start with the bolt sticking out of the bedframe that tore my daughter's brand new slacks and took a hunk out of her shin and left her bleeding and hobbling around Disneyland.  Oh, what a marvelous time ... NOT!  Save yourself the angst and stay somewhere else ... ANYWHERE else.
Manager Response: Hello Maleko1,  We are sorry to hear that your experience at our hotel. We are in the Middle of a transformation to Four Points by Sheraton. We will be replacing all items in room as well as a fresh new look. We hope that you will come see us again when we are fully remodeled.  Skylar L Knowlton Operations Manager

Summary: The only thing I liked about this hotel was the polite vallet staff. This hotel looks a bit beat down the elevators look shoddy. The pool was closed for renovation. And the food in the hotel restaurant was sub par.
Manager Response: Dear Samuel B,   Thank you for sharing your experience and kind words about our staff members.  Our engineers are in the works in converting our hotel this fall to a Four Points by Sheraton hotel which is set to be complete in early 2017. The renovation will refresh our guest rooms, lobby, pool and more. We would love to welcome you back in 2017! We have begun our exciting transformation, beginning with our fifth floor rooms, which will be available for our guests to enjoy come late December. We apologize your stay with us was not as enjoyable as we would have liked. If you would like to further discuss your stay please feel free to email me at your earliest convenience.  Best Regards,   Sureya Atoura Front office supervisor Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary Heading: The best hotel that we stayed at during our 2 month stay in USA
Summary: firstly, very clean hotel, loved the view from the room, good customer service and close to disneyland and resturants,  the staff memebers were friendly and helpful. the sights and sounds of the fireworks from disneyland were incredible. and that was from just outside our room. only thing we would say is that valet was not needed, for us anyway, and we did have to bring our luggage to our room. but otherwise, a great find
Manager Response: Hello RZAeatGLORIOUSfood!  Thank you for your four star review!!!! Our staff goes above and beyond to provide guest satisfaction that goes above industry standards. We are overjoyed your experience with us was a positive one. We hope to see you soon!  Best Travels,   Sureya Atoura Front Office Supervisor Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary: Stayed at Hotel Menage for 5 days.  This place needs renovating, which I believe is happening in the coming months. It looks very dated and tired  I can see alot of potential in this hotel but I think it has needed to be renovated for some time.  The tap for the shower bath was constantly running. The bed squeeked everytime I moved, not good when you are sharing the room with a friend and you want to get out of bed but you are worried you will wake them up.  The staff were great and housekeeping did the best with what they had to work with.  Close to Disneyland and transportation to Disneyland stops at the hotel all day.  I hope the renovations make this hotel to just ok to something great.
Manager Response: Dear Incubuschick,   Thank you for sharing your experience.  We are currently undergoing an extensive renovation and we will convert to a Four Points by Sheraton hotel in early 2017. The renovation will refresh our guest rooms, lobby, pool and more. We would love to welcome you back in 2017! We sincerely hope to see you soon!  Best Travels,  Sureya Atoura Front Office Supervisor  Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary: We've been staying at the Menage for several years as an alternative to the ever more expensive Disneyland hotels and enjoy the friendly serve, easy access to Disneyland and the outdoor pool which reminds us of Hawaii. With that said, currently the state of the hotel is worn out. The good news, they are now under going a complete renovation curtesy of The Starwood group. Now you can earn points and they are giving concessions for the inconvenience of the renovations.  Menus change but so far all our selections have been wonderful, from the soup to the spinach and goat cheese appetizer.  Will return!!
Manager Response: Hello DJchester320!  THANK YOU FOR YOUR FIVE STAR REVIEW!!!! Our construction is currently underway as we transform to a Four Points by Sheraton. Rennovations are expected to be complete in early 2017. The renovation will refresh our guest rooms, lobby, pool and more. We would love to welcome you back in 2017! We sincerely hope to see you soon!  Best Travels,  Sureya Atoura Front Office Supervisor  Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary: Really nice hotel, good value for money, hotel is just off the freeway but once you close door you don't hear the traffic much at all, best rooms are the one that face the pool you can see the fireworks from Disneyland from These rooms. Hotel is close enough to walk to. 👍🏽
Manager Response: Hi maz555,   Thank you for you four star review! Our proximity to Disney allows guests to walk to the Disney Parks at their convenience! Thank you for sharing your experience and we look forward to your future stay with us.   Best Travels,   Sureya Atoura Front office supervisor Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary: I was nervous because they're undergoing renovations and it is super close to the freeway, but it was great. There was no problem with noise at all. We literally could see the freeway from our window, but the room was silent. The bed was super comfy, and the room was very nice. They have a stop for the bus to Disneyland right out front--it was very convenient! I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello Danielle C,   THANK YOU FOR YOUR FIVE STAR REVIEW!!!!! Hotel Menage strives for "Five Star" service without the "Five Star" price! We are delighted you enjoyed your overall stay! We hope to see you soon!  Best Travels,   Sureya Atoura Front Office Supervisor Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary Heading: Shocked this is a Starwood hotel - very subpar
Summary: Location is great. If you want to be walking distance from Disneyland then this hotel is an option. and the reception folks were lovely.  Those are the only 2 positive things I can say. The room was of motel quality. The ENTIRE bathroom had peeling paint.  The room was only semi-clean. If you are on the pool side you will have absolutely NO privacy when opening shades as you go to your room via the outside. I used points to book this - if I had paid money, I would have found a different hotel for us to stay in. Beyond disappointed this is a starwood hotel - I was shocked. You hear everything from the people in the next rooms.  The fireworks didn't bother us as we expected them.
Manager Response: Dear LSS-Seattle,   Thank you for sharing your experience. Our engineers are in the works in converting our hotel this fall to a Four Points by Sheraton hotel which is set to be complete in early 2017. The renovation will refresh our guest rooms, lobby, pool and more. We would love to welcome you back in 2017! We have begun our exciting transformation, beginning with our fifth floor rooms, which will be available for our guests to enjoy come late December. We apologize your stay with us was not as enjoyable as we would have liked. If you would like to further discuss your stay please feel free to email me at your earliest convenience.  Best Regards,   Sureya Atoura Front office supervisor Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary Heading: Short shuttle bus trip to Disneyland
Summary: Short shuttle bus trip to Disneyland with view of the Disneyland nightly fireworks.  Sleep quality: Overall very good, just remember that there are fireworks from disneyland most nights at about 2130.  Bed and Pillow: bed was comfortable, pillow was soft and fluffy. There is no pillow menu available at this hotel  TV: Standard sized TV. Good reception, lots of channels  WIFI: Good strength overall within the hotel. Shower pressure: good  Hot water: nice and hot. Amenities: standard hotel shampoo, conditioner, and 2 bars of soap. Hair dryer  Bathroom cleanliness: overall very clean Hotel Greenness: like most hotels these days they promote having an ecofriendly stay.  Carpet cleanliness: overall looked pretty clean. Hard to tell with carpet, but there were no obvious stains on the
Manager Response: Hello Kikochan01!,  Thank you for you four star review! Hotel Menage is delighted to hear your stay was pleasant and enjoyable. Keep a look out for some up and coming upgrades to our property when we convert to a Four Points By Sheraton Anaheim come early 2017. We hope to see you again!   Best Travels,   Sureya Atoura Front office supervisor Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary: I would like to congratulate Geoffrey on our check in. We have stayed at several hotels on this trip and this was by far the best.. Geoffrey is an asset to the ménage hotel and should be congratulated for his service, he helped us with our check in, made sure we had a great room and also helped us with Disneyland tickets.  Thanks so much Geoffrey. Jenny 😄
Manager Response: Hey There Jenny A!  THANK YOU FOR YOUR 5 STAR REVIEW!!!!!!!! We thank you for taking the time to share the experience you had at our guest service desk! We appreciate the kudos you have given our staff member and will make him aware of your kind words! We hope to see you soon!  Best Travels,   Sureya Atoura Front office supervisor Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary: As always clean and fresh.   Missed Frank at the bar though !  Could do with more shaded areas but only for the baby so maybe a parasol or something but other than that fab.   Convenient, walking distance to Disney and another wonderful stay
Manager Response: Hey there Syandgem!  THANK YOU FOR YOUR FIVE STAR REVIEW! We are excited to hear you enjoyed your overall stay with us! Hotel Menage aims to make each guest experience a positive one.  We thank you for sharing your experience and look forward to your future stay with us!  Best Travels,   Sureya Atoura Front Office Supervisor  Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary: Was very nervous about this hotel after all the negative reviews, but all 3 of us were pleasantly surprised when we arrived.  Yes it's on the I-5 and yes it's loud because of that.  Yes it's 1/2 mile walk from Disneyland, all of this is reflected in the price we paid. There was no construction in the lobby or mess anywhere in the area that we saw, not sure what people are talking about with that.  Pool bar was open and we enjoyed a drink and dinner outside.  Room was clean and tidy, had lots of towels in the bathroom.  King sized bed was great, pull out couch not as comfortable, but it's a pull out after all.   Sure the hotel needs some updating, but we were happy with our choice and would stay there again when in Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear Cat H,   Thank you for you four star review! We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your overall stay with us! Please stay on the look out as our renovations continue as we transition to a  Four Points by Sheraton hotel in early 2017! We hope to see you soon!   Best Travels,   Sureya Atoura Front Office Supervisor  Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary Heading: Not a Real Starwood property yet
Summary: Only one of five floors has been renovated, and I guess you've got to be royalty to get one of those rooms. SPG Platinum wasn't good enough. My room was motel quality. The courtyard/pool noise overpowered the a/c hum. Parking requires a window pass and you must check in before you can access the lot. The transition continues until March 2017 and there's a LOT of work to do to make this into a Four Points.
Manager Response: Hi Kauai-Boz-Traveler,   Thank you for sharing you experience. We apologize for the miscommunication, however, no floor has been completed in our renovation process at this time.  We have begun our exciting transformation, beginning with our fifth floor rooms, which will be available for our guests to enjoy come late November. We apologize your stay with us was not as enjoyable as we would have liked. If you would like to further discuss your stay please feel free to email me at your earliest convenience.  Best Regards,   Sureya Atoura Front office supervisor Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary: Stayed in room 302 during July 2016 for 5 nights when we took our 2 yr to Disneyland.  Room was average.  You could tell the hotel was old with an attempt to make it presentable.  Carpet was dirty (my son's feet was black after running around barefoot) and we found a white larva looking bug on our carpet during our 2nd day (not sure if housecleaning dragged it in or how it got into our room).  Bathroom had no ventilation so it had a wet smell to it.  Bathroom sink was very slow in draining (one of my main annoyances).  Who wants to see my phlegm floating for 20 secs before barely draining. Nasty!  Bathtub had a detachable shower rod but we had the most difficult time to route the water from the shower head to the rod.  We eventually had to call maintenance to help us loosen the
Manager Response: Dear Jshutterbug,    Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. Hotel Menage aims to make each guest experience a positive one, we sincerely apologize if this was not the case during your stay.  We greatly appreciate your feedback and have addressed your maintenance and cleanliness concerns with the proper department managers.   Please contact me at your earliest convenience if you would like to further discuss your stay.   Regards,   Sureya Atoura Front Office Supervisor  Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary: We stayed here because we had family visiting from Northern California and we were all going to Disneyland together. My husband and I are Annual Passholders, so we come up to Anaheim a lot and stay in hotels for a night or two. My husband booked this hotel instead of the usual one we stay at that he gets at an employee discount because he wanted to surprise me and stay at a "nice" hotel. We checked in and the room is NOTHING like the pictures on the website. There is no carpet, the bathroom has mold, the whole room is dirty and run down. My husband went down to the front desk to tell them about the room and James was very apologetic and switched our rooms. Our new room did have carpet, but was just as dirty and run down. Not something that should be going for $150 a night. The
Manager Response: Hey crzyblonde23,  I wanted to reach out to you about the experience you had here at the Hotel Menage. I am truly sorry about your experience here and with the conversation I had with your husband. The first conversation I had with your husband (before your arrival) said he was here for a business trip with an interview. As per our policy, when booking through a third party we do not cancel any nights because it is pre-paid non-refundable. Of course, after the experience you had we want to take care of ALL our guest and make sure exceed expectations. We are transforming to be Four Points by Sheraton with going through renovations of ALL our rooms. I am unsure what you mean by owner since we at Starwood/Marriott. Hope that as we transition you would consider returning and our we product.  Skylar L Knowlton Operations Manager

Summary Heading: Good first impression, downhill from there.
Summary: Hotel has a nice reception area and gives a good first impression. The staff are polite and friendly but were not overly knowledgable of the area or helpful with questions about how to get around. The rooms are dated and in need of a refresh and more lighting. The room didn't feel overly secure. Location is a good proximity to disneyland and the walk is not bad. We used uber twice from disneyland and downtown disney which was between $5 and $6 each time. The restaurant down stairs is good, but a little expensive. The pool is nice. If hotel had a refresh done we would consider staying again, however we are more likely to stay somewhere right on top of disney next time around.
Manager Response: Dear Belle993,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. This fall our hotel will be undergoing an extensive renovation and we will convert to a Four Points by Sheraton hotel in early 2017. The renovation will refresh our guest rooms, lobby, pool and more. We would love to welcome you back in 2017! We sincerely hope to see you soon!  Best Travels,  Sureya Atoura Front Office Supervisor  Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary Heading: Close to Disney, Don't take the ART Shuttle
Summary: Hotel Menage is just across the freeway from Disneyland. It's so close that you can see the backlot of Disney behind It's A Small World.  The room was decent, smaller in size but it did have a mini-fridge. The bathroom didn't feel very clean and the decor was old but if you are looking for a place to sleep close to Disneyland without any fluff then Hotel Menage will work.  There is an onsite bar/restaurant that we ate at twice (breakfast & dinner) The valet staff was friendly and accommodating. Self park is $12, Vallet is $13. It was recommended that we take the shuttle, which we did ONCE. Going to Disneyland on the shuttle was simple and quick since Hotel Menage is the last pick up before DL. Returning back to the hotel after Disneyland was a long ride with several stops. The
Manager Response: Dear Trish S,   Thank you for sharing your experience with us. This fall our hotel will be undergoing an extensive renovation and we will convert to a Four Points by Sheraton hotel in early 2017. The renovation will refresh our guest rooms, lobby, pool and more. We would love to welcome you back in 2017.  We appreciate your feedback and have addressed your cleanliness concerns with the proper department managers.   Best Travels,   Sureya Atoura Front Office Supervisor  Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary Heading: Lovely stay and great location for Disney
Summary: This place was lovely, clean and had a decent food menu. The wifi was not very strong, otherwise a great stay and friendly staff. We stayed for 3 days and this place was family friendly, easy to get transfers around to the shopping outlets and just a short walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Nic K,   Thank you for your for star review! Our Staff goes above and beyond to provide a service that goes above industry standards! We are in close proximity to the Disneyland Resort area, only one stop away when you purchase the ART shuttle pass! We thank you for taking the time to share your experience regarding your recent stay with us! We hope to see you soon!   Best Travels,   Sureya Atoura Front Office Supervisor Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary: We stopped here for a few days, as a stop over on a round e world trip.  It was about an hour from LAX in a shuttle.  It is a short walk to Disney and has a nice pool area.  Watching the fireworks show from the pool was special, much better than keeping the kids at Disney till late at night.  It is close to the freeway, but we weren't bothered by the noise.  The food was OK.  We did have some strange credit card transactions from the hotel, that dropped off our account a week later, which was a bit strange, but came right.  There is a Starbucks, Taco Bell, gas station and pizza restaurant over the road, which is handy.
Manager Response: Dear, Nedbedrock,   Thank you for your four star review! We are delighted you enjoyed your overall stay with us!  As our transition is underway please be on the look out for our newly renovated rooms and more come early 2017. We sincerely hope to see you and your family soon!   Best Travels,   Sureya Atoura Front Office Supervisor Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary: This hotel was a horrible end to a fabulous holiday.  The hotel is surrounded by loud roads and a freeway.  I had requested a room away from the freeway/noise and was told the street side of the hotel was quiet. There is no quiet area in this hotel.  My room overlooked a loading bay and air conditioning rooms.  Each morning we were awoken by lorries reversing into the loading bay.    Where to start with what is wrong with this hotel.  Firstly on arrival we saw a sign in reception apologising for dust as there were works being carried out.  Our holiday company never informed us of this.  We were given our room key and told where to park.  We had to enter via a gateway to get us to the lifts.  As we entered there was a bag of dirty linen and dirty plates left by lift.  Not the
Manager Response: Dear Mejunie,   Thank you for sharing your experience. We sincerely apologize your recent stay with us was not a pleasurable one. Our guest experience supervisors and managers are on staff 24-hours to ensure any guest concerns brought to light are addressed.   Please feel free to contact me at your earliest convenience if you would like to further discuss your stay.   Regards,   Sureya Atoura Front Office Supervisor  Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary: If you are planning a trip to disneyland soon or near Anaheim, this is the place to stay. Friendly staff, clean rooms, comfortable beds. Near freeways and walking distance to Disneyland. Not to mention their restaurant is great, the food is amazing. We have stayed their a few times and the staff is always friendly. We just stayed there again this past weekend and Carolyn at the front desk was awesome....very friendly and helped us get everything situated when we thought we had booked a room online and turns out we didn't.
Manager Response: Dear, Asandoval1003,  THANK YOU FOR YOUR FIVE STAR REVIEW!!!!!!!! We appreciate the personal shout out you have given on of our staff members and will ensure she is made aware of your kind words. Our American Tavern Menu has been recently updated with some new menu items! We are overjoyed you had the opportunity to try it out!  We look forward to your future stay with us!  Best Travels,   Sureya Atoura Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com Front Office supervisor

Summary: This property is rated by most sites as a 31/2 to 4 star property.  It also is a Starwood property.  Beware!  This property is an overused, poorly maintained property that, at one time back in the 80's was a 3 1/2 Star property. After staying at the property for 4 nights and having an unusual odor from a place we couldn't find we pulled the sheets back to find that the mattress was urine stained.  The problem is, that they new it, unless they have never changed the sheets.  They were obviously aware of the problem and chose not to address it.  Additionally, the bathtub faucet ran constantly and the bathroom was small and dank. The property is undergoing a rennovation in 2017, but they don't tell you that before booking the hotel. Additionally the hotel sits on the corner of Ball
Manager Response: Dear Jay T,  Thank you for sharing your experience. Hotel Menage thrives to make each guest experience at our property a relaxing and pleasurable one; we apologize if this was not the case with your stay. Our Hotel Manager has reached out to you and is looking forward to your reply. As our transition is underway please be on the look out for our newly renovated rooms and more come early 2017.   Regards,   Sureya Atoura Front Office Supervisor Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary: This place seriously needs to step up their game as a Disneyland partner.  As far as location goes, awesome. Literally minutes from Disneyland and directly off a highway exit. Plenty of food and gas stations nearby, a few just across the street. Although they've got the awesome location going for them, the hotel itself really falls flat. Valet was awesome, check in was average, and at first glance the room was average too. Second glance, NO. Firstly, the bed's headboards had handprints on the in multiple spots in weird places. like really high up. Okay...gross for a few different reasons. The bathroom was closet size, you could barely open the door without hitting the toilet. Check out was terrible. The man was rude and left me standing there, whilst waiting for something to be
Manager Response: Dear ElzaJohanson,   Thank you for sharing your experience and kind words about our valet staff. Hotel Menage aims to make each guest experience a positive one, we sincerely apologize if this was not the case during your stay.   Please contact me at your earliest convenience if you would like to further discuss your stay.   Regards,   Sureya Atoura Front Office Supervisor  Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary: While it is true that this hotel is under going a much needed renovation, one thing that doesn't need changing is some wonderful employees!  Without going into too much detail, I had an unfortunate incident with yellow cab co.  The cab co was very unhelpful in tracking down the driver we had but the valet staff, Miguel and Kenny, went far above and beyond their job duties in tracking him down for me!  I am amazed at their level of concern for a guest- that is not something often seen!  Also, if you stay at this property make sure to get a drink from Frank at the bar.  He really helped make our stay much more fun with his engaging personality ( and great drinks).
Manager Response: Dear Karen G,   THANK YOU FOR YOUR FIVE STAR REVIEW!!!!!!! Our staff goes above and beyond industry standards to provide a memorable guest service experience. We appreciate the Kudos you have given our staff members and will make them aware of your kind words.  We look forward to your future stay with us!  Best Travels,   Sureya Atoura Front office supervisor Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary Heading: Good location, in need of an update.
