Summary: Spent 3 nights, 4 days and may have experienced one of the worst hotel stays ever.   The first room we checked into had a broken fridge, dirty walls and dirty tub.  We were offered another room the following day. The front desk staff person told us to wait in our rooms for our new room to be prepared. 20 minutes later, we called the front desk - no one answered. My husband went down to find out that the person was no longer at the front desk and FORGOT to call us. FINALLY, we got to our 'new' room which was identical to the first, except the fridge was in working order and the walls and tub were in better shape.   In general, the rooms were incredibly stuffy and the freeway made for a noisy stay.   Checking out was a DISASTER. There was a line of people (5-10 people) being
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Best Hotel...IF you have a pet
Summary: We think the location is great. Short walk to the park. We like having a restaurant in our hotel although we have never used it. Best thing about this hotel is that it let's you have a pet (if a pet room is available). Because of traffic noise, which doesn't bother us, the pets are essentially guaranteed of never being heard. There is a shuttle to the park which we used as a one way (to get there) for $3 each. You can get it for a whole day for $5. On the way there, Disneyland is the first stop. On the way back there are multiple stops before you get back to Menage. Quite frankly the worst thing about the hotel is the bed in multiple ways. It is noisy. It was not level. My wife severly injured her shin by running into extra bedframe that extends about 10" past the bed. When we
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel was noisy!! It sets under the freeway, and by two busy streets, so there is no getting away from the noise. The Disney fireworks over the pool were quite fantastic, but may be too loud for children... Rooms are DARK. The setting is beautiful. The location, just a little far for my walking comfort. Understaffed... so expect frustrations. Not impressed with a few key maintenance issues.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: I've stayed in many Disney Good Neighbor hotels, but probably wouldn't stay here again.
Summary: I was on the fence about staying here, but ultimately decided to try it because the price was a bit lower than other hotels. I read in reviews that the breakfast was nice, and the hotel offered a shuttle to Disney. Please know that neither breakfast nor the shuttle is free! The breakfast costs $15 pp,  the shuttle is $5 per person. So the money I saved by staying farther from the park was totally a wash. We used a GPS map to track our time and distance to the park. It was exactly 1.6 miles and a fast 15 minute pace to get to the park. Not really that close (though the front desk claims it's only a mile and 10 minutes...it's just not). If you're pushing strollers or walking with little kids, it will take longer. We did walk to the park the first day we stayed, again wanting to
Manager Response: none

Summary: My best friend and I visited Disneyland and wanted a hotel close to the park. We were really happy when we walked in the lobby. We had friendly staff and the hotel was nice. The pool is incredible! We loved lounging out on the patio. There is a lot of private seating. We rode the ART bus to get to the park, though we also walked a couple times. The nachos they have in the restaurant are bomb. I have been dreaming of them since I left. It was convenient to get meals all day long there. We are visiting again in November and we have already decided to stay there again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great hotel walking distance to the parks❗️Nice pool that's open 24 hours❗️great free wifi too❗️ Staff is super friendly, and they offer late checkouts as well❗️Pets are welcome as well with plenty of grassy areas for them❗️
Manager Response: none

Summary: We were going to spend five days in Anaheim and I read about this hotel and booked it on-line as a special. The special included breakfast each day and an upgrade to a room which had a view of the Disneyland fireworks if you stepped out onto the walkway in front of the room or looked through the drapes.   It was a very nice hotel with a really great breakfast, not your usual for a hotel. The views of the fireworks lived up to expectation and the hotel was about a 15 minute walk from the Disneyland gate. One minor issue I told the front desk about was dealt with to my complete satisfaction.   If we did not wish to walk, the hotel was a stop for the ART busses and we used them a few times, even to venture to a couple of places for shopping on our non park days.   The hotel was
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here for 15 nights while we toured the Los Angeles area.  Pros: -Helpful staff -Quiet rooms -Close to parks/shuttle bays -Great view of Disneyland fireworks -Pool was nice (spa could do with some work)  Cons: -Renovations meant we heard drilling noises in the daytime, one of the elevators was out of service and the foyer was dirty. It would have been nice to know this was going on when we booked. -Our room was in front of the elevator which meant we got no light. -Internet was slow during "peak times" -Some of the TV channels didn't work -The maid did not "clean", she/he only wiped things down
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff were so helpful with tips, booking passes and shuttles and giving us an extended checkout time when we were flying home. So close to Disneyland, a quick 15min walk. The restaurant had good food too. Wifi was good and there is a shuttle to the parks from the hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is a good hotel not to far from Disney... Is going thru remodeling and is right by the freeway but the bed was comfortable and clean. Many good places to eat around the area and nice pool and jacuzzi.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I had an amazing time at this hotel. The customer service is amazing! I recommended this to all my family. The pool is open 24 hours which is super nice after coming back from Disneyland. The food quality is amazing and important when unsure as to where to eat around the area.
Manager Response: none

Summary: You can see fireworks from Disneyland from the pool (and your room if you're facing south). Love the bartender Frank!! He was so nice and fun. Our room was perfect. Even though it looks far, it's just about a 10 minute walk to the front gates of Disneyland.  The beds are comfortable and rooms are very clean. We will only be staying here when in town for Disneyland. Great for families, couples, or friends trip!
Manager Response: Dear TheSandraShow,  Thank you so much for your incredible review of our hotel!  Our pool deck fireworks view is one of my favorite features of our hotel, and I'm glad you were able to enjoy it.  Thank you for your kind words about Frank.  I will make sure he knows you spoke well of him.    We're honored by your loyalty to our property and are excited to welcome you back in the future.  Warmest regards, Rich

Summary Heading: Don't Judge a Book by its Cover
Summary: The Hotel Menage was a fantastic base for our 3 days in Disneyland.  It was only a short stroll to the parks.  The rooms were clean and quite spacious.  We had an awesome view of the fireworks every night!  The staff are really fantastic, special mention to Jeffrey, who not only helped my husband book me a doctor when I became ill but called our room 3 times to check how I was going.  Would 100% recommend this hotel for anyone wanting decent accommodation close to Disneyland at a very reasonable price.
Manager Response: Dear Maffaz,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  I'm so glad you enjoyed the fireworks view.  I'm pleased that Geoffrey was able to assist you when you were not feeling well - I trust that you are better now.  We hope to see you again in the future!  Warmest regards, Rich

Summary: We stayed at this hotel so we could visit Disneyland. In close proximity but we chose to catch the shuttle for $5 return. It runs every 15 minutes. You could easily walk but we covered 32km in the park so it was a nice break to catch the bus back.  Hotel is undergoing much needed renovations. Pool area is nice. Hotel breakfast was $15 each and was pretty good. Coin operated laundry which was great. Self park was $12 or valet for $13. Staff were friendly.  Bathroom in hotel was small and needed upgrading. Our bathroom was not overly clean but OK.  A good choice for cheap accommodation when visiting Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Kyzash,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  I'm pleased you enjoyed our pool area and breakfast.  We are excited about our renovation which is scheduled to be finished by January 2017.  We hope to see you again soon!  Warmest regards,

Summary: If you want to spend time to relax this is the place.  We love the fact that is close to disneyland and shopping centers. We are planning to go back in a couple of months.  I will recommend it to family and friends
Manager Response: Dear Leticia M,  Thank you for your terrific review of our hotel!  I'm glad you had a relaxing stay.  We look forward to seeing you again for your next stay!  Warmest regards, Rich

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, good location for Disneyland, can see fireworks from pool
Summary: My family enjoyed our 2-night stay here.  We could walk to Disneyland...not too long of a walk.  We took the van on the way back to the hotel after a long day at the park, though.  Room was clean and comfortable.  Pool area was nice.  The best part about this hotel is that you can see the Disneyland fireworks from the pool and the view of the fireworks is great.  It was a highlight of the trip to watch fireworks from inside a pool.
Manager Response: Dear juliejames227,  Thank you for your fantastic review of our property!  I'm pleased you enjoyed our fireworks view.  We look forward to seeing you again soon!  Warmest regards,

Summary: I stayed at the hotel menage in the week of April 16 . First time staying here and I felt in the zone . Fast check in nice clean rooms awesome pool 24 hours tiki bar felt like Vegas lol . Front desk was very helpful Kent and Geoffrey were very hospitable I had a bad panic attack and they got me thru it . Really easy too get too Disney park . I would recommend too anyone who likes having fun and enjoys the outdoor heated pools and hot tubs . You can sit in the pool and hot tub and watch Disney fireworks with a cold beverage . Great food cold bevys awesome staff concierge boys can get your transportation around town and allow you too relax . Great job hotel menage I'll see you next time .
Manager Response: Dear Farley R,  Thank you so much for taking the time to share such a positive review about our hotel!  I'm pleased that Kent and Geoffrey were able to assist you.  We look forward to serving you again soon!  Warmest regards, Rich

Summary: Big plus includes walking distance to Disneyland, full view of DL fireworks and a super Breakfast buffet. Service was fantastic, especially Kent at the front desk. Dinner food quality was above average. One of my biggest concerns is bed quality. These were wonderful beds! Drawbacks: room was a little tired, especially bathtub area. AC was noisy first night, seem to get fixed after that. Overall I would return
Manager Response: Dear Bobbykart2014,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  I'm so pleased that Kent was able to provide excellent service to you, and that you enjoyed our restaurant.  I encourage you to come see the big changes in the look of the rooms next year!  We hope to see you again soon.  Warmest regards, Rich

Summary Heading: Great hotel...do not pay attention to the negative reviews!
Summary: If you didnt know the area and just read reviews of this hotel I would never stay there.  But we have always wondered about the hotel so last minute trip we booked a great rate ($129) two queen room.  We checked in on a Wednesday at about 5p and it was empty, check in was 5 min top and off to the room.  Small bar in the lobby never had  more then 3 people tops nice quite place to have a drink.  We had the 4th floor over looking the pool and the back of Disneyland.   Others posted about all the noise and hotel pool noise? 2 people in the heated pool and no music noise coming from pool.  Room was nice lot of room and carpet not cement like others posted. Bathroom was large and area to store suite cases.  We headed to downtown Disney for dinner. We drove a 5 min drive but in
Manager Response: Dear RollPositive,  Thank you for your great review!  We love being able to provide a great value in such a busy resort area.  Our rates and occupancy do vary, and it is good advice to book mid week and slower seasons for the best price point.  Thank you for staying with us!  We hope to see you again soon.  Warmest regards, Rich E

Summary: We stayed at the Hotel Menage again last week (April 18-21) and it was great!  Staff as usual were very inviting, friendly and willing to help with anything we needed!  The room was comfy and just what we needed after long days at Disneyland!  We stopped at the bar one night and had a very pleasant interlude.  We've already decided we're staying here again on our next trip!!  (We also stayed here last December!)
Manager Response: Dear Barbara R,  Thank you for your wonderful review of our hotel!  I'm so pleased you enjoyed your stay.  We look forward to seeing you again soon!  Warmest regards, Rich

Summary: We could not Fault anything at the the menage. The pool was cleaned every morning All staff were friendly and Extremely helpful answered every question. The only staff members name i remember is Geoffrey he was only 1 of the many staff. we had room kept very clean. Great view of the Disneyland fireworks and only a 10 min walk or a ART  Shuttle to the doorstep. Fully recommend it
Manager Response: Dear jarrod f,  Thank you for the glowing review!  And thank you for your kind words regarding Geoffrey and the rest of the staff.  Our pool deck is one of my favorite special features, with its Hawaiian Palapa Bar and fountain.  I'm so pleased you enjoyed your stay.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.  Warmest regards, Rich

Summary: The staff was friendly, My room very clean. I realize its a family hotel but more could be done about the kids being at the pool very late. Some issues with noise in the corridors. Our room was on the end facing the pool and every time somebody exited the gate we could hear it. We've stayed three times total. We just request not to get that room..
Manager Response: Dear Sandy M,  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us!  I'm pleased you were happy with our staff and our cleanliness.  We love our return guests and are so glad you have chosen us for multiple stays.  Our pool does have extended hours, and we would be happy to provide your room type in another area when available.  Warmest regards, Rich

Summary: Our room was clean and comfortable . Did not have issues hearing the freeway like past complaints I've seen. Saw the Disneyland fireworks right outside our room.   Jorge in the patio bar is amazing. He accommodated our every wish which often times meant him having to run in and out of the hotel to grab things to make our drinks and experience 100% ! Wonderful drinks even did some customs ones for us as well!
Manager Response: Dear Ashley T,  Thank you for your outstanding review!  I'm delighted that you received excellent service from Jorge, and that you enjoyed your stay.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warmest regards,

Summary Heading: Overall a good stay, but some cleanliness issues
Summary: We picked the hotel because it was marketed as a more adult, boutique hotel, and still within walking distance to the Disney Gates (we are two adults travelling alone). It was a great 15 min walk to the gates, and has a community shuttle stop if you prefer. Overall we had a good stay and would stay there again if the price was right. Just know the traffic noise on the poolside (south?) is VERY loud as the hotel overlooks the freeway.  The good: - Beautiful renovated lobby area - Generally friendly and helpful staff - Close to Disneyland and tons of restaurants; many restaurants deliver to hotel room. - Decent room - a bit rundown, but for the price/area it was of good size and fairly clean. They haven't put the effort into the room that they have into the lobby (ie walls need
Manager Response: Dear Travel_J33,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  I'm troubled to hear that you experienced some cleanliness issues in public areas during your stay.  We work hard to maintain high standards of cleanliness throughout the hotel, and it looks like we were not successful during your stay.  For that I am truly sorry.  We hope that you will stay with us again in the future.  Warmest regards,

Summary: My boyfriend and I stayed at this hotel when we were going to Disneyland and the inside is gorgeous and the staff were incredibly helpful. I believe his name was Edwin that helped get checked in, he answered all of our questions and never seemed frustrated. One perk is that they sell Disneyland tickets at the front desk and they also have a shuttle that runs back and forth between the park and hotel every 15-20mins. I'm not sure if they have fireworks every night but the night we were there they were going on right outside our door so if you enjoy fireworks request to be put on that side! Overall we had an outstanding stay at the menage.
Manager Response: Dear Danielle J,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel, and for the five-star review!  I'm glad that Edwin was able to help you feel welcome, and that you enjoyed our outstanding fireworks views.  We hope to see you again in the not-too-distant future.  Warmest regards,

Summary Heading: FUZZY BLACK MOLD AROUND WINDOWS! THIS HOTEL SHOULD BE A BIOHAZARD!
Summary: Of course we did not discover the mold until our last day because we avoided our hotel room like the bubonic plaque. It's unfortunate I can not post pictures or somehow share the smell to go along with this review, this hotel is a complete and total dive. This is our 3rd time booking a Disney trip with Getaway Today, the first 2 trips were great but after this experience it will most likely be our last. Lets start with our booking, Getaway Today asks the age of our 3 children, a teenager and 2 younger ones, they offer the Hotel Menage "a boutique hotel" that was capable of sleeping 5 people comfortably. We do not typically spend a bunch of time at our hotels when on vacation so we booked the 2 queens with a rollaway thinking it would work fine and the price seemed right, done.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We have stayed at the Hotel Ménage many times and each time has been great. They are very accommodating, there is little to no wait in the lobby to check in or out and the rooms are kept up and clean. I have read reviews where people complain about traffic noise but it has not been a problem for us. We don't really hear it with the door closed and we have stayed on both sides of the hotel. The hotel may be walking distance to/from Disneyland but we usually drive and park at the Disneyland parking structure. My only tiny complaint would be that sometimes it is difficult to find parking by your room at night but it's not enough to knock it down a star. This hotel is wonderful and has a great view of the fireworks if your room has a pool view. Also, the pool is awesome. We will
Manager Response: Dear Aka6245,  Thank you for taking the time to give such a glowing review!  I am so pleased that you have enjoyed the pool and the fireworks at our hotel.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.  Warmest regards,

Summary: We arrived here after 15 hours of travel and the staff were great and we got checked in really quickly. I booked directly with the hotel and requested a room in order to see the Disney fireworks. This did come at a cost and to be honest I wouldn't again. You can see the fireworks from most parts of the hotel and you have to come out of your room anyway. The highway is also incredibly noisy so not a good idea for light sleepers. BUT staff are great and place is clean with such easy access to Disney. Would go back !
Manager Response: Dear Karen G,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  I'm pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay, and were able to take advantage of our close proximity to Disneyland.  We hope to see you and your family again soon.  Warmest regards,

Summary: Nice and great hotel big pool that my kids love it the room was ok not too big like others easy check in check out. Great value for family to stay then going to disneyland. A 10- 15 mins walk going to the disneyland park     I like the happy hour at tavern not too bad !!!
Manager Response: Dear chef_jhayar,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  Our pool deck is a great place for kids, and also includes a ping pong table!  I'm pleased to hear that you were able to enjoy several of the amenities that we offer.  We hope to see you again in the near future.  Warmest regards,

Summary: The hotel customer service and on site bar/restaurant was great. The pool and hot tub was very nice and I was told it was open 24 hours... The room was fairly nice. Bed was comfy, there was a large tv, a couch... The bathroom has seen better days, needs to be resealed and caulked. The hotel rooms are like a motel 6 as the rooms doors are outside. This was a good place to sleep at an okay rate for CA.
Manager Response: Dear Jacqui I,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  I am pleased that you found the room comfortable, and the service to your liking.  We hope to see you again in the future.  Warmest regards,

Summary: We checked in to an upgrade pool view room.i reminded the desk agent of this as I checked in . We were given a room on the 5th floor at the end of the hall that overlooked the freeway. The only way we could see the pool was to hang over the rail and look left. The room was clean but so noisy. We thought we would not notice with the door closed. we were wrong and at night the noise was more noticeable. First thing in the morning I called and told them I needed a room change. They were accommodating and told us that we could remove our belongings before we went to the parks and another room would be readied. I called from the park at three because we wanted to return for a break and a rest because we had not slept well. They said our room would be ready when we got back and it
Manager Response: Dear lilyspal,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  I'm pleased that the Front Desk was able to accommodate your room move request.  I hope that you will consider staying with us again in the future.  Warmest regards,

Summary: The Ménage is in a great location 15 min walk from Disneyland but that is the ONLY reason to stay there. The room was grungy and the bathroom was disgusting. It was so mildew and smelled awful. Can't believe what it cost to stay in such a bad room.
Manager Response: Dear Martimariette44,   Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and share your experience on your recent stay with us. Our staff strives to provide a service level that goes above industry standards. We apologize if this was not the case during your stay with us. Please feel free to contact me at your earliest convenience if you would like to further discuss your stay.  Best Travels,   Sureya Atoura Front office supervisor Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary Heading: Visitors to Disneyland ,....a great value place to stay
Summary: Spent 3 nights at this Hotel in mid February 2016,..... And rate the Hotel very high,.....Spotlessly clean,....Comfortable, and easy walking distance to Disneyland, Staff were friendly,...Cleaners superb, and they had a bar, and proper breakfast area. Cost of breakfast was $13.95, and was done buffet style,.....eat all you can eat, and the choice was incredible,.... Streaky bacon coming out your ears,....Breakfast would set you up for the whole day,....rooms were comfortable,...Swimming pool at the rear,....We were up on the 3rd Floor, and although the road outside was a busy road,....... not that much traffic noise,....and great views,....Good size carpark,...I really enjoyed my stay here ...<Chris,...
Manager Response: Dear Aultz,   Thank you for your review! Hotel Menage strives in creating memorable guest experiences! Our staff strives to provide a service level that is above industry standards to make our guests feel comfortable and happy. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed dining at our American Tavern Eatery and enjoyed our daily breakfast buffet option! We hope to see you soon!  Best Travels,   Sureya Atoura Front office supervisor Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, great for adults. Amazing view of Disneyland Fireworks.
Summary: Nice hotel, noise was a bit of an issue though, most rooms face at least one of the highways as the hotel is built at the junction of 2 busy roads. I noticed it more on weekdays than the weekend.  The pool was nice and the spa was good.  The view of the Disney fireworks was amazing. They were being set off opposite the hotel so you are closer to them than you would be if you were in the park. I was in the room for one of the fireworks shows and did not notice any noise from this but my room faced away from the park.
Manager Response: Dear Jeanette E,   Thank you for taking the time for reviewing our hotel. Our proximity to Disney makes us the perfect spot to view the Disney fireworks! We are glad you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you soon!   Best Travels,   Sureya Atoura Front office supervisor Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary: Every member of the staff we encountered was beyond helpful. I rented the European Suite for my birthday. I had friend in for a small gathering and this room more than met our needs. Lots of comfortable seating.
Manager Response: Dear LorraineC72,  Thank you for your review!  We love hearing how guests use their time here for celebrations!  Happy belated birthday, and we hope to see you again next year.  Warmest regards,

Summary: My husband and I stayed at the menage for 7 days and it was great! The room was clean and spacious, the hotel restaurant served beautiful food, the pool area is a nice spot to relax and the staff were very helpful! The best thing about this place is the location! Walking distance to disneyland and restaurants and perfect spot for the fireworks every night! There are lots of shopping outlets nearby and you are out of the craziness of hollywood. There were lots of families staying there while we were there so it suits everyone.  I would definitely recommend staying here and I would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Sarah B,   THANK YOU FOR YOUR FIVE STAR REVIEW!!!!!! Our location ensures our guests are in close proximity to the Disneyland area! We strive to ensure our guests experiences go above industry standards to make each experience one that will last a lifetime! We greatly appreciate your recommendations and look forward to seeing you soon!   BEST TRAVELS,   Sureya Atoura Front office supervisor Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary: Everything about the hotel is an A++++ The location, 24 hour pool, firework view, breakfast, rooms & of course the staff!!!! The hotel Manager "Leo" goes above and beyond to make sure your stay is nothing but the best!!!!!! Thank you & we will back very soon!!!!!
Manager Response: Dear JuniorChacarria84,  THANK YOU FOR YOUR FIVE STAR REVIEW! Hotel Menage aims to make our guest experiences last a life time! We are truly pleased that you enjoyed your stay and look forward to seeing you soon!  Best travels,   Sureya Atoura Front office supervisor sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary Heading: Never again, not even if I'm  broke.
Summary: Place is nice looking on the outside,  but everything you read about this place from others is true. Hotel messed up our reservation that we made and checked us in on a room not checked out.  On our second day they deactivated our key card while we were still checked in.  Kids make crazy noise even till the A.M. when pool should be closed. Felt like a motel room. Only good part was being able to see the fireworks from there.
Manager Response: Dear Daniel R,   Thank you for sharing your experience. Our staff strives to provide a service level that is above industry standards. We apologize if this was not the case during your stay with us. Please feel free to contact me at your earliest convenience if you would like to further discuss your stay.  Best travels,   Sureya Atoura Front office supervisor  sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary Heading: Biggest Pro- OnlyTwo blocks from Disneyland!  Biggest Con- Not very clean & a bit loud
Summary: If the staff here wasn't as kind and helpful as they were, I would have been more likely to mark this review as "Poor."  The service couldn't be better at this hotel.  The staff was friendly and informative.    This hotel is VERY close to Disneyland!  It's only two blocks away and approximately a 20-minute walk (moderate pace) to the entrance of both parks and Downtown Disney.  Be prepared to cross a couple of LARGE intersections however. I would recommend taking the shuttle ($ 5 all day pass) if you have any mobility issues or can’t walk at a quick pace. You should know there are many other hotels we passed on the same street as this establishment so you have other options.    Upon our arrival at the room, we observed the room wasn’t cleaned thoroughly.  We found floss left
Manager Response: Dear Andrea D,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel, and for your kind words about our staff.  We strive to maintain high standards in all facets of our guest experience, but it sounds like your stay fell short.  I apologize for the cleanliness issues that you experienced.  Please feel free to contact me directly if you would like to discuss your stay further.  Warmest regards,

Summary: I try to keep my reviews positive and this hotel has a lot going for it, but it is unclear to me why we were given a room on the first floor facing next to the parking lot with a view of a wall, when the hotel was obviously nowhere near capacity. This room was creepy and insulting. It had no natural light, the ceiling was painted black and had exposed boiler room type of exposed pipes. It is the kind of room that should be the last room given by management or as a place for an employee to sleep. I hate to complain, but we called and requested a room change.  I had received a good rate on Hotel Tonight, and the deal was still sitting there on my phone at check-in, it was apparent also from the lack of people present in the bar, restaurant and pool area that the hotel was not
Manager Response: Dear OffshoreFlor,   Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We apologize if your experience was not a positive one. Feedback like yours assist us in providing a better guest experience. If you would like to further discuss your stay please feel free to contact us at the email listed below.  Best travels,   Sureya Atoura Front office supervisor sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary: After staying just over a year earlier I was wondering if my second stay would live up to my memories. I wasn't disappointed. Once again great service, friendly staff, and nice surroundings. Looking at booking my next trip at the moment and will be booking my stay at Hotel Menage once again.
Manager Response: Dear Dale S,   THANK YOU FOR YOUR FIVE STAR REVIEW!!! We are thrilled to hear you have chosen Hotel Menage as your choice hotel when visiting the Anaheim area! Thank you for being a loyal guest and we look forward to your upcoming stay with us!  Best travels and we will see you soon!  Sureya Atoura Front office supervisor Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary: I stayed here with a friend for 4 nights. Our check in was easy and the staff were very friendly. Our room was clean and had everything we needed. The hotel is a short walk to Disneyland or the ART shuttle comes regularly which takes you door to door. The hotel has a great pool which is the perfect place to view the fireworks if you're not at Disneyland! The restaurant attached does some good food and dinner is very reasonably priced however, unless you are having a big breakfast the buffet breakfast cost can be expensive.  Overall we had a great stay, I would stay here again and recommend to others.
Manager Response: Dear Lozz S,   THANK YOU FOR YOUR FIVE STAR REVIEW!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Hotel Menage aims to make each guest experience one that will last a lifetime! We appreciate your recommendations and sincerely hope to see you soon!   Best travels,   Sureya Atoura  Front office supervisor  Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for our Disneyland visit. I found a deal on travel zoo that included the parking and hot breakfast with a pool view. We did get a pool view, but we were on the end near the street so it was very noisy. I wanted to move, but we had already unpacked and we did not want to have to repack. The bed was fairly comfortable except the wooden base sticks out which caused me to hit it a few times in the middle of the night when heading to the bathroom. I learned my lesson to steer clear of that. The first morning the breakfast was great. There were eggs, bacon, sausage, pancakes muffins and toast. We chose this hotel because we knew the breakfast consisted of a lot of protein. My husband has a hard time with breads due to stomach surgery he had. However the second
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is an ideal hotel for those who are planning on visiting Disneyland. Wifi is slow, but free. Parking is $12 per day - sad to see they don't offer discounts for week long stays!  The hotel room itself is dark and loud, due to it literally being right next to the road.  Housekeeping service was good, and we didn't have any issues during our stay.   Recommended for young couples and families traveling to Disneyland Resort!
Manager Response: Dear christophermore,   Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that our housekeepers were able to meet your expectations. Please keep an eye out for some upcoming updates with our hotel!  Best travels,   Sureya Atoura Front office supervisor sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary: I purchased this through a "Third Party"- no where in the confirmation material was a "parking fee" listed. Hotel staff asked for the email confirmation to prove that it was not mentioned. I provided it. They didn't care. Still insisted on charging me for parking. But that was just the beginning. The man working at the front desk said he was going to put me in the "quietest section." The room was very loud  from traffic noise. I hope that wasn't the "quietest section." The room was OK- looks like quick and cheap redecorating. Several items I had gotten used to weren't included - such as laundry bags. The shower dripped all night. In order to sleep, I turned the fan on - which went off and on all night. Then when I went to actually use the shower in the morning, it would not
Manager Response: Dear destinationdoc,   Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. Feedback like yours greatly assists us in providing a better guest experience. We would like to apologize if your experience was not a positive one. Please know that the issues that you have listed will not be overlooked. If you would like to further discuss your stay please feel free to contact us at the email listed below.  Best travels,   Sureya Atoura Front office supervisor Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary: Lobby was beautiful, pool beautiful, employees fabulous!  Room was so disgusting we asked for our money back and went to another hotel.   I'm fairly certain the bed was a hand me down from the Flintstones. You could see the large indent on the bed from years of sleeping by on it. The walls were dirty, carpet had not been vacuumed.  When we checked in they said no smoking  in the room, and as soon as we walked in it reeked of cigarette smoke. And the AC barely worked. Right next to the freeway, lots of noise.
Manager Response: Dear Denise R,  Thank you for your review, feedback like yours assist us in providing a better guest experience. We would like to apologize if your experience was not a positive one.  If you would like to further discuss your stay please feel free to contact us at the email listed below.  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leo.flores@hotelmenage.com

Summary: Hotel Menage is an excellent hotel to take your family when holidaying in the Anaheim/Disneyland area. Not only were the staff exceptionally welcoming I think they were as sad to see us go as we were them. The resort was very clean,situated about 1 km from Disneyland main gates so you can walk or an awesome public shuttle service can pick you up at front of hotel for small daily charge. Hotel Menage has a late checkout time of 12 noon perfect if you have afternoon/evening airport departure. I will return again to Hotel Menage to see my good friends Leo,Jose and Frank who made our stay unforgettable.
Manager Response: Dear Mcdalee008,   THANK YOU FOR YOUR 5 STAR REVIEW!!!!!!!!!!! Hotel Menage strives to make each guest experience last a lifetime. Our staff members aim to go above industry standards to make our guests feel especially welcomed. We appreciate the kudos you have given our staff members and will ensure they are made aware of your kind words. We hope to see you soon!  Best travels,   Sureya Atoura Front office supervisor Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary: Bed was hard as a rock,no box springs, wooden frame went past the mattress(stubbed my foot a couple times).  Food was good, got a deal through Travelzoo.(free breakfast and free parking) which was very nice.  Staff were good.   Freeway noise is bad...You get a great view of the Disneyland fireworks each night...Nice pool and palm trees, very scenic.
Manager Response: Dear DJT0307,   Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We apologize if your stay was not a pleasant one. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our all american breakfast buffet. If you would like to further discuss your stay please feel free to email us at the email below.   Best travels,   Sureya Atoura Front office supervisor Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary: Spent 5 days here and found the hotel to be satisfactory for a budget hotel. Definitely not a boutique! The rooms are clean but very basic. The vanity is beautiful! However a chair for the dining table would be good. The bathroom is tiny! The pool area is nice and clean all though the pool was nowhere near warm and the chlorine in the spa makes your eyes burn just from being in the area. The outdoor bar looked good but it was never opened, they served drinks from there for a short time on a Sunday evening as there was a private function happening. The doormen and front desk were very friendly and helpful! The noise from the freeway is only just bearable. Never received the complimentary cocktails (non-drinker anyway) and ended up in a room with a nice view of the dumpsters and
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your recent experience. Hotel Menage is happy to hear you found the value you were seeking during your visit to the Anaheim Resort area. Please know that the issues that you have listed will not be overlooked. Please also look out for some new updates ahead with our hotel!   Best Travels,   Sureya Atoura Front office supervisor Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary Heading: Visiting Disneyland for a friend's surprise birthday celebration
Summary: While the grounds, pool, and breakfast were fine, our room and the room service needed significant improvement. Our check in staff member was a bit rude and didn't seem to care that we were there.   The carpet was worn and had stains. There was damage to the furniture and the bathroom was awful. We had to request towels as room service is only provided every other day.   See pictures for the damage to the bathtub and shower. Not worth the money. Choose a better option closer to the parks.
Manager Response: Dear Tony S,   Thank you for posting your recent experience. We apologize if your stay was not a pleasant one. Please know that the issues that you have listed will not be overlooked. If you would like to further discuss your stay. Please feel free to email us at the email listed below.  Best travels,   Sureya Atoura Front office supervisor Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary: I would recommend this hotel to a group of friends in their 20's. The location of the property is about a 15 minute walk to Disneyland but you do get a view of the nightly fireworks from your balcony. There is a shuttle bus from the hotel to Disneyland as well, you do have to buy a ticket for the bus which can be purchased in the lobby.  The rooms were nice and clean. The only bad thing I can say is that because of its location by the freeway you do hear the murmur of cars driving past, however that did not cause any problems for me and my friends.  The staff were extremely accommodating and friendly, they always greeted us with a smile and asked if we needed anything.  I'd defintely stay at Hotel Ménage again.
Manager Response: Dear Gypsymind,   Thank you for your review! We are ecstatic to hear you loved our hotel and would recommend it to your friends! Hotel Menage strives to ensure each guest stay is a memorable one! We hope to see you and your friends soon!  Best travels,   Sureya Atoura Front office supervisor  Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary: The Hotel Menage is actually a really unique hotel. The first thing you'll notice is the livelihood of the hotel. The atmosphere in the hotel is awesome. The front desk and valet agents were very helpful. I stayed for 1 night in a King Bed and a sofa sleeper. I was located on the 4th floor facing the pool. The room upon arrival was clean, well-appointed and looked appealing to stay in. The room was stocked with clean towels, clean linens, and plenty of amenities. I was facing the pool and the highway, but lucky enough I didn't hear the highway at all. I did go down the hotel restaurant and had a little dinner. The food was surprisingly really good, I was expecting just cheap bar food, but it was up to good standards. I noticed a lot of partying towards the later hours, which
Manager Response: none

Summary: I am a single Mom and took my 2 girls to Disneyland January 4th to January 14th. We checked in approx 2pm and the front Desk was friendly and efficient. The Lobby has a funky upbeat vibe and an open plan. We were assigned a room on the 2nd floor. Once we got up to the room, we were disappointed as it only had one bed and a sofa and not the best view of the pool. We had requested 2 beds and a pool view. However, we are fully aware that requests are just that and can not be guaranteed by the Hotel. We called down to Front Desk and the staff was understanding and accommodating.  They gave us an option of two other rooms and once we picked, they brought up the keys and only added a very minimal charge per night. We loved our new location!! We were on the top floor with a beautiful
Manager Response: Dear Florence M,   Thank you for our 5 STAR REVIEW!!! We are so delighted that you and your daughters enjoyed your stay! Our hotel aims to ensure each guest has an experience that will last a lifetime! We hope to see your family soon!  Best travels,   Sureya Atoura Front office supervisor  Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary: we stayed here for 3 nights and found it a clean reasonably priced hotel, ideally suited for families doing Disneyland, there's everything you need in close proximity, watching the fireworks from the pool is very cool, they have a guest laundry which is good after traveling a lot and having to find laundromats,there's vending machines, and  a good bar
Manager Response: Dear Ian & Julie,   Thank you for your review! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your overall stay with us. We hope to see you soon!  Best travels,   Sureya Atoura Front office supervisor  Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary: Was here for a few days to visit Los Angeles and Disneyland for the 60th anniversary. Staff were welcoming and very helpful, especially Michael on the desk in the mornings. He was kind and helped us out when we were wanting to go to Los Angeles and other areas and helped us in using the uber app and made sure the driver picked us up. He also helped us with the shuttle bus from the hotel to Disneyland, which was literally about 5 minutes away which was very ideal for someone like me who loves Disney. The rooms were clean and big enough for my friend and myself, the shower could be updated but it wasn't that bad and also a lovely view from my room over looking the pool and the fireworks at night from Disneyland. We had dinner in the bistro one night and was very pleased with the
Manager Response: Dear Mhari M,   Thank you for your review! Our staff members strive to make each individual guest stay memorable. Please look out for some new updates with our hotel ! We hope to see you soon!  Best Travels,   Sureya Atoura Front office supervisor Sureya.atoura@hotelmenage.com

Summary: I'm reviewing this hotel as a parent of young kids, and giving weight to the fact that this hotel is a Disneyland Good Neighbor Hotel. We just came back from a Sunday night stay in February. I chose this hotel because of the price, and the availability of a room with a king bed and sofa sleeper, a perfect set up for our family. Even with $12 parking (which covered us all the way till midnight the next day), this hotel was one of the cheapest options that night for a king bed within walking distance to Disneyland. Upon check in, I got a trendy, slick vibe that kinda made me feel like kids might be out of place. The front desk staff was polite. Parking was easy and ample during our stay. I had requested a quiet room, but we ended up on only the second floor, right in front of the
