You do however have to catch a bus to & from Disneyland that costs $2.50 OR you can do the 15 minute walk if the weather permits.   Our main reason for booking this hotel was the only 24 hour heated pool in the county. Brilliant right? especially right in the middle of a mildly chilly So-CAL winter. Wrong - the water was tepid at best & the heated spa smelled & felt as if you had immersed your body into a Chernobyl Reactor (very chemically). Also, be careful around the pool surrounds when you get out. I slipped & fell hard.  but that's ok
Manager Response: Dear connie t  Thank you for posting your review.  We are happy to hear that you found the value you were looking for at Hotel Menage.  We are also happy to hear that you enjoyed the front row seat to the Disney fireworks.  Best Travels,  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: Stayed at hotel for a trip to Disneyland. Very close to park and is walking distance. Hotel is clean and staff is friendly and helpful. Hot tub was small but nice and pool area is clean and kept up. Outdoor bar was fun to sit at, but bartender are not up to par with their drinks. Inside bartender was almost clueless on drinks. The hotel is right next to freeway, so you do hear alot of freeway noise. Over all it is a very nice and friendly place to stay!
Manager Response: Dear Roger M  Thank you so much for your review!  We are truly happy to hear that you found our outdoor area comfortable, and our staff friendly.    Best Travels,  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: This was our first hotel of our holiday, and not a good first impression. The rooms and hotel are very tired and smell very stale. The air conditioning machines are vintage. The hotel is a convenient 10 minute walk to the Disney parks, but there are many more hotels closer and more convenient. The hotel is used by many local traveling businessmen, and whilst we where staying they did not make the outside bar area very family friendly. The food and service in the hotel was outstanding, and the staff were very accommodating. The laundry facilities where not sufficient for the size of the hotel. The hotel is on a major intersection on one side, and the main interstate fwy on the other side, so traffic noise is an issue, but we were so tired each night slept through it. The ART bus
Manager Response: Dear Russell C,  Thank you for For taking time out of your day to post your review.  We are happy to hear that you found the value you were looking wile visiting the Disneyland resort area.  Please know that your feedback is important to us.    Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: My friend and I stayed at the Hotel Menage in January for 3 nights to visit The Disneyland parks. Great location, only a short 10-15 minute walk to the parks which was very convenient. Located near the highway however it was surprisingly quiet in our room. We stayed in a double queen room which was spacious and had a nice bathroom. Loved the pool and spa area too. The restaurant was lovely (we ate there 2 out of the 3 nights) and there were great happy hour specials. The wifi wasn't that fab however we were compensated with free cocktails which made up for it in our opinion! A special mention to Erik at the front desk who helped us out with everything we needed to know and laughed along with our stupid jokes :)  Overall a great stay at the hotel with lovely staff, would
Manager Response: Dear Ashsh_44  Thank you so much for your FIVE STAR review!  We are thrilled to hear that you truly enjoyed your stay!  We are happy to hear that you got a chance to experience our great restaurant and happy hour deals.  We will definitely share the kind words you had about Erik, he will be excited With the recognition.  We hope to see you and your friends soon!  Leo Flores, Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: I stayed here for 6 nights, the room was average and smelt a bit odd but the staff were lovely and always happy to help with anything. A $150 deposit was taken off my card and after 4 days is still not back in my account which I am slightly annoyed about. Big thumbs up to the staff, they were definitely the best part of our stay
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time out of your day to post your review.  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the level of customer service that was provided.  Best Travels,  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: I stayed here for 2 nights on a business trip in February 2015. There were very few hotel options available due to the conference I was attending. I had a king room that was recently updated. The room was tastefully decorated and clean. Noise is a problem as guests walk by the door and the I-5 traffic that is very close.    Use the valet service as it is only $1 more per day than self parking. I was unable to get the wifi to work and when I mentioned it to the staff they laughed and said it is being worked on. The staff at the hotel was friendly and helpful.    The interior common areas could use an update. Access from Harbor and Ball roads can be frustrating depending on the direction you are coming from.
Manager Response: Dear fardog1,  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience with Hotel Ménage. Your feedback is truly appreciated. Please know we are diligently working on improving our wifi,   Best Travels,   Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: We travel often to Disneyland and this was our first time to Menage which was highly recommended by family. We were told to ask for room on the first floor by the pool. At check in we were told that the rooms on the first floor were concrete but that there was a rug that covered 75% of the floor. Yeah, maybe 10% which does not feel good on sore feet that have been walking at the park all day. It was noisy next to the pool but that honestly didn't bother me. I have older children and they can sleep through anything. For our family the location was not convenient. Too long of a walk for kids and kind of scary at night and we did not like being at the mercy of trams and buses. Best Western Anaheim Inn and Candy Cane Inn are definitely the way to go. The valet staff was awesome and
Manager Response: Dear WONDERSMOM,  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience with Hotel Ménage. Your feedback is truly appreciated.   Best Travels,  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary Heading: The only way this hotel was able to redeem itself was the bed was like a fluffy cloud!
Summary: Let me tell the good things about the hotel first.  It is very conveniently located to Disneyland.  There is a shuttle that picks you up and its a less than 5 min ride to the park.   Buy a three day ticket for a discount and you can come and go unlimited times.  Starbucks and Taco Bell is right across the street.  Valet parking is $1 more than regular parking.   The valet employees are the nicest group of people. They run to get your car.  There is a great pool where the fireworks from Disneyland are clearly visible.  The rooms are not only dated but need maintenance.   The wood inside the bathroom door is chipping off and the tub is only a foot tall, barely room for a toddler.  The water pressure is minimal.  There is only a small frig and no microwave.   There is a shared
Manager Response: Dear SilverFallsCoffeeCo,  Thank you for taking time out of your day to post your review.  Your feedback is very valuable to us, as it assist us in providing an ultimate guest experience.  The issues you have mentioned will not be overlooked.  Best Travels,  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary Heading: Great Place to stay with friends & Party
Summary: We enjoyed this hotel, Staff very friendly and accommodating, rooms cleaned well every day, The Concierge very knowledgeable, restaurant has a good menu and a 4-7 happy hour menu every day, for those on a budget or needing a snack.  It can get be noisy, If you stay on the side of the pool, Pool & Hot tub open 24 hours a day.) you can see the fireworks from Disneyland on Friday and Saturday nights. Its quieter on the other side of hotel but can't see the fireworks. All in all we enjoyed our stay at the Ménage Hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Shipmates,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. Your feedback is extremely vital and appreciated by our Team.  Our Staff is delighted to know you were pleased with our accommodations.  We do look forward to seeing you again, and thank you for choosing to stay with Hotel Ménage.   Leo Flores front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: I have mixed feelings about Hotel Menage. The check-in area, restaurant, lobby, pool and the inside of the rooms look great... the part I did not like were the halls of the buildings: not sure if it's the brown color or maybe the property is old. However; once we got in the room, it all changed: the room is nicely decorated, has all the basics, nothing pretentious. We stayed on the 5th floor facing the highway, a room with 1 King bed. No noise from the outside inside the room, which was great, since the highway is very loud.    Didn't have time to use the pool, but it looks amazing! Customer service is great, from the valet guy to the front desk and restaurant personnel. Will definitely come back to this hotel in case I go back to Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear dreamer8313,  Thank you so much for posting your review,  We are happy to hear that you truly enjoyed your stay.  We look forward to having you as guest, on your next trip!  Best travels,  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary Heading: Reserving the Asian Suite is a must
Summary: Opt for the Asian Suite, as the living space with all the furniture and wall mounted widescreen tv's is nice. You could get 10 people in the large shower with the multi jets on the wall with the nice zen colors. This hotel is walking distance to Disney Land. There are many restaurants and shopping in the area, making this hotel a great choice for Anaheim. The room as stated is well appointed, the front desk staff is very friendly and helpful. It has an on site restaurant and bar, with a second bar pool side. Pool is heated and there is also a hot tub to soak in. The terrace around the pool and bar is most inviting with beautiful landscaping. I will return here again.
Manager Response: Dear EWBrown  Thank you so much for your FIVE STAR REVIEW!  We are excited to hear that you enjoyed your stay in the Asia suite.  The Asia suite is definitely a treat.  We look forward to having you as a guest soon!  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: we stayed here in november last year for 12 nights,,with my partner and freind.. short walk to disneyland and some good resturants ,,brekky here was good all you can eat for $14,,,everynight you cld hear and see the firworks from disneyland we were on the 3rd foor ..staff were very helpfull and polite ,,very close to freeway but we cldnt hear it at all ,,,we would stay here again no problems
Manager Response: Dear Wayne H  Thank you so much for your review!  We are happy to hear that you truly enjoyed your stay.  We look forward to having you as guest soon!  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary Heading: Good for Disneyland on a budget...
Summary: A friend and I stayed at The Menage for 5 nights in February.  The hotel rooms are average and a bit dated but our room was clean and the beds were comfortable.  The bathrooms are a little on the small side.  The hotel is right next door to Disneyland and is a lot cheaper than staying at a Disney hotel.  You can walk to Disneyland or catch the ART bus which stopped right outside the hotel.  The restaurant at the hotel was reasonably priced and offered a great buffet breakfast which we took advantage of.  There is a large pool and spa which is nice after a day at the theme parks.  The staff were mostly friendly but not overly attentive.
Manager Response: Dear Melissa C,  Thank you for taking time out of our day to post your review.  We are happy to hear that Hotel Menage offered the value that you were looking for, when visiting the Anaheim Resort.  Best Travels!  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: Hotel Menage was really good, great location, 10 minute walk to Disneyland. Staff were really friendly and helpful. We had purchases sent to the hotel and we didn't have to pay extra to have it dropped there! Big win! :) we would definitely go back 😊
Manager Response: Dear Melony O  Thank you so much for your review!  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay! Our proximity to Disneyland makes Hotel Menage a great option for those guest that would like to walk.  We Hope to see you soon!  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: The customer service was the best  from all the hotels we have stay in the states ...the guys at the service desk were amazing specially Erik made us feel at home.  The rooms where was always  clean &  we got  fresh  clean  towels everyday & our  beds  made.  & close to everything With  walking distant  to Disneyland places to eat   i will give this hotel  5Plus
Manager Response: Dear mariella1969  Thank you so much for your FIVE STAR REVIEW!  We are thrilled to know that you truly enjoyed your stay with us!  We always strive to provide the same great customer service that was provided to you to all our guest!  Erik will be happy to hear that you mentioned his name.  Best Travels!  Leo Flores  Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: My Husby and I stayed here last weekend for a stay-cation. The $$was great, poolside bar really cool, the room was everything they advertise, clean modern etc. We are used to traffic noises in our own busy city so hearing the freeway was more like white noise if anything. If u are used to hearing crickets and aren't used to city noise u may want to request a room opposite of the freeway. Overall great time and we will be back!
Manager Response: Dear Mousehouse4me,  Thank you very much for your  FIVE STAR REVIEW!  We are thrilled to hear that you truly enjoyed your stay.  We look forward to to hosting your next staycation.  Best Travels,  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: Its good in general, only one thind made be upset which was the internet connection (very slow and bad connection - worst ever ), otherwhise the place was good, lovely beautiful outdoor area, 15 minutes walk away from disney
Manager Response: Dear haboosh85,  Thank you for your review.  Please know that we are working diligently on resolving the wifi issue.  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our out door area.  Best Travels,  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: My experience with with Hotel Menage was absolutely fantastic! We used their advanced booking, non-refundable room rates. At first, I was hesitant in doing so, due to the inability to change hotels mid-trip. However, after the first evening and night, I was sure that I'd be staying.   - The pool/hot tub area were immaculate and well taken care of. -The American Tavern restaurant and bar served great food at a reasonable price. They also have a great Happy Hour environment, with cheap appetizers and cocktails. -The staff were extremely accommodating and polite. -There was ALWAYS someone keeping an eye on the ART. So, we always had an accurate time estimate for the next bus. The only hitch in my stay (slight trouble with bathroom door) was remedied quickly and I was given a
Manager Response: Dear CoreyAnderson,  Thank you very much for your FIVE STAR REVIEW!  We are thrilled to hear that your experience at Hotel Menage was a positive one.  We strive to provide the same great experience that you had, to all guests that visit us.  We look forward to having you as a guest soon!  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: We stayed at Hotel Menage Jan 2015.  The service was amazing, the rooms were clean & tidy.  BUT most importantly our daughter left her bag in the toilet in the lobby with lots of 'special things', camera & her own pocket money.  We reported to the hotel as soon as we realized, it didn't turn up while we were there.  However in today's post we received the bag, the camera, all the special things & the money.   Truly amazing, so very grateful, thank you for everything to Leo & the team at Hotel Menage. I strongly recommend this hotel for lots of reason, but mostly because they truly care about each & every guest
Manager Response: none

Summary: Good things  The hotel menage is a good hotel for the price, staff were very pleasant and helpful. Always around to help out if anything was needed. Very close to Disneyland and access to freeways to get other places as well. Free parking in this area....huge bonus...  rooms are very spacious and there is a fridge for small groceries  Downside  This hotel is located in a triangle of land between the I5 (5 lanes of traffic each direction) Harbour Blvd and Ball road. This makes it a very very noisy location. It is also across the I5 from Small World where they have evening fire works...you will have an Awesome view of them, better than in the park actually...but it also sounds like the hotel is being bombed, windows shake etc. First night there I had forgotten about this and was
Manager Response: Dear pinkyrayne,  Thank you for your review.  We are happy to hear that Hotel Menage was the value you were looking for during your trip to the resort area.  We are looking to improve in the near future some of the issues you mentioned on your review.  Best Travels!  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary Heading: Fantastic Family Friendly Hotel in Excellent Location
Summary: Stayed with Hotel Menage October 14,15,16 &  again on 28/10/2014 on a family Holiday to USA. Awesome team from Housekeeping to Front Office, Restaurant & Valet team. Facilities suited us perfectly with a nice swimming pool, great friendly lobby bar, restaurant. Excellent location, within walking distance to Disney and right on freeway for getting about and heading south to Mexico for a day trip. Special mention to Leo, Front Office Manager & Frank, Bar Manager for making us feel valued and all the team for allowing us to take over the lobby seating for our evening enjoyment and drinks. Highly recommended. See you guys again later in 2015.
Manager Response: Dear Mr Coulter  Thank you for your FIVE STAR REVIEW!  Mr. Coulter it was a pleasure having you and your family here with us.  We are happy to hear that you experienced and enjoyed every aspect of Hotel Menage.  I do appreciate the kind words, and I will share them with Frank as well.  We look forward to seeing you again in 2015!  I will make sure Frank keeps the drinks cold.  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: I stayed here with my husband for two nights. We were visiting Disneyland for the weekend. We checked in with no problems and were greeted by kind people. The room was much bigger than we expected, so we were very happy with the accommodations. Every night we watched the Disneyland fireworks from the balcony, so much better not being crammed in the park with thousands of other people. Other than the fireworks, its was very peaceful and quiet.  The buffet breakfast every morning was absolutely delicious. It was well worth the $15 per person. The dining area was very open and easy to walk around the other tables without bumping the people around you.  Check out was easy and smooth. Everyone working there was a delight. I only wish we could've stayed longer so we could've tried out
Manager Response: Dear Darlene G,  Thank you so much for your FIVE star review!  We are thrilled to hear that you truly enjoyed your experience at Hotel Menage.  We are glad that you were able to enjoy the Disneyland fireworks from outside the room!    We look forward to having you as a guest SOON!  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary Heading: Poor customer service for disabled people
Summary: foPoor customer service. Requested disabled rooms with 2 beds in 3 rooms on Dec 25 for 4 nights with adjoining rooms. They sent us alone to the 4 floor room 402, 404, 406. They were the farthest away from the elevator, not disabled, only 1 bed, and so noisy that you could not hear each other. They moved us to the first floor Not disabled, only 1 bed, and not adjoining. The tub would not drain while taking a shower and during the shower chunks of black stuff started coming into the water that I was standing in. The refrigerator did not keep even a bottle of water cool, much less the yogurt went bad, along with the cheese. The manager refused to discount our room because the were completely booked, but did offer to send an email for a free room x 3 for a future stay, which we have
Manager Response: Dear Sweetpeajr,  Thank you for taking time out of your day to post your review.  We apologize if your experience with us was not a pleasant one.  We always do everything in our power to fulfill any guest request. Our ADA rooms are strategically placed throughout the Hotel, from the first floor to the fifth floor.  To ensure every guest has the same opportunity on their location preference.  Unfortunately the room configuration that you requested does not exists on our property being either standard rooms or Accessible rooms.   We are also ADA compliant throughout the Hotel including  but not limited to our 24 pool, our Palapa Bar Area, and our restaurant.  If you would like to further discuss any of the issues listed in your post please contact me via Email at any time to the email listed below.  Thank you.  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: as always great service, great food, great cocktails, clean, fab location.  2nd stay as a family from the uk with a baby, excellent assistance for helping with the baby.  we stayed for 10 days.   perfect base walking distance from disney even for my hubby who has bad legs.   cofortable seating around the pool
Manager Response: Dear syandgem,  Thank you so much for your FIVE star review!  We really appreciate the continued loyalty and are thrilled to hear this is the place for you when you return to the Anaheim Resort area.   We look forward to serving you and your family soon!  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary Heading: Basic, Clean and Great Restaurant but a bit noisy
Summary: As other guests has reported the Hotel Menage is in a fantastic location for a trip to Disneyland. Only 10 mins walk up the road and you're there. Parking was also easy and reasonably priced in my opinion. I chose this hotel due to the great value rate we got and was pleased with the reality. The room was spacious, had everything you need and a comfy bed. The only downside was the noise of the freeway but nothing that couldn't be solved with a good pair of earplugs (I never travel anywhere without my Heroes earplugs - if you are a light sleeper they are amazing). The best part about the hotel is the bar and restaurant. The meals we had there were outstanding although it was weird being checked for ID at the bar given we are a married couple in our mid thirties.
Manager Response: Dear SezzieM  Thank you very much for taking time out of your day to post your review.  We are excited to know you enjoyed yourself during your recent stay with us!  We can’t wait to have you as our guest again!  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: At first because of the reviews I was a bit skeptical of this hotel and in fact I had another hotel booked for back up just in case I didn't like it.  It has a nice restaurant in it.  The food was great.  You walked in to an inviting lobby and the bell men outside were phenomenal, always holding doors, wishing you well and greeting you as you came into the hotel.  Anything we needed for our room was taken care of right away.  I mean we would barely get off the phone with the front desk and BOOM, it was there.  The ART system was great and timely.  Yes this hotel is next to the freeway but is not bothersome in the rooms.  When you shut the door, you can not even hear it.  Every night you hear and see the fireworks at Disneyland which was great.  The bar downstairs was hopping at
Manager Response: Dear travelgrl4life,  Thank you for your FIVE STAR review!  We are thrilled to hear that you truly enjoyed your stay. , our American Tavern Eatery menu, and Happy Hour l is always a hit and we are very pleased to know you enjoyed it as well.  We always strive to provide the same great service that you received!  We are happy that you found us and cannot wait for your next visit!  Leo Flores Front Desk Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: We stayed here for 5 nights on the top floor, we were wrecked but when we got into the room there was a large white stain on the carpet next to the bathroom we didn't want to have to move so tried to ignore it, by putting a towel over it. The wifi was the worst we experienced the whole time in the US we complained and they said they would fix it, then they said it was because we were too high up, why have wifi if it isn't accessible to the whole hotel? Then we did laundry on the ground floor (a laundry was a plus) but the wifi didn't work there either. It is a very short walk to Disney, another plus and a short drive to decent places to eat eg pizza press. We had to pay to park on top of hotel fees but when we forgot to display our ticket we had a notice put on our windshield.
Manager Response: Dear bettyinoz,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. Your feedback is extremely vital and appreciated by our Team.   I wholeheartedly apologize for the interruption in our WiFi connection and we are currently working on improving upon that service.   Best Travels,  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: Stayed here For 5 days and loved that we could watch the fireworks from here. The outside bar was never open so that was kinda disappointing.. Would have been nice to sit out and watch the fireworks with a bit more ambience. The rooms were average and found housekeeping was average. We tipped the first couple days and still the room was not cleaned well. Our cups from the night before were always there when we got back from our day at Disneyland. Our King size bed was good on one side but had a big divot on the other. Breakfast was 15 dollars and which was good but would have been nice to see a smaller breakfast selection for cheaper... more of a continental style would have been nice... maybe even complimentary coffee.. Dinners there were great.. We had the steak and it was
Manager Response: Dear Arlene P,  Thank you very much for you review.We truly do appreciate any feedback that will assist us in making sure we provide a memorable and pleasant guest experience.  If you would like to discuss any of the items you mentioned please contact me at the email listed below.  Best travels   Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: My husband and I stayed here for 5 nights to go to Disneyland for my birthday. After driving 8 hours we were really looking forward to good nights sleep but we were placed in room right next to the freeway and it was horrible, no sleep at all. The next day was my birthday and I barely had the energy to go to Disneyland. We asked to move and the next room was better, but still lots of noise. One of the reasons we choose this place is cause of the 24 hour pool/spa but we never got to use it cause it was always filled to the brim, most of the time with kids. The walk to Disneyland is not too bad. We ate at the restaurant one night and it was good. Next time we go to Disneyland we will be trying out another hotel, will not stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Sandy A,  Thank you for posting your review of Hotel Menage.  We truly apologize if your stay was not a pleasant one.  Due the proximity to Disneyland, we are surrounded by two major streets and a freeway.  Our 24 pool and Jacuzzi are is a big attraction here at Hotel Menage, we apologize if you were not able to enjoy it.  Best Travels,  Leo Flores Front Office Manager  leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: Friendly staff, great food at restaurant.  Not bad accommodations for the price compared to other nearby hotels.  Highway traffic can be a bit noisy but not bothersome if you are used to living in a city.  Unless you are planning on living in this hotel, this is perfect for visiting Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Rafal B  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience with Hotel Ménage. Your feedback is truly appreciated.   We are ecstatic that our unique hotel was ideal for you; our location, our American Tavern Eatery menu and our 24 hour pool is always a hit and we are very pleased to know you enjoyed it as well.   We look forward to seeing you again, soon.   Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: We had a wonderful time staying at this hotel.  The staff were very friendly and even remembered my granddaughter's birthday and sent up an special dessert to our room.  The room was clean.  We were able to watch fireworks from our balcony.  Pool was awesome.  Happy hour and the food was very good.  Thank you Erik and staff!
Manager Response: Dear CathyR777  Thank you so much for five star review!  It truly does make us happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay.  We strive to provide the same great guest experience you had with all of our guest.  We will also share the same kind words you had about our staff, Erik.  We look forward to seeing you soon!  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel 4 times in 2014. The rooms are spacious and were clean. I do wish the bathrooms were a little bigger. Most of the staff were very friendly and attentive. And the valet service was fantastic. The last time at the hotel I did notice the outdoor bar was not open during our stay. Hoping that they are not cutting back on some of the amenities. Will be staying there again soon   Wayne Stonecipher Fresno,ca
Manager Response: Dear Wayne S  Thank you so much for your review!  We want to thank you for your continued loyalty to Hotel Menage.    We look forward to serving once again, soon!  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casareortsinc.com

Summary: OVERALL: I recommend this hotel for folks looking to save money who mind the short walk to Disneyland. The hotel is older, but it is clean and the staff is very helpful.  LOCATION: We chose this hotel due to the value and the location. We were able to walk to Disneyland within 12-15 minutes. Disneyland is on the same side of the street. If you didn't want to walk, the hotel also is a stop along the ART shuttle line. You can buy a 3-day, 1-day, or even single use pass.  The hotel also has easy access to I-5, is across the street from a Starbucks, and within a 15 minute walk to a Walmart. It is located right next to the freeway and there is road noise. However, it was more of a white noise. The Fireworks go off every night at 9:15 and they are so close you can feel them.   ROOM:
Manager Response: Dear DeeandLolo,   Thank you very much for your review!  We are happy  to hear that you truly enjoyed your stay!  We really appreciate the kind words that you had to offer in your review.  The breakdown in the different areas, will definitely assist us in making sure that everyone has the same great experience that you had.  We look forward in having you as a guest soon.  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: Had an excellent stay at this hotel. We were greeted with excellent customer service at check in. Room was to our expectation.The view from our room was spectacular with the Disneyland fireworks at night. We had breakfast at the hotel which was beyond what we expected and very tasteful. Overall I loved my stay at the menage hotel and we were helped out with fabulous customer service by Eric Libid at check in. Will stay there again in the future and I recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a great place to stay with excellent customer service.
Manager Response: Dear Santanab22  Thank you so much for your five star review! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay.  We strive to provide the same great customer service experience you received to all our guest.  We will definitely share your kind words that you had for Erik.  We look forward to having you as a guest soon!  Leo Flores  Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: One aspect of Hotel Menage that stood out the most during our stay was definitely the staff. Everyone was welcoming and friendly, especially  Erik, a member of the reception staff who's customer service really stood out for us during our stay. He went above and beyond to make sure we were well looked after and always greeted you with a smile and checked we had everything we needed. An extremely kind and helpful member of the staff, he is a great asset to this hotel and we hope he is recognised for his efforts and great customer service.
Manager Response: Dear g-thomas04  Thank you so much for your review!  We are very pleased to hear that your experience while with us was a positive one.  We will definitely share your kind words with Erik.  We look forward to having you as a guest soon!  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresorstinc.com

Summary: Our family are returning visitors of Menage.  As usual, customer service is outstanding!  Easy and painless check-in after a long flight-in. Rooms are clean with sufficient amount of space. Like the fact that they had a safe put in for your valuables in room. Beds are comfortable and cozy.  Shower/ tub have hot water all the time. Been to some larger hotels where water goes from hot to cold. Downstairs Kya restaurant was great. Food was tasty and good price value!  Our waiter, Kevin was awesome!  Lots of parking in secured lot. Easy in and out access. Didn't get a chance to swim in the pool this time but pool is always a treat for all ages.  Especially the jacuzzis, for the adults is a added bonus after a long day at Disneyland.  Fireworks from Disneyland is picture perfect
Manager Response: Dear 808Chinagirl  Thank You so much for your five star review! we truly enjoy hearing how satisfied and pleased our guests were with their stay.   Our hotel is intended to deliver a truly unique hotel experience and we are glad to know we provided that for you.   Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: We had been in LA house sitting for a friend who came home earlier than expected so we decided to book at hotel near Disneyland at the last minute so we could get too and from the theme parks with ease.  The rates were decent and the hotel was 15 mins walk from Disneyland, so for those reasons it was great. The room itself was clean and while the sheets didn't seem like they would be warm enough, I was never cold at night. I also found the beds very comfortable and in between park visits, we spent the better part of a day, lounging around the room and making use of the great range of TV stations.  The bathroom is small, as others have reported, but we found it suited our needs - we just made sure we showered with the door open to prevent the bathroom from feeling cramped.  The
Manager Response: Dear HobsonzChoice  Thanks for letting us know how much you enjoyed your last stay and we look forward to your next! We truly enjoy our international and overseas guests and enjoying hearing about their stay with us.   We look forward to seeing you soon!  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: My wife and I purchased Annual Passes to Disneyland this year and have made a number of trips to Anaheim this year.  We usually pick hotels in the $70-$90 per night range.  This being our last trip and new years we wanted to have a bit of a blow out and went with Hotel Menage, a hotel in the $125 per night range.  The room was mostly clean, but the bed had only a thin duvet and sheet, with no blanket.  This would have not been an issue had our heater in the room worked.  On new years eve when we returned to our room the heater was pushing out cold air even when turned off.  Fortunately someone from engineering came by and totally replaced the unit, but that took from 2:30am to 3:00am.  The maids never replaced used plastic cups and only supplied new toilet paper if the roll was
Manager Response: Dear johnthediver01  Thank you for taking time out of your day to post your review.  Please know that the issues you listed will not be overlooked. If you would like to further discuss please feel free to contact me at the email listed below.  Best Travels  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: We just spent 3 nights with family here (3 adult couples) and it was perfect for our needs.  The point of the trip was to visit Disneyland and California Adventure, which are a pleasant 15-minute walk away.  The staff was friendly and helpful.  The rooms are very nice and the public areas--lobby, bar, restaurant, and especially the pool and outdoor bar--are perfect to gather together after a long day at the Disney parks.  As for the fireworks... the nightly Disneyland display can be seen better from here than from inside the park itself: spectacular!
Manager Response: Dear Kerrycdunn  Hotel Ménage Team is truly happy to know you enjoyed your recent stay with us. We have the best view of the Disneyland Fireworks around and the makes for a pretty exciting view.   We look forward to your next stay and having you as our guest!  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary Heading: Nice hotel close to all that is Anaheim
Summary: Reasonable rates close to theme parks and the Orange outlet stores. The staff are very friendly and helpful and the overall amenities are great including the pool in a nice setting and the restaurant with a simple but fulfilling menu
Manager Response: Dear Dayle S  We are so excited that you enjoyed your trip to Disneyland stayed with Hotel Ménage! Thank you for the kind words and acknowledging the level of service we always aim to provide! We strive for that experience with each of our guests.   We hope that you choose to stay with us on your next trip to Southern California and again, thank you!   Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary Heading: adequate is the nicest thing I can say
Summary: We stayed for 4 nights recently and while it was not terrible it was far from  boutique hotel I was hoping for.    The first issue was upon check-in in we found we had been given a King room instead of the double queens we had booked, and the requested (on the phone a few days prior) crib was not in the room.  The front desk insisted that they were sold out and that there was no possible way to change the room, until I spoke to a manger at which point a room with two queens magically was available.  The requested crib still took two more calls and an hour to be delivered, at which point the nap we had hoped for was out of the question.  Other than the initial issues at check in interactions with the staff were fine though.  The furnishings in the room were newer, and trendy, but
Manager Response: Dear jp94952  Thank you for taking the time to post your review.  We truly do apologize if there was any shortcomings during your stay.  We appreciate your feedback.  If you would like to further discuss any issues you encountered during your stay, please feel free to contact me at any time to the email listed below.  Best travels  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary Heading: Nice Place, GREAT VIEW Of Fireworks!
Summary: Stayed in Nov w/my two girls, 11 & 6. Check in and out was a breeze. People that work there, really nice. Hotel does charge $10 to park a night, but we got a great rate, which more than made up for it. Pool was heated but still a tad cold. Hot tub was hot. Great Happy Hour. You can smoke by the pool. (Either a plus or minus, depending on your preference) View from hotel room for fireworks was awesome, by the pool?! Amazing! REALLY Awesome!  With two girls that walk rather slow, took exactly 11 min to walk to front gate Disneyland. Easy walk. Room was comfy, I totally would recommend to my friends.
Manager Response: Dear Dick V  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience with Hotel Ménage. Your feedback is truly appreciated.   We are ecstatic that our unique hotel was ideal for you; our location, our American Tavern Eatery menu and our 24 hour pool is always a hit and we are very pleased to know you enjoyed it as well.   We look forward to seeing you again, soon.   Leo Flores  Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel close to Disneyland
Summary: We have stayed in several hotels in the Disneyland area and Hotel Menage is the best so far.  It is a little more expensive but the quality of the room, restaurant and service was great.  The only down fall is that the pool is open 24 hours and if someone is out there being loud it can be very disturbing when you are trying to sleep.
Manager Response: Dear Jsteele435  Thank you very much for your five star review!  Our dedicated team enjoys hearing from Guest such as yourself and the great time that had with us.   We look forward to having you as guest next time you are in the area!  Leo Flores Front Desk Manger leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: The staff could not be faulted. They were attentive and very friendly. Our room was very nice, large and offered all the comforts we required. The only downside to this stay was that the traffic can still be heard (not ridculously loud but a constant hum) in your room. However i would not hesitate to stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Holly D,  Thank you very much for your review.  We strive to provide the same great service that you received to all our guest.  We look forward to serving you and your family on your next visit!  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay. Very clean, wonderful staff, and close to Disneyland. Either walk or take the shuttle bus. Loved happy hour everyday, amazing food and drinks with super friendly staff  we had a great time watching sports poolside and chatting to bar staff. Morning buffet was again, excellent. Being able to buy our Disneyland tickets at the desk also work out very well for time saving for us. Totally recommending to my friends & family.
Manager Response: Dear Sian L  Thank you so much for your review!  We are thrilled to hear that you truly enjoyed your stay.  We strive to provide the same great service to all our guest.  Thank you so much for referring us to your friends and family.  Leo Flores Front office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary Heading: Clean, modern, comfy, cheap hotel for Disneyland
Summary: Excellent hotel for people visiting Disney. Staff friendly and helpful. Room large (even had a couch), clean and modern. Bed comfy TV selection good. Down other end from Disney so fair few hotels closer but price was right and for 2x 23yo wasnt an issue. Room had a fridge great for buying some drinks to save costs whilst travelling. Only downfall was the in room wifi. Barely worked not even able to load basic google pages and if did load would drop out constantly making it impossible to use. Did talk to reception about it-nothing done really. Was ok if weren't needing internet to search maps, activities or check email/contact family. Would stay again if price better than other hotels in area.
Manager Response: Dear Bec D  Thank you so much for your five star review!  We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your accommodations.  We are also happy that you found Hotel Menage a good value, on your visit to the resort area.  We look forward on your next visit!  Best travels   Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: Customer service at this hotel was absolute great. David checked on us frequently and was very attentive as we had lunch in the courtyard. I will definitely be back for the amazing nachos and great service.
Manager Response: Dear Dons1996  Thank you so much for your five star review,  We are thrilled to hear that you truly enjoyed your stay. We are also happy to hear that you took advantage of the great food options that American Tavern has to offer.  We look forward to seeing you soon!  We will have the nachos ready!  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary Heading: This is an classy petite hotel!
Summary: The hospitality staff extended courteous service to us. I mispleced my purse and they stored it in lost and found. I was so relieved! Josephine, who was in charge of food took great carw of us. The Losbster Mac and Cheese can with a burst of flavor. This is a true treasure. Oh yes, the rooms gave me the feeling of a New York loft from the concrete floor to the contempary decor. Im comimg back to this place.
Manager Response: Dear Gracentrue   Thank you for your five star review!  We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We are glad to hear that you recovered your belongings with the assistance of the staff.  We will definitely your kind words with Josephine.  We look forward to having you, on your next visit to the Anaheim Resort.  Leo Flores  Front office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: My family and I stayed here for a Disney trip 12/26/14 and 12/27/14. It is close enough to walk, we liked that a lot. Edgar and Sureya were so sweet. Sureya sent a tray of cookies to my room just because she thought my kids were cute. The restaurant in the hotel was very good and had a buffet breakfast that was delicious and convenient. We will stay here again for sure. A lot of other reviews commented on noise, I didn't find it loud at all.
Manager Response: Dear kksmith802  Thank you so much for your five star review!  We pride ourselves in outstanding customer service, to ensure that every guest has the same great experience that you had during your visit to Hotel Menage.  We look forward to having you as a guest soon! Once again thank you.  Leo Flores  Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: The staff is what made this stay so great! The concierge, gave us advice day 1 and we used it throughout the 3 days, we received guidance on the local shopping, flat rate transfer with Grand Tours, who we are using for another part of our trip. The concierge Michael, is super friendly and knowledgeable he deserves a tip every time! The room is clean and spacious. The bathroom was smaller but it didn't matter. You can see Disneyland fireworks from the Balcony and I just loved the feel of this place. It is close to Disneyland and The Outlets at Orange, highly recommend that too!
Manager Response: Dear Naomi M,  Thank you so much for your five star review!  We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with  us.  We will definitely share the kind words that you said  about Michael.  We are looking forward to having you as a guest soon!  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: I visit the area 2-3 times a year and this is the first time I've stayed at this hotel.  I was pleasantly surprised.  The staff alone made this hotel jump to the top of my go to list.  Extremely accommodating and friendly and it started before I got there with the reservation agent who helped me with an issue that she really didn't need to because I booked through a 3rd party.   The lobby and common areas are beautiful!  We only had breakfast at the restaurant but was pleasantly surprised at how good the buffet was.  The rooms were OK.  A little dated and run down but clean and spacious.   The only down side to this hotel is it sits in this little triangle where Ball, Harbor and I5 intersect so at night, we could hear the freeway.  Didn't bother my or my family, but I could see
Manager Response: Dear Amy T  Thank you so much for your review!  We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay.  Our service team is truly committed in providing service that is above and beyond industry standards.    We look forward to having you as a guest soon!  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: From the outside it looks really dated but when you head inside it is surprisingly very nice. The rooms are really big, spacious and clean. Disneyland is less than 10minutes walk so it's an ideal location. The bar and pool outside end up being the perfect spot to watch the Disney fireworks from if you end up coming home early after a big day at the theme parks. We also had lunch in the restaurant one day and really enjoyed it. For the low price you pay the rooms are really good. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Morgan G  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience with us; we truly enjoy hearing how satisfied and pleased our guests were with their stay.   Our hotel is intended to deliver a truly unique hotel experience and we are glad to know we provided that for you.   We look forward to having you visit us on your next trip.  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: Our travel agent suggested this hotel and we were very happy with it. Staff are very friendly. Both concierges who assisted us - Michael and Clint- were very helpful, informative and accommodating in organising some transport and a tour I wanted. Great proximity / short walk to Disneyland and we had a view over the hotel pool and nightly fireworks. Pool area looks to be well maintained. The room was clean, plenty of fresh towels, clean, functional bathroom and very comfortable beds. We did not find the freeway noise to be a problem. We enjoyed buffet breakfast in the restaurant every day. Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear msjrg  The Hotel Ménage Team is truly happy to know you enjoyed your recent stay with us. We have the best view of the Disneyland Fireworks around and the makes for a pretty exciting view.   We look forward to your next stay and having you as our guest!  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights while we visited disneyland. The rooms are very basic and nothing flash but nothing flash is needed here as if you are staying it's more than likely to go to Disney for which this hotel is perfectly located, a straight ten min walk and you are there. The staff here are super friendly when coming back from dinner they race out to open the doors for us and we're so welcoming.  One thing that sets this hotel apart is the 24hr spa perfect to relax after a 14 hour day at the happiest place on earth. Tip if you are staying with little ones and want an early night this place might not be for you as the fireworks for Disney go off right accross the road and are insanely loud here. All in all this hotel was good but without blowing us away
Manager Response: Dear Rori M  Thank you for your review.  We are excited to hear that you enjoyed your stay.  We are also happy to hear that you took advantage of our 24 hour pool area.  We look forward to having you as a guest soon!  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary Heading: maintaince work on pipes at 2 am
Summary: I barely got any sleep at this place, the room we were in on the first night we were woken by people fixing the water pipes at 2 am,  surely during the day would be more appropriate to fix them. When we asked to be moved or given a refund and we would go else where, they moved us to the room next to the lift. So every time someone would go past they would wake me up. Punishment for complaining I guess
Manager Response: Dear Jen O  Thank you for taking the time to post a review.  We truly do apologize if your stay with us was less than satisfactory.  We will indefinably address the inconvenience that you experienced while at Hotel Menage.   Best Travels  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: We had 2 rooms connected for our quick Birthday Celebration. We arrived Friday all the employees greeted us with smiles. The kids were excited they got to see the fireworks from our room. Valet run to get ur car. Check out was easy. We had a good weekend.
Manager Response: Dear Victoria M  Thank you so much for your five star review!  We are thrilled to hear that you and your family enjoyed there stay with us.  We strive to provide the same great experience that you had to all our guest.  We look forward to hosting your next family celebration!  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: It was my first time planning our company holiday party. Corporate allowed me to pick a brand new location to host and I have absolutely no regrets hosting it at Hotel Menage. The staff was extremely friendly, hardworking, helpful and fun! The hotel rooms were VERY nice and the banquet room we had our party in was very welcoming and "cozy". My entire staff had a great time, loved the venue and are already asking me if we will be doing it at Hotel Menage again next year! Icing on the cake..... the amazing firework show from Disneyland you can see perfectly from the outside patio. Everyone felt it was our very own personal firework show =)
Manager Response: Dear William M  Thank you very much for your five star review!  We are thrilled to hear you and your staff enjoyed your time at Hotel Menage.  It was a pleasure having you and your coworkers.  We cannot wait to host your next event, see you soon!  Leo Flores Front  Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: Fairly modern and updated rooms. The wifi never worked...at all for the entire stay. Be aware, the hotel is convenient to Disney and the Convention center but is also next to the freeway and is very loud in the rooms.
Manager Response: Dear Steven D  Thank you very much for your review.  We are constantly working on improving every aspect of our unique property, and feedback like yours is necessary.  Best Travels  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: If you plan to stay at this hotel with your furry freind expect your stay to be very uncomfortable with the concrete floors and conduit running the ceiling cold floors cracks in the walls very unpleasant we checked out and stayed near by
Manager Response: Dear Kenneth L,  We want to apologize if your experience was not a positive one.  Most of our guest that travel with pets, appreciate the stained concrete floor versus the carpet as it makes for easy clean up.  If you would like to contact me to further discuss the issues you have listed, please feel free to email me at anytime at the email listed below.  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: We stay at this hotel every time we visit Disneyland, we've been here 4 times. It's within walking distance of the park about 10 min walk, but they also offer a shuttle for a nominal fee. The rooms are clean and decor is OK. The staff is very friendly, greeting us with a smile. The best part of this hotel is the 24 hour pool and the nearby pool bar. Love coming back after long day at Disneyland and soaking in the hot tub. Great place to stay when visiting the parks!
Manager Response: Dear Rhocelli P,  Thank you very much for your review!  We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay! Our proximity to the parks makes it convenient to all our guest.  We are also happy to hear that you took advantage of our 24hour pool and Jacuzzi.  We look forward to having you as a guest again, soon!  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: I stayed at Hotel Menage with my partner this past November and have to say we were both pretty disappointed when we arrived to see the hotel wasn't at all what we expected. Needless to say we both agreed we were there to get out and have fun and wouldn't be spending much time there anyway, ya live ya learn. Oops.  The strong points of Hotel Menage really only fall on the convenience/cheap factor. The hotel is extremely close to Disney and there is also shuttle service which arrives every 20 min and goes right to the park. The front desk/door staff were all very friendly and helpful and we had no issues checking in early or obtaining parking for our rental car (there is a $10/day charge to park). There is also a pool so if you have kids that could be nice to have for an easy day
Manager Response: Dear Mikaela V  We are sorry to learn that you experience with our hotel was not what you expected. We make every effort with all aspect of our unique hotel to ensure that we deliver, clean comfortable accommodations, a superior dining menu and a service level that is above all other competitors in our area.   If you would like to further discuss the issues that you have mentioned.  Please feel free to email me, at any time  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary Heading: Quick last minute trip to Disneyland
Summary: We made a total spontaneous trip to Disneyland with our family.  The hotel was close to disney. You can walk but you have to go over a bridge that is over i5. We did it twice and then decided to use the ART because our feet were tired/and the sidewalk is so close to busy roads.  But it is doable.  The room was clean and tidy we stayed on first floor: I liked the concrete floor IMO much cleaner than carpet...housekeeping was efficient.    King was comfy. Pull out was fine. Had a little staining on mattress but, it's a sofa so it's not totally unexpected.  Sheets were clean.   The shower could use renovating (fixtures).   My biggest complaint was noise.  The music by the pool past 10 is silly.  No one was out there and it was really loud.  We only heard it one night though.  And
Manager Response: Dear Src4343  Thanks so much for your review and taking the time to share your recent experience. Our Service Team is dedicated to ensuring your stay, and room accommodations are clean and comfortable.  We look forward to seeing you again.   Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: Almost to the end of our five week adventure we found this hotel to be tired and dated.  The room itself was adequate but the bathroom was tiny.  This hotel is located right next to freeways with continual traffic noise but within walking distance to Disneyland (but not much else!) A view of the nightly fireworks was a bonus and happy hour was enjoyable but this hotels redeeming feature was its young, friendly and helpful staff.  But beware, extremely limited WiFi availability (basically non-existant).
Manager Response: Dear Nives B  Thank you for taking time out of your day to share your experience with us.  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the friendly interactions with our staff.  Please know that we are constantly working on improving our facilities.  We do look forward to having you as a guest in the future.  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: My partner and I stayed for 4 nights, we arrived at the hotel at 8.30am, off a long flight from NZ, total travel time over 22 hours with our layover in Brisbane, we knew we could not check in until 3pm, and stored our bags, however reception were so helpful, and our room was ready within an hour of arriving.  We were on the 3rd floor overlooking the pool.  Next to the freeway, so there was a little noise, but to be quite honest, we were not in our room during the day, only to sleep, and once the door was closed, you hardly heard any noise, slept no problem, yes, you can hear the noise when you are outside, but it wasn't a bother, as the staff were all so friendly, restaurant was lovely, this hotel just has a lovely atmosphere. I am a travel agent from NZ, and its a lovely
Manager Response: Dear kimandsteve33  Thanks so much for the great review! We are also happy that we delivered the experience that you expected during your trip to Disneyland.  Our Hotel Team is truly dedicated to providing a level of customer service that is above any other; we work hard to make each guest experience unique and memorable.   We look forward to you next stay!  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: My mother Daughter Georgia and myself stayed here for 5 days we were met and checked in by Edgar what can I say about this young man truly an asset to your hotel in fact James and some of the other staff members put together make a wonderful hand picked group of workers. They are what makes me and my family come back nothing was too hard the rooms were okay clean easy walking distance to Disneyland nearby restaurants I would stay again because of the staff and the feel of this hotel . Can you give our thanks to Edgar for his hospitality  Thank you hotel Menage Carrol
Manager Response: Dear colcy007  Thank you for your 5 STAR REVIEW! We are very excited to know you and your family enjoyed the hotel inside and out.   We are sure that Edgardo and James will be happy when they read the kind words you have left for them.  We look forward to having you and your family as guest soon!  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: Great Location , clean comfortable beds . The bathroom was small , but there was only my daughter & I staying in the room so it wasn't a big deal . Had breakfast in the hotel , good choice for the price . ART bus to Disney , which was a 5 minute ride , picked up right outside the hotel . Helpful staff , Jeff from Grand Transportation was AWESOME & can't be thanked enough , he is contracted out through the hotel & took us to the outlet mall our first night there & then a couple of days later to Santa Monica & LAX  ! We will be back
Manager Response: Dear DE04  Thank you very much for your five star review!  We are thrilled to hear that you truly enjoyed your stay with us.  We strive to provide the same great experience you had to all our guest.  I will definitely share your kind words with Jeff.  We look forward to having you as a guest soon!  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: This hotel is not walking distance to Disney and is literally on the freeway.  While we were able to change rooms as our first room sounded like we were on a racetrack, the new room is just slightly less noisy - but with a Subpar shower. An overall disappointment for the price
Manager Response: Dear FoodFun23  Thank you for sharing your experience during your stay.  I do want to apologize if we did not meet your expectations.  Our unique location and proximity to Disneyland, is a convenience for most of our guest, we are sorry if that was not the case for you.  If you would like to discuss the issues you presented please feel free to contact me at the email listed below.  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary Heading: Good location, great value, loud at night
Summary: I've stayed at this hotel twice. Love the location, restaurant and friendliness of hotel staff. My only complaint would be the noise. During the first trip our room was close to the garbage containers outside and were woken early two mornings in a row by garbage trucks. The next trip we had a room close to the pool. Loud adults kept us up late into the night.
Manager Response: Dear Amy H  Thank you so much for taking time out your day to post your review.  We really appreciate the continued business.  If you would like to discuss the noise issued your experienced during your most recent stay please feel free to contact me at any time at the email listed below.  We look forward to having you as a guest again, soon!  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: We stayed here for 10 nights from October 25th. It was myself, my husband and our daughter.  We were first given a room over looking the pool on the 3rd floor it was so noisy from the pool and live music. We asked if we could move and were told no not till the morning they were fully booked, Only to have the hotel managed ring not even 10 minutes later with a room ready for us. We moved and the room was much better. There was road noise but nothing to keep us awake at night. The maid service was slightly disappointing. Some days it would look like the room hadn't been vacuumed, other days the toiletries weren't replaced.  The location is perfect for disneyland with an easy 10-15 minute walk.  The pool was great my daughter loved spending time there and the happy hour at the bar
Manager Response: Dear tinks_woody  Thank you very much for your review!  Hotel Ménage Team is truly happy to know you enjoyed your recent stay with us.  Our Palapa Bar space is a great place to unwind and enjoy our signature drinks and Palapa bar menu. We hope to see you soon!  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: This hotel was amazing from the moment we walked in. The staff were so friendly and went out of their way to help us. They went above and beyond. The kids loved watching the fireworks from the room and its so close to everything. Erik was the main person we dealt with through our stay and he was magnificent, we wanted to bring him home. We will definitely be going back to that hotel!
Manager Response: Dear Savajye  Thank you so much for your five star review!  We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. Our proximity to Disneyland provides our guest the best view of the Disneyland fireworks, while hanging out by the pool!  We will definitely share your kind words with Erik.  We look forward to having you as our guest soon!  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: My family and I have stayed at this hotel twice and both time we had a great experience.  The location is very close to Disneyland, freeway and restaurants.  The best part of the location is that you have a great view of the nightly fireworks.  The pool area is large and clean, and there is a bar outside so you can have some drinks while relaxing at the pool.  The rooms are average, decent size and clean.  The staff was helpful and friendly both times we visited.  There is a lot of parking surrounding the building.  We have had brunch, dinner and dessert while we have visited and even ordered room service.  The food has always been great!  We are planning on going to Disneyland again soon and will stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear chare  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. Your feedback is extremely vital and appreciated by our Team. Our Staff is delighted to know you were pleased with our accommodations, pool space and restaurant.  We look forward to seeing you very soon!  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary Heading: Decent Place to Stay for Anaheim Travel
Summary: My fiance and I stayed at the Hotel Menage for 8 nights. We were content with the room furnishings which included a king sized bed, couch, 50" flat screen TV, desk and more. The room had plenty of space for two people and we never had a problem with moving around.   The bathroom was a little outdated and the bathtub/shower could have used a bit of work – nevertheless it got the job done. Personally, I wasn’t a big fan of the shampoo and soap they provided. The shampoo wasn’t as “deep cleaning” as I would’ve liked and the oatmeal soap left my skin a little too dry afterwards. On the bright side, it’s still “complementary”.  The bed was huge, which I thought was great to sprawl out on. Walking around and standing in line for hours at Disneyland really took a toll on my back, so
Manager Response: Dear Steven L  Hotel Ménage is so very pleased to know we were the value you were looking for on your recent trip to Disneyland; our accommodations, amenities and of course the view of the nightly Disneyland fireworks makes us an exceptional value for families and everyone else.  We look forward to seeing you again soon! Thank you.   Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights. Kent from the front desk checked us in with great ease. He was friendly and helpful, gave us many great tips about the area. The first room we checked into was on the third floor facing the parking lot. The good thing was we got an amazing view of the fireworks that night. The bad point was our internet connection was terrible. The next morning they gladly moved us to another room on the first floor closest to the outside bar- free of charge. Luckily it wasn't noisy in our room. Unfortunately the wifi connection still didn't work but since we were on vacation we really didn't need to be glued to our phones. We could easily step out to the computer room they had conveniently by the reception.  Another word of praise for the front desk staff was when
Manager Response: Dear Bonnie W,  Thank you very much for your review!  We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us.  I will definitely share your kind words with Kent, and the rest of the staff.  We look forward to having you and your fiance as guest!  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: We stayed at the Hotel Menage for 4 nights mid September 2014. The room was clean and comfortable. There is a bus to Disneyland which is convenient and inexpensive. I found it a little noisy on the weekend due to the bar music and partying. The hotel staff were polite and friendly. However, responses for service requests were delayed. Despite this, for the price I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Angelina778  Thank you very much for your review!  We are pleased to hear that you found your accommodations clean and comfortable while visiting us.  We definitely look forward to having you as a guest!   Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary Heading: Very disappointing - better, cheaper hotels located nearby
Summary: This was our second time staying at this hotel. A few things to note:  1. The first time we stayed here (probably 3 years ago we were in a room right in front of an elevator. The rooms are not sound proof and you can hear everyone walking by and waiting for the elevator. I figured there was no way with more than a hundred rooms that we would end up by the elevator again. Boy was I wrong. This time we ended up in front of an elevator that was literally 5 feet from our door. Our room faced north and so we heard the freeway, the bing from the elevator, and everyone talking while waiting for the elevator. We didn't realize how bad it was until we had already unpacked. This isn't the worst of it though, twas after we had finally fallen asleep (with earplugs in), we awoke to the
Manager Response: Dear sandpiper999  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We are sorry to learn that your experience with our hotel was not what you expected. We make every effort with all aspects of our unique hotel to ensure that we deliver a great experience.  Please know that we will address all service short falls that you outlined in your review.  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: First off, Dylan is one of the Valet greeters and as soon as I went to valet my car he was there to greet me and was exceptional in creating that friendly environment! Following my great welome to the Hotel, I then went and checked in with Leo who was awseom enough to allow me to have an early check in! Check was quick, easy, and fast. Very friendly staff! Room was perfect, bed was comfortable, bathroom clean and spacious, and the AC unit worked great! as for the view, it was perfect, had the fourth floor! trip was for the USC football game on Thursday night, so it was halfway to our home in SD so we didnt want to drive back after the game, so opted for a hotel in Anaheim. Definitely will stay here again, and reccomend this Hotel to anyone!
Manager Response: Dear MAX23051991,  Thank you so much for your five star review!  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed to stay with us.  We strive to provide the same great experience you had to all of our guest.   It was a pleasure having you as our guest, and we look forward to the next time. FIGHT ON!  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: First, let me say that I agree with some of the other recent reviews: there is apparently no wifi in the rooms, even though they give you a password for it. It never comes up. I suspect the router is in the lobby, which is why you can get wifi in the lobby, but there you have to contend with screaming children and noise at the bar and pool. If you're a business person, go elsewhere. I also laughed at the one where he hit his foot on the bed frame; same thing happened to me a couple of times before I got it in my brain that the frame sticks out. My husband and I both said that it was an odd bed frame and they ought to change it (we said to ourselves, not management). Our only experience with the restaurant was the buffet breakfast, which was okay. The fellow who cleans the tables
Manager Response: Dear AncientPlanter  Thank you very much for sharing your experience. Our proximity, location and convenience to Disneyland offers all the benefits listed in your review.  We look forward to having you as a guest soon.  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: I stayed there for 5 nights while on business. The first problem was I had no wifi connection, something I was in dire need of during my entire stay. The lobby tells me "the wifi is really bad in your wing. Feel free to use wifi in the lobby." They expected me to conduct business in a very busy lobby with a bunch of screaming kids. I asked if they could move me to another room and never heard back from them. Aside from that, there was some sort of water leak near the sink area. I believe it was coming from the tub. I called a few times and asked them to look at it. As far as I know, that never happened. Then as I was checking out, they tried to charge me for room service I never ordered. They didn't remove the charge until I asked to speak to a manager. BEWARE --- DO NOT STAY
Manager Response: Dear Flngn  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us.  We are sorry to learn that you experience with our hotel was not what you expected.   If you would like to go over in detail the issues that you have listed, Please contact me, at the email listed below.  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: Our travel agent booked this hotel on its location - being close to Disneyland- and the deal they had going at the time - stay 8 nights pay for 6.  We arrived at the hotel around midnight, check in went smoothly and we made our way to our room.  Our room was 2 doors from the end of the hotel, overlooking the motorway.  The noise outside was very loud, once inside you could still hear it in the back ground.  The only benefit of this room is that we had an awsome view of the Disneyland fireworks.  Our room had a King size bed and a fold out for our two children,  the king bed was very comfortable although it had a very odd bed frame which stuck out about a foot from the end of the mattress.  As I found out a great toe kicker,  I have a lovely black toe nail as a souvenier.  The
Manager Response: Dear perro2515  We are sorry to learn that you experience with our hotel was not what you expected. We make every effort with all aspect of our unique hotel to ensure that we deliver, clean comfortable accommodations, and a superior dining experience.  Please know that we will address the service short falls that you outlined in your review.   If you would like to further discuss the issues you have mentioned please feel free to contact me at the email listed below.  I look forward to being of assistance. Again, thank you for your feedback  Leo Flores Front Office manager leof@casaressortsinc.com

Summary: We stayed for 3 nights. Staff were very helpful and friendly even swapping our room to a quieter one when we arrived! One thing even though it was great to have, our little bar fridge made quite a bit of noise but nothing else was an issue! We had buffet breakfast included and it was delicious! Also eating there for dinner a couple of nights. We had a view of the Disneyland fireworks at night which was pretty awesome! Enjoyed our stay thoroughly! :)
Manager Response: Dear Xxally  Thank you for your FIVE STAR review and rating!  We are happy to know our accommodations, guest room and of course our dining options were satisfactory with you. You can always find something special on our American Tavern and Eatery dining and cocktail menu.  Thank you again for your review and we certainly hope to have you as our guest next year!  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: We (family of four) stayed at Hotel Menage for 11 nights.  From our first experience of checking in, we found the staff to be very helpful and professional.  This continued on throughout our stay.  All staff were a pleasure to deal with making us feel very comfortable.  Special mentions go to Edgar, Michael and Erik.  Edgar assisted us in arranging an important family outing going over and beyond his job requirements, ensuring that it was a memorable one.  We cannot thank him enough.  We were greeted with Michael's warm smile, patiently answering any questions we had.  We found Erik to be very professional and efficient throughout a stressful time of returning our camera to us back in Australia that we left behind in LA (no fault of Hotel Menage) in a very quick and secure
Manager Response: Dear Nick S,  Thank you so much for your pleasant words; our dedicated team enjoys hearing from Guest such as yourself and the great time that had with us. We are happy to hear that we were able to assist in the recovery of your Item.  Edgar, Michael and Erik, will be very happy you hear the kind words you have left for them  We look forward to serving you and your family!  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: Our trip to Disneyland started out with lots of problems with a cancelled and re-scheduled delayed flight but Hotel Menage made it all worthwhile.  The staff, especially Erik at the front counter, helped us in getting us settled as soon as possible after landing the next day, booking shuttles and transportation to the parks and the Menage staff accommodated our early check-in.  In addition, they were able to provide Expedia information so that they could may some modifications given our cancelled flight.  In addition, the staff were nice, the ART transportation system was convenient and it is a 10 minute walk to Disneyland.  We will definitely be back to the Menage the next time we're in Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear Miranda H,  Thank you for your five star review!  We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us.  We strive to provide to all our guest, the same great experience you had!  We will be sharing your kind words with Erik.  We look forward to having you as our guest soon!  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: Had a good stay booked our room in September and pre paid. Our room over looked 3 major roads and was extremely noisy at night. When we asked to change rooms they said it would be an additional 20 per night. On the up side Frank in the bar was great and the drinks and appis were good value
