Manager Response: Dear Karol0063,  Thank you for taking time out of your day to post your review.  We really appreciate your feedback.  We will definitely share your kind words with Frank.  We look forward to having you as our guest soon.  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: we came from Thailand 2 adults and 2 kids .So public transportation was top choice for us.At Menage hotel bus stop of ART is in front of the hotel so you can use ART to Disneyland , Amtrak station or Knott berry farm.The staffs are very nice and willing to help.The vending laundry machine and other vending machine are useful for us.Breakfast at the restaurant also good even the same menu everyday. But we think before you go to attractions breakfast is very helpful. The bad side of the hotel was the noise .We stay at room 244 the noise was acceptable for us.We can sleep well all 9 nights may be from loss of energy from theme parks. In over all we think this hotel is worth for us .And we will comeback in next time and suggest it to our friends.
Manager Response: Dear kachenchang,  Thank you for your review! Your compliments will be shared with our Team.  We are happy to hear that our proximity to the ART hub made it easy for you and your family to get around!  We are also thrilled to hear that you will visit us again, and will be sharing your experience with your friends.  We look forward to serving you and your friends soon.  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: Check -in was fast and very friendly. Free Wi-fi!!!!!!!!!!!!  The Pool was a perfect temp even for Nov and spotless. My kids loved it, we had a great view of the fireworks which was great! Secure Parking lot for hotel guest only, for only $10.00 (not bad) And they have coin washer and dryer. Gated everywhere FELT very SAFE!
Manager Response: Dear Veronica C  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. Your feedback is extremely vital and appreciated by our Team. Our Staff is delighted to know you, and your family were pleased with our accommodations.  We do look forward to seeing you, and your family soon.   Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary Heading: Always a Great Stay with our Dog!
Summary: We love coming to this hotel while going to Disneyland. We bring our dog with us and are assigned a 1st floor rooms with concrete floor and facing the great grassy areas. The staff are always so friendly (compared to the always rude Red Lion who also take dogs but we wont go back there). The beds are more firm than we like but we will only ever go back to this hotel when we travel with our dog. Its a bit far to walk to Disney but the drive is perfect, less than 5 min.
Manager Response: Dear Fauna24,  Thank you very much for your five star review!  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us.  Being pet friendly makes it a convenience to  a lot of our guest, and we are happy to hear that you take advantage of that. We love four legged friends, here at Hotel Menage.  We look forward to serving you and your pet soon!  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: To start off this hotel is absolutely wonderful! The staff was amazing Vince and the bar was one of the best staff members there! Hey young lady check to San and was also very courteous! She went out of her way to try to get us an upgrade! We met the assistant manager of the hotel and he was very nice! I would highly recommend this to anybody with family,it's not that far from Disney so if you want to walk you can! And the food was awesome happy hour was the best! Our favorite food items or the chicken wings and the pork sliders! The room was Great the bathrooms were huge everything was clean and spotless! It was loud outside however soon as you close the door you didn't hear any road noise! We had room 402..to wrap this up I would say this hotel is awesome and a great family
Manager Response: Dear hyeager  Thank you so much for you for your five star review!  We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us.  We strive to provide the same great service you received to all our guest.  We will definitely share your kind words to all our staff.  We hope to see you very soon!  Thank you again!  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: I checked in on Sunday  They gave me a room next to a service elevator and when i sat on the bed it squeaked/moaned at me. I go in the bath room and the caulking has mold in it. So they moved me. I get to my room and same noise out of the bed. One filter in the ac unit was missing. Caulking was better but still not right. So the front desk calls me and asked me if I had left a bag of apples in the previous room. Oops i did. They tell me they will have someone bring them up. They bring it up and half of the apples were gone. Because i had training in the area and my company paid for the hotel i had to stay. But i checked out a day early and will never go back.
Manager Response: Dear gr8whtshrk,  Thank you for taking time out of your day to post your review.  We are sorry to learn that you experience with our hotel was not what you expected.  Your feedback is greatly appreciated and will not be taken lightly.  If you would like to further discuss the issues you mentioned, please feel free to contact me at the email listed below.  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: Great location within walking dustance to Disneyland. On site restaurant good value, buffet breakfast usd15 including tax, friendly staff.  Room on 2nd floor, although near the highway,  noise wasn't an issue.  Would recommend to family a d friends, greaf value.
Manager Response: Dear Liz W  Thank you for your review!  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us.  Our location makes it easy to get to and from Disneyland for guest like yourself!  We look forward to having you as a guest again!  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: We stayed at the hotel menage for 3 nights in October.  Our stay was great, the room was very comfortable - air con worked great, room was clean.  It was a great location close to Disney, we could have walked to and from Disneyland but decided to save our legs for the park and use the ART shuttle, the shuttle was awesome, we went to and from disneyland for the 3 days, plus out to the outlets at orange, all for under $30 for 3 people for three days!!  We ate  dinner at the hotel restaurant twice and enjoyed it both times, it wasn't overly expensive, probably median price range, the drinks were great, I loved the Seattle grind - perfect drink after a long day at Disneyland.  There is an on site laundry which was so handy to wash our clothes.  The only suggestion I can make which
Manager Response: Dear L_Macie  Thanks so much for your review and taking the time to share your recent experience. Our Service Team is dedicated to ensuring your stay, room accommodations and special requests are handled with care.   We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary Heading: We had a GREAT stay here!
Summary: Based on some of the negative reviews we were tentative about how our stay would go. We were more than pleasantly surprised and are not sure what people are expecting for this price or this location?  It is easy walking distance to the Parks (for Adults at least!), our room was updated and clean, our bed was super comfortable, our A/C worked like a charm, the bar was excellent (thanks Jose!), the breakfast was great and every single staff member was fantastic - we were treated like gold by everyone.  We were on the 4th floor and had the pool view we requested.  As soon as our door was closed we could not hear anything from the pool or the freeway.  The only items that have room for improvement - the wireless connection was not good and the fan in our bathroom was not connected.
Manager Response: Dear SandS_10  Thank you for your review.  We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us!  We are very happy to hear that every staff member made you feel welcomed.  We strive to provide the same experience you had to all our guest.  We re definitely working on improving the wifi.  We really look forward to having you back as our guest  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: The room needed a good renovation so it was hard to say if it was really clean, the hot tub was foamy and i was expecting more comfort from a boutique hotel. You hear the highway constantly but i guess that was to be expected. I was very disapointed!!
Manager Response: Dear Lyne M  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience with Hotel Ménage. Your feedback is truly appreciated.   We are sorry to hear that you did not fully enjoy your stay with us.  Your feedback is much appreciated and will not be overlooked.  If you you like to further discuss please feel free to contact me at any time at the email listed below.  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary Heading: Great hotel, great staff and great location!
Summary: My daughter and I just got back from a fabulous Disneyland vacation!  We had a perfect stay at the Menage Hotel.  The staff was awesome, our room was immaculate and on the 4th floor overlooking the pool!  I felt very safe there too, since I was on vacation with my daughter alone, this was important!  The pool and hot tub were very nice and to our surprise while swimming one night...had the most perfect view of the Disneyland fireworks.  We me some greatecouples as well as some nice families while hanging by the pool too!  My daughter loved that she could swim and watch them at the same time.  The nightly Happy Hour from 4-7pm with $5 drinks and apps was also a nice perk.  The Palapa Bar was great!  Located right next to the pool area and the staff was again, very friendly.  We
Manager Response: Dear sosfamily,  Thank you very much for your five star review!  We are so happy to hear that you and your daughter enjoyed your stay. We are also glad to hear that you enjoyed the pool area with the fireworks, and the Happy hour that takes place every day.  We strive to provide the same experience you had to all our guest!  We can not wait to have you and your daughter as guest during your next Disneyland trip.  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary Heading: To many issues to be better than average...
Summary: This is one of the toughest reviews I have had to do of late.  To make it easier, I will separate the visit to their on-site restauraunt, The American Tavern into a separate review.  On arrival, the place is nice looking enough and certainly has very good access to Disneyland.  But the first knock comes quick as you pull into the drive.  You can valet for $12 per day, or self park for $10 per day.  Really?  $10 per day to park my car at a hotel I have a reservation at?  I guess next time I'll walk from Nevada, since clearly the Hotel Menage doesn't expect paying guests to have thier cars with them!  We got to our room.  I had requested a fireworks view and it almost seemed like they went out of their way to give me a room with the least amount of that view.  Ground floor, facing
Manager Response: Dear PaulYou,  We are sorry to learn that you experience with our hotel was not what you expected. We make every effort with all aspect of our unique hotel to ensure that we deliver, clean comfortable accommodations.   Please know that we will address all service short falls that you outlined in your review and will ensure deeply regret that was not the experienced you came to enjoy.  If you would like to further discuss the issue you experienced, please feel free to contact me  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: This is our second visit in two years to the ménage. Reception and restaurant staff were really friendly, food and cocktails were both fantastic. Only slight moan I have is that when we visited last time we were on our honeymoon and we told them this prior to our arrival on their Facebook page, we were upgraded to a pool view room and given a bottle of bubbly. This visit was for our friends honeymoon so I requested they could do this for them via email and they did nothing so I was a little disappointed at this.
Manager Response: Dear shortly13  Thank you for your review! We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us.  We strive to provide the same friendly customer service to all our guest.  I do want to apologize about the miss communication with your request.  Please contact me at the email below if you would like to further discuss.  Thank you, and we look forward to having you and your family as guest again.  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary Heading: Great facilities within the heart of Anaheim
Summary: Very happy with our stay and facilities of Hotel Menage.  A big Thank you to Michael at the bookings desk. He was extremely helpful and friendly to us AUSSIES . Thank you very much. We would be happy to stay with you guys again !
Manager Response: Dear Bright C  Thank You very much for your five star review! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our facilities.  We strive to provide the same experience that you received to all our guest.  We will definitely share your kind words with Michael.  We are looking forward to having you as guest soon!  Leo Flores Front office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: We were in Anaheim for a convention so the city was booked up.  Our company put us up at the Hotel Menage.  Oh boy, what a place.  It is at the huge intersection of Harbor Blvd and Ball Road with the 5 Freeway on the back side.  The noise is deafening and stressful.  The room was adequate and with earplugs we did sleep all night.  Stay here only if it is the last place available.
Manager Response: Dear Krobinto, Thank you for taking time out of your day to post your review.  We are sorry to learn that you experience with our hotel was not what you expected, due to the traffic noise.  Our proximity to and access Disneyland does offer a convenience for most guest, and we are sorry to learn that was not the instance with you.   If you would like to discuss the issue further you are more than welcomed to contact me at the email address listed below.  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresorstsinc.com

Summary: Starting off the 24hr pool is what got us there. On our first night we were moved rooms because when we got back to our room everytime we tried turning on the ac it smelled like it was burning which was not good. The 2nd night we got back at midnight and our room keys were not working, we had a 2 yr old that was crying because he was tired. My husband went back down,we were on the 5th floor, to get a new key when he tries it... It doesn't work so he calls the front desk from his cell n they send security up with a new key that doesn't work. Maintanence arrived and tried to clean the card reader n nothing so he got the door open but needed to change the card reader so he was in our room with the door open for about 10min u til im he changed it. It were just little problems but we
Manager Response: Dear Yvonne831  Thank you for taking time out of your day to post your review.  Your feedback is greatly appreciated and will not be overlooked. We are glad to hear that you and your family enjoyed our 24 hour pool area.  If you would like to further discuss the issues that you encountered during you stay.  You can reach me, using the contact info listed below.  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: This was our first time staying at Menage Hotel and we are absolutely staying there again on our next visit to Disneyland. Rooms very clean. Pool and hot tub opened 24/7. So easy to walk or take shuttle to Disneyland. Kent at the front desk made it so easy for us to enjoy our visit.  From the moment we got there until we walked out the door when we left he made sure we were taken care of   Thank u Kent.  And lets not forget of Jose at the outside bar at the "Palapa". He made sure we had an amazing last day at the pool area. I will recommend this hotel to all my friends. See you all there soon   Thank you so much !!!! Erika
Manager Response: Dear Erika G  Thank You for your review! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your first visit with us, and very happy to hear that you will visit us again.   We will definitely share your kind words with Kent, and Jose.   Once again Thank you!  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary Heading: Diamond in the ruff - Would stay again
Summary: This was our first stay at Hotel Menage, as we typically stay closer to the parks.  I would have to say this is our new favorite hotel by the parks.  With 24/7 pool access, live music, clean and friendly facilities and staff, why wouldn't you want to stay here.  The only problem we had was the smoke detector was chirping when we returned from the park one evening; staff promptly removed it but never returned it, and the wifi signal is not reliable.  Would connect and was unable to surf the internet.  Our room faced the freeway; outside you could hear the freeway; but once you closed the door it was super quiet!  Definitely recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Dear Trevor S Thank you very much for your review.  We are excited to hear that took advantage of some our amenities like the 24 hour pool, and the live music on the weekend!.  We are definitely working on speeding up the wifi.  We look forward to having you as a guest soon!  Leo Flores  Front office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: Our family of four stayed for nine nights. The room accommodated us with two queen beds. The hotel pool and outdoor bar were great. The happy hour food and cocktails are a must. An easy walk along Harbour blvd to Disneyland and chain restaurants. The hotel has been updated but is still a motel at heart. Staff were all very helpful. Room had a basic small coffee maker, I don't understand why a kettle or microwave is impossible like.
Manager Response: Dear benabz  Thank you very much for your review. Your feedback is vital, and much appreciated by our staff.  We are delighted to know you, and your family were pleased with our accommodations, pool space and restaurant.   We are looking forward to having you as our guest soon!  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: very friendly staff,clean,close to disneyland, we had a brilliant stay no problems at all.shuttle bus available if required.christine on reception very helpful,as was all staff.would definately go and stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Linda G  Thank you for your five star review!  We are very happy to hear that you had a brilliant stay, while visiting us here at Hotel Menage.  It is our mission to provide the same experience you had, to every guest.  We look forward to serving you, and your family in the future!  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: My partner and I stayed here for 4 nights during October. Anaheim was our first stop on our American holiday, and after being on a 17 hour flight, Edgar at the front desk was more than accommodating. I requested a pool-side view which we got, on the 5th floor. I am quite a light sleeper, and was worried about sleeping with the highway right next door, but the 4 nights I stayed there was possibly the best 4 nights sleep I have ever had! I never woke up to noise once, and the bed was so big that I didn't even bump into my partner once while we were asleep. The pool also has the most amazing view of the Disneyland fireworks. You could actually see the Matterhorn Mountain and the ferris wheel from our room. The ART bus was also really handy, stopping at the hotel every 20mins to
Manager Response: Dear apesssss,  Thank you very much for your five star review!  We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed all the amenities that Hotel Menage has to offer! including our 24 hour pool area, with a great view of the fireworks.  We will definitely share with Edgar your kind words.  We are looking forward to having you back as our guest!  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: Hotel didn't do anything to enhance our stay and visits to disneyland- it is an ok place to stay and you get what you pay for compared to the fancy resorts closer to Disney.  Staff were always welcoming which was good after a long day battling crowds and hoards of people. WARNING DO NOT USE THEIR RECOMMENDED CAR RENTAL COMPANY!!! We got fleeced by fernando from Anaheim Car Hire and can't get our money back off him. It is so disappointing that a hotel would recommend any disreputable services . We expected so much more.... Bad experience , very poor service from Hotel Ménage
Manager Response: Dear Brendan1970  Thank you for your review!  We are happy to hear about that you enjoyed they welcoming staff after your long days at Disneyland. I do want to apologize if your experience with Anaheim Rent a Car was not a positive one.  If you would like to further discuss the issues, please feel free to contact me at anytime using the email listed below.  Thank you  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary Heading: Clean, close to Disney but nothing special
Summary: Stayed at Hotel Menage as part of a Jet Blue package.  The Menage was clean and close to Disney but nothing special.  Lots of families and not very quiet.  Near freeways and very near nightly fireworks which were fun.  Rooms were clean, staff were fine.  In house restaurant was pretty good but pricey for pub fare.
Manager Response: Dear Frugalyankee  Thank you for your review, and taking the time to share your experience with us. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the clean rooms and the proximity to Disneyland.  Please know that we did enjoy having you as our guest, and hope that you come back to visit us soon.  Leo Flores	 Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: Our experience with Hotel Menage actually started 2 weeks before we got there. My co-worker and his partner and their friends got myself, my mom and a friend of mine hooked on coming to Disney for Gay Days a few years ago. So this year would mark our 3rd trip all together and the first one for my mom after beating breast cancer. So exciting! I've used Costco the past 2 trips and Hotel Menage came highly rated on their website as well as Trip Advisor. And it was SO reasonably priced, we jumped at it. We were all going to drive in and meet in Anaheim on Thursday night and then spend Friday and Saturday living it up in the park. My mom lives in CA and we in NV. She had decided that she would drive down fairly early on Thurs so she wouldn't have to drive at night. The only issue
Manager Response: Dear cali-girl89113  Thank you so much for your five star review.  We are happy to hear that you and your mom had a great experience during your visit with us. We strive to provide the same great experience with every guest that we encounter here at Hotel Menage.  We cannot wait to have you and your mom as our guest hopefully sooner than later.  Once again Thank You!   Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: My family (5 of us + 2 husband/boyfriend) stayed here in 3 rooms from September 23-30, 2014.    We booked a private van from the airport and I'd recommend it, much cheaper than Disney shuttles or cabs.   We arrived just after check in and were greeted by a beautiful, clean lobby and very helpful and friendly staff.  They told us about happy hour (4-7 p.m. daily, $5 appetizers and cocktails!) so naturally we headed to the pool bar ASAP. We had Jose, who was an AMAZING bar tender and server. We always loved having him serve us and joke around with us Canadians.  When we went to our rooms, me and my boyfriend were pleasantly surprised to see that we had been given a room with 1 king instead of 2 queens.  We faced the highway but we never heard it except some sirens since the police
Manager Response: Dear Lindsay-Sellar  Thank you for your five star review!  We are thrilled to hear that enjoyed your stay with us.   We strive to provide the same experience you had, for all our guests.  We are also happy to hear that you took advantage of our happy hour.  We will definitely share your kind words with Jose.  We are looking forward to having you and your family as our guest, soon.  We will also talk to mother nature about turning the heat down a little bit.  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: The hotel is in a great place but it is very high class. When you walk in you feel like royalty. The bar area was awesome. Drinks and food were briugh out to us really fast even though that night was super busy. Definitely get what you pay for though, we will be staying there again!
Manager Response: •	Dear  MollyValenzuela,  Thank you for your review! We are very happy to hear that you felt like royalty when arriving at Hotel Ménage.  We strive to provide the same experience you had, for all our guests.  We are also happy to hear that you enjoyed our restaurant and bars.   We can’t wait to have you back as our guest!  Leo Flores Front Office Manager leof@casaresortsinc.com

Summary Heading: If Disney is your destination, this is your Hotel
Summary: My family and I visited Anaheim for the sole purpose of going to Disneyland and California Adventure Park. We visited in September in the middle of a heatwave. Although the A/C may have been old, it worked really well. I concur with other reviews, although this Hotel is right next to a freeway, with the door closed you cannot hear it at all. This Hotel has the only 24 hour pool and spa and believe me after a long hot day at Disney, a pool you can relax in and around into the late hours is a godsend. Happy hour goes for 3 hours and the cocktails and beers are well priced as is the food. The WiFi is up and down but I found it worked best around the pool! The best feature of this Hotel (apart from its proximity to Disney and Starbucks for real coffee- Aussies will know what I mean)
Manager Response: Dear Joel I,   Thank you for your review and sharing your experience with us.  We are thrilled to know that you enjoyed our Palapa bar, proximity to Disneyland and our service team was helpful.  We work diligently to provide the experience you had for all of our guests.  We hope your experience with Hotel Menage was beyond what you expected and look forward to having you and all of our Aussie guests back soon!  David Gutierrez Assistant General Manager davidg@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: My husband and I stayed for 3 nights for our anniversary.  Very comfortable room. Close to many restaurants,  and attractions.  Wifi didn't work well, but we liked the no electronics rule this trip. We loved the walk to Disney and many areas nearby. Didn't have to pay for parking!
Manager Response: Dear bahena4064.   Thank you for your review and happy belated anniversary! We are thrilled to know you spent  your special occasion with Hotel Menage! We apologize for the inconvenience in Wi-Fi connectivity and are currently working to improve the service.  We look forward to having you back as our guest soon.   Thank you,   David Gutierrez Assistant General Manager davidg@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: The rooms were neat and clean and surprisingly very quiet even though we were right next to the highway.  Great for the kids to play in the pool, great for parents to catch up on some washing.  The food at the restaurant was great and convenient after a day at Disneyland.   Starbucks is across the road for that AM coffee and you should try and pick up some water from the service station before heading out for the day.  There is free wifi but it we found it hard to get onto at times.
Manager Response: Dear Kathryn R,   Thank you for the 5 STAR REVIEW! We are so excited to know that you enjoyed your recent stay at Hotel Menage including the 24 hour pool, guest amenities and our excellent American Tavern Eatery menu.   We can’t wait to have you back as our Guest.   David Gutierrez Assistant General Manager davidg@casaresortsinc.com

Summary Heading: It was pretty much what I expected
Summary: First I'll say the employees are very polite and helpful I had no trouble finding my room like other reviews had complained. The only thing outdated in the room was the air conditioner. It had been so hot the last couple of days I was looking forward to blasting it on high but that didn't happen. It looked like it was from the 60's. It blew cold air the problem was the high settings acted like it was on super low but whatever. I did enjoy the ablity to go swimming at 11pm with no kids it was really nice. I would recommend not eating at the restaurant located in the hotel you can tell its microwaved frozen food. If they could prove its fresh that I would like to know how they get the chicken so chewy and rough. I would be impressed to know how to get the microwave taste without
Manager Response: Dear Heather M,  Thank you for your review and taking the time to share your experience with Hotel Menage Management.   We apologize for the items you listed which impacted your overall stay.  Our goal is always to provide an above then satisfactory experience and I am sorry that was not the case.  We are thrilled you enjoyed our clean rooms, our 24 hour pool and our great drink menu at the Palapa bar  as well as our excellent guest service team.  Should you wish to discuss further, my contact information is listed below. We hope to have you back soon! Thank you,  David Gutierrez Assistant General Manager davidg@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: We stayed at the Ménage for a second this past August.  It was just as fantastic as the first time.  The service at the Front Desk and bell staff was first class.  We will definitely be back the next time we are at Disneyland.  I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a comfortable and enjoyable hotel.  Great for families or if you are in the area for business.
Manager Response: Dear Jonathan B,   Thank you for your 5 STAR REVIEW! We are very excited to know you and your family enjoyed the hotel inside and out.  We are thrilled to know that you would recommend us and look forward to having you back as our Guest soon!  David Gutierrez Assistant General Manager davidg@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: Wow. Impressive, I'll definitely come back in March. CLOSE to Disneyland bus comes every 15-20 minutes and is only 5.00 for an all day pass. I DID NOT hear any freeway noise. Beautiful 24/7 pool. I'd rate this Hotel a 10 and I've stayed at the Disneyland Hotel. Good job Hotel Menage! Cheryl Ramsay
Manager Response: Dear 9livesOceanside,   Thank you for your FIVE STAR REVIEW! We are so happy that   that you enjoyed our accommodations, easy walk to Disney and our friendly and inviting staff along with our guest amenities.   We are glad you  to hear you would return in the future and look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: We stayed at the hotel ménage for 1 night as part of our road trip! The hotel was alright not as nice as I was lead to believe by the pictures but nothing much wrong with it. We Were put off sitting by the pool as there was some noisy men drinking and listening to loud music! We had a ground floor room which I'm not sure if it was supposed to have a carpet but it looked like it had recently been pulled up. Apart from that room was very modern and clean. The Hotel is within walking distance from Disney which is great! we stayed at the sheraton park hotel for 3 nights previous to this and that hotel suited us better but the hotel ménage was still very nice and clean and would recommend it for a short stay.
Manager Response: Dear Alright hotel,  Thank your   review and sharing your expedience.  Our first floors rooms are “loft style” offering a unique and boutique style appearance.   We are very sorry you did not enjoy your pool experience and if you would like to discuss your stay in greater detail, you may contact me at davidg@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: A year ago today, my family embarked on our first overseas holiday. We were extremely tired when we arrived at Hotel Menage. Although our flight arrival did not coincide with our check in time (next time, we would book our room for the day prior to our arrival to ensure we can access our room when we need to, and would pay an extra night when leaving, to allow us to access a room all day before flying home). The lobby staff were wonderful in storing our luggage so that we could commence our LA holiday immediately. They kindly booked us a taxi, and we visit Wallmart (which was awesome). Upon entering our room, we were happy to see that the room was clean, and roomy. Even though the highway was right outside, we slept so well. Some nights, we could hear the fireworks from
Manager Response: Thank you so much your review; we are so very glad that our guest rooms and friendly and attentive Service Team made your stay that much more enjoyable.   Thanks again for sharing and we hope to see you in the near future.

Summary Heading: Always a great visit, wonderful staff
Summary: We have stayed here a number of times and always have a great visit. The front desk people are welcoming and accommodate our requests re room location, etc.. We have never had a bad experience here. The breakfast buffet is excellent with a good variety replenished regularly and at $13.95 we felt it was well priced. Servers there are very nice. The rooms are spacious with fridge, microwave and large TV. The beds are comfortable and housekeeping does a nice job. It's a short walk to Disney or you can take the ART bus right in front of the hotel to Disney or Knott's. We think one of the best assets is the lobby bar where Frank is in charge most nights and prepares excellent drinks at special happy hour prices. We always look forward to his pleasant company and conversation. We've
Manager Response: Dear Cands2,  Thank you for a taking the time to share your experience with us and thank you for your FIVE STAR REVIEW!.   We strive to ensure each of our Guests enjoys their stay like you did, our view of the Disneyland Fireworks is one of the best and of course, our proximity to Disney Parks.  We are thrilled you had an opportunity to taste our fantastic menu, enjoy our guest rooms and pool.   We look forward to your next stay with Hotel Ménage!

Summary: Stayed here with my boyfriend and will never be back. The first room we were checked in to had cracked concrete as the floor throughout. No rug except under the fold out couch. There were exposed sprinkler pipes and electrical lines. When we requested to move to another room we were answered with a "No" From the front desk. When we pressed further the front desk girl told us she would talk to her manager and she did then moved us to the third floor reluctantly. After putting our bags in the room we went down for a drink at the bar. Both bars were closing at 11:30pm on a Saturday with patrons lining the bar stools. The bar tender made us two weak long Island's and then chased us away.   At 7:00am we receive a knock on the door by hotel security telling us that our car had been
Manager Response: Dear Amanda E,   Thank you for your feedback reading your stay with Hotel Ménage. Our Guest Service Team is always prepared to assist our guests and assure they are comfortable; we are sorry this was not the case with your stay.   Please contact me at davidg@casaresortsinc.com to discuss your stay further.

Summary Heading: A Travel agents point of view
Summary: Me and my partner stayed at the Hotel Menage for two nights at the end of August.  The hotel is in such a great location if you want to go to Disneyland. You can walk in about10-15 minutes or you can by an art pass (shuttle which leaves every 20 minutes) to Disneyland. We did a mix of both.   The pool area is fabulous and has a great happy hour. The food was great around the pool, with heaps of variety. We loved the pork sliders and the buffalo wings :)  The rooms were clean and the beds were very comfortable.  There are a few reviews saying this is a noisy area due to the highway, We did not hear it at all.  The best thing here is the view of the Disney fire works, its better than from the park.  We would definitely return to the Menage
Manager Response: Dear BandC161,  Thank you very much for your 5 STAR REVIEW! We can’t be happier   to hear that our Travel Agents had a wonderful at our hotel and enjoyed the 24 hour pool, our great happy hour and our comfortable and clean guest rooms.    We are so happy to have had you as our guest and we look forward to having you back soon!

Summary: We used this hotel as our base for our guests for our daughter's wedding.  We stayed in the African Suite...gorgeous and very roomy.  We also used gueen and king rooms....all beautiful.  The pool was just the right temperature and drinks and snacks poolside were relaxing.  We had the breakfast buffet....just right.  We came back a couple of weeks later to just relax from the wedding excitement.  We'll be back!
Manager Response: Dear Camille S,   We are so thrilled that our African Themed Suite you booked was enjoyed by your wedding  party guests and that you spent your special occasion with us.   We look  forward to  having you back as our guest and enjoying Hotel Menage all over again!

Summary Heading: Great location, clean rooms, outstanding fireworks view, warm pool, and great valet!
Summary: This hotel is across the freeway from Disneyland! It's easy to get to, and the valet is fast and friendly. The restaurant service is friendly, the good tastes great, but the overall service is slow. The fireworks display, from Disneyland, is absolutely spectacular! We will stay here again, for the the fireworks alone! The beds are really comfortable, but the bathroom and rooms are on the smaller side, however the price is spot on, so the size is no big deal. We got what we paid for, and were very happy. Oh, and the kids loved it! Can't beat a 24 hour, heated pool!
Manager Response: Dear NicoleEugene,  Thank you for your 5 STAR REVIEW! We are very happy you enjoyed our American Tavern Restaurant, our comfortable beds and the very accessible drive to Disneyland.   The nightly Disneyland Fireworks are a great way to end a day at the park and we are so happy to enjoyed them as well.

Summary: I stayed at the hotel before and after my wedding. The hotel is nice. The room was beautiful.  The Pool and jacuzzi were too crowed, even after midnight.  For the most part they staff was very accommodating besides a few incidents.  First off, I ran out of toilet paper in my room. (They only provided one roll. I had several girls in my room getting ready with me for my wedding. ) I called housekeeping to get more toilet paper and they said they would bring some up right away. After 30 minutes nobody had come. My guests had to go down to the lobby in their robes to use the restroom. I called again and finally 45 minutes later someone brought toilet paper. My other (and biggest complaint) is that I had booked the Asian suite for my husband and I to stay at the night of our
Manager Response: Dear Michelle F,   Thank you choosing Hotel Menage as your hotel of choice prior to you wedding. We are thrilled to know you enjoyed your stay and apologize for the hiccup with servicing your room. We strive to ensure that requests are completed in a timely manner and this disrupted your occasion.  Please know we enjoyed having you and your party as our guests and hope that you would give us a chance in the near future to show you the level of service we aim to provide.  Should you wish to contact me and discuss your overall stay in greater detail, please don’t hesitate to email me at davidg@casaresortsinc.com.  Best Travels!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay near Disney.
Summary: My husband and I stayed here for 2 nights in September 2014, and couldn't have been happier. Excellent rates, clean hotel, friendly and extremely helpful staff, and a cozy and comfortable room. Surprisingly enough, despite how close we were, the noise from the freeway was minimal once the door to our room was closed. My husband stayed here 5 years ago when the hotel was under construction, and he had a positive experience back then which is why we chose this hotel. We went to Disney - which was a very short drive away - and booked a City tour of LA through the concierge. Not much else to do near this hotel but if we needed a place to stay in Anaheim, we would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Shannon G,   Thank you for your review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay and the convenience to Disney and area parks.  We are very happy that our rooms and accommodations were enjoyable and we look forward to having you as our guest again soon!

Summary Heading: Great customer service and great fireworks view
Summary: We stayed for 7 nights at hotel ménage. We were very happy with out choice after a lot of research. Walking distance from Disneyland, great fireworks view. Yes right off highway 5 so  can hear the traffic, but was prepared for that and it didn't bother us. Customer Service was sooo amazing front desk, valet, at the restaurant and bar. All around very friendly people (can make a huge difference). Pool was so nice to cool off with in the middle of the day or evening after a day at Disneyland. Hottub got really really dirty. and the pool could have been kept a little cleaner in regards to the standards we are use to at other hotels we have stayed at on other vacations. Either than that would recommend this hotel - reasonable rates. For eating out we would recommend Mimi's Café (we
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer M,  Thank you so much for your review! We are truly happy you enjoyed our hotel, 24 our pool and of course our guest rooms.   We are happy that you enjoyed our proximity to Disneyland and you had an opportunity to enjoy the nightly Disney Fireworks!  Thank you for your feedback and we look forward to having you as our return guest!

Summary: Staying here you are WALKING DISTANCE to Disneyland! You can see their fireworks while lounging poolside every night and the restaurant is absolutely fabulous! The rooms are nicely equipped and furnished, spacious and quiet. People are super-friendly and helpful. They even offer self-parking. You get the total package! I wouldn't change a thing at Hotel Menage.
Manager Response: Dear Christiane T,   Thank you for your FIVE STAR REVIEW! We are truly happy that you enjoyed your overall stay with Hotel Menage especially our proximity to Disneyland and our guest rooms.   We hope you choose to stay will us on your next trip and thanks!

Summary: Booked this "hotel" because it appeared to be a HOTEL conveniently by disneyland. Upon arriving at the location I was a bit surprised. The entrance to the hotel rooms are through exterior (outdoor) corridors, which is not visible on the online photographs. The rooms have the feel of modern motel rooms. The room was clean except for the bath tub, it appeared to have dried dirt or perhaps cracks from old age. The pool is open 24 hours which seemed like a good idea after spending the day on your feet. However, there is alot of young adults that take advantage of the situation and party pretty heavily. Overall the front desk and service is great. There is a bar and restaurant located in the hotel. The price is very reasonable that is of course you get what you pay for.
Manager Response: Dear Em040692,   Thank you for sharing your feedback with us; we value your time and we are sorry that you did not truly enjoy your stay and accommodations.   If you would like to discuss in further detail, please contact me at davidg@casaresortsinc.com.   Thank you.

Summary: Wifi didn't work at all and the girl on reception gave the worst service - was as if everything I asked was a huge chore for her. Wifi was most disappointing as wanted to contact family at home. The fireworks display was awesome and I also Liked the dinner at the restaurant and the service from the girl there was excellent. Breakfast was average for $15
Manager Response: Dear Gemma H,   Thank you for your feedback; we are sorry to learn that you truly did not enjoy your stay but I am eager to discuss the items you mentioned. I can be reached at davidg@casaresortsinc.com.

Summary: Front desk was very helpful and accommodating! I would stay here again. Wish we would've had more time to enjoy the bar and pool area which is beautiful. The puppies loved the room as well! The restaurant that is in the hotel lobby was decent too. We asked for an early check in to be able to have a place for the pups and still have the day to enjoy the parks as well as a late check out to do the same. both times front desk was very accommodating. No complaints here :)
Manager Response: Dear Lirey1125,   Thank you for your review! We are so happy to know that you enjoyed our service and our accommodations and our pet-friendly hotel!  We look forward to having you as our return guest!

Summary: Toni bartender/server is AMAZING, she was very helpful with recommendations for dinner and the history of the restaurant. Amazing service from most of the employees. Young woman, wish I got her name, today around 10:30 am, saved our lives by going out of her way to loan us jumper cables. Amazing. Room was good. No carpet but a large enough rug. I like that idea. Worst part about the entire experience wifi was/is HORRIBLE! Come on, really! Not happy with check in male, pretty rude. Parking was $10 a day which seems ridiculous. Also, wanted to hold $150 on debit/credit card even though we prepaid everything, annoying not mentioned ahead of time.  Housekeeping service was great. Extra coffee and great cleaning service. Towels brought right to my room last night when needed more
Manager Response: Dear Jacky Jack R,   Thank you for your review! We truly are appreciate of your feedback and happy to know we made your stay comfortable and satisfactory.  I am eager to discuss your overall scoring of our Hotel and if you would like to contact me, I can be reached at davidg@casaresortsinc.com.

Summary Heading: It was great walking distance to the park.
Summary: Yes the hotel was in a good location to the park however the tub in the bathroom was outdated and should be replaced. Other than that the hotel was very nice. The pool was clean and free to the guests. I like that there is also a bar there. High protection since you need your keys to get in everywhere. I like the option that there is room service available. The bed was firm also the pillows. My husband liked the firmness but having fluffy pillows for choices would have been nice as well. The cleanliness of the hotel was was very nice and I felt comfortable in the hotel. The drinks were expensive. But the staff was very nice and helpful.   Also the fact that this review MUST be 200 characters is a little much.
Manager Response: Dear JessicaKick04,   Thank you for sharing feedback on your recent stay. Your comments will be taken into consideration as well and remedied.  We are truly happy that you enjoyed the proximity to Disneyland as well as our friendly staff. We look forward to having you back soon!

Summary: Close to disneyland, which was nice,but Couldn't sleep as much. Our room was close to the freeway. Employees were very friendly . Was nice to see the fireworks from the pool area. Which was nice as well.
Manager Response: Dear Chris760,   Thank you for your 5 STAR REVIEW! We are excited you enjoyed your stay with Hotel Menage.   We hope to see you in the near future.

Summary: We stayed at the Menage Hotel on our recent trip to Disneyland (Aug 24-30) and it was an excellent experience.  The only thing that keeps this from being a full 5 stars is the lack of internet. They do provide free Wi-Fi, but it was extremely difficult to connect to and extremely slow.  My new Galaxy S5 couldn't connect at all. My laptop would connect, but would take almost 5 minutes to load the Disneyland website. I tried to upload a 1:30 video to Facebook and it was going to take 800 minutes to upload.  Very disappointed in that.  Other than the Wi-Fi, I loved everything about my stay at the Menage.  Housekeeping was Awesome and arranged my 7 year old daughter's toys and animals different everyday making her so excited to get back to the room every night.  The entire staff was
Manager Response: Dear lsullyr92,   Thank you for your review! It’s always great to know our Guests enjoyed our Hotel and we delivered the service and accommodations you expected.   We are apologetic you experienced connectivity issues with our Wi-Fi and we are looking into the issue for an immediate resolution.   We hope to have you back as our Guest soon and if you would like to discuss you stay in greater detail, you may contact me at davidg@casaresortsinc.com.

Summary: Clean hotel. Friendly staff.  Sureya was great in showing us what around he hotel. Pool is open 24 hours.  Was able to check in early with wife and son.  Good sized pool 5 feet at the deepest point.  Room has adjustable AC temp control which we kept ice cold.  Hotel is close to Disneyland so fireworks can be heard and seen as if you were at Disneyland.  Our day was for a day and night.  Definitely will love to go back.  Great pool side appetizers and drinks.
Manager Response: Dear Francisco C,   Thanks for your 5 STAR REVIEW! It is great to hear that our Guests enjoyed our Palapa Bar, our great rooms and our 24 hour pool.   We can’t wait to have you back as our guest soon!

Summary: Stayed at this hotel once several years ago and thought it was great.  Well, it may have been refurbished and updated a bit since then, but quality of the service has totally deteriorated since then.  WiFi in the rooms didn't work.  The restaurant was lousy.  and the Front Desk staff acted like answering guests concerns and helping in ANY way was not part of their job (they should all be fired). the saltwater pool was nice, but that is about all I can say on a positive note about this place.
Manager Response: We are sorry to learn you did not truly enjoy your stay with Hotel Menage. If you wish to speak about your stay and dining, please contact me at davidg@casaresortsinc.com Thank you.

Summary: Personally I love this place!  It is very close to the Disney entrance or the Mickey and Friends parking structure.  The rooms are renovated and quite nice!  If you book regularly, you get a preferred rate too, and every time I come I see the same awesome staff greeting me!  You can come back after a day at Disney and relax in the pool without worrying about when it closes because it's open 24 hours!  Or you can sit by the palapa bar near the pool, order a cocktail and watch the fireworks show from the comfort of your seat since they happen right behind the hotel.  Give this place a go, you won't be disappointed!
Manager Response: Dear Jarrod_SanDiego,   Thank you for your 5 STAR REVIEW! We are very excited to know you truly enjoyed your stay, our accommodations and proximity to Disneyland.  Please contact our Reservations Desk for your next stay! Thanks and we look forward to seeing you again.

Summary Heading: Great hotel in need of TLC
Summary: The location and staff are fantastic but this hotel would benefit from some general maintenance. The pool area is lush and relaxing and happy hour is generous. The rooms are large and comfortable but in-room WiFi is awful. The fireworks from Disneyland are louder here than in the park, but the fireworks viewing is spectacular.
Manager Response: Dear Sheespan,   Thank you for your review; we are happy to know you enjoyed yourself while a guest of ours and thank you for sharing your valuable feedback.  We look forward to having you back.

Summary: Hotel is a short 5 minute walk from Disneyland. Handy location to get onto freeways. Extremely helpful staff to organise tours of LA which include pick up from the hotel. Can watch the Disneyland fireworks from the hotel every day.
Manager Response: Dear dollarboyjoel,  Thank you for your FIVE STAR REVIEW!  We are happy to hear you enjoyed our proximity to Disneyland and our great location.  We look forward to having you as our guest soon!

Summary: Can watch the Disney fireworks each night by the pool at this hotel which is great. Pool is nice and clean. Rooms are average but clean. All of us in our party repeatedly caught our shins and toes on the large square bedframes.
Manager Response: Dear Lynda6648,  Thank you for sharing your recent experience about your stay at Hotel Menage. We truly value your feedback and are happy you enjoyed the nightly Disneyland fireworks.  I am sorry to hear about the experience you had with our beds and would be happy to discuss with you further. You may contact me at davidg@casaresortsinc.com.

Summary Heading: Five star boutique hotel experience on a budget?! Is this real life??
Summary: The service we received during our stay was that which one would expect from a five star resort. The people that work at the hotel ménage seem to go above and beyond the call of duty as a routine. Clearly, the management here has employed extremely high standards when selecting their staff. They even went out of their way to help us when we accidentally got lost on the wrong shuttle!  Coupled with the noteworthy customer service, this hotel was immaculate, the rooms were beautifully decorated and modern, and the pool area was beautiful, with fun music playing and great happy hour specials. Try the mac and cheese! Skip the Mai Tai, though, haha.   The shuttle takes you directly to and from Disneyland, which adds to the convenience and the overall pampered feeling we received,
Manager Response: Dear LCGreeneyes109,   Thank you for your FIVE STAR REVIEW! We always strive to deliver the service to each one of  our guests just like what you experienced on your recent trip to Hotel Menage; we are happy to have had you as our guest!  Thank you for sharing your positive feedback about our service team, I’ll be sure to share with them as well.  Again, thank you and we look forward to having you as our guest in the near future!

Summary Heading: We had an amazing time this weekend at Hotel Ménage !!!!!!
Summary: Hotel and staff were amazing we loved the pool atmosphere , Disney firework show abs the food was good too!!!! My 4 year old made lots of friends in the pool and learned to swim.... Good price and good service can't beat that ...
Manager Response: Dear SantiagoA5,   Thank you for the FIVE STAR review!  We are thrilled our pool, fireworks and hotel provided you with the experience you hoped for.  We can’t wait for your next return! We look forward to having you as our guest soon!

Summary: Walked in to the hotel room (on the 4th floor) and was welcomed by a strong urine odor. The hotel moved us to another room (on the 2nd floor) that while not as bad, still had a slight urine smell. We didn't want to keep moving. so decided to stay since it was tolerable and we were tired. Unfortunately, this room had no connection to the "free" wifi. They offered for us to move again, but we stayed. While taking a shower we found the reason for the urine smell, the plumbing was blocked up and backing into the tub. Yeah, gross.
Manager Response: Dear MichaelJaramillo,  We are truly apologetic that your overall stay was unsatisfactory. Your areas of concerns have been addressed with the appropriate departments and should you wish to discuss  your stay in greater detail, please contact me at davidg@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: We checked into our room late at night was sad that food was no longer served after 11 pm.,  But the pool / hot tub is opened 24 hours.. That was a godsent! Hot days at Disneyland and cooling off in the pool!  The value for your money was absolutely mind blowing ( I booked through Expedia.. It was by far the cheapest)  This hotel has the Disney shuttle come every 20 mins., if you are going to explore Disney for 3+ days I suggest you buy a multiple bus pass.. It will save you even more money.  Even though Disney is just a few minutes away I strongly suggest you take advantage of the shuttle or drive there yourself.. (Parking at Disney is 20.00 / day) after a long busy day at Disney you will want to sit on the bus for a few minutes (hotel ménage is on bus 11 and 3rd drop when
Manager Response: Dear Natasha M Thank you for your FIVE STAR review! We are truly happy you were satisfied with your experience and had an opportunity to enjoy all our hotel amenities. We are also trilled your experience with our 24 hour pool and room accommodations were pleasant.   We look forward to your return trip to Hotel Menage!

Summary Heading: Great experience, if you know what to expect
Summary: Great property. Conveniently located near the highway and of course, Disneyland. Modern, classy rooms, many with high lofts overlooking the pool (pool views also allow for great viewing of the Disneyland fireworks). Some of the rooms are a little noisy if facing the highway, but it has never bothered me, and I've stayed here 3 times already. Small fee for self-park, but it's no biggie compared to some of the outrageous parkings fees founds at other California hotels.
Manager Response: Dear SherryinTX Thank you for the 5 STAR REVIEW! We are truly happy to have had you as a return guest and we look forward to your next stay! Thanks again!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay (coming back on the 21st to stay)
Summary: I stayed at ménage and at first did not know what to expect, I was very pleased with the amenities and service.  The staff was very helpful and valet guys were great.  The only thing I have an issue with is no one answers the phone, I have been calling since yesterday and no answer.  I called the 714-758-0900 I have a question about an amenity  Other than that, food is great, adult beverages were mixed correctly :).  Great fun...  Oscar Meza
Manager Response: Dear Oscar_Meza_Sprint,  Thank you for your 5 STAR Review! We are so happy you enjoyed your most recent visit and you’ll be back.   I am sorry you were not able to connect with our Guest Service Desk but please feel free to contact me at davidg@casaresortsinc.com or again, at the direct line.   We look forward to having you as our Guest again.  Thanks!

Summary: Had a great stay. Can walk to Disneyland in 10 mins. Hotel is old, but well maintained, clean & comfortable. Staff are great, extremely helpful, especially Frank the barman, also Christine & Michael. Check-in was quick & efficient. Restaurant food was good. Traveling to Disney via ART bus was easy, would stay again when visiting L.A.
Manager Response: Dear Noel S,   Thank you for your review! We are truly happy that you enjoyed Hotel Menage our guest rooms as well as our proximity to Disneyland! We hope to see you soon!

Summary: I am definitely coming back to Hotel Menage. I don't know how they are able to provide such great services with such low rates! Some highlights:  1. Our room was GREAT. It was incredibly clean and spacious. And I was delighted to see that we were provided with all the amenities (e.g. a refrigerator, a coffee maker, a flat screen television, an iron). I was also very fond of their oatmeal soap bar.   2. The people were very friendly, helpful, and prompt. Our questions were kindly and quickly answered. We asked for a lot of directions.  3. The food was DELICIOUS and UNIQUE. We ate at the American Tavern two nights in a row. I highly recommend trying the "Spicy Penne and Sausage" or the "Borraceo Chicken." Order both! You won't be disappointed! The "Borraceo Chicken" comes with
Manager Response: Dear Sahnghee Y,  Thank you for your 5 STAR review! We are so happy that you were completely satisfied with all that we had to offer. We strive to deliver the level of service &  accommodations you enjoyed. We hope to see you on your next trip to Disneyland.  Thanks again!

Summary Heading: Hotel Menage - An Awesome Place to Stay near Disneyland!!!
Summary: We have frequently stayed here.  Great environment/vibe.  Pool is awesome and open 24 hours.  Best place to watch fireworks other than the park!  Rooms are comfortable and very clean - get one facing the pool, 3rd floor, lower numbers (301 - 310).  Staff are exceptional - Ashley, Frank, Emilio, Jose, Hailey, Enok, Yadi, Frank (another one!), Ric, plus many others whose names we did not get.  Food is great, awesome happy hour food/drinks.  Nice walk to Disneyland (or take the shuttle).   Thanks for the great experience once again everyone!
Manager Response: Dear MakeItGreat,   Thanks for the 5 star review! We thank you for your loyalty and we truly appreciate our return guests.   Thank you for recognizing our team and we’ll be sure to share your experience with them.   We look forward to seeing you soon!

Summary: I would say we had an excellent stay at Hotel Menage and would definitely recommend to family and friends. The fireworks show was absolutely fabulous! Our only concern is the bed frame. Five out of six of us hurt ourselves by bumping into the corners.  Very painful and would recommend padding be placed on corners of bed.
Manager Response: Dear Kay R,   Thank you for your 5 star review! We are truly excited to know that you enjoyed being a guest of ours and we look forward to your return visit.   We are happy to know that you enjoyed the nightly fireworks  and thank you for the recommendation!

Summary: Hotel is practically on top of the 5 Freeway.  Rooms on the backside of the property have deafening eight or ten lane traffic noise 24/7.  Elevator was slow and felt like it was about to break.  In the room my safe did not work, my bed sheet had a bloodstain and my entry key worked sporadically.  The fridge made a whining sound.   No HD Channels or at least not many.  I'm sure the budget minded family going to Disneyland will find this place acceptable,  but not me.
Manager Response: Dear SeaAirMakesMeHungry,   I am sorry to learn you did not truly enjoy your stay with us. Please know that had these items been brought to the attention of Hotel Staff, we could have had those immediately remedied. They have also been addressed by the appropriate departments.   Please feel free to contact me directly at davidg@casaresortsinc.com if you wish to discuss your stay in greater detail.

Summary Heading: Convenient location, reasonable price.  Hotel ok, but not great
Summary: If you're going to Disneyland, this is a great choice, as it's a 10 minute walk from the park, or if you prefer (especially if you have small kids) there's a bus stop right outside that will get you to the park.  The hotel itself was clean, and I ate breakfast at the hotel each morning at their breakfast buffet, which was great for kids, and ate in their restaurant one night, which was reasonable.  The pool was ok, and it was convenient to be able to buy a beer right next to it, or to play ping pong in that area.  My two gripes about the hotel were 1) it was too noisy at night - in my case, my room was on the freeway side, and there was a lot of freeway noise.  The noise seemed to come in around the door, so weather stripping on the door would likely fix that (so hopefully
Manager Response: Dear Gavin S,   Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback on your recent stay with Hotel Menage. We truly appreciate your review.  Our Team has taken note of the items you shared and we  have made the necessary corrections.   We are happy to know your family enjoyed the vacation and we look forward to having you as our guest soon!

Summary Heading: Not what I would of expected!
Summary: I picked this place as it was near Disneyland and from the website had some great extras. 1. the pool was open 24hrs and was it was a nice pool. 2. You could also see the fireworks from the park. My experience however with this place was that we didn't check in until midnight and the room we got was HORRIBLE. My daughter was even shocked of how ugly and tacky it was. The room looked like it was not even finished, and there was no carpet which was odd to me.Since I had said I had a 2 yr. I was concerned if he fell he could of gotten hurt. Then there were pipes in the ceiling that also made the room very uncomfortable. Then there was the bathroom that had hair in the tub and also a pubic hair on the floor. I was literally disgusted that we were offered that room. Of course I
Manager Response: Dear Maria I,   We are sorry to learn that our “loft style’’ guest rooms were not what you expected, however we are happy to know you appreciated the  proximity to Disneyland and the.  If you wish to discuss your guest room and your overall experience in greater detail, please contact me at davidg@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: Our family stayed at the Hotel Menage for a day at Disney. Very nice hotel with beautiful grounds, pool, lobby, restaurant. I would definitely stay here again for another trip to the area. We didn't eat at the American restaurant but I wish we did. We took the shuttle to Disneyland. Very convenient.
Manager Response: Dear ohiopapatraveler,  Thank you for the very nice review! We are happy to know you annoyed your stay while at Hotel Menage.   We hope to see you soon and have an opportunity to eat at our American Tavern Restaurant.  Thanks!

Summary: What a nice hotel. But with terrible location. Right next to the freeway and busy stay. But the windows work well. The fireworks display view is beautiful from the pool area. The rooms are clean and nice. The attached restaurant, American Tavern has good food. I do recommend this place. The service is great too. There is a shuttle to and from Disneyland but it isn't free. The hotel is right next to the I-5. I love the pool and Palapa bar. I love how the pool is open 24/7.
Manager Response: Dear NIKO C,   Thank you for your 5 star review!  Our Team is excited to know your experience was pleasant and enjoyable.   We are glad you enjoyed out American Tavern Eatery menu and the nightly Disneyland Fireworks.   We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We stayed at this resort in February 2013 and liked it so much that it was our first choice when we went back to California in December. I have stayed in at least a dozen hotels in the Disney area and even though this one is a 10-15 minute walk to the park, this was easily one of my favorites because it's away from all of the noise that comes with being right across from Disneyland. Definitely request a room with a view of the fireworks - we actually thought the view of the fireworks was almost on par with our view from when we watched them in the park (albeit without the music or the castle). Rooms are a good size. I've read a lot of complaints about the noise from the freeway but this was honestly never an issue for us... possibly because we were so tired from everything we
Manager Response: Dear MeganO85,   Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We are so happy to know you enjoyed your stay, our accommodations and our proximity to Disneyland.   It’s flattering to know you enjoyed your stay months back and are now sharing your stay’s details now with us.   We hope to see you in the near future!

Summary Heading: I did not like this room at ALL.
Summary: We decided to stay at this hotel because of its close proximity to Disneyland, and because of the reasonable rates. I'm sorry I did because the beds were so hard, the pillow felt like someone folded up a towel and stuffed it in a pillow case. There was no covering over the box spring which added to the overall cheap feel of the room. The bathrooms are weirdly large and just don't feel clean. Yuck. I didn't like this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear JodiNina,   We are sorry to know that you did not truly enjoy your stay and your guest room.  Please know that our service team is trained to ensure our guests are always completely satisfied;   Please feel free to contact me at davidg@casresortsinc.com to discuss your stay and room in greater detail.

Summary Heading: Trying hard but not a boutique
Summary: This hotel is more like a motel.  In need of major renovations.  Our room had a problem with the shower control  and we could never regulate the hot/cold temperature of the water.  The carpet was soaked in front of the bathroom sink, and although we told the staff about it they put a large fan to dry the carpet and did not fix the problem  so when we got back to the room our shower was flooding the floor below.  We did ask for and received some compensation for the inconvenience but they could have been more proactive and fixed the problem when we first old them about it.  I will not stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Tim W,   We are sorry to know that you truly did not enjoy your stay and we not completely satisfied with our hotel.   Please feel free to contact me at davidg@casareosrtsinc.com to discuss your stay in greater detail. I look forward to hearing from you.

Summary: We stayed here so we could take our two boys to Disneyland and more importantly Cars Land! We found the pricing to be really great and it was only a short commute to the Disneyland resort. We stayed for 4 nights and found the location to be quite close to shops and restaurants. I would stay here again if I am back in Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear NicaTravisc,   Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with Hotel Menage. We are very happy to know that you and your family enjoyed our Hotel as well as the new attractions at Disneyland.   We hope to see you on your next trip! Thanks!

Summary: I enjoyed my stay here. The pool is amazing and rooms are spectacular. I would recommend this to any family or friend. The employees are always helpful. Restaurants in the hotel are great too. I will definitely return.
Manager Response: Dear Michael A,   Thank you for the 5 Star review! We are so happy to know that you enjoyed your stay with Hotel Menage as well as our fantastic American Tavern Eatery menu.   We hope to see you on your next trip to Disneyland! Thank you!

Summary: We love this hotel.  From the service to the Palapa Bar, pool, breakfast, rooms, location and VALUE!! I can not say enough good things!  We will return first week of September.  We won't stay anywhere else.
Manager Response: Dear Theresae777 ,   Thank you for your 5 Star review!  It is fantastic to hear that you enjoyed everything about Hotel Menage.   We truly enjoyed having you as our guest and we look forward to you next stay! Thanks!

Summary: The rooms are fresh and clean and open and bright! Bathrooms are clean and have good travel products. The staff were all very nice and helpful. The pool was refreshing, and full all day long. FIREWORKS!!!!!!!!!!The buffet breakfast was pricey, but the food is really good. The wifi was not strong.   This was our second stay here, and we brought another couple with us. We all were very happy with our stay.
Manager Response: Dear ivory1217 Thank you for the great review! We truly valuable your time and feedback. Thank you for also being a return guest. We are happy to know that you enjoyed our clean, comfortable rooms and we look forward to your third stay with us

Summary Heading: outstanding staff make this hotel a 5 star equivalent!
Summary: My husband and two teenage daughters took a 5 night trip to disneyland. We wanted to stay at a Disney property but could not justify the cost.  Now we are so glad we passed on disney and stayed at Hotel Menage. I usually start rating the hotel with the check in experience but the exceptional service began with the reservation process!  Sam was so helpful when we booked our two queen room.  She helped me arrange an airport pick up with the local taxi company and he was waiting for us at the airport as promised!  Ask for "Pete" to pick you up. He is courteous and professional. we arrived at the hotel too early to check in but anxious to ger to Disney. This is where the fabulous Bellman/Concierge service kicked in!  Wow!!! Talk about great service,  Michael took care of our bags
Manager Response: Dear OutofTownVancouver,  Thank you for the 5 Star review! We truly appreciate the details who included in your review about Hotel Menage, service levels and accommodations. We strive to ensure each guest experiences Hotel Menage like you did.   Thank you for recognizing our Service Team; Our Bellman and Concierge always have the best and most helpful tips and pointers when traveling to the Anaheim Resort Area. All that you listed is what Hotel Menage is about “Creating Experience to Last a Lifetime.”  We hope so see you on your next trip to Southern California and best travels!

Summary: Found my mum's ring and handled it properly, many thanks to the professional service.  The room clean up is good, and air condition is great, I especialy recommend the 24 hours pool service. It's clean and great outdoor entertainment.
Manager Response: Dear Steveyema,   Thank you for your 5 star review! We truly are happy to know you enjoyed your recent stay with Hotel Menage.  We are excited to know you enjoyed our 24 hour pool and our guest room accommodations!  We thank you and look forward to your next stay with Hotel Menage.

Summary: We stayed for 7 nights and not a single moment that the wifi worked in the rooms. Signal is so bad that we need to go to the lobby to get a decent reception.  Good hotel though if you're into swimming and an avid fan of Disneyland fireworks .
Manager Response: Dear Arpee66,   We apologize you did not have your issue resolved in a timely manner. We have numerous options available for any guests that experience trouble with Wi-Fi connectivity. We know every device is just a little different and have resolution plans in place to get our guests connected. I am sorry that was not the case with you.   If you would like to discuss your stay in greater detail, please contact me at davidg@casaresortsinc.com.  Thank you.

Summary: Order some food (macaroni and cheese/ and shrimp Alfredo,)  when I get the bill they add service charge, room service charge ect ect.,I think that's too much , any way it's just a one time , happy hour was great ,
Manager Response: Dear 4royce,   Thank you for your recent review and sharing your feedback about our American Tavern in-room dining menu.  We are glad to know you enjoyed your stay and our dining and Palapa Bar menu!. We look forward you having you as our guest in the near future.

Summary Heading: A Nice Place to Stay While Visiting Disneyland
Summary: We stayed here during a recent trip to Disneyland. The lobby was up to date and clean and  the staff was friendly. One of the positives is that if you can stay in the park late and not have to worry about missing check in. They process check-ins up to 2 am. We booked a 2 queen room, but were pleasantly surprised with a queen and a king. The mattresses were quite comfortable. They are soft, if you are a fan of hard mattresses, they might not be for you, but I thought they were perfect. It was honestly, the best night of sleep I had during our 2 1/2 week stay in So Cal. Parking was extra, but not outrageous for the area. It was nestled between two busy streets with a highway nearby. I didn't hear any road noise in the road, so the sound proofing must be good.
Manager Response: Dear 2_shutterbugs,   Thank you for your review! We truly value your feedback on your recent stay with Hotel Menage.  We have a 24 hour desk always available for guests who are traveling during off-hours. We are happy to know your had a restful stay and we look forward to your next stay with Hotel Menage.

Summary: It's a 15 minute walk to the entrance to Disneyland, but the hotel offers a shuttle service.  The cost of shuttles over and back for two of us, made taking the car to the Disney parking garage about the same cost, but more convenient for us. You can see the Matterhorn from our 4th floor balcony.  We really enjoyed that the pool was open 24 hours.  The staff is friendly.  As we walked away from checking out, my 5 year old remarked about Christine, who worked at the registration desk , "She is soooo nice."  My daughter had fun on this little trip;  she enjoyed her Disney experience and the hotel with the all-night pool, but that she left the hotel with a positive feeling when the young lady at the desk listened to her talking about Disneyland, allowed us to go home with a longer
Manager Response: Dear RangerBobN,  Thank you for your review. We truly appreciate your feedback. Our proximity to Disneyland make us a premier choice in convenience and location.  Thank you for sharing your experience with our service team. We will be sure to share that.   We look forward to your next stay with Hotel Menage

Summary: I have been going to disneyland my whole life & we always stay in a cheaper hotel walking distance to the parks. All of them seem dumpy & dirty! I was so thrilled when we stayed at hotel menage! The price was very reasonable so we booked it.  Upon arrival i was thrilled to see it had an actual nice lobby, restaurant & bar inside. There was a pool, jacuzzi & bar outside too.  I read other reviews that said it was loud, & maybe it has to do with room location but our room was fine! No noise problems. It wasn't huge but definitely spacious & clean. I was very happy with it.   The disney shuttle stops at the hotel & my parents used it. However, my husband & i walked- my GPS measured it at less than a half mile from lobby to disney gate. We would walk back each evening to get dinner
Manager Response: Dear Livi422,  Thank you for your 5 star review! We are truly excited we were your hotel of choice and you thoroughly enjoyed your stay with us.   We look forward to your  next stay!

Summary: There are a few good things. If u r facing the pool you do see the fireworks. Water is hot. Staff is nice. Now the bad. Rooms r horrible. Dark and no tables 1 chair. It's dark so u can't see the issues in the room. Holes in walls damp smelling. Like a dog stayed there. Went down at check in to ask for a different room. They offered a suite at 150 more a night. Refrigerator didn't work. Asked for a new one. They didn't have any. Roaches climbing in the elevators and around the rooms. For the money I would have stayed at the Marriott or the best western. Traveler beware.
Manager Response: Dear Jillymi,  Thank you for your information. We sincere apologize that you did not truly enjoy your stay and the isolated incidents you encountered have been addressed.   Should you wish to speak with hotel management, please contact me at davidg@casaresortsinc.com.

Summary: Hotel Menage was okay. We read reviews and were sure to request a room away from freeway noise. We had a street side room. The location of the hotel is tough for noise (near highway 5)- but amazing for the fireworks show which can be seen from the pool. Internet did not work for 2 days. The shuttle to Disney is a public shuttle which you need to pay for separately. The shuttle worked out fine, but when I booked the room I was led to believe the shuttle was the Hotel shuttle and was included. The room was clean and comfortable. The valet folks were helpful. We have stayed at many hotels near Disney over the years in comparison this hotel was about average.
Manager Response: Dear Ccmgogo,   Thank you for sharing your experience with Hotel Menage. We are happy to know that you enjoyed the nightly Disneyland fireworks during your stay. We also happy to know that you enjoyed our clean comfortable rooms.   We look forward to your next stay with us!
