Summary: I absolutely loved this hotel.  We vacationed with a family of 4 (kids ages 3 & 5).  Upon arrival, the staff was incredibly welcoming and friendly.  Valet helped us to unload our car after a long drive, and did so with friendly smiles.  The lobby was full of life and quickly reminded me that we were on vacation.  We ate at the well-priced restaurant buffet every morning, which was perfect for our early mornings before hitting the theme parks.  Staff were attentive and friendly.  The fees were also incredibly reasonable for the shuttle to and from both parks.  We didn't have to wait more than 10 min and they were easy to find at the end of long days at Disney.  The kids loved the pool.  It was the perfect location to watch the Disney fireworks from.  Our rooms were exactly what
Manager Response: Dear Emilia R,   Thank you for your 5 star review!!  The Team at Hotel Menage strives to deliver the experiences you encountered on your recent trip to Disneyland.  We are happy to know you enjoyed your clean, comfortable room, American Tavern Breakfast Buffett as well as our convenient location to the Anaheim Resort area.  Our pool is the perfect place to unwind while on vacation.  Our team looks forward to your next trip to Hotel Menage and Disneyland!

Summary: We stayed here in June and checked in effortlessly to our top floor room. We walked in and walked out immediately! The noise from the freeway was horrific. Went to the front desk and they rectified this immediately and without hassle. We were given a pool facing room which was great. Ate at the restaurant a couple of times and the service was efficient and the food was very good. Can certainly say the breakfast was great value. Disneyland was a fifteen minute walk and you cannot beat that!  Pool open 24 hours and was clean and well kept. Would stay here again in a heartbeat.
Manager Response: Dear Carl H,  Thank you for your review! We are happy to know that your concerns were addressed and you were satisfied with your accommodations.  We thank you for your feedback and are truly happy to know you enjoyed staying at Hotel ménage and we look forward to your next reservation.

Summary Heading: Awesome place for my children and I.
Summary: Amazing place to say.  Extreme close distance to Disneyland.     I thought it was a clean beautiful place.  At 9:30ish the Disneyland fire works go off and you can relax by the pool or bar and see it all. My family enjoyed our stay at the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Miguel B,  Thank you for your review and your feedback! We are very pleased to know you and your family enjoyed themselves while being a guest of Hotel Ménage. We truly hope to have you as our guest very soon!

Summary: I recently stayed at this hotel..After, making my reservation I read the hotel had bedbugs, useless to tell you how concerned I was. The first thing we did was to check the mattress.. NO TRACE OF BED BUGS !! Hotel was clean, the staff very polite, pleasant,helpful and Disneyland firework could be watched from the swimming area.. GREAT HOTEL, and GREAT DRINKS !! I surely recommend that hotel... 12 to 15 mn walk from Disney.. A.Demarest
Manager Response: Dear AnniedePetaluma,  Thank you for your 5 star review and thank you for your feedback! We are so happy to know you enjoyed yourself as a guest of Hotel Ménage.   We hope to see you soon!

Summary: All of the rooms face outside, but that shouldn't deter you.  You can sit at the pool and watch the Disneyland fireworks every night if you are not in the park.  They have a bus that takes you straight to the park for a fee, you could walk two blocks if you wish.  The restaurant and bar scene is great.  For adults this is a great wind down place at the end of the day.  Could never get the wi-fi to work here on my laptop, but I used my hotspot on my phone.  They do have a business area with two computers and a printer in case you get really need to get e-mail etc.  The rooms are nice and clean, a bar and restaurant that is in expensive.    Overall I would stay here again no issues.
Manager Response: Dear Dennis B,   Thank you for your 5 start review! We truly value your feedback and are happy to know you enjoyed being our guest.  We are happy to know you had an opportunity to enjoy the Disneyland fireworks from our pool and courtyard.  Thank you and we look forward to having you as our guest again soon!

Summary Heading: Economic choice nearby Disneyland but very noisy
Summary: We chose this hotel given it's close proximity to Disneyland.  The room was spacious - it has a king size bed and a queen size pull-out sofa bed.  Our room was directly facing the swimming pool, and it was therefore incredibly noisy - the pool was opened 24 hours so it was hard to get a good night sleep with the ongoing loud music and people's noises.  On our first night our kids slept early due to jetlag - only to be woken up by the extremely loud noise from Disneyland firework at 9:30pm.  The noise was even louder than inside Disneyland, so if you have toddlers not fond of loud sound then you need to reconsider before booking this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear lilyhk1986,  Thank you for your review and we are sorry to know you did not truly enjoy your stay with Hotel Ménage.  Should you wish to discuss your stay in greater detail, please feel free to contact me at davidg@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: I stayed here with my wife while visiting Disneyland. It is very close and only took us about 10-15 minutes to walk to the gate each day. There is only one road to cross on the way. There aren't many people around when walking back to the hotel upon park close, however the route is well lit and there is regular traffic on the road next to the footpath so it still felt safe. There is a service station directly opposite for any basic supplies.   The hotel's proximity to the roads mean there was some traffic noise however this was greatly reduced once the door was closed and the air conditioner turned on. This however won't reduce the noise from the Disneyland fireworks as these were very loud the one night we weren't still in the park at 9:30pm. They don't last too long and as
Manager Response: Dear EpicBeeRock,   Thank you for sharing your recent experience with Hotel Ménage. We are happy to know that our proximity to Disneyland was convenient for you and your family.  Thank you for shearing and we hope to have you as our guest in the near future!

Summary: Hotel was great al the way round! From the rooms to the customer services! The front desk guy even helped us play a small joke on our family! They made the trip feel as if you would be at home!  Big THANK YOU to Sureya front desk. For all her help from the limo ride in to the check out ! I would high recommend this hotel. Great price , great food , great customer services , great location!
Manager Response: Dear Jesse F,   Thank you for taking the time to share your 5 star review! We truly value your feedback and sharing your recent experience with Hotel Ménage. I will be sure to share your acknowledgment with our TEAM!  Thank you and we look forward to seeing you soon!

Summary: This is the worst place I've stayed in. Finally at 1 a.m. I looked out at the pool that nobody was in and called to have them shut off the awful loud music. I understand music until 10 pm but 1 am? The freeway traffic is so loud. This place is a joke. Avoid it.
Manager Response: Dear Angie B,   Hotel Ménage sincerely apologies that you did not enjoy your recent stay. Should you wish to discuss further, please contact me at davidg@casaresortsinc.om

Summary: This is by far one of the worst hotels I've ever stayed in. When we got there the noise from the freeway was so loud it was annoying. The room doors face the outside of the hotel. Just like most motels. We got in our room and if we weren't so tired and it wasn't almost mid night, we would have turned around and left. The walls were half painted, there were wet spots on the rug, the curtains were dirty, the paint was peeling off the titles in the shower and tub, you could see Pee stains on the wall in the bathroom, the sheets were so wrinkled I had to wonder when the last time they were changed and to top things off the biggest spider I've ever seen was on the wall. I couldn't sleep in there. We got on the phone and booked another hotel. Everything was full so we had to stay the
Manager Response: Dear boogergirl,   Hotel Ménage sincerely apologizes you did not truly enjoy your stay; please know that we take every guest concern  seriously and should you wish to discuss further, please contact me at davidg@casaresortsinc.com

Summary: I've stayed at this hotel 3 times within the past 3 years in various rooms. Having stayed here with the Disney parks as my main destination, the location is great, an easy drive to the parks but still walking distance as well, if you choose to walk. Their Asian themed suite is great, spacious and modern although with a king bed, the sofa (not a sofa bed) had to make do as a bed since there were four of us.  Their standard room with two queen beds was clean and adequate for our needs. The two rooms I previously mentioned are located in the main building, having to go through the main entrance of the hotel and up the elevator to the rooms which overlook the pool. My most recent stay though, had us in a room by the parking lot. We parked right outside our room door. The room was
Manager Response: Dear luv2travel2010_12,  Thank you for review; we truly value your patronage thank you for choosing to stay with Hotel Ménage.  We are sorry to know you experienced a few inconveniences with wait times and noise and those items will addressed with management immediately.  We know you have many choices when visiting Disneyland and the Anaheim Resort area and thank you for staying with you over the last three years.  Please feel free to contact me should you want to discuss your most recent stay with management at davidg@casaresortsinc.com.  We look forward to having you as out guest again.

Summary Heading: very good hotel in very good location
Summary: i spent there 25 days from June 21st to July 16th with my family, the hotel is very good, rooms is very clean and had everything you need for stay, all reception memebers are friendly especially Eric and the Leo the reception boss they very respectable about the amount you will pay- very transperent there is only one negative point that the hotel wifi is not strong in the rooms i advise anyone wants to go near to DISNEY to go to this hotel
Manager Response: Dear Samer S,   Thank you for the 5 star review! We are truly happy to learn that you enjoyed your stay with us during your extended stay in Southern California and enjoying Disneyland Parks.  Our Guest Services Team strives to deliver the best for each guest and are thrilled we did that for you.   We hope to see you in the near future and thanks again!

Summary: Was checked in right away on 7/19/14 right off the bat I seen the tiki bar and pool and was told it was open 24/7. Happy hour was from 4-7 pm great food and drink. The rooms were big and comfy. There was a mishap on my hotel charges but Christine took care of it and now we have found our local Disneyland Hotel from now on to stay at when we visit Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear hipower80,  Thank you for choosing to stay with Hotel Ménage during your recent trip to Disneyland. We are sorry to know you encountered a billing error but am happy to know it was resolved satisfactorily.  We look forward to having you as our guest again on your next trip to Disneyland.

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights while we were visiting Disneyland. We walked to the park each day which took about 10 minutes. It is noisy as it is next to the highway however our room was on the fourth floor at the front of the hotel so the noise didn't really bother us. The room was a good size with a king bed and lounge.
Manager Response: Dear Smashly,   Thank you for your review. We are happy to know that our proximity and convenient location made your stay that much more enjoyable while visiting Disneyland.   We are also happy to know that our rooms were comfortable and spacious for you.  We look forward to your next stay with

Summary: Erik checked me in. He was awesome. I am disabled and have a Service Dog and he came and found me to give me the keys to our room when it was ready so I didn't have to walk back to the front desk.  That has never happened before! The only thing that we didn't like was the loud music where you eat breakfast. So loud that we went someplace else.
Manager Response: Dear trentonbabs,  Thank you for your 5 star review! We truly appreciate you acknowledging our Service Team and will be sure to share your experience with our Team.  We always happy to help and we look forward to your next stay with Hotel Ménage!

Summary: Great hotel, location isn't too bad. A 15min walk to Disneyland. Rooms are really modern and updated, also very nice and clean. There is a happy hour everyday! And the pool is open 24hrs. The hotel itself gives a great sense of security and very welcoming from the moment I drove in to check in.
Manager Response: Dear XCupcakepattyx,   Thank you very much for a sharing your experience with Hotel Ménage on your recent trip to Disneyland.  Our convenient location to Disneyland are area attractions is a plus!  We look forward to your next trip  and having you as our guest again!

Summary Heading: Great location but room was not clean.
Summary: Blankets had bleach stains on them, wife found a bug in the bathroom that I had to kill. Staff was very friendly though and for the price, I could not complain. We had a room close to a gate that guests kept slamming all night and kept waking us.as a Mercedes-Benz employee, I was told that this hotel was suppose to be great. I must have went on an off night.
Manager Response: Dear Daniel M,   Thank you for your feedback and we are sorry to learn of the issues with your room. We work diligently to ensure our standards are met and exceeded and are sorry to know that was not the case with you.  Should you wish to discuss your stay further, please contact me at davidg@casaresortsinc.com.  Thank you again.

Summary: I recently booked a family trip and we are annual pass holders do we are very familiar with the area. We decided to try the Ménage because it looks so nice on the outside. IT IS FABULOUS!!! the atmosphere is so upbeat. Music by the pool, happy hour with wonderful snacks, wonderful modern rooms and the lost friendly staff I have ever come into contact  with. We had an issue with the shower (my fault) and there was a staff me ever at our door in minuets to help. I notices the "vip's walking the grounds and making sure everything and everyone was taken care of. I had the BEST stay that I have had in years!!! I didn't want to leave.
Manager Response: Dear Staci D,  Thank you for 5 star review and thank you for recognizing us as the best! Your review is truly appreciated. Our entire staff works diligently to ensure that we deliver and create experiences just like you enjoyed.   We look forward opt having you as our guest again soon!

Summary: Hotel Ménage is pretty close to Disneyland - take the  ART Shuttle - it comes every half hour. Christine at the front desk was very helpful and sweet. Rooms are a modern, updated feel. Grounds are tropical with music, thatched poolside bar, 24 hour pool and jacuzzi plus a trendy restaurant/ bar inside.we switched to this hotel after our first night since it was clearly a FUN hotel to stay in for both adults and kids. Prices were great - we paid about $100 a night plus fees. We are very picky travelers so my taking the time to write this is a testament to my enjoyment of this hotel! Lol!
Manager Response: Dear MarieGrace2014,   Thank you for the 5 star review! We are thrilled to know you enjoyed yourself and had FUN while staying with Hotel Ménage.  Thank you for recognizing our Team and especially Christine and will be sure to share your feedback and review with her.  We can’t wait to have you as a guest of ours again!

Summary: A 15 min walk to Disneyland , Hotel Menage provided a perfect platform to enjoy our LA experience. From the local attractions to the glitz of Hollywood the friendly staff booked tours and arranged transfers. Spacious and clean rooms and  restaurant downstairs to enjoy. The kids enjoyed the pool whilst the adults enjoyed the bar.
Manager Response: Dear John R, 	  Thank you for the review! We are happy to know you enjoyed yourself while we had you as our Guest.  We look forward to your next stay and thank you  for choosing Hotel Ménage!

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay at this hotel.  All of the staff were extremely friendly, facility was very clean and well maintained.  The pool area was great.  Our only concern about this is that smoking was allowed in the bar area and there were also people smoking in the pool area.  Our room overlooked the pool and sometimes the smell of smoke would come through our air conditioner.  We loved the fact that we could stand out side our room or in the pool area and watch the fireworks from Disneyland.  The beds in our room were a bit uncomfortable but overall were still able to sleep.  We had no problem with noise and found our room quiet and restful after a long day.  We stayed for 8 nights and would definitely return.  Also, we ate at the restaurant in the hotel and it was really
Manager Response: Dear AlbertaJanelle,  We truly love our Canadian Guests! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with your recent stay.  We are sorry to learn of the disruption in your stay but a thrilled to know you had an opportunity to enjoy the nightly Disneyland Fireworks!.   We hope to have you as our guest in the near future.

Summary Heading: Very pleased with our stay....with a couple pointers!
Summary: To begin, I did a tremendous amount of research prior to my choosing this hotel.  For the price and amenities offered, I am a little bit perplexed at some of the complaints I've read.  I chose the Menage for it's location to Disney, the good reviews on the Tavern restaurant, employees attitude, cleanliness, pool and other facilities.  Upon our arrival 07/13, the outside of the hotel looks very nice and modern, comparatively speaking to other hotels in the immediate vicinity.  The bellboys/valet were very welcoming.  Front desk was also very welcoming.  It was my wife, 6 yoa daughter and I.  They honored my room request for a pool view so that we could face the every evening 9:30 pm fireworks.  As for the freeway noise, there is no escaping it.  I knew this when booking.  Light
Manager Response: Dear mikec,   We truly are appreciative of the feedback you shared with Hotel Ménage regarding your recent stay.  Our proximity to Disneyland and to the Anaheim Resort area make us a convenient choice when visiting Disneyland.  We are sorry to learn you overall experience was not completely satisfactory but are thrilled to know you have a chance to enjoy our Palapa Bar, our 24 hour pool and the convince of the ART shuttle.   We thank you for sharing and hope to have you as our guest in the near future.

Summary: I stayed 5 days in June 2014.   The front desk staffs were just "OK" friendly.  It would be nice if they put some smile on their faces.  Even the room service ladies have more friendly smile then the lobby staffs.   This hotel emphasized their "boutique hotel" style but I would say they're just trying their best to renovate a crappy motel.  Everywhere from lobby to room to hallway showing their aging and worn out.  The room was clean and the bed was very comfortable.  I personally just don't like the "low ceiling" of the room.  The A/C wasn't cool enough and it was noisy.  All the room are facing highway but once I close the door I don't hear anything from the traffic.  The beautiful 24hrs pool was a bonus.  I spent couple nights there watching the firework from Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear muimui77,   Thank you for your review and sharing areas of improvement; we strive to ensure that correct any issues promptly and efficiently and we are sorry to know that wasn’t the case with your stay. Hotel Ménage is working diligently to improve Wi-Fi connections and ensure a satisfactory result.  Please know the areas you shared that were not satisfactory will be immediately responded to and remedied. Should you wish to discuss your stay further, please feel free to contact me at davidg@casaresortsinc.com.   We thank you for choosing to stay with us for the 5 day trip in June and hope you would consider returning.

Summary: The Menage was presented to us at a great price, and given the amenities offered it was a great choice for our brief Disneyland leg of our LA trip. The staff were among the friendliest we've ever had the pleasure of encountering at any hotel we've stayed at in the past ranging from small inns to five-star hotels. The hotel itself has a slightly exotic, rustic vibe as soon as you walk into the door, and while the Menage isn't the newest hotel around the area by any means, the rooms are very modern and clean, and the hotel has aged well, for lack of a better term.  First impressions were that the top floor room facing the freeway we stayed in had poor sound deadening in the door, almost as if it wasn't closing entirely and while the noise from the freeway wasn't annoying or
Manager Response: Dear ACKaoss,  Thank you for taking the time to share  your  experience with you and are happy to know you had an overall pleasant experience;  we take the highest standards in ensuring our guest room cleanliness  and apologize you encounter a shortfall. Please know we will address and correct immediately.  We are working diligently to improve our Wi-Fi connection and during high occupancy, there can be limited times of slower connectivity.   We are pleased to know the Service Team you encountered were helpful and courteous and we will share your feedback with the team. We look forward to having you as our guest in the future.

Summary: This is not the first time we have stayed at Hotel Menage. My family and I live about 30mim away from home. We decided to stay to come here to spend some quiet family alone time, and there is no regret. I know some people states there was noise but our room was located in a area that we heard no noise. We were located close to the pool and close to the lobby. Our room was very nice and clean. We had the hotel van drop us off at Downtown Disney (by the way he was very friendly) and took a cab home. The pool is another reason we've returned the view for the Disney firework show is amazing. The drinks at American Tavern were delicious. We are planning to return for the holidays. Thank you for having great staff members. We had an issue with our AC and they immediately send maint to
Manager Response: Dear cookies217,  Thank you for your 5 star review! We are truly happy to have had you as our guest and appreciate the positive feedback!  We truly value our returning guests and understand that have many options when visiting Disneyland.   Thanks for recognizing our clean, comfortable rooms and our Palapa Bar drinks. We look forward to having you as our guest again!

Summary: The reason we booked the ménage was because of the reasonable price. We had been tempted to book it the year before but changed our minds due to bad reviews.   This year we kept the reservation. We arrived after being awake for 30 hours after long flights and getting lost from LAX to Anaheim but we arrived in one piece, desperate for a good sleep!! First impressions weren't great, it definitely is like a motel and the parking setup isn't ideal. We were given a room beside the freeway which was definitely loud and could be heard even with the door closed.   However, this place had a lot of positives though. Huge comfortable bed in  by modern looking room. Staff were very nice and helpful. The bar had a happy hour as well which we never went to but looked very reasonable.
Manager Response: Dear CM218,   Thank you for giving us the opportunity to have you as our guest during your recent trip to Anaheim. We happy to know we met your expectations and would consider stay with us again. We are constantly making improvements to our Hotel with regards to our rooms, and public spaces and we hope you would try us out again.   Thank you for your feedback and review and we look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: nice rooms, pool and spa area a nice size with lounges to relax on along with an outdoor bar friendly and helpful staff close walking distance to Disneyland good breakfast available nice meals all round and you can also see the fireworks at night
Manager Response: Dear sues716,   Thank you for your review. We are excited to know you enjoyed yourself during your recent stay with us!  We can’t wait to have you as our guest again!

Summary: The hotel in ver conviently located across the street from Disneyland walking distance from Angels Stadium a 25 min drive to LA and did I mention 100 yards from a Starbucks convienant store and Taco Bell. The views were spectacular whether the 24hr pool from the balcony in front of your room or the mountains from the end of the hall. The freeway noise is absolutely not an issue you can't here a single peep with the door closed. You can watch Disney fireworks from the pool area where's there's an AMAZING bar with only the friendliest employees. Every employee treats you as if you knew them for ever not robotic generic conversations everyone is full of personality. The bar drinks are great and very fairly priced specially during the daily happy hour. The resteraunt and breakfast
Manager Response: Dear Robert11234,   Thank you for taking the time to share your 21st Birthday experience with us!  We are very happy to know that we met and exceeded your birthday expectations.  We have one of the best views of the nightly Disneyland fireworks and are so happy you go to enjoy those as well. We are looking forward to your next stay and thanks for choosing Hotel Ménage.

Summary: We stayed at Hotel Menage for 2 nights in July 2014 while we were in Anaheim purely for Disneyland. The checkin was seamless as staff allowed us to check in very early as we were incredibly jet lagged. The staff were helpful and assisted with wifi issues, calling a taxi, and arranging shuttle transfers. Although the reviews below are correct in that the rooms were noisy - the fireworks are enjoyable and we loved being able to see them from the hotel grounds. Although being so close to the busy highway does create some noise pollution and a close fire department means frequent sirens.  This being said, the room was clean, convenient for Disneyland and comfortable for 3 adults.
Manager Response: Dedar Kelly T,   Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with Hotel Ménage. We are pleased to know our staff were helpful and expeditious in getting you comfortable. I’ll be sure to share that with them.  Our proximity to Disneyland and local area attractions make us a great value and apologize for the noise you experienced during your stay. Should you choose to speak in further detail please contact me at davidg@casaresortsinc.com.  We hope to have you as our guest soon.

Summary: We arrived quite late at the hotel after a long drive from Vegas. We found the staff to be very friendly and helpful, room was fine - not huge but was fine for our needs. Very large car-park, so never had a problem parking.  A nice pool area with hot-tub and plenty of towels, though the area was quite loud at times due to the proximity of the freeway, though nothing too crazy. There was a fairly frequent shuttle-bus to Disney, quite cheap. It's probably walkable if you want. Really quite a visually attractive, modern looking hotel, who clearly do care about maintenance.  A good restaurant with a wide range of beers, ciders and cocktails.  Small laundry area is available if you really want to do washing on your holiday (which we really didn't have a choice about by this stage of
Manager Response: Dear jad74,  Thank you for your FIVE STAR review and rating!  We are happy to know our accommodations, guest room and of course our dining and cocktail options were satisfactory with you. You can always find something special on our American Tavern and Eatery dining and cocktail menu.   Thank you again for your review and we certainly hope to have you as our guest next year!

Summary: my niece and myself stayed at menage for 2 weeks had a ball loved being able to walk to restuarantas and theme park if you wanted to ,loved the fireworks every night .pool great fun ,breakfast in restuarant every morning great .Looking at booking again for next year .Sandra R
Manager Response: Dear sandra284,  Thank you for sharing your 21st birthday with Hotel Ménage and are pleased you experienced all that you came for. We look forward to having you as our guest on your 22nd birthday.  Thank you!

Summary: I knew before we stayed that there were some rooms with traffic noise issues but thought there would be some rooms noise free, I was wrong. I particularly asked for a quiet room but the sound of traffic was a shock but not as much as the very loud bangs from the Disneyland Fireworks which set off car alarms around the car park. The Firework display is spectacular (and of course free). To be fair it wasn't as bad when the doors and windows were shut but even so if you are a light sleeper or want to sit by the pool in tranquility then go elsewhere.  Otherwise the beds were comfortable, hotel staff were all very helpful and friendly and we enjoyed the meals we had on premises in the bar. Great for the Disneyland Shuttle which calls at the hotel every 15 minutes or so until late.
Manager Response: Dear Honeybun51,  Thank you for your review and we apologize you did not truly enjoy your stay with Hotel Ménage due to the traffic noise. Our location and access to Disneyland make it convenient for most guests and we are sorry to learn that was not the instance with you. Should you feel you would like to discuss further, please contact me at davidg@casaresortsinc.com and I would be happy to speak with you.  However, we are happy to know that you enjoyed the nightly fireworks and the convenience of the ART shuttle.

Summary Heading: Always a great stay at the Menage
Summary: We like this place because of it's close location to the resort and the great pool.  We find the beds very comfortable and we enjoyed the fireworks most every night from the hotel.  If you don't want to wait for a shuttle, it's only a 10 minute walk to the parks.
Manager Response: Dear MRpolite01,  We are excited to know repeat guests just like yourself enjoy our location to Disneyland, our comfortable beds and rooms and of course, the 24 hour pool with the nightly fireworks! We can’t wait to have you as our guest, again! Thanks for the review!

Summary: Recently spent five nights and found this hotel to be staffed by friendly and helpful employees.  Rooms were very clean and comfortable.  A lovely pool to enjoy, with even a couple outside games to play for those that wish to.  Adults can enjoy their favorite beverage at their outside  bar that offers good choice of appetizers and Happy Hour beverages. Holds a restaurant/bar inside, also. A great spot to enjoy the Disney fireworks by the pool.  Gym and laundry facility is on site.  Shuttles available throughout the day. Good rates and will recommend!
Manager Response: Dear Marchelle C,   We are so happy to know your five night stay with Hotel Ménage was enjoyable and you would recommend us! All of our accommodations, conveniences and amenities makes Hotel Ménage are truly a unique choice when traveling to Disneyland and we are happy to know we delivered.  Thank you for sharing and we look forward to your next stay!

Summary: Traveled with to friends for an grown up Disney trip. It was a success ! Room was very clean and stocked with personal care items. Pool and hot but were both clean. Staff was wonderful ! Inside bar and outside bar.  Travis and Haley were our bartenders, they were friendly and outgoing. Made it a nice time to sit and watch the fireworks from outside. Only thing I would change or add is that the post on the bottom of the beds need to go. They are horrible toe grabbers.  Would also be wonderful if there was some form of a coffee shop inside.  Walking across the street for a Coffee in the am was not the easiest with traffic. Hotel staff were all wonderful.  ART bus passes is the way to go to get to and from Disneyland.  Money well spent.  Would I recommend Hotel menage ?  Absolutely
Manager Response: Dear Debbie S,   Thank you for your FIVE STAR review! Hotel Ménages' service team strives to deliver the experience, boutique accommodations and of course, our fantastic Palapa Bar bartenders and signature drinks!  Thank you for the recommendation and we can’t wait to have you and your guests again at Hotel Ménage!

Summary Heading: try to get a room below the sound wall
Summary: Read many reviews about this hotel, have stayed at several hotels near Disneyland in the past. This hotel is the best I have found where one can morph the disney experience and resort experience into one. Our first night was in a room on the 5th floor,above the sound wall, and it did not feel like we were near the freeway; it felt like we were on the freeway! 5 lanes each way all day long creates a lot of sound. The hotel graciously moved us to the first floor, which was so much more pleasant! We were staying with friends, had asked for adjoining rooms, and apparently there are few of those. so we opted for rooms 3 rooms away on the first floor, where were were able to enjoy the amenities without the mind numbing sound. I lived in LA and am used to freeway noise. The rooms,
Manager Response: Dear sacramentomom61,  Thank you for taking the time to share your stay and resort style experience with the team at Hotel Ménage. We are sorry to know that the noise level was not satisfactory and also sincerely apology for the interruption in Wi-Fi service. We are working diligently to correct all Wi-Fi issues as we know that is important to anyone traveling.  Our boutique hotel location is great for families who want the proximity to all local area conveniences nad attractions as well as our 24 hour pool! Thank you again for your review and we look forward to having you as our guest again!

Summary: This place is well priced and a good location for visiting Disneyland. It is right along the highway so there is a bit of traffic noise but you can also see the Disneyland fireworks display from the hotel each night which is fantastic. The rooms are clean and the staff friendly. Gym is good and laundry facilities for use on site.
Manager Response: Dear Gizmo9876,  Hotel Ménage is so very pleased to know we were the value you were looking for on your recent trip to Disneyland; our accommodations, amenities and of course the view of the nightly Disneyland fireworks makes us an exceptional value for families and everyone else.  We look forward to seeing you again soon! Thank you.

Summary: We recently stayed at the Hotel Menage for 3 nights, mainly to visit the Disneyland parks. We were very pleasantly surprised when we arrived at the hotel - it is like a mini resort. The rooms were very spacious and clean with a large beds. The bar and restaurants in the lobby have a great relaxed atmosphere and the food is great (and very affordable!). Breakfast buffet was simple but nice -strongly recommend.   Location couldn't get much better - 10 minute walk to Disneyland entrance and to restaurants.
Manager Response: Dear kaitlan08, The Staff at Hotel Ménage truly thanks you for taking the time to review our Hotel. We strive to ensure we meet and exceed cleanliness, service and dining expectations and are happy to know we did with you. We are pleased you were suprised! We look forward to booking your next reservation with Hotel Ménage!

Summary: We checked in at 1am and not expecting amazing customer service at that time and that's all we had.  So many perks at this hotel I was blown away!!!  I love that the pool was 24 hours just wish that we brought swimsuits!  They upgraded me with no charge and that was a great surprise.  I really like that there was Valet parking (you have to pay extra) but when you have a 3 year old thats the last thing you need at 1am to find parking.  I will definitely come here again!!!
Manager Response: Dear Ginallin B.  Thank you for your 5 star review! The Staff at Hotel Ménage strives to deliver the unique experience, accommodations and dining options the other area hotels do not offer.  We are happy to have had you as our guest and look forward to your next stay.

Summary: You can not stay much closer to Disney unless you are in one of the more expensive options just across from the park. Great view of the fireworks show from the poolside balconies at night. Clean rooms and tidy facilities. In house restaurant ok. Not much else in tye area though unless you have transport.
Manager Response: Dear Matt G.   Thank you for your review! Our proximity, location and convenience to Disneyland offers all the benefits listed in your review as well as the boutique and unique experience our guest truly enjoy.   We look forward to seeing you again, and thank you!

Summary: I loved this hotel! Everyone here was exceptionally friendly. I came here from Chicago with my girlfriend for a big celebration and was not disappointed. It's only ten minutes from Disney on foot, near a mall and several restaurants, a Wal-Mart, and has a perfect view of the Disney fireworks that we enjoyed with drinks from the outside bar while soaking our feet in the jacuzzi.  Our room was clean and secure, had a mini fridge, toiletries, etc. Generally clean and comfortable-the noise from the highway didn't bother me even once, and I'm a light sleeper. The price was reasonable and the breakfast was a nice touch/had a nice variety. I definitely recommend it and would return if i ever got to come back to Disney.
Manager Response: Dear Alyson H,  We are so excited that you enjoyed your trip to Disneyland stayed with Hotel Ménage! Thank you for the kind works and acknowledging the level of service we always aim to provide! We strive for that experience with each of our guests.  We hope that you choose to stay with us on your next trip to Southern California and again, thank you!

Summary Heading: This hotel was clean and within walking distance to Disneyland
Summary: The draw is the pool. You can see the fireworks from the pool. It's a clean hotel. But if you are looking for a quiet sleep, good luck. Our room was close to the pool. If you are a light sleeper, you may be awakened. I think there were people out there until midnight, or later, each night.   That being said, the pool and jacuzzi were great. And there is an outdoor bar/food service area, which allows you and the kids to enjoy the pool without having to really go far. Breakfast was average buffet. I'm not a huge fan of buffet breakfasts, but it was good in a pinch.  Would I stay here again? If I weren't next to the pool, yes.
Manager Response: Dear photogurrl,  We are excited that you had an opportunity to visit Hotel Ménage during the Summer and enjoy our pool and hot tub as well as the nightly Disneyland fireworks. We work hard to ensure that guests like yourself have the same experience you did but apologize for the noise disturbance during your stay.   We look forward to seeing you soon!

Summary: We stayed for 3 nights with 2 families.  We first got a room on 5th floor overlooking the freeway.VERY loud, BUT beautiful view of Disney fireworks from balcony.  We asked to be moved to quieter rooms.  The hotel staff moved our stuff while we were at Disney.  The next 2 nights we had rooms on ground floor with direct access to the pool. This was great. They have a nice outdoor couch/chairs which we ate breakfast at every morning and there are plenty of tables.  We brought our own food to save $$ and the pool area was a perfect place to eat. The rooms were nice, the staff nice. The walk to disney was not bad at all.  The best part of the hotel is the pool where you can sit and watch the fireworks with unobstructed view.  I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Theresa961 Thank you so much for sharing your experience with our staff on your recent stay; our convenience to Disneyland as well as the unobstructed view of the nightly fireworks is something special for those that stay with Hotel Ménage.   Thank you for sharing and we look forward to seeing you soon!

Summary: We decided to stay at this hotel because of it's amenities but found that the amenities were not up to par.  We were greeted promptly and service at the desk was courteous but our reservation had not been entered into their system even though I had the confirmation in my hand.  Rooms were good but the beds are hard.  Restaurant left a lot to be desired.  Service was mediocre and atmosphere was nil.  Bar at the pool was unfriendly and no wait service left us to order at the bar and retrieve from the bar.  The bar area is very inviting but could be capitalized by having wait staff take orders and deliver to tables and pool area.  There was plenty of wait staff in the restaurant who were just hanging around and could have been making some tips by providing service at the bar and
Manager Response: Dear Janet N,  We are sorry to learn that you experience with our hotel was not what you expected. We make every effort with all aspects of our unique hotel to ensure that we deliver clean comfortable accommodations, a superior dining menu and a service level that is above all other competitors in our area.   Please know that we will address all service short falls that you outlined in your review deeply regret that was not the experienced you came to enjoy or hoped for.   If you would like to discuss your stay with a Service Manager in depth, please feel free to contact me at davidg@casaresortsinc.com I look forward to being of assistance. Again, thank you for your feedback.

Summary: We had a three day hopper at Disneyland and found this gem to stay at during our trip. The hotel staff were very accommodating and we were in checked in our room right away, giving us time at the parks. The rooms were clean with fun artwork, a mini fridge and a flat screen T.V. It is always nice when hotels feel clean.  My favorite by far was the outside pool and bar area where you can enjoy the Disney fireworks show with a front row view. The pool and spa are opened 24 hours so you are not rushed to get back from the park and miss using the facility. They have a reasonably priced breakfast buffet and an assortment of food at the restaurant that made it easy for three people to not get bored. They are on a route for the shuttle system which is inexpensive and it comes every 20
Manager Response: Dear sparkysam19,   Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with at our hotel with us. Hotel Ménage offers a unique experience coupled with spacious accommodations, one of the best views for the Disneyland fireworks and the only 24 hour pool in southern California.  We are pleased to know our outstanding breakfast buffets was enjoyable and we can’t wait to have you as our guest in the near future! Thank you again!

Summary Heading: DO NOT STAY AT THIS HOTEL THEY over charged us 400 dollars
Summary: DO NOT STAY AT THIS hotel they charged us $194, $94 and then another $246 dollars we already pre paid our hotel and we have these unknown charges, we called the hotel 3 times and we have yet to have a refund, we left the hotel 2 weeks ago, i wouldnt stay at this hotel as it has cost us over $1000 dollars to stay for 4 nights, for that price you can stay at the disney hotel where there is no sound from the freeway. every time we call we get put on hold for 10 minutes and then the line goes dead
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here after my lady's graduation from Cal Poly.  The 3 of us were in the Asia suite.  Aside from the art on the walls, there was nothing of clear Asian influence in the room.  That aside, the room was spacious, clean and all furniture was comfortable.  It has that two room feel,  but doesn't have a dividing wall so the room is very open. The tile floor is just our style and the duel vanities makes it easier for all three of us to get ready.  The staff here is wonderful as well.  Valet was fast friendly and very helpful when it came to arriving early.  All staff at the front desk for check in and departure was helpful and treated the three of us respect.  Myself, the gf and bf will be back to this Hotel.    Thank you all for a wonderful experience.
Manager Response: Dear OCSurf508,  Congratulations on the recent graduation from Cal Poly! We are enthused to know that you chose to celebrate this special time with your friends and family with Hotel Ménage. Our Service Team and Staff truly are pleased you were satisfied with the level of service received.  Our four uniquely appointed suites are a welcomed change to accommodation you can find elsewhere and we are happy to know the experience with us was one to remember. Than you and we look forward to your next stay,

Summary: Loved the outside bar, food was good, staff friendly and helpful. Rooms were very comfortable and clean. Would always stay at this hotel when visiting, a bit of a walk to Disneyland but I've always enjoyed a good walk.
Manager Response: Dear Angela C,   Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. Our American Tavern Eatery and Palapa Bar menu are really something we take pride in; our clean comfortable rooms are make any trip to Southern California something to remember.   Thanks for the  review and we look forward to your next stay!

Summary Heading: Great staff, clean luxurious rooms, wonderful views of Disneyland fireworks and fantastic happy hour!!!!
Summary: From the moment that we checked in ALL of their staff were very friendly and extremely helpful. The rooms were great and very clean. The 24 hour pool area was a huge draw after spending the day over at the "Happiest Place on Earth"!! Nothing like a good hot tub soak after walking around all day!!  The hotel is conveniently located just a few easy blocks from the resort.(Walking or local transit) The morning buffet was reasonably priced, as well as the dinner and happy hour menus! The outside patio bar was a wonderful place to enjoy a frosty beverage while watching the fireworks show over Disneyland! My family would always recommend the Hotel Ménage for your vacation needs in the Anaheim area! We wouldn't stay anywhere else!
Manager Response: Dear danmartin10,   Thanks so much for the great review! We are also happy that we delivered the experience that you expected during your trip to Disneyland.  Our Hotel Team is truly dedicated to providing a level of customer service that is above any other; we work hard to make each guest experience unique and memorable.   We look forward to you next stay!

Summary: We stayed a year ago and I was on Trip Advisor and realised i never wrote a review. Please note this review is aimed at overseas tourists like us! We loved this hotel. Good price, nice little restaurant, reasonable location. Customer service to us was fantastic, but we are from Australia where the standard is so low, so its not hard for us to be impressed. Rooms were a little small but adequate for our needs and furnished nicely. There was a bar in the lobby but it was not too intrusive so we did not mind. The pool is smallish but fine. Nice view of Disneyland fireworks. We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear 386EllieC,  Thanks for letting us know how much you enjoyed your last stay and we look forward to your next! We truly enjoy our international and overseas guests and enjoying hearing about their stay with us.  We work hard to make every guest experience our Hotel, accommodations, our pool and American Tavern Restaurant enjoyable.  We look forward to seeing you soon!

Summary: Friendly staff, everyone was very polite and helpful. Awesome hotel restaurant and bar with a  24 hour pool! Hotel is well kept, and very clean. Quick and easy shuttle service to Disney land. Highly recommend, will stay again!
Manager Response: Dear Melissag6521,   Thanks for your review; our Service Team is truly dedicated to ensure our guests are comfortable accommodations experience an unparalleled level of service. Thank you for the recommendation and we can’t wait to see you again!

Summary Heading: A hidden gem near the Magical Kingdom.
Summary: I recently stayed at the Hotel Menage for a work retreat and also an anniversary get a way. This place is a hidden gem. The staff was extremely helpful from the moment we arrived. The outside Hawaiian style bar is a great place to relax with beautiful landscaping, comfortable teak furnishings, and live music on the weekends. Food from the American Tavern Eatery was exceptional. Though an indoor restaurant, we asked if our dinner could be served outside in the bar area as it was such a beautiful evening. The staff gladly granted this request. An extra treat is the view of spectacular fireworks every evening.  It is within easy walking distance to Downtown Disneyland, which is always a fun place to experience some of the magical qualities of Disneyland. A great place to stay,
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience with us; we truly enjoy hearing how satisfied and pleased our guests were with their stay.  Our hotel is intended to deliver a truly unique hotel experience and we are glad to know we provided that for you.  Our recently ‘refreshed’ outdoor pool and Palapa Bar space is a great place to unwind and enjoy our signature drinks and Palapa bar menu. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: They were very friendly and helpful.  We needed to extend our stay for. An extra day and they were very helpful.  I would highly recommend them!  It is very close to disneyland especially when using the public transit.
Manager Response: Dear Tamara B,   Thank you for your review.  We truly enjoy hearing from our guests and we are always happy to assist with reservation inquiries. Thank for your recommendation! We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: My son (7) and I stayed at the Hotel Menage 3 nights last week. We both really enjoyed the 24 hour pool with ping-pong and baggo set up! Rooms were nice and comfortable, we're never bothered by the freeway noise or any of the guests partying late at night. Hotel is in walking distance to Disney or has a great bus route that comes every 15-20 minutes or so. Only negative about the hotel which I read on other reviews, is the bed frame! It sticks out 8 inches from the end of the mattress! Lost track of how many times we ran into it!
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing your recent stay! We are so happy to hear that you and your son enjoyed your visit, and we hope to have the opportunity to host you again.

Summary Heading: Great Location for a staff retreat
Summary: We just had our staff retreat at the Hotel Menage!  We had 30+ staff members spend the night and use the Ballroom and Banquet facilities.  All the staff all were excellent and helpful. Food was wonderful.  Great experience.  Would recommend it for business meetings.  After our work day, everyone enjoyed the Palapa Bar and Pool.  Some ventured out to Downtown Disney as it was only a short walk away.  So fun to watch the Disneyland fireworks from our Balcony! We will be back!  Thanks so much Krik, Katie, Nicole and the rest of the Hotel Menage staff
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that your group enjoyed your business trip! Thank you for your kind remarks about your stay. Your compliments to our friendly staff are very much appreciated, and have been passed along to them :) We hope you think of Hotel Ménage for your next business meeting!

Summary: The room was nice enough. The traffic noise was a bit much. We bought a fan to help drown out the noise. The cleaning crew was outstanding. I would stay again but i would try to find a room on the other side in hopes of less noise. It is 10.00 to park. The breakfast was high. 41.00 for 3 buffets. We asked for coffee 2 times and i stood next to it while the manager was talking. He sure moved fast when he put down the tab. Wish it had been for coffee. I would Never again  eat breakfast there again. It was within walking distance to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your candid comments and we thank you for your compliments to our housekeeping team. I'm sorry to hear that traffic noise was a bother, as we do our best to provide noise barriers such as heavy duty insulation, double paned windows and a fan/air conditioner in each room. Thank you for notifying us of your experience with coffee service in our restaurant. Your feedback is appreciated and important to us.

Summary Heading: I loved it, at my discounted price.
Summary: I read a lot of reviews on this hotel, some were great, some were horrible. We rented two rooms, adjoining. The staff were always very kind. The hotel was clean and the pool and jacuzzi were great. Jacuzzi open 24/7 so I had a warm soak one morning at 6 am! Some reviews complained about the music playing outside in the courtyard. I loved it. It gave a fun, playful atmosphere to the whole place. I could slightly hear the baseline from my room, but nothing that an earplug wont take care of. Our fridge quit working one night. We had some food in there that got ruined, not too much. Probably valued at $10. They gave us a $25 voucher for the restaurant there. Which, by the way, was excellent! And good prices. One night we did have drunk 20 somethings get a little roudy down stairs,
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review. We are so happy to know that you and your friends enjoyed your recent stay at Hotel Ménage! I just wanted to let you know that it is a standard hotel operational policy, at any hotel offering amenities such as a bar and restaurant, to place an authorization for incidentals on a hotel guest's credit card for each day of their stay. I can understand your frustration at not being aware of this "incidental authorization", and we are happy to have been able to work with you on this matter. Thanks again for your candid comments... we hope to have the opportunity to host you and your friends again soon!

Summary: The over hotel is clean and is close to Disneyland. However you do have to walk across the freeway on the overpass to get there. The rooms are newel renovated, but it's still noisy based on the location to the freeway. We had to turn the air on high so we couldn't hear the cars driving all night. The parking lot was not well lot. This was most likely a Motel 6 previously.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. Hotel Ménage was formerly a Holiday Inn, not a Motel 6. We have completed massive renovations to each guest room, the restaurant, both bars, the lobby, our meeting spaces, and our pool in order to make it the property it is today. We continue to update and renovate in order to provide our guests a comfortable and enjoyable and affordable home away from home. We appreciate your candid comments and invite you to visit again next time you return to the Anaheim area.

Summary: The staff were ALL wonderful, especially one of the bell boys and the supervisor on duty Sureya.   I absolutely loved the breakfast from the infused water, the paprika spiced potatoes, and the eggs with vegetables YUM!   The view was also amazing, I could see the pool. Although I didn't use the pool a 24/7 pool sounded awesome!  I was actually on a trip with my boss, coworkers and other business party as well as my family. I speak on behalf of the lot of us when I say everybody enjoyed the stay :)   I could really say a lot about the hotel, it was just overall convenient, a great value, and I was really comfortable.   Thanks a bunch hotel menage!    OH! p.s. The shuttle service to disneyland is SO WORTH IT!! I must have used that bus like 5 times each day! hahaha
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review! We are thrilled to hear that you and your coworkers enjoyed your business trip with us. Your shout-out to Sureya has been passed along and is very much appreciated. We hope you think of us again, next time you return to Anaheim!

Summary Heading: Relaxing, Fun Stay at Hotel Ménage
Summary: Our stay at Hotel Ménage was noting but excellent. We enjoyed the outdoor bar, pool, and live music. Standing by pool during the Disneyland firework show was like having a front row seat. The service was outstanding and our room was clean and perfect.
Manager Response: Dear Mikexnxike,   The Hotel Ménage Team is truly happy to know you enjoyed your recent stay with us. We have the best view of the Disneyland Fireworks around and the makes for a pretty exciting view.  We look forward to your next stay and having you as our guest!

Summary Heading: Hotel Ménage is a fantastic place to stay with a great Restuarant and Bar.
Summary: Hotel Ménage has large rooms with a couch, large beds with nice fluffy pillows, and a flat screen TV. On top of that, the Palapa bar and American Tavern restaurant have great drinks and even better food. There are so many great options to choose from on their menu. I highly recommend booking your stay in Anaheim for Disneyland, conferences, or any other occasion at Hotel Ménage!
Manager Response: Dear Marissa K,   Thank you for taking the time to share your recent stay and experience with us. We are truly happy to know you enjoyed our restaurant, accommodations and Palapa Bar.   We hope to see you soon and thanks for choosing to stay with us.

Summary: From the first steps on the property, Hotel Menage was the most pleasant place we have ever stayed. From the front desk staff to the maintenance staff, everyone we encountered were freindly and professional.  The restaurant staff and bar staff were especially great.  The food in the restaurant was absolutely perfect. Fresh ingredients, wonderful menu choices, and very reasonable prices.  Hotel Menage simply raised the bar for all the hotels.
Manager Response: Dear Craig O,   Thank you so much for your pleasant words; our dedicated team enjoys hearing from Guests such as yourself and the great time that had with us.   Our American Tavern Eatery menu is always a hit and your experience will be shared with all.   Thanks!

Summary: We spent 11 days at Hotel Menage early in May this year.  The staff was extremely pleasant & helpful.  Rooms are regular hotel rooms but are clean and comfortable, which is all you need on a Disneyland trip.  Having the pool open 24 hours was nice so you could cool off after a long hot day at the park.  We particularly enjoyed the restaurant,  Menu is reasonably priced, service was great and selection and quality of food was excellent.  Try the calamari from the pool bar menu, mushroom risotto & four cheese mushroom flatbread!  It's an easy 10 minute walk to Disney parks or Downtown Disney or a short shuttle trip.  Also a short taxi ride to Angel Stadium or the Outlets of Orange.  We'll certainly plan to stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Luvtotravel_172,   Thank you for your review! Your compliments will be shared with our Team. We are happy to know that you enjoyed our accommodations and pool and were pleased with our American Tavern Eatery and Palapa Bar menu.  We look forward to seeing you soon!

Summary Heading: Stay in Hotel Menage - visit Disneyland
Summary: It was a very nice stay in this Hotel, near the Disney Park in Anaheim. Only 8 minutes to Disneyland, we only have to cross a Bridge, and then follow the street to get into the great Disney Park.  Sureya in the Hotel, in the reception was very nice, she could help us a lot, many thanks for all you did for us.  Only the Highway is infront of the Hotel, so the loudness is high, but you will be very tired after the visit in Disney, so we could sleeo well, but still the cars were there on the Highway.  But our stay were really nice, Hotel was good, and the pool and Whirlpool were great! Thanks for all!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We are pleased to hear you had an enjoyable stay, and your compliments to Sureya have been passed along. Thanks again!

Summary: This hotel was perfect for young couples doing Disneyland. The shuttle is right outside for $5 round trip but easily walkable, not even a half mile. The pool and hot tub are 24 hrs! It is a lil noisy being next to the freeway but nothing I couldn't sleep through w the air on in the room. The biggest plusplusplus is the restaurant in the hotel. The most amazing food I've ever had in a hotel. Lots of variety, eclectic, do the bacon wrapped blue cheese stuffed dates, and cheap! Bottomless mimosas on Sun.. and great happy hour menu. We ate in the hotel everyday before heading to Disney!
Manager Response: Dear Zarako B,   Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience with Hotel Ménage. Your feedback is truly appreciated.   We are ecstatic that our unique boutique hotel was ideal for you; our location, our American Tavern Eatery menu and our 24 hour pool is always a hit and we are very pleased to know you enjoyed it as well.   We look forward to seeing you again, soon.

Summary: We stayed here in February and had an amazing time, so when we came back to Anaheim May we decided to stay here again, and I am so happy we did! Kent was great at the front desk and the valets were impressive once again, every staff member was so friendly and willing to help. We only stayed for one night this trip, but we were still very satisfied with the hotel. My only "con" would be that the room was a lot smaller this time then last, but we managed! Can't wait to stay here again!
Manager Response: We appreciate your loyalty to our hotel! Thank you for your compliments to Kent and our friendly team. We look forward to hosting you again soon!

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at Hotel Menage May 11-18, 2014. It was our first trip to Disneyland with our kids ages 12 & 8. We called in a couple times with questions and received very friendly professional customer service even over the phone. When we arrived the staff were very friendly and accommodating. Our room wasn't ready as we arrived at about 12:30pm. The concierge stored our luggage for us while we ate lunch and checked out the facilities. As soon as our room was ready they took our luggage up for us and let us check in early. The food at the restaurant was very good and very affordable. Our room was clean and the beds were very comfortable. The pool area was nice but the furniture is looking a bit old and weathered. We inquired about renting a car for one day to go to the
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay. Thank you for your informative review and compliments to our helpful staff members. We appreciate your candid comments.

Summary: We were amazed at how helpful all staff were at this hotel - they couldn't do enough for you. They booked us tickets 2 sporting events, arranged pick-ups, booked buses & provided loads of general information. Great rooms, great facilities - really good stay.
Manager Response: Dear Danielle M,   Thanks so much for your review and taking the time to share your recent experience. Our Service Team is dedicated to ensuring your stay, room accommodations and special requests are handled with care.  We look forward to seeing you again.   Thanks!

Summary: This is my favorite place to go when I'm taking a disney vacation. I only live a couple hours away but it's so much more convenient to stay down there when doing a multiple day trip. When I go, I always stay at Hotel Menage. It's perfect for a place to relax and take a dip in the pool during the day and the beds are so comfortable I fall asleep right away. The staff is always incredibly friendly to me and accommodating. I visited recently and was greeted by Erik who took care of us right away, welcomed us warmly, and gave us tons of information about the area. The pool is open 24 hours which is so nice because you won't be getting back from Disneyland until late. There's a bar by the pool where they make a perfect blue Hawaiian and a restaurant that makes amazing burgers and
Manager Response: We are thrilled to read your review! Thank you for your loyalty and your kind remarks. We look forward to remaining your "home away from home" each time you get away to Anaheim.

Summary: As others have said, one side faces the freeway. Beds were comfortable. close proximity to Disneyland. contrary to another post, we found service staff to be top notch. all were friendly with greetings, etc. rooms were clean everyday. pool area well maintained. restaurant breakfast was good. WIFI connection was poor (kept dropping) and TV was out of order one day. I would stay here again if we were going back to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear tourista2014  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. Your feedback is extremely vital and appreciated by our Team.  Our Staff is delighted to know you were pleased with our accommodations, pool space and restaurant.  I wholeheartedly apologize for the interruption in our WiFi connection and we are currently working on improving upon that service.  We do look forward to seeing you again, and thank you for choosing to stay with Hotel Ménage.

Summary: Everyone in this hotel was friendly and helpful.  The restaurant/bar had good food at reasonable prices.  The Tiki style bar outside was really cute and was a great place to watch the fireworks.  The beds were updated and very comfortable.  One problem, though not sure how it could be avoided, was the rental movies.  We were very tired and wanted to relax and watch a movie.  Complained to the desk and was told they would fix it.  In four nights, it was never fixed.  Otherwise was  a great stay.  Would definitely stay here again.  Take the bus to Disneyland, it is a great deal.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post your review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay. I am very sorry to hear of your frustration with the movie function on our TV... this since has been repaired. Your kind comments are appreciated.

Summary Heading: Average hotel, noisy but good location for Disney
Summary: Didn't love the staffs responses to some of our questions and wasn't treated the nicest, which is such a 360 when your coming back and forth from Disney were the service is phenomenal. Also our room was right over the freeway (they never mentioned that- we even paid more for a King) and it was very noisy. We had to put a table against the door to shut it tight to block out more sound as it didn't shut tightly.  Another issue was the restaurant bar that I had a good recommend on was only open for 4 hours or so- 6-10:30. So we were never around to try it, kind of a miss there.  Im giving it 3 stars for price and location to Disneyland only.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I am very sorry to hear that your recent experience was not up to our standard of excellence regarding our customer service. If you would like to go into more detail about how you think we can improve our service, please feel free to email me at guestservice@casaresortsinc.com. I am very interested in your input or suggestions. Thank you again for your candid comments.

Summary: The restaurant and bar were amazing. Good food, great drinks, and reasonable prices. We also really enjoyed their happy hour. Room was fine, nothing amazing, but it was clean and comfortable after a long day. Only problem was with the WiFi which didn't work once in our 3 day stay. The TV also did not work at times, which was getting frustrating. The 24 hour pool was nice and always seemed to have guests in it. However, late at night there were many drunk guests doing questionable things. They were getting loud, aggressive obnoxious, fighting, and being unsafe. Security should be more aware and concerned about what people are doing. Overall, ok stay, would stay again if had to.
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed our restaurant and bar. Your comments about your guest room have been noted, and we appreciate your candor regarding your experience with our 24hr pool. Such late/loud activity is not typical, however we appreciate you bringing this concern to our attention.  Thank you for your kind review, and your candid comments. We hope for the opportunity to really wow you during your next stay!

Summary: My partner and I stayed here for 4 nights, check in was fast, staff super friendly and always happy to answer any questions we had, it was an easy 10-15min walk to disneyland which was great. The room was very nice beds were very comfy and the room was always nice and clean, we had no problem with noise at all, slept comfortably!  I would definitely stay here again!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review! We look forward to hosting you both again soon :)

Summary Heading: love this hotel and all the staff !!!
Summary: I want to say thank you so much to the staff at Hotel Ménage , Frank Cueua the bartender is just amazing , he is so great with the kids and such a nice guy ! I look forward to seeing him each and every trip , would not be the same without him !! I also want to thank Maria Martinez for the wonderful room cleaning and the personal touches she did for us , I always ask to stay in Maria's section!! Rooms 500 Front desk staff Leo , I always look forward to seeing you , you are so good with all of our needs and requests !! love your smile ! James I know it was your first week at the hotel and I so appreciate , you accommodating all my requests , I loved you remembered my name each and everyday and helped us out !! Young frank ( outside bar ) thanks also ! Last but never least I want
Manager Response: Dear Lynn, Thank you so much for your lovely review! Our team loves to be appreciated for all their hard work; it is so nice to read your personal acknowledgement to each of them :) We are thrilled to have earned your loyalty, and we all look forward to welcoming you and your family back for your next holiday! Warmest Regards, The staff and management of Hotel Ménage

Summary: My husband and I have been staying at the Hotel Ménage for years. We're actually planning on staying there during our next visit to Disneyland for our one-year wedding anniversary next month :) Whether we've gone with a group of people or just us two, we always try to book our stay here if our budget permits. The price to stay here is very reasonable for being a boutique hotel. The rooms are always clean, the property is modern and gorgeous, and the service is top notch. We especially love that they have a 24 hour pool. The hot tub is a great place to unwind after a long day at the parks. We also love that they have a bar right next to the pool with an awesome happy hour. I think the hotel is more suitable for young people or couples, but the perk I find for families is that
Manager Response: We are so grateful for your continued loyalty to Hotel Ménage! Thank you for your comments and compliments. Your informative and candid review is very much appreciated. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: Generally a good experience with clean comfortable room. Bathroom was aim need of a little repair. Metal bed frame sticks out and easily catches your leg. We placed pillows on corners to remind us. Very noisy as next to the I5, however the room was well soundproofed and all we heard was a hum of traffic. Great view of Disney fireworks in the evening. It was about 1/2 mile walk to park entrance but there is also a shuttle service for which $5 gets you a day pass and you can ride any of the ART busses including to outlets mall etc.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback. Your comments regarding the bathroom and bed frame have been noted for discussion. Thank you for your candid comments... We look forward to the opportunity to host you again, should your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area!

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel, could be upgraded a bit.
Summary: The staff is friendly, helpful and pleasant! The hotel is nice but the rooms are a bit old and dated, they were clean though. You are really close to Disney, we would walk there and back no problem! Please beware if you have little ones you are  close to the parks and can hear the fireworks clearly at night and it actually might scare them. Check out Mimi's restaurant for a good priced meals. It's between the hotel and Disneyland and good value for what you get! Close to the highway as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay, and we appreciate your candid comments.

Summary: My husband and I stayed at Hotel Menage in April 2014.  I booked this hotel after I read some other Trip Advisor reviews.  The other reviews said the hotel was noisy because of the 24 hour pool and the proximity to the freeway.  We had a room facing the pool so we did not hear the traffic noise.  We also heard no pool noise for the first 4 nights.  Night 5 was ridiculous.  I didn't mind people being in the pool but the blaring rap music was unbearable.  Night 6 also resulted in me calling the front desk to complain about the neighbors.  They had a dog and it was barking and crying.  The walls are quite thin so we could hear every move our neighbors made.  We complained twice and the desk staff were very quick to apologize and confront the noise makers.  After 2 complaints by us
Manager Response: none

Summary: When we originally booked our trip we expected to arrive a day later than we did. The hotel and staff were able to accommodate the extra day we needed without any trouble. The hotel is conveniently located on a transit route giving very easy access to Disneyland. Both Sureya and Erik took great care of us. I would definitely stat here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Well, I can not say enough about this luxury bouique hotel.  My girlfriend and I stayed in this gourgeous hotel for 2 weeks.  Be prepared to be treated like royalty, from the management to the cleaning staff.  It is noted that the big wig management, do not glorify their positions to their staff instead I saw during my stay each one of them pitching in whenever the staff needed the help.  There was no yelling screaming and not one of them stated, "this is not in my job description, so I will not help!" instead each one of them rolled up their sleeves to pitch in wherever needed.  If this is not class, I don't know what is.  Secondly, I happened to get sick with the flu and Siria in the front desk was very quick to refer me to a in hotel doctor that was able to see me and give me
Manager Response: We are thrilled to read your review of your recent stay! Thank you for your kind compliments to our friendly team members... your shout-outs are very much appreciated. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: We loved our nice & spacious room, our beds were very comfy and the bathroom was very modern...coming from a nicotine soaked Vegas room to this fresh , clean room  was a blessing. We absolutely loved the in-house restaurant with every meal enjoyable. Loved the relaxed atmosphere around the pool bar (especially happy hour). We saw so many fire-work displays while lounging by the pool it was heavenly.Do yourself a favour and get a 3 day shuttle bus pass...the 10 minute walk is a killer after walking around Disneyland all day and then use that pass to travel around Anaheim ......we recommend the O.C discount outlets (Route 15 I think)....get yourself a burger at Red Robins.....loved it!!! Overall this is a great place for Aussies....you'll meet lots & lots at the bar :)
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post a review of your recent stay. We are so happy to hear that you had a great time at our hotel, and that you were able to enjoy the fireworks view from the pool and bar. Your kind words are appreciated!

Summary Heading: Absolutely perfect - except for the WiFi!
Summary: Loved our 4 night stay at Hotel Menage. Exceeded our expectations. A very short 5-10 min walk to Disney area. Room was large and comfortable, and beautifully serviced daily. The pool area was perfect for cheap cocktails and bar snacks at happy hour on comfy couches in the sunshine. Great on-site restaurant also. There is a service station right across the road with a Starbucks and Taco Bell, and more restaurants either side within a 15 min walk. The front desk staff were AMAZING. Cannot say enough about all their staff - they were all so helpful.   The only real downside to this hotel is their Wifi - it is very patchy making it impossible to Skype.  We left our two year old at home so we were dying to see him! It works for short amounts of time making browsing the internet or
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very proud to have the friendliest hospitality team in Anaheim, and we appreciate your compliments to them! Our deepest apologies about the trouble with the internet during your stay... I can completely understand your longing to see and speak with your little one. We are so grateful for your candid comments, and we look forward to hosting you and/or your friends again!

Summary: We had a great time at this hotel. The staff were excellent and Erik was especially helpful and accommodating. The pool was clean and accessible. The rooms were spacious and well looked after. House cleaning staff did a very good job. I loved the fact that we could walk to Disneyland and close to the convention center.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Not your over priced disney area hotel!
Summary: I have always stayed at the fairfield inn across from disney, we loved the view, and accessibility to disney. However, after staying at the hotel menage I will never go back. This hotel is amazingly beautiful. It has every amenity a good neighbor hotel should have at an outrageously good price.  The pool area is open 24 hours, they offer an array of food options, a shuttle goes between disney and the hotel every 20 mins all day/night long. The rooms are nothing like other good neighbor hotels. The design is very sleek but still kid friendly. The beds are full of pillows and delicious imported coffee is at your disposal.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to have earned your loyalty! Thank you for giving Hotel Ménage a chance... we are so happy you enjoyed your stay :) We look forward to hosting you again soon!

Summary: The employees were the absolute best. From the valet to the front desk, everybody was helpful and extremely accommodating and nice. Sureya at the front desk was exceptional. She was friendly and really helpful with all our questions. The location and value of the hotel is perfect for how close it is to Disneyland. Another perk is the restaurant located in the hotel called American Tavern. EXCELLENT food. The flat bread and lobster mac and cheese was amazing. Overall, highly recommended and we are definitely staying there again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We are so pleased to read your compliments to our friendly and helpful staff... we are so proud to have each and every one of them! Your shout-out to Sureya has been passed along :) We appreciate your kind words and look forward to welcoming you back again soon.
