The indoor bar is large, includes private meeting areas, and entertainment on weekends. My favorite appetizer, thinly cut real-potato fries with
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great hotel, friendly staff and Good location..
Summary: We stayed at this hotel 29th may for 5 nights, during our holiday. The hotel was in a good location just a short walk to restaurants, shops & Disneyland over the freeway. We had a room facing the freeway & have to say wernt bothered by any noise. The rooms were very clean & well maintained. Could maybe use a fridge. The staff were all very helpfull during our stay with any questions we had, and if we were to return to Anaheim in the future i would definatley consider this hotel again.
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting Hotel Menage.  We pride ourselves on the service quality, so I know our team will be delighted to hear of your experience with us.  Thank you for your review but most importantly thank you for your business.  We know you have many choices in the area and we look forward to seeing you in the near future.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: Loved it, but has to be your cup of tea
Summary: I loved the Hotel Menage. My fiance and I planned a trip to Disneyland and I found the hotel on hotels.com and he ended up making the reservation on the hotel site because it was about $20 than hotels.com. The hotel was very easy to find and it stood out. I agree that it is more of a chic kind of hotel compared to the others when staying around Disneyland. It was perfect for my fiance and I because we were not bringing kids and we wanted someplace with at least a small bit of a romantic vibe. The staff was very helpful when it came to all our questions and I loved that you don't pay for parking until you are leaving. I do think it should be easier to get from the parking lot into the hotel lobby because that was a bit of a hassle.  The restruant was very good and we enjoyed the
Manager Response: Thank you for your words.  I would like to think we have something for everyone, but I guess you do have to like the unique style of hotel to enjoy us.  As you noticed we do have a lot of families and business people alike.  Our restaurant is quite addicting and we have a wide selection of tapas style plates, I'm glad you enjoyed our food.  Congratulations on your marriage and we look forward to seeing you every time you trips bring you to Southern California.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: staff was courteous and attentive.  atmosphere was quite and relaxful, except for the evening fireworks display at Disneyland. However, even that was fun and not at all bothersome.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  Our proximity to the fireworks actually works in our favor, most of the time.  I'm sorry that it was bothersome, but thank you for your comments on the staff.  We look forward to your future business.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: Don't be fooled by the online pictures
Summary: My Mom and I stayed here for a girls weekend trip to Disneyland. The pictures online looked awesome, and the ammenities also sounded great. There are no exterior pictures of the hotel. It looks like an old Motel 6 where the doors are on the outside of the building. You could hear all the noise from the highway all night long. The website boasted a fine dining experience at an Asian Fusion restaurant. They had sandwiches and chicken fingers. What a disappointment. The pool bar was also a small tiki bar instead of the swim up bar they advertised. The hotel staff was less than stellar and not overly friendly. I also would not recommmend taking the shuttle to Disneyland from the hotel. It was an absolute nightmare! We waited almost 45 minutes for it to arrive, and was jam packed
Manager Response: I'm sorry about your experience.  The photo's online are the photo's of the hotel.  Our restaurant boost what is called street fare, and we have over 70 items from over 3 continents.  I do hope you'll give us another opportunity to serve you and your family.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: Best Hotel in Anaheim.  Awesome Disneyland fireworks view!!!!
Summary: This is the all-time best hotel to stay in... Restaurant offers a great veriety of food selection; I had the sea food sampler and it was GREAT.  Service exceeded my expectation.  Best of all, Disneyland fireworks view from the pool area; also, Disneyland shuttle make the their rounds every 20 minutes!
Manager Response: Short but wonderful.  Thank you for your kind words and your right, best view of the fireworks, best value for food and beverage, and best Hotel in Anaheim...  Please tell all your friends and family.  We look forward to seeing you again very soon.  Thank you!  Hotel Menage.

Summary: Booked Hotel Menage through expedia for a great price. After reading most of the reviews i was a little unsure of what to expect. The hotel is right off the freeway (easy to find!) and parking is10 bucks. The lobby/lounge is so trendy and the pool looks amazing.   Unfortunately, our room was RIGHT in front of the elevator and as soon as we walked in the smell of cigarettes was overwhelming. And I thought this was a non smoking hotel! Anyway we went to the front desk and asked for another room. The staff was so nice, didn't ask any questions and gave us a new room. This one was on the 5th floor but again right in front of the elevator. So at night and early in the am we were able to hear everything.  The room was clean and nice nothing special. The bed was very comfy but other
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review regarding our hotel.  We do work hard to make sure each guest receives impeccable service.  The hotel is non-smoking however it seems that someone smoked outside in the hallway, hence seeping through into the room.  The freeway noise is non-existent once inside the room, so I am glad you noticed.  We look forward to seeing you again soon and thank you for your business.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: KEEP VALUABLES IN A SAFE PLACE
Summary: We arrived at the hotel on 06/21, we had reservations for 2 rooms (8 people).  I called to confirm the reservations the day before and was told everything was good.  Upon arrival I was told that one of our reservations was for 06/20 and we were no shows and our adjoining rooms were no longer available.  (I still have my email showing 2 rooms for 06/21)  They did not apologize, the front desks lack of communication was equal to him being flat out rude.  The next day our rooms were finally moved (took longer than expected and took 3 requests).  I do not expect a lot from hotel staff, I realize they have a lot of people to serve and feel guilty asking too much, so I could have ignored this slight inconvenience.   2 days later, my sons best friend and my daughter's fiance went to
Manager Response: First and foremost, we strive hard to provide the best service in town.  I'm really sorry about your experiences including the lost game.  I assure you I will personally speak with the front office team so that nothing like this ever happens again...  I do hope you'll give us another opportunity to serve you.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: Despite Priceline canceling our reservations at our original destination our trip was truly back on track once we book our room with Hotel Menage.  We traveled with 4 kids and had to stay in a one room with a king size bed and sofa bed.  yes we were cramped but had enough room for all of us to still be comfortable.  ` NEVER GO THRU PRICELINE TO BOOK A VACATION THEY WILL RIP YOU OFFCANCEL YOUR RESERVATIONS AND PASS THE BLAME ON THE HOTEL THEN RELOCATE YOU TO A HELL HOLE FOR A HOTEL!!!! This hotel was great despite the negative reviews...the freeway noise wasnt that bad, the 24 hour pool was awesome! When we go back to Disneyland this is where we will be staying oh and the resturant was absolutely a great savings for 6 people to eat it only cost us $34 and we all were full
Manager Response: I am truly sorry that you had some difficulties during the booking process, however I'm pleased to hear your experience with the hotel was great.  Thank you for your kind words, our 24 hour pool is a great amenity and the noise from the outside is non-existent once inside the rooms.  We look forward to many future visits from you and your family and friends.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: Unless, you enjoy your kids being susceptible to soft porn at the pool-stay away!!! There were couples making out everywhere. The cigarette smoke was unbearable. There was lots of noise. You can here the surrounding freeways everywhere. The hotel was sort of chic, but with underlying old musty tones. It's definitely more geared towards adults. I would describe as a party hotel. We checked in, and then checked out a short time later.
Manager Response: I assure you we are a good place for everyone, including families, about 80 percent of our guests are families.  I don't know what specifically occurred during your visit, but we will follow up on your review.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: This place was terrible! Employees were rude and not helpful!!
Summary: As I was booking my hotel I put in the notes please have a room away from the freeway and have a fridge already in it and I also mentioned it was our honeymoon. I heard sometimes they do nice things for you (they didn't, they kind of laughed at us and sent us on ou rway). We get to our room which is facing the fwy something we requested not to have. The room smelled of paint (it was just painted that afternoon) masking tape was still on the walls covering light switches and what not. We go back downstairs and tell them about this. The snotty guy's solution was two move us from room 501 to 503... My husband told him we were not staying on that floor facing the fwy, we already put in out notes we did not want to be located there. After 15mins of going back and forth with the rude
Manager Response: I am extremely disappointed to here your comments.  I am very sorry about your experiences.  Our team does work diligently to ensure each guests' requests are met in a timely manner.  I assure you this is not indicative of our service levels and we will improve on your comments.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: We stayed here two nights with 3 children.the rooms are not very large,but nice decorated. The sink is outside the bathroom,I don't really like that, but that is also the only negative I have to say about the rooms:) lovely pool area with a nice bar,and very close to Disney.
Manager Response: It seems other then the sink your visit with us was quite nice.  Thanks for taking the time to write a good review.  Your correct, the majority of our guests love our 24 hour pool.  We look forward to seeing you and your family again soon.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: We got a great deal on hotwire.  Our room was ready and waiting for us.  Housekeeping did a great job each day of our eight night stay.  A refrigerator was quickly delivered upon request, with no extra charge.  The hotel was in a convenient location for our 5 days in the Disney parks.  The K'ya Restaurant food was excellent!  Great quality for the price!  The pool was incredible, and we especially enjoyed watching the Disney fireworks from the pool area.  The beds were extremely comfortable and perfect after a long day in the parks.  We followed other TripAdvisor tips and put a pillow around the end of the footboard, as the bedframe sticks out further than the mattress, resulting in bruised shins.  Our second night at the hotel, there was a noisy party next door, but management
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write this great review.  Although there were some hiccups during your visit, I'm glad you received the value for price paid and you had a chance to enjoy k'ya and our great pool.  We hope to see you again soon and thank you for your business.  Regards,  hotel Menage.

Summary: This is a Motel with an identity crisis.  During our stay we were assigned an occupied room, a smoking room, and finally a room with a perpetually slow draining tub (asked to have it fixed and never truly was).  Our room overlooked the pool which on the first day we thought was nice.  That night we learned about the outdoor bar and the hours that they kept.  We had asked about the pool music and what time they turned it off and were told right after Disneyland's fireworks (they play music all day at the pool).  Well the fireworks went off and the music and noise did not end.  It was at this point that I called the front desk to inquire again, and they told me that the pool music was off, but that the noise was from the outdoor bar and it did not close until 2 am.  As the time
Manager Response: I assure you that this is not the norm for our hotel.  Our hotel caters to everyone, including our 24 hour pool for all to enjoy.  I'm very sorry that the team was not attentive, and I do hope you'll give us another opportunity.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: A great hotel with some outstanding people working there. Andrew, Viviena, Leo and Rigo all made for a pleasant stay.  They are accommodating, professional and courteous. Loved the pool bar too!
Manager Response: Our team will be so happy to read your review.  They strive to ensure everyone receives the attention you did...  Your right, the staff does make the difference.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: Friendly Staff Good Food Clean Rooms
Summary: My friend recommended the Menage for my stay while my huband was in a nearby hospital. The manager was always asking how my husband  was doing. The front desk girls were so helpful. the food was reasonable and the room was clean. Thanks Steve, Sylvia and Viviana for kindness. Sue B. Guam USA
Manager Response: Thank you for pointing out the three individuals specifically, I know they will be very happy to read your review.  I'm very happy that your friend has recommended the hotel to you and I hope that you will recommend our hotel to your friends and family as well.  Thank you again for your comments and your business.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: Excellent service, but the hotel is average
Summary: PROS: fabulous service - everyone was friendly and attentive. Every hotel employee we encountered was definitely service-oriented.  Comfortable bed/pillows. Room was clean every day and I noticed the pool area being cleaned on a frequent basis in the mornings.  Nice pool - we took a disneyland break every afternoon and swam in the pool. Although the weather was in the 70s, the pool was perfectly heated and warm to swim even at night time. The pool area and hot tub was clean and it was very fun be able to watch the fireworks from the pool! We saw many people who had rooms on the pool side of the hotel standing out on their balconies watching the fireworks from there too. The view is perfect from the pool area.  CONS: despite the above, you can't get away from the fact that this
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write this review.  Our 24 hour pool is a great amenity for our guests and the view of the fireworks are the truly the best.  I am truly glad to hear you received the service you did from both our front office team and our bartender...  Thank you again and we look forward to seeing you again soon...  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: I stayed at the Hotel Menage for 2 nights.  It was just me and my 10 and 9 year old daughters.  We had an excellent time!  We arrived at the hotel early on June 6, 2010, around 10:30am.  We got a room and got checked in right away.  We were doing a quick little Disney trip.  Once we checked in, we wanted to go to Downtown Disney.  The valet gentleman out front was so helpful in what was the best way to go.  Which was WAY shorter than the walking map I had!  Once we were done there, we went back to the hotel.  My girls swam and swam in the pool.  We ordered a snack and it was brought right to us.  That night, we could watch the fireworks right from outside our room.  I read a lot of rooms about the traffic noise and how bothersome it was.  Honestly, when we were in our room, we
Manager Response: I'm so glad you and your two daughters enjoyed our hotel and that your experiences exceeded your expectations.  I am also glad you experienced our exceptional food and beverage as well as the view of the fireworks.  Our 24 hour pool is an amenity that you can't miss.  Your right, the noise from the rooms are non existent once you are inside.  Thank you for your business and we are certainly glad you will definitely come back and stay with us.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: I recently stayed at this hotel with five friends and it was perfect for what we were looking for.  We really liked the fact that the pool and hot tub are open all night (even if the nights were a little too chilly to use them long) because it's really too bad at other hotels when they close the hour you would have liked to use them.  The disney fireworks were a definite highlight at night to watch from our balcony, and the food at the restaurant is seriously amazing and at great price as well.  We were able to have two adjoining rooms and they were quiet and comfortable.  It may be a bit of a walk for people with young childrent to walk the half mile or so across the freeway to disneyland but there are buses that come around.  One night when we asked for a wine opener, the
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stayed at the Menage about 2 years ago and although many reviews say it was loud I actually found it nice and peaceful.  The room was nice and the lobby was beautiful.  My only gripe was the bathroom looked like it belonged in a motel 6 not the Menage.  As far as the staff they actually ignored us for the most part so I am interested to see if they have become more attentative and friendly.   We are heading to Disneyland again (6/24 - 6/27)  and decided to give it another go.  I do remember they had a beautiful lobby and pool area so I am looking forward to that for sure!
Manager Response: I hope your experience was better the second time around...  We strive to make everyone's experience a great one and I hope it was better.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: We love the Menage, will be back. Friendly staff, great food and fun!
Summary: We booked the Menage for the last three nights of our three week USA vacation and wished we had stayed longer, it has a fun relaxed atmosphere. Upon arrival we were checked in by Laura who was there to answer my many questions with a smile during our stay...  Food is excellent with a large range of street fare and very well priced. We enjoyed meals in the restaurant, bar and pool bar, this did help me relax as there was no need to leave the hotel in search of meals. Not only were the meals great but also the service which was excellent.  Each afternoon we relaxed around the pool bar which is very popular. The main bar inside is also a great place for a drink.  The advice we received from the front desk regarding Disneyland was invaluable, I just can't for the life of me remember
Manager Response: Thank you for bringing your family to experience Hotel Menage.  I know Laura, Ashley and the valets will be very happy to hear you named them specifically.  I am so glad you enjoyed every experience, from the beds to the food to us meeting your requests.  The team works hard to ensure all aspects of every visit exceeds our guests expectations, it's really nice to read your comments.  Thank you again for your review, but most importantly thank you for your business and we look forward to seeing you next year, hopefully sooner....  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: We spent a dreamy 24 hours at Menage in Annaheim! It was a quick getaway and I discovered this gem of a hotel that is close to Disneyland but a haven for any adults who wants a real hotel in the area....the vibe is cool and relaxed, music fills the lobby and pool area and makes you feel so relaxed. My girlfriend and I love this place...happy hour at the bar is plentiful and cheap ( $2 drinks!). Food at K'ya restaurant is awesome...the Poco Loco  is tingly good! Service is awesome. I HIGHLY recommend this hotel!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review!  We are glad you had a chance to get away for 24 hours and more importantly that you chose us to spend that time with.  Thank you for your business and we look forward to seeing you again soon...  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: Somewhat Dodgy Motel with a Cool Lobby
Summary: Make no mistake - Hotel Menage is a motel - and a somewhat dodgy motel at that. It has a fairly nice lobby - modern and inviting - but the rooms are VERY noisy - and the bathroom looks straight out of 1978. The price made it ok for one night but I wouldn't stay there if you're planning for 2 or more nights.
Manager Response: I'm sorry that you felt we fell short of your expectations.  Our value for price paid and our service is what we hope everyone experiences.    Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: Our travel agent booked this promising it would be a great place for the family to stay at for our Disney leg of the trip.  It was okay, but nothing special.   The room was nice, except watch out for the ends of the beds - they caused quite a few leg bruises whenever they were walked into. The biggest problem with this hotel is that it sits on a block that is surrounded by freeways that are busy 24 hours a day.  Outside the room it was louder than an airport.   At night we left the room's fan running to drown out the noises and this helped us sleep. The location is a good ten minute walk to the Disneyland gates, but there are hotels closer and these don't require you to walk across on and off ramps to the freeways.  Having said that, there are pedestrian ligts on all of these.
Manager Response: I'm sorry to hear that you would not give us another opportunity.  We are close to some major intersections, which do add value to the proximity to the park, but also the fireworks that spray over our pool deck.  We do hope you'll give us another opportunity to service you in the near future.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: WOW!! GREAT VALUE!! GREAT SERVICE!! GREAT FUN!!
Summary: From the minute we drove up to valet before check-in to the minute we walked out after check-out we were amazed & dazzled with this hotel!! Each time we walked in hotel we felt like we were in another world,with the fun festive vibe at the Pool Bar, to the relaxing Lounge area with ambiant lighting,candles and weekend piano music. The wonderful options of food and great music playing throughout public areas...You may not want to leave hotel!!  Food was AMAZING and cheap, very fresh and tasty.   This hotel has the BEST HAPPY HOUR!!! even on weekends!!  Food prices 1/2 off regular prices,we were so amazed at the happy hour prices!! Believe me you will be too.  Service was excellent, everyone had smiles and was very attentive. It was also nice to see the manager so involved;(sorry,
Manager Response: Thank you for your glowing review.  We pride ourselves on value, service, and overall guest satisfaction, so it's very pleasing to hear of your experiences.  I will make sure that both managers are told of your kind words.  Thank you for the time to write the review but most importantly thank you for your business.  We look forward to seeing you again soon...  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: I booked a room at this hotel as a surprise anniversary present.  I reserved the King Loft room, but they accidentally moved us to a standard room.  When I let the staff know and asked if there was a loft available, the very helpful woman at the front desk said she would upgrade us for the inconvenience.  Boy did she upgrade us!  She gave us the suite and it was HUGE! Easily the size of 2 rooms.  Big lounge area, several TVs, walk-in shower, wet bar, robes, slipper, the WORKS.  Also, you can order room service from the hotel restaurant at the same prices- super cheap.  We had french fries, bread pudding, and a few cocktails sent to the room and I think we spent about $20.  The room was only about $80.  I would definitely go back!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words.  I know the team loves reading reviews like yours.  We appreciate you taking the time to write, but most importantly we appreciate your business and look forward to seeing you back soon.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: I just got back from a long weekend getaway to Disneyland with my two teen age daughters.  We traveled with my sister, her husband and their two teenage children and stayed at the Hotel Menage.  We loved the Hotel.  It was in walking distance to Disney Land, which was perfect.  The service was superb from checking in, to the meals at the restaurant, to the very comfortable beds. The staff  were all very friendly and  went over and above to make sure that we were all taken care of.   We enjoyed two meals in the restaurant and they were both reasonably priced and we were surprised and pleased   with the very wide selection to choose from.  We didn't spend a lot of time in the Hotel, as we were up and gone by 9:00 am and did not return untill 11:00 pm, but I would definately come
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  Thank you for your business, and we look forward to seeing you again.  We pride ourselves on our value and service, and I'm extremely happy that you and your family experienced both.  We look forward to welcoming you back to Hotel Menage soon.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: Find somewhere else to stay. The noise is unbearable in the so called quite rooms .
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: 2nd time around was a bad trip
Summary: Let me preface this by saying I had stayed at this hotel previously so I thought I knew what I was getting.  My sister & I had a 3rd flr room with 2 queen beds that was lovely, modern looking & overlooked the pool.  When I booked my husband & I for our anniversary I booked a King Loft Suite thinking we would be upgrading room class - I was so wrong!!!!  It was a ground floor room, not behind the security gates and viewed a freeway on ramp ( I had TWICE requested a view overlooking the pool which is the best feature of this hotel & has a good view of the Disneyland fireworks).  This room had a cement floor, a torn couch, a ceiling painted black w/exposed pipes & a bathroom that was so old & gross I did not want to set foot in it.  So we moved to a standard king room.  We were at
Manager Response: I'm sorry that your 2nd experience was not to your satisfaction.  Our loft rooms on our first floor is slightly different than the normal hotel room, with concrete floors and exposed ceilings.  I do hope that you will give us another opportunity to make this right.  Regards,  Hotel Menage

Summary Heading: Arrived with high hopes - Left with dismal results
Summary: My boyfriend and I stayed at Hotel Menage for our anniversary with a trip to Disneyland. While the photos made the hotel seem like a great deal, our stay was not enjoyable.  The lobby area is dark trying to go for the "Vegas" feel. Except it was actually awkward as there weren't many people lounging around.   After we checked in, we went up to our room which was in the back corner (facing the freeway and in front of the elevator).  The room was NOT soundproof and you could 1.) hear all the cars whizzing by on 5 and 2.) hear the elevator loudly rumbling.  I immediately called the front desk and requested a room change due to the noise, which the person replied, "Really? That's actually one of our quieter rooms." I found that EXTREMELY hard to believe, as I'm certain rooms on the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out to write regarding your visit.  I am sorry for the response you received from our front desk, I assure you that we will address this immediately with our team.  We pride ourselves on our value and service, and apparently we fell short during your visit.  I hope you will give us another opportunity to serve you in the future.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: THE WORST HOTEL I HAVE EVER STAYED AT
Summary: This is the worst hotel I have ever stayed at.  Let's start with the better part.  The actual room doesn't look so bad considering it's a renovated motel.  It's still awful in comparison to what the hotel pictures look like.  The WORST; the bathroom.  The drain in the tub doesn't work properly so you're left with a nice pool of water while and after showering.  There was someone else's hair in it, too.  The paint in the tub is peeling.  But wait, here's the best part.  I went to grab a towel and opened it... and what falls out? AN ENTIRE BALL OF HAIR!!!   Unfortunately, I am currently still staying at this hotel! I haven't slept yet and I am looking at other hotels to switch to.  I'm willing to take the loss (of money) to get out of this hell hole!
Manager Response: I am truly sorry about your experience at our Hotel.  I wish that we could have turned your experience around prior to you leaving.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: My family and I stayed at the hotel Menage for 5 nights, and had an excellent experience. The staff are extremely friendly, helpful and genuine. The restaurant has awesome food, prices and the service is excellent!  The hottub and pool area were very clean with nice furniture and lots of lounge chairs for everyone. The only drawback was the freeway noise which we were aware of by other reviews but really by the 2nd night it didn't bother us at all. There are 2 computers for use in the "red room" so we never had to wait long at all to access the internet. We did the shuttle the first day for Disneyland but had to wait a long time for the return trip after the park closed with ALOT of other people so we walked back to the hotel and every day after that, which was only about 10
Manager Response: Thank you for your glowing review.  Our team works hard to ensure every guest has your experience.  I am very glad to hear your first experience to Disneyland was spend with us...  Thank you for your time and most importantly your business.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: First off the only staff member who treated us kindly was the valet,  he was the only one who took the time to tell us where everything was located and what times the restaurant, pool, etc. were open.In the end of course the manager was nice and gave us a free breakfast but it took her 10 min to get to us. Our room was stark white, paint peeling out of the shower, a whole in the sink area ,tub and sink clogging while used, no closet doors, dirty carpet, and the walls and base boards were scuffed up and covered in dust! The bed was as hard as a rock  and the noise from the music by the pool area combined with the freeway noise was unbearable! This hotel is renovated, but the "renovations" appear only to apply to the lobby and public portions of the hotel. Our room's renovations
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  I assure you the team will be addressing all of the room quality and service issues immediately!  I am very sorry about your experience and hope you'll give us another opportunity.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: Trip Breakdown:  Stayed for 4 nights, early May.  Had 3 meals at the hotel, excellent food.  Hotel costs were very reasonable.  First off - yes the hotel sits directly on the freeway.  The rooms nearest the freeway do have to contend with the noise.  The first night my family of 3 arrived we were put in Rm. 340.  This is the closest room to the freeway.  The noise was loud and constant, and truth be told, a bit too much for me.  The next day (while at the parks), the hotel moved my bags for me to Rm. 325.    This room was fantastic.  Low noise, great views of the pool (which was super warm and nice, used every day), the Matterhorn in the distance, and the backside of  "It's a small world".  Having been to Walt Disney World many times, this was unique to me.  No hotel on WDW
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We appreciate your business and thank you for your kind words.  You are right the majority of our rooms are not noisy at all, rather the proximity to the fireworks adds to the delightful 24 hour pool.  I'm so pleased you enjoy our restaurant and our service.  We look forward to seeing you and your family soon.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: We stayed here for 5 nights and thought the hotel was very good.  Room was a good size and clean.  Bed was comfortable.  Staff were extremely helpful.  We caught the shuttle bus to Disneyland which was very convenient.  The concierge organised an LA tour for us which was fantastic.  The pool was great and open 24 hours.  The outside bar was good and we met some great people - both tourists and locals so we had a fantastic stay.  The food was street fare which we enjoyed for something different but could not eat every night so we took a taxi to Garden Walk where there were some good restaurants.  The traffic did not bother us and my husband is a light sleeper - we were on the 5th floor.  Was a great location to view the Disneyland fireworks every night.
Manager Response: I am so pleased to hear your visit with us was exceptional.  Thank you for taking the time to write such a great review.  We work hard to ensure value for price paid in both our restaurant and our hotel.  Thank you again for your review but most importantly thank you for your business, we look forward to seeing you soon.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: Stay away! - or at least pack your earplugs
Summary: The noise from the surrounding freeway and major roads is unbelievable! No matter where your room is...you cannot escape the roar of traffic. We complained and were switched to a "quiet" room away from the freeway...but it was still bad...and then we were "treated" to the garbage truck every morning at 7am right below our door. The housekeeping was pretty bad...our standing request for a few extra towels was ignored...we had to call at least once every day to have them brought up. The in-room coffee was never re-stocked...we had to have that brought up every day too. I will say that the beds were very comfortable...but the sofabed was among the worst we ever experienced...the "mattress" was not much more than a bag filled with springs. The food in the restaurant was cheap and
Manager Response: I am very sorry that you felt this way.  The majority of our guests don't find the noise that bad, but unfortunately you did not like the location of the hotel.  I assure you that we will be following up with our housekeeping team to ensure your experience is NOT duplicated.  I do hope you'll give us another opportunity on another visit.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: Another reviewers description of this hotel as a "motel with a nice facade" was spot on.  The "renovations" appear only to apply to the lobby and public portions of the hotel.  Our room's renovations consisted of a new flat screen tv and lots of paint.  Paint over the mold on the bathroom tiles, paint over the broken bathroom door (also covered with drywall mud).  As other reviewers have also noted, the freeway noise along with the blaring music at all hours, is unbearable.  The rooms do not provide any sound dampening.  After looking at the room, my wife's only comment to the kids was, "keep your socks on."  Almost forgot about the dog behind the front desk, very classy.
Manager Response: I am very sorry you felt this away about our Hotel.  I assure you that we do NOT want anyone to leave us feeling this way.  I'm not sure which room you were in but I assure you we care about our product...  Lastly we are a pet friendly hotel, hence dogs are permitted on property.  I do hope you will give us another opportunity to serve you.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: My husband and I stayed at Hotel Menage for 5 nights in April 2010. The hotel was recommended by our travel agent and we were not disappointed. Even though we were early we were able to be checked in and had a choice of rooms. The room was clean and had a good sized flat screen TV. We ate at the restaurant downstairs and although meals were small they presented great value for money. It was easy to get to Disneyland using the shuttle service. The location was good and across the road from Starbucks, gas station and Taco Bell. We requested a fridge in our room and got it the same day along with a microwave. Staff were excellent and even recommended a medical centre where my husband could get his ankled look at. The freeway noise was noticable at first but you soon got used to it.
Manager Response: First and foremost, I hope your husbands ankle is feeling better...  Thank you for your kind words, our team will be very happy to hear of your experience.  We appreciate the time you took to write such a good review.  Most importantly, we look forward to seeing you back again soon!    Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: Went with my 11 yr old son and had a great trip!  Good deal for the price I paid!  If you are expecting a Hilton then book there and pay the rates but if on a budget...this is a great place!  Yes, the traffic noise can be loud but this is LA people!  We had a poolside room and didn't notice the noise much at all.  The fireworks show from Disneyland is much louder and a perfect view from a poolside room!  Turn on the fan and drown out the traffic if it bothers you that much.  I found the accomodations to be a pleasant surprise for the rate I paid compared to similar rates elsewhere with much less to offer.  Clean over-size room, comfy bed with lots of down pillows, big screen tv, what more could you want!  The restaurant is the best value anywhere!  Nothing over $10 and that
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about Hotel Menage.  You are right, once inside the room the outside noise is gone.  I am happy to say you experienced both our value for price paid and our excellent service.  We work hard to get reviews like yours, but most importantly thank you for your business.  We hope you get a chance to come back soon, and please tell your friends...  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: Like trying to stay in the middle of the 5 freeway with reggae music blasting in your ears.
Summary: I don't think this hotel could be any more noisy if they tried....or maybe they are trying to drown out the 5 freeway which most the rooms overlook. Checkout Google Earth and you will see that this hotel is bounded by the 3 busiest roads in Anaheim. The constant reggae-themed music was so loud you could barely speak to anyone in the lobby, bar or restaurant. Rooms have only window a/c and heaters....more of a motel with a nice facade.
Manager Response: I am truly sorry you felt the way you did on your review.  Although we are next to the freeway, most of the noise is drowned out inside the room and most of our clients seem to enjoy the fireworks and our amenities.  We hope that you will give us another chance in the future.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: I booked this hotel with a vacation package with Expedia and it came up to about $43/night! At first, I didn't want to book it because of the distance between the park and hotel and some of the bad stories I heard when it first opened. I was wrong.  First off, this hotel was basically a converted motel and it doesn't look quite like a motel anymore in the lobby. However, the rooms still look like a renovated motel room as you had to access the rooms from the outside and the air conditioner was like the ones you found at a Quality Inn. The beds were comfortable, but pretty small (didn't look like a queen). I found that the carpet and wall color did not match at all. It looked a little weird to find plain white walls and a darkish carpet. Maybe a little paint will do. The bathroom
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  Although you mention quite a bit of information, the rate you paid was a package net rate.  we are a renovated hotel with all the amenities of a full service hotel and I will find out why our internet was not up to par.  We do hope you'll come visit us again soon.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: Even tho it's been 3 years, I remember Hotel Menage
Summary: It was over 3 years ago.  My stay at the Hotel Menage still remains with me this very day.  It was the great fires of 2007.  The  Witch fires.  I was driving from LA to SD, the radio  said everyone must get off the roads.  I pulled off in Anaheim.  I pulled into the Hotel Menage.  Fearful  of  what was going on, I walked up to the front desk and was greeted warmly.  I explained my situation and got the distressed passenger rate immediately.  I walked into my  room and saw the the large, flat screen TV.  That was my life line for the next 3 days.  I  was able to see what was happening and where it was happening. It put me at ease.  My house was safe, I was safe at the Hotel Menage.  The Hotel Menage had so many ammenities.  The pool, the kid friendly, pet friendly atmosphere. I
Manager Response: Wow what a great honor to have you write a review after all this time.  Thank you for your kind words.  Although San Diego is an hour away, we knew that we need to pitch in anyway we could to assist.  We are glad that we had a positive effect on you during a very scary time.  Thank you for your kind words and we look forward to seeing you again, next time for a leisurely visit...  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: This is the 4th time staying here. We have sent our family and friends to the "Menage" as well. All have returned multiple times for Disney visits. The food is awesome (street fair menu) and the customer service has always been fantastic. On this last trip, I forgot my sons belt, so he couldn't wear his pants at night to DL. He would freeze in his shorts. I told the bartender outside about my problem while ordering food, and BAM! He finds a huge safety pin in the cashier drawer! Problem solved! When we got to the room, I called the desk for a refrigerator, and in 15 minutes there was one in our room plugged in and ready to go. We love to go back the the hotel from DL between 4 and 5 for a break, some cheap yummy dinner and a few cocktails (happy hour prices) to relax us from the
Manager Response: Thanks for your review.  Most importantly thanks for your loyalty...  We appreciate your repeat business and for sending all your friends and family as well...  We work hard to create an affordable vacation for everyone, so I'm very happy to hear of your experiences...  I know Frank will be ecstatic to hear of your kind words for him as well as the team.  We look forward to many return visits in the near future...  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: After reading some reviews we were a little hesitant on what this was going to be like. Rooms were very good size. Yes the hotel is just off the freeway, but seriously noise wasnt bad. Slpet right through it and i am not a deep sleeper. It is across the other side of the bridge to disneyland, but the shuttle to disney takes 3 mins if that!  Staff were lovely, pool was excellent. The restaurant was excellent! The food was so cheap and it was quite nice. We liked it that much that we have decided to go back there and stay there for another night instead of somewhere at Laguna! Would deffinately reccomend this to anyone. Only downside, there was no fridge in the room and no concierge, but they still had all the brochures!
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive review.  We pride ourselves on value and service and I'm thankful that you experienced all of the things we continually work on.  Although we are close to the freeway the noise really isn't as bad as some reviewers state, rather the fireworks from the park add to the overall ambiance.  Thank you again for the review but most importantly thank you for you business and we look forward to seeing you soon!  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: I will start out with my email I sent them today. I did like somethings about the hotel but not sure if I will be staying there again... This is my personal experience, yours might be better.   We stayed at the Hotel Menage on 3/28-3/30 in room 217. When we first arrived around 10 am the man at the valet outside was very rude to us when we told him we were attemping to check in, he shook is head in disgust with us. The room wasn't ready, but that was okay we really just wanted to park the car and go to Disneyland. When we arrived later the staff at the desk was very nice and helpfull. We went to the room to find housekeeping did not have the bedding for the sofa for my son. I went downstairs and got his bedding from the front desk. The next day we went into the park for a few
Manager Response: First and foremost, your experience is abnormal for our hotel and I assure you that I will be addressing all of your concerns.  All of your feedback has already been given to the team and they have addressed it with their prospective staff members.  This is not indicative of the service we provide and I am very sorry about your experience.  I hope that you will give us another opportunity to provide you with better service in the future.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: This hotel is close to Disneyland and on the shuttle route.  The staff was friendly.  We asked for a quiet room and they told us this was the quiet side of the hotel - facing the pool and the freeway.  It was really loud and then the pool music plays from 10 am to 10 pm so very difficult to get any rest for us.  If you are looking for more of a party hotel, this would work for you.  The sheets were frayed and the bath tile and grout was spray painted over in places - mildew is my guess.  The restaurant food was decent and again good service but it had a night club feel to it so breakfast was a little odd.  I have stayed in three star hotels (and motels) that were cleaner and better kept so I guess I'm feeling a bit betrayed by the rating system.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write this review.  I am hopeful that you'll give us another opportunity to serve you soon.  We strive to make our environment conducive to all demographics including families, so I'm sorry your experience didn't pan out.  Regards,  Hotel Menage

Summary Heading: Overall I great stay! Would recommend to anyone! from Canada
Summary: We just returned from staying at the Menage in Anaheim. Pros:   1.Close to Disneyland - 10/15 minute walk - although you walk beside a busy street and uphill. You can take a shuttle for $4 a day adult and it runs every 20 minutes. (Most people take this shuttle.) 2. Food Food Food ! The restaurant K'ya is in the lobby along with a bar along with a deli along with a pool side bar! There is no shortage of places to relax and eat or drink! The food is AWESOME!  and very reasonable - most items below $10. My favorite was the stuffed french toast! Kids eat free in the am!  3. FRIENDLY AND HELPFUL STAFF: shout outs to - Sergio the valet, Big blonde curly Valet (sorry no name!) Dan the concierge, Wendy, Ashley, Anok and Guadolupe at K'ya! (Thanks for trying to teach me spanish!)  I
Manager Response: Thank you for taking your time out to write a detailed review.  I will personally address the issues' that you had during your visit.  I'm glad you had a chance to experience the great service from our team.  We work very hard to exceed our guests expectations and I'm very happy to hear of your experiences.  Our location and value to our guests' are something we pride ourselves on and we look forward to seeing you again soon.  Again thank you for your time.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: well... some good and some bad with hotel menage
Summary: we stayed at hotel menage feb., 2010 with my husband and 3 teenagers while we visited disney. we had 2 adjoining rooms- each with 2 queen beds.  there are many pros with the hotel but also cons.  hope this review will be helpful to you.  pros;  location is good if you are doing disney.  we walked to and from disney each day- it tool 12-15 min. from the front gate to the hotel.  if you have small kids- i recommend the shuttle as you are walking adjacent to a very busy street.  it even scared me with my teens!   the lounge area in the lobby is quite nice to hang out.  our kids sat with us one evening and watched a basketball game on the large tv's.   the menu has a large selection of very reasonable dishes.  nothing on the menu is over $10- the dishes are each like appetizers.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments.  We work hard to ensure all our guests enjoy every part of their visit.  I wish that you had no cons, however I assure you our engineering department will look into the the area of the bathroom you mentioned.  We do hope you'll give us another opportunity.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: Okay if you get a good deal
Summary: My husband and I booked a "Mystery Room" through Bookit.com and it turned out to be the Hotel Menage.  For the rate we received, it was a nice place to stay.  As mentioned in other posts the exterior is a little off putting but you can tell that they are trying to update the rooms and restaurants.  They try to advertise it as an "It" boutique hotel..you will be greatly disappointed if you believe this.  It is definintely no Joie De Vie or W hotel.  The staff is extremely friendly and helpful whic was nice. The hotel offers a shuttle to Disneyland that runs until 12:30am which is nice but parking at the hotel will set you back about $10.  All in all I would rate the hotel as average or just okay.  It is great for families since there is a pool and a shuttle to the theme parks.  I
Manager Response: Thank you for taking your time to write a review.  Our rooms do sell for a lot more than you paid and we do have some great channels that give good discounts during off season times, however I'm sorry you felt the hotel was not up to your standards and hope you will give us another opportunity.  Thank you for your comments about our team, I know they'll be glad to hear your words....   Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: I just returned home from a stay at Hotel Menage, and I have to say how happy I am with this Hotel and the Staff were so friendly.  We stayed there March 14 and 15, and I wish we would have stayed there for our whole vacation.  The rooms are super clean and modern, as is the whole Hotel.  I asked for a room with a Pool view, as I knew my daughter would love that, and Ashley emailed me back right away and said it wouldnt be a problem.  She was very helpfull each and every time I emailed her or phoned the Hotel.  And Trevor was so nice upon checkout that it made it not so bad we had to check out at 3am to catch our flight home.  The pool and hot tub are fantastic, open 24 hours and heated too, i have to say we took advantage of that because we were on our last 2 days of
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write such great words for us at Hotel Menage...  I know both Ashley and Trevor will be happy to hear of your kind words, and I know that they will continue to do the great job they do.  Our hotel, as you mentioned, is close to Disneyland and the freeway, but once the doors are closed the rooms are quiet and as you said, comfortable...  We thank you for all your comments and look forward to seeing you sooner than later.   Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: One of my best hotel stays - EVER
Summary: Spent three nights with my wife and two small children at the Hotel Menage to visit Disneyland.  Found the Menage right off of I-5, just across the Harbor Blvd bridge withing easy walking distance to the park entrance. The resort shuttles stop here last before entering the park so shuttle trips are only minutes. The staff was  EXCELLENT!  Everyone from maintenance to desk staff were happy and knowledgable. Even the valet guys were cool, everyone knew something that helped our stay. The restaurant  KYA was the best food we ate on a week long trip, never ate the same thing twice and that was three breakfasts and two dinners.  Kids ate FREE for breakfast. 24 hour heated pool access allowed us to unwind after a long day of Disneyland adventuring.  I WILL be back!
Manager Response: Wow, thanks for the comments...  We do have something for everyone, families, singles, couples, etc... I'm glad you had a chance to experience our hotel with the entire family.  Our team will be extremely happy to hear that they were all a part of making your visit with us memorable...  We look forward to seeing you again soon and thank you for your business.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: May not be perfect for everyone, but it was for us!!
Summary: A friend and I stayed at Hotel Menage for an extended weekend at Disneyland. We are both in our early 20's, and I'm SO happy we picked this hotel. We had no problems the entire time we were there. Some highlights; The pool was amazing. Neither of us wanted to hang out at disneyland to watch the fireworks and it was great to be able to watch them at the pool. The food in the resturant was great as well, I think we ate 3 or 4 meals there. Room service was very quick, and perfect for a nice breakfast while getting ready for a day at the parks. We were on the freeway side of the hotel and didn't have any problems with noise. If the door was open you could hear the freeway, but it was by no means a big deal and didn't disrupt our sleep (or awake time!). This hotel was perfect for us,
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments.  We do want to be the hotel for everyone and families do enjoy our 24 hour pool and the fireworks from Disneyland over the pool deck area.  Our restaurant, k'ya street fare, has something for everyone and I'm very glad you got to experience it on more than one occasion...  We look forward to seeing you and all your friends again soon....  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: This was the second time that I stayed at the Hotel Menage and will stay there again for all my future trips to Disney. The rooms are spacious and all of the amneities within the room are great. It was an easy walk to the parks but when it rained we decided to drive a very short distance to the parks. Can't wait to go back!
Manager Response: Thank you for your continued business!  We appreciate each and every time you stay with us and for taking time out of your schedule to continually write reviews.  Thank you for your loyalty and we look forward to seeing you again soon...  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary Heading: THINGS ARE NOT ALWAYS WHAT THEY SEEM...
Summary: This hotel is a lovely place to stay..Once you get past the shock of the exterior.... Upon first arrival i was a little bit disappointed when i 1st saw the front of this hotel... But once i entered through the main doors the sound of soft music and friendly staff soon changed my mind..... After a short walk to our room i was even more surprised when opening our room door... There was a nice size room, very clean and good size beds for sharing with friends... The bathroom set up was also FANTASTIC with toilet and shower behind doors and basin/mirror outside of door making it easy for 3 friends to get ready for any outings.... Only down fall with bathroom was no ceiling fan...The pool area was FANTASTIC with heated spa/pool to enjoy all year round.... This hotel is a must stay :)
Manager Response: Thank you...  As expressed in another review, there was only so much we could do with our renovations on the exterior.  We focused on the inside of the hotel as well as the service.  I'm glad that you experienced our excellent customer service and our nice amenities within the room...  Thank you for your review, but most importantly thank you for your business...  We know you have many choices in the Anaheim area and we thank you again for choosing to stay with us.  We look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: We stayed here for a girls trip to Disneyland (all in our 30's).  It was easy to find and a very short walk to Disneyland (about 10 mins).  The rooms were spacious enough for 4 girls and unless the door/windows were open - they were very quiet from freeway noise.  Valet parking guys were great (esp John).  Didn't try the pool out - but had a great view of the fireworks from the room.  Free internet in the lobby which was great for printing our boarding passes off for the flight home. Would recommend this hotel to anyone.  I do feel like it is aimed towards adults and I really didn't see many kids.  Hotel lounge got quite crazy on Sat night (with I am assuming are locals) so avoid that area if you are looking for a quiet drink or two.  All in all a great stay at a nice hotel.
Manager Response: I'm glad your all girls trip worked out at our hotel.  You are right to say that once the doors and windows are closed, the sound proofing is quite good.  Depending on the weekend and days, you will see families as well as we gear our hotel everyone.  We look forward to seeing you again soon at Hotel Menage.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: Extremely courteous staff; a special thank you to Leo for your help and attention.  Thanks to Sylvia for your friendly welcome and attention to detail.  The property is very neat, clean,and well maintained.  Room soundproofing is exceptional.  The entire stay was perfect, I highly recommend The Menage to anyone staying in the Anaheim area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words.  I am sure when Leo and Silvia read this they will be very happy to hear of your experience.  Mostly, thank you for your business and we look forward to seeing you again at Hotel Menage.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: Don't judge a book by it's cover
Summary: This Hotel is not what you expect. Its outer looks old and not as modern as others, but once you step through the door you will be surprised. Fantastic service, casual atmosphere souded by great music and great food. The rooms are also one that you may think, oh no, but once you walk through what feels like a lower class hotel, you open your door to a modern room with all that is needed, comfortable beds and plasma tv's. The pool area is fantastic, usable pool all year round as it and the spa/jacuzi are heated to the perfect temperature for a dip in winter/fall.  This hotel is a must stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words and review.  When we renovated the hotel it was hard to really do anything with the exterior of the hotel, however as you experienced we work diligently with the interior of the hotel rooms, lobby and restaurant.  The focus for us at the end was our continual focus on excellent customer service.  I'm very glad to hear you experienced this as well.  Thank you for your business and we look forward to seeing you again soon at Hotel Menage.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: Make sure to bring your confirmation email
Summary: I had booked my reservation online and upgraded to the "Romance Package" to surprise my boyfriend for Valentine's week. When I checked in the associates up front seemed more interested in talking about clothes and what bars they would visit after work than checking us in. I also had not recieved the romance package. When I called to ask about my reservation the agent said that I had not upgraded. I told them I had checked it on the website and that I had confirmation on it. Long story short I had to ruin the surprise to my boyfriend to get the problem sorted out. I returned to the front office and showed them the confirmation email I had recieved. They did appologize and offered a voucher for the package I did not recieve. In the end, I still paid for the package due to their
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review for Hotel Menage.  I am deeply sorry about the experience you had upon check in.  This is not indicative of experiences from our customers nor is it the way our front desk team should react to incorrect confirmations.  Trust me we will address this immediately with our team.  I do hope you'll give us another opportunity to serve you in the future.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: Great service, nice room but not happy with additional charges
Summary: The room was nice and clean and the staff was very friendly. There was some freeway noise but I knew this already having read other reviews so no big surprise. The Deli had excellent sandwiches. My only real complaint was that the phone was not working for incoming calls. I could call out but could not get incoming calls. I however did not know this until my cell phone died and I had to call my wife from the room phone and told her to call me right back on the room phone. She called the front desk and had them put her call through (she asked the front desk if there was a way for her to call the room direct and they were not sure and said they didn't think so.) It rang and rang on her end but never rang in my room. She tried it four times before giving up. I just assumed she had
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to write this review.  I'm extremely sorry that this occurred and apologize for the inconvenience.  The front desk should have just taken the phone charges off the bill.  There are many things that should have occurred during your troubles, and we failed to meet your expectations.  Again I apologize for the situation and wish the team would have handled it better.  At times we cannot control technology, however we can control how our team handles the resolution.  I do hope you'll give us another opportunity to exceed your expectations.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: Can't wait to come back to Cali!!
Summary: Where to begin? From check-in to check-out my stay was flawless. Great front desk staff, awesome room and perfect amenities. K'ya was AMAZING!!!!  The service staff was outstanding. Food was worth every penny! Ate food from there on three separate occasions. I wish I could have tried everything on the menu! On my last day in the hotel I had a delightful convesation at the lobby bar with Frank and Anthony. They made a great team and really made me feel welcomed. The K'ya manager was so sweet and active. I can really see why the servers had great attitudes. My colleagues can not agree more! We will be back very soon! I can't wait to bring my family to enjoy this hotel. The Hilton has nothing on this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you, thank you, thank you...  We work hard to ensure each customer has an experience like yours...  Your time and energy writing and recognizing the specific team members are greatly appreciated.  I will make sure they hear your wonderful words of encouragement.  This is what keeps them going...  Most importantly thank you for your business and we look forward to seeing you again soon...  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: A few of my Freinds and colleagues and I visited Anaheim in 2008 for some training. We never heard of this Hotel before and I being the avid traveller was responsible for booking our entire trip. Lucky me. I booked this Hotel and the rest of our travel through Expedia and when we got to the Hotel, we were amazed at the look of this hotel at night. It was amazing. We thought for sure that the rooms would be horrible if the rest of the hotel looks this good. Wrong again. The rooms were recently redone and the beds were so comfortable. We each had our own room and all 3 of us had the King suites. All our rooms had small fridges for our own beverages and such. The exersise room was not bad for a small space. At the end of the week that we stayed, none of us wanted to leave. The
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write this review.  When you look good we look good and we appreciate your business.  Thanks for your wonderful words and you are correct, once the door is closed in the room, the noise from the roads do go away.  We look forward to seeing you in March and exceeding your expectations once again...  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: The Best Kept Secret Hotel in Anaheim
Summary: I have stayed at Hotel Ménage twice now and each stay was wonderful.  It is a comfortable boutique hotel with all the amenities.  What is truly exceptional about this hotel are its Staff and its Restaurant.  We have received extraordinary service from Ashley, Sylvia & Tiffany.  There isn’t a challenge that they can’t handle or a question they can’t answer.  The Restaurant’s service is also amazing and the food excellent, not to mention the uniqueness of the Street Faire format.  Anyway, we love the place and look forward to our next visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments!  We hope that we are not a best kept secret as we would love the world to stay with us...  I know that Silvia, Tiffany, and Ashely will be greatly appreciative of the comments as well as the restaurant staff.  We strive to ensure each guest experience is exceeded and we are proud to have the team that we do.  Thank you for your repeat business and we look forward to seeing you again soon.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: From the moment we came in you could tell that this place cared about their guests. The front desk manager, Tiffany was AMAZING!!! The valet staff was AWESOME! The rooms, as with the rest of the hotel, had special touches! The rooms were updated & clean. The view of the fire works fro Disney was SPECTACULAR (thank you Tiffany!). I had such a great experience, that I will be back many, many times-including this weekend! Pet Friendly and they mean it, they even have a little grass area for your dog:)  (without an obscene deposit, like most places!) K'ya -the restaurant-AWESOME! Free wireless!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  I know that Tiffany will be ecstatic to read your words.  We want to continue to create experiences like yours and continually create value while exceeding our customers expectations at Hotel Menage.  We look forward to many more visits from you and your family.  Thank you again for your time and mostly thank you for your business.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: Close to Disney, great food but very noisy.
Summary: This is a hotel that has had a cosmetic upgrade.  It looks nice on the surface but the bones are clearly from a previous Holiday Inn.  HOWEVER, if you are looking for a better than average budget hotel near Disneyland this is the place to stay. (Especially if you have teens or 20 somethings in your party.)  The food is EXCELLENT!   For those over 21 the drinks aren't bad either.  We came back from the Disneyland each evening for dinner and some swimming.  We then went back to the park until closing.  (It was very quiet in the morning)  No reason to pay Disney prices for a barely tolerable hamburger when you can eat great food at your hotel for the same price.   We go to Disneyland every year or so.  We've stayed in both the Disney Paradise Pier and a couple "Good Neighbor"
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts with us.  I am very happy that you experienced the service standards that we strive to provide.  Our food and beverage is all about value and quality and every dinner you spent with us is greatly appreciated.  Although the hotel is located next to the road, once the door is closed the noise isn't that bad...  We do hope to see you again at Hotel Menage and thank you for your business.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: The hotel does have the excellent views of Disney’s fireworks but be aware if you have a sensitive car alarm the percussion of the larger displays will set it off. The restaurant has good food at reasonable prices and the hotel staff tries to be as helpful as they can. It is an older hotel that they have tried to fix up with a little makeup. Beds have a leather headboard with a cheap mattress, 7 foot desk and water stained ceilings, ergonomic chairs and heat/air conditioning units that are old and noisy, 42-inch plasma TV and a cheap spray painted tub and shower in the bathroom to make look new. It is on a triangular piece of property with a major highway and two major roads surrounding it on the highway side the traffic noise is unbearable the other two sides the noise is very
Manager Response: I'm sorry that we did not meet your expectations.  Most of our guests enjoy everything their visit to Hotel Menage.  We do hope you'll give us another opportunity to exceed your expectations.  Regards,  Hotel Menage

Summary: It was a last minute trip to disneyland & found hotel through website.  Great reviews from past guests although a bit hesitant since most negatives reviews are the noise factor being close to the freeway.  Well, wasn't too surprise it was noisy , so ot's not the kind of hotel where you want to relax.  However, if trip includes going to Disneyland, it's perfect location.  The beds are a bit off, supposedly 2 Queens but 1 seems to be a full size bed.  Not sure if it's the same for other rooms.  I liked the lobby area, very cozy.  The restaurant was great.  Great food selection, perfect size, & very reasonable.  Staff was great.  The prize we got for 1 night was worth it.  I like the fact that there are no other additional charges like other hotels.  Other than the parking which
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We do have three room types, one with a king and pull out sofa bed, one with two queen beds, and one with a king and a queen bed...  I'm not sure what you received upon checking in, but I'm glad all else went well during your stay.  We appreciate you time and most importantly your business and we look forward to seeing you soon.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: We had a wonderful time at Hotel Ménage. Our room was absolutely AMAZING!!! My girlfriend and I flipped when we saw how nice the room was. We walk in and see not one, but TWO flat screens!! The tiled floors and all the other high-end modern furnishings gave it a real cozy home feeling. We went for my girlfriend’s birthday so viewing the Disneyland fireworks from our room was an added bonus!   We also ate at the K’Ya Restaurant, I did notice the menu had changed from the time we had eaten there; but changed in a good way I loved the small potions, we were able to taste many different types of food and we were greatly pleased with the quality, taste, presentation, not to mention affordable and the friendly staff just made our stay there feel very special. I highly recommend both
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about Hotel Menage.  Your comments about our room and our restaurant is absolutely right on.  Our k'ya Street Fare concept in our restaurant has something for everyone to share...  We look forward to seeing you again soon and thank you for your business.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: Booked through Priceline. Was a little nervous about the whole priceline booking hotel and the not knowing. I have to say, I was very satisfied with the hotel. Able to check in early. Room was nice, clean, roomy. The only negative thing was the room had no ventalation in the bathrooms. The grounds nice tropical setting. Pool and hot tub nice and working. Upbeat music seemed drownout the hwy 5 traffic. Hotel staff  helpful by asking preference questions. I was gaurenteed a king with queen pull out and that is what I got. Requested 2 queens, "not available". Refrigerator and microwave complementary and provided upon request. Parking fee $10 no contenenial breakfast. Did not eat at the restaurant, but did have a sandwich from the deli, it was good. Ordered a bannana split for my
Manager Response: Thank you for your review about Hotel Menage.  We appreciate your comments and we are happy that you enjoyed your visit to Anaheim.  Our team really works hard to ensure everything during your visit exceeds your satisfaction, I'm glad we did.  We look forward to seeing you back again soon, and thank you for your business.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: Incredible customer service was the best part of this hotel during our stay. The staff was extremely accomodating, and the front office manager on duty when we checked in (Tracy) did a herculean job helping to sort out a reservation problem, and ensured that everything was taken care of. Best to arrange any reservations directly with the hotel, as they will price-match any online offer. Bell staff were awesome and extremely helpful with tips on the best ways to get around. Only (very minor) downside on the staff was that an otherwise very pleasant and helpful young woman at the front desk didn't follow through on something she was going to do, but that was definitely the exception. The room we had was not quite like the photos on their website. There was no carpeting in the room
Manager Response: I'm glad Tiffany at the front office assisted you with your issues at check in, but I'm sorry that another person at the front desk didn't follow up on the promises.  I will make sure to follow up with the team.  We pride ourselves on our service so every guest issue needs to be addressed to the team.  The pool music should have been turned off at 10pm, so I don't know what happened during your visit.  Lastly the rooms on our first floor all have artistic concrete floors.  They are our studio lofts a New York style room.  Some people, like yourself, find it too different than the normal rooms with carpet.  The rest of our rooms do have carpet on the floor.  I wish they would have moved you to another room.  Thank you for taking the time to write the comments and most importantly thank you for your business.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: I couldn't complain about our stay at the Menage. The beds were the best....so comfortable and cuddly wanted to sleep the whole time. Close to disneyland which is a bonus and excellent views of the fireworks better than being in disneyland! Food in the restaurant was great except the service was a little slow even though there weren't many in the restaurant. All else was great with this hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about Hotel Menage.  Thank you for your great comments about the rooms and the food.  I will make sure service levels in our restaurant match the food quality, I assure you of it.  Thank you for your business and we look forward to seeing you again in Anaheim.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: I went with my boyfriend and his kids for a trip to Disneyland and we were looking for a hotel that wasn't all that expensive but close to the park. The photos make it seem like an attractive place to stay but I had several issues with it.  1. I asked for 2 queen beds and I got one queen bed and a fold out sofa with a horrible old mattress. The kids could feel all the springs in their back.. they hated it. As I was checking out I overheard another couple checking in and they asked for 2 queens.. the girl at the desk explained to them that the 2nd bed was a fold out sofa.. they were not pleased either.  2. The room was really small and it was located right next to the elevator and 405 freeway. We consistently heard the elevator dinging and the freeway noise. The maids will wake
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write your review.  I'm very sorry about the experiences during your visit.  I assure you I will follow up with the Housekeeping and Front Office team as this is not the norm at our hotel.  We pride ourselves on our service and I'm truly sorry your experience did NOT meet your expectations.  I do hope you'll give us another opportunity to serve you again.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: It had few advantages I would like to share
Summary: Last summer we went with our young child to Anaheim for a one week vacation and stayed at  Menage Hotel. It had few advantages I would like to share: 1. We enjoyed its central location. 2.Rooms were spacious and our child could sleep with us. 3. Other facilities were of a good standard too. 4. The hotel is nicely designed. We booked the room in Last minute travel web site and we were happy with it.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and your business.  We appreciate you taking time to write about Hotel Menage and we look forward to seeing you again soon.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: Excellent Place to Stay, but not without its faults...
Summary: Don't get me wrong, my fiancée and I were very happy with our stay and I was extremely satisfied with the value for the price, however there were a few things that were bothersome. This trip was an early Christmas gift for my fiancée.  Things that need to be improved upon:  1. Attention to detail:  ---Upon check-in, my credit card could not be attached to account for unknown reasons so we had to use my fiancée's card (keeping in mind it was a gift for her). However, when I called VISA the next day I discovered it was due to the front desk clerk (not sure of her name) entered the expiry date of my card incorrectly twice.  ---My room requests on the reservation were not satisfied as we were assigned a room on the highway.  ---Neither of our first room keys worked.  2. Don't
Manager Response: Your detailed review will be thoroughly examined with our team.  Although your ratings were good, we like to hear the constructive criticism as we try to continually improve.  All of your issues are being addressed as I write this and I assure you we appreciate every detail.  Thank you for your business and your complements on the team.  We look forward to seeing you again soon!  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: Pros: Proximity to Disney, Large LCD TV, Free Wifi, Early check-in Cons:  Poor condition, noise, $10 a day parking  First, let me say that pictures are definitely deceiving.  Our room was in  poor condition. Poorly patched holes, dirty tub, marks on the walls and carpet.  It appears as though the remodel was done as a quick fix.  You can see the poor workmanship on the replacement faucet, the tub spout, etc.  Second, the noise is god awful.  There is music playing around the pool area ALL DAY.  It's extremely loud, to the point it drowns out everything in the room.  It doesn't stop until about 9:30 - 10:00 when the fireworks go off.  The freeway noise is annoying, but the constant music playing is ridiculous.  We called down to the front desk to ask about the volume and they
Manager Response: none

Summary: It starts with the staff... they make you feel at home and they are on top of every request. As soon as you step into the room, you notice how clean and how trendy it is. My girlfriend and I wanted to have a little getaway from some visiting family members... so instead of letting them stay in the hotel, I decided to let them stay at my house so my girlfriend and I can take advantage of some alone time. The hotel is just a couple minutes away from Disneyland. We went to Downtown Disney to do a little shopping and grab a bite to eat. And on a side note... we had dinner at the hotel restaurant called K'ya... very impressive "Street Fare"... the price and the food was excellent!!! If you're visiting Disneyland or need a really cool place to stay in Orange County.... try out Hotel
Manager Response: Your review says it all...  We work hard to ensure each customer has an experience like yours, and we are thankful each time we hear great reviews.
