Thanks for taking the time to write these words.  I hope you'll have many future visits, when you give your house up to relatives, to stay with us at Hotel Menage.  Thank you for your business...  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: Great stay for business or pleasure!
Summary: Very nice hotel in Anaheim within walking distance of Disneyland.  I saw a few people with pets, so it is definitely a pet friendly hotel!  If you have kids, you get one of the best views of the Disneyland fireworks from the pool area and select room locations.  Our room was updated with a comfortable bed and a large flat screen TV.  If you have last minute guests, they have an equally comfortable pull out couch bed as well.  The staff was friendly and their food inside their hotel restaurant was amazing.  I highly recommend the calamari if you're adventurous.  They come in tapas sized portions making it easier to order a variety off of the menu.  The prices are reasonable so you don't break the bank.  I would definitely recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments about Hotel Menage.  As you noted, we do provide something for both business travelers as well as the leisure traveler.  With complimentary wireless and a 24 hour pool, there's definitely something for everyone.  We look forward to seeing you again soon and thank you for your time and your business!  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: The view of the fireworks, alone, is reason enough to stay...but the guest service is better
Summary: My boyfriend and I have had our eye on this hotel for a while, but to avoid parking at Disneyland, we always stayed at the Tropicana Inn (which is located directly across from Disneyland Resort).  Though the Tropicana Inn is nice and conveniently located, the experience we had at Hotel Menage was exceptional.   We stayed in their Deluxe King room which, for the most part, was very spacious.  The bathroom was rather small, but suffice--the shower/tub was a decent size.  The bed  was very comfortable and had a very nice appearance.  The best part about the room was the HD 42" Plasma TV by LG.  We experimented and found that the AV inputs work ;).  There were a couple of fixtures that were slightly loose, but nothing to fret over, in my opinion.    We arrived on a  Friday night,
Manager Response: WOW...  Thank you for taking the time share the details of your visit to Hotel Menage.  Our team will be very happy to hear of all your experiences.  Silvia, Shaun and the rest of the team will be thrilled to know you pointed them out.  We strive to continually provide both value for price paid and exceptional service and I can tell you experienced both.  Thank you for your business and we look forward to seeing you back for a lot of years to come...    Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: My husband, I, daughter, son-in-law. son and 2 grandchildren stayed here for 3 days for a Christmas getaway to Disneyland.  ALL of the staff at the Menage were courteous and helpful and the rooms were clean and beautiful.  We enjoyed the beautiful landscaping (kind of felt like we were back in Hawaii) and the transportation provided for our visit to the Disneyland Resort.  The food and service in the restaruant and lounge we would also have to say was excellent - loved the variety.  Thank you very much for a great vacation!
Manager Response: Your review makes all of the work worth the effort!  Thank you for your kind and generous review.  Our team works diligently to ensure every guest experience is like yours and the team will be proud to read your review.  Thank you for your business and we look forward to seeing you and your family again soon.  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary Heading: piped Christmas music till midnight and in the morning
Summary: This hotel was very noisy and caters to young people.  They played piped loud christmas music till midnight! When you wanted to sleep in, the piped music started playing at 09:00 in the morning all outside!  Service in the restaurant was horrible and takes so long to get food.  The distance is not close and misleading as you must first walk over a freeway bridge which is not fun after a long day at Disneyland.  Many parties in the ballroom going which again brings drunks and smokers up to the room as they talk outside.  This is not a hotel for children but for more urban young people not going to disneyland.  Good price and the room was clean but bathroom showed signs of age.  Hotel right next to a freeway so very noisy and loud on top of everything else.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  I'm sorry that you did not have a good experience at our hotel.  We do cater to families and couples.  The Holiday music starts at 10am and should be off by 10pm, so I'm very sorry if it came on sooner and turned off later, I will make sure to check the timer.  We did have some Holiday parties recently, but I thought we had a good handle on noise as this is the first complaint we have had.  I assure you that we will address your issues with the appropriate staff members.  We do hope you'll give us another opportunity to serve you again.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: I'll start with the good stuff. The place in close to Disneyland, and really easy to get to. The pool bar is really fun and the pool being open for 24 hours is really nice. The fireworks that go off at Disneyland are fun to watch while having a drink. Lot's of reviews complained about noise - maybe because we live in So Cal we're used to the freeway but I didn't think it was bad at all.  It's very modern in design and feel however it looks a bit "cheap" in parts of the hotel. We really enjoyed the food at the restaurant K'ya, ate there both breakfast and dinner. The Thai Curry shrimp are amazing. The service was not steller, and this proved to be a note throughout the hotel (except the bartenders, the bartenders we're fantastic!)  We got there expecting a cheese platter, told it
Manager Response: First and foremost, I'm glad you enjoyed the pool area and bar area.  The noise, as you stated, is really not bad once inside the room.  As far as the service is concerned, I will make sure we follow up with the Food and Beverage Manager.  Lastly both the shuttle service and the parking are run by outside companies.  Like all full service hotels in Anaheim there is a nominal fee for both.  I will make sure that we follow up with the shuttle service to ensure their timeliness. We do hope you'll come visit us again soon.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: Birthday Getaway...with a few bumps along the road...
Summary: We  decided to stay at Hotel Menage due to its convenient location (only being .5 miles from Disneyland) and its good reviews. We decided to book a King Suite because my friend and I felt that the standard rooms looked a little small on the website. We stayed the night of my birthday, which was a monday, and checked in a little after 6 PM.  We decided to leave out luggage before checking out our room, so we headed up after getting our key. The room was such a dissapointment! It looked nothing like the suite on the website, and was small, with no fridge or microwave; certainly not what we expected for paying an extra fee to upgrade. My friend went downstairs and asked the receptionist why our room seemed so small compared to the picture on the website, and after looking into it,
Manager Response: First and foremost I'm sorry that they checked you into the wrong room and then the key not working.  Obviously these bumps shouldn't happen during anyone's hotel visit.  Thank you for understanding.  We look forward to seeing you back at Hotel Menage...  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: Our stay was excellent from the time we arrived to the time we checked out.  Our rooms were very clean and had a cool modern feel to them.  The front desk was very courteous  and knowledgeable. Loved the holiday decorations and music., very festive. Great 24 hour pool/spa.  Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you.  Your review is very much appreciated and we always look forward to the Holiday Season as we can decorate and play some very festive things throughout the hotel...  We look forward to serving you again soon...    Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: The Hotel Menage was a very pleasant surprise
Summary: Hotel Menage has a friendly comfortable atmosphere fron the valet to check out. The resort style hotel with a very spacious pool and spa area with the poolside Palapa Bar, Its and great place to relax and have a drink or watch the nightly fireworks from disneyland. The 24 hr pool area is nicely furnished and comfortable with music playing all day throughout the property. Almost forgot to mention the food....a unique street fare menu has sometime for everybody and the food is fantastic Hotel manager Tiffany and her staff are doing a great job and couldn't be more friendly and helpful. I would and do highly recommend this hot spot and i always look forward to my return
Manager Response: I'm very glad your experience at Hotel Menage exceeded your expectations.  We take pride in our service and I will make sure Tiffany hears your comments.  Our k'ya street fare concept is exactly what you stated, something for everyone at a very reasonable price.  Lastly our 24hour pool area is a hit with families and couples alike.  Thank you for you business and we look forward to seeing you again...  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: clean room, nice swimming pool and jacuzzi! we stayed 2 nights in September 2009. there was a big screen TV set in the room. we enjoyed the Disneyland firework. the restaurant on the 1st floor was having special dinner something called street food festival. there were Mexican, Italian, Japanese, Thai, Korean dishes and more. we enjoyed a lot!!!  only 15mins. distance from Disneyland! we difinitely will stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  Our 42 inch plasma's truly are a hit and our k'ya street fare restaurant is actually a new concept that we launched 4 months ago.  Thank you for your business and especially for taking time out to write a review.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: I really fell in love with this hotel. The lobby service, the bar and outdoor pool/spa really set the scene of the hotel. The rooms were great, very clean and fully modern. The bathroom layout was great for a couple and the room was a decent size.  They provided free wireless internt and a huge HD TV within plenty of chanels.  Great location for disneyland, a five minute walk. Plus you can see the fireworks every night from the hotel blacony which is quite nice. The front desk organised a shuttle for us to Knotts Berry farm which was about a 10 minute drive.  Highly recommended, especially for 20-something couples wanting to have a romantic visit to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments.  We have something for everyone and I'm very glad you, as a couple enjoyed our hotel.  Our team works hard to ensure every guest experience is top notch, and your experience makes the time we took to train the team that much better.  Thank you for your business and we look forward to seeing you again soon.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: just got back from a two night stay to celebrate my girlfriends birthday & visit Disney & were very impressed with the Hotel Menage. from the complimentary bottle of Champagne left in the room when we arrove to the guy making sandwiches at midnight everything was perfect & everyone went out of their way to make sure we were being helped or needed anything.
Manager Response: Thank you for writing a review about Hotel Menage.  We appreciate the feedback and we're glad you enjoyed your visit to the area and wish your girlfriend a happy birthday!  Thank you for your comments about the team, I will make sure they hear your kind words.  Lastly but most importantly thank you for your business and we look forward to seeing you again soon...  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: I was meeting up with family for a LA/Disneyland wkd and felt that Hotel Menage met my price point.  It was only a 15 minute walk to get to the park.  I liked the contemporary feel and spaciousness of my room.  The bed was great and the large LG TV was a plus.  Would have been nice to have a room safe and a mini fridge.  I was surprised and disappointed by the $10/day parking fee, but it sounds like this is the norm for Disneyland properties.    There is freeway noise and the pool music does not stop until after the fireworks.  I didn't have a problem with either of those.  But my room was directly above the lobby.  My first two nights (Wed and Thurs)  were fine but on Friday there was a piano player in the bar/lobby and I could hear him in my room.  I had to turn on the room
Manager Response: I'm sorry to hear of your experience during your visit.  Our piano player does play every Friday and Saturday night in the lobby, however this is the first time I've heard of the sound going to the rooms.  I will have our engineers look into the insulation above the lobby level.  We like to cater to all generations as we like to create a good comfortable environment for all ages so again, I'm sorry you felt like you did...  I do hope you'll give us another opportunity to serve you in the near future.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: Had a great stay and enjoyed the setting and location. I would try to stay on the street side as opposed to the highway and pool area. Food was amazing and the price is excellent. When I take the family to Disneyland I will stay there. Customer service was great as well, clean rooms and the TV's were great!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and your great rating.  We appreciate every comment and our team will be happy to know you enjoyed their services...  Please come visit us again soon and thank you most importantly for your business...  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: The overall feel of this property is great. You can certainly tell this property was an enhanced remodel, as through bits and pieces of the property you can see the age, however it's modern appeal worked well. Staff interaction was few and far between, when I interacted with them they were - bland. Cool Reggae music playing in the bar.
Manager Response: Being in the Anaheim area, it's important to us to create value for price paid and we have succeeded with your visit to Hotel Menage.  Thank you for your business and we hope you will visit us again soon.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: I was suppose to do this a long time ago right after i left from a wonderful stay but i get very busy. When I first walked in I was instantly amazed at the layout. Very sleekish with a side order of elegance. The staff at the front desk and throughout the building were very kind and helpful. Very happy and up beat like employees at Disneyland.  The on sight restaurant      was incredible! The menu consist of food from all over the world. I chose maybe 6 different dishes because the price was very low but tasted as if they should have been charging double. The room was very comfortable and skeekish. Beautiful room with a big flat screen. I highly recommend you stay there if you are in anaheim for the weekend. OH YEAH! The swimming pool is 24 hours!! Las Vegas do not even have
Manager Response: Thank you for all your kind words.  Our team strives to give great customer service and I'm very glad you experienced this during your stay.  Our value for price paid definitely works in our restaurant.  We offer items from a street fare menu from $2 to $10 per item, something for everyone...  I will make sure our team here's your compliments and thank you for your business to Hotel Menage.  We look forward to seeing you again soon...  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: We stayed at the Menage for 3 nights. The location was great - took 7 minutes to walk to Disney. If we were to go back we would request a room on the inside overloooking the pool (the pool was fantastic). Our room was on the outside and looked like it was being renovated - the carpet didnt cover the whole floor and there was an interesting "Pipe Sculpture" on the ceiling. The restaurant was pretty good and it had  laundry facilities.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  Our renovations are complete and it seems you took a Loft Style room...  These rooms are different then your average hotel room.  The exposed pipes and concrete floors with an area rug are the New York style lofts you find in the east coast and only our first floor is completed in this manner.  The rest of the rooms are quite different.  I don't know if cheap is the word for our hotel, we do like to create value and with the competition in the area we continually like to keep in line with other hotels.  We hope to see you again at Hotel Menage again soon.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: Stayed for one week. Room was excellent and clean. Valet service was just incredible, the guys used to clean my car from the inside every night! Room service was superb, I had breakfast and dinner both show up in 15 minutes. The value was great too. They have a nice pool and really awesome outside bar as well that's open late.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words.  I will make sure the valet team and the food and beverage team hears of your great experiences...  We thank you for spending one fourth of your month at our hotel and we hope you will do it again soon...  Thank you for your business and please let us serve you again soon...  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: Pool was just what we were searching for
Summary: We stayed when this was still the Holiday Inn Anaheim.  The pool was the big draw.  It needed a little work, but was still fabulous.  Just what we were looking for - secluded, palm trees, felt Californian, and the first night we got there we did not have passes for Disney Land, but watched the Fireworks from the pool - boy, did that build the excitement!!  An easy trolley ride to the park.  Nice flora.  Will stay there again whenever we can get back.  Price was reasonable.
Manager Response: Thank you for coming back after our renovations, we have spent a lot of time and money on our property, but most of all we spent our efforts ensuring that our team continually treats our customers the best in the area...  Thank you for your comments and we look forward to seeing you back again soon...  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: I took my husband here near the end of May for his birthday.  We are from Wisconsin and had never stayed in Anaheim before, but wanted to be close to Disney.  Check in was great, the nice woman at the front desk asked us about our trip and why we were visiting, and upgraded us to a beautiful room because it was a special occasion.  Our room was beautifully upgraded, very large open concept "living room" area and bedroom with a large screen tv and huge bathroom.  We really were surprised how nice it turned out to be, since you would never guess from the outside.  Only drawback we had was that since you are very close to Disney, the fireworks each night are loud.  However, this would be the same at any hotel that close to Disney.  We did notice a little bit of traffic noise as
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and most importantly thank you for your business...  We know you have a lot of choices in the area when visiting from Wisconsin, and your choice to stay with us is much appreciated.  The fireworks are loud, but as you mentioned the view is quite spectacular from our pool deck.  I will make sure that our front office staff knows of your great experience and they will be pleased to hear of your encounters...  Thank you again for your great review,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel stay with my children
Summary: I had made reservations at this hotel because it was one of a few listed on the eco-friendly websites. After reading reviews on various sites I was at the least hesitant and wanted to switch to another hotel it was too late to cancel w/o losing my first nights lodging. Now I am glad I didn't cancel. From the minute we drove up until we left we were impressed with this hotel and the staff. I did like the fact they have a no smoking policy in the rooms. You have to sign a form stating that if you smoke in the room  you will pay a $200 fine, I wish more hotels did this. I hate when I go into a room and it smells of cigarette smoke. One of the things the hotel could work on is having the ice machines where we could find them (never did find one).  The hotel's location is not right
Manager Response: We are very grateful that you did not cancel your reservation, and thank you for your detailed review.  We appreciate you taking the time to detail your experience about our hotel.  I would agree with everything that you mentioned, especially our staff.  The team is dedicated to ensuring each and every guest receive the high quality service that you did...  Our 42" plasma's, 24 hour pool, complimentary fitness center, and complimentary wireless all add value to everyone's stay...  We do like having clean minded guests as yourself as it continually gives us the opportunity to improve with any issues, and again, I'm very glad we passed your test.  As far as the noise is concerned, you are absolutely correct when you mention that the freeway noise does get drained out with the AC or your own fan on, but once the door is closed it the noise does go away.  Again, thank you for your time and your business, we look forward to seeing you back again soon...  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: The room was large and the beds comfortable. Disneyland is within walking distance, although it is a little bit of a trek. There are shuttle services available but for the price we didn't mind walking. There is a nice restaurant that serves tapas size meals from around the world. The only fault I had with the hotel was poor water pressure in the bathroom.
Manager Response: I'm glad you had a great experience at Hotel Menage!  Thank you for your review and your business...  We checked on the water pressure and I don't know what was occurring during your stay, however everything does seem to be working correctly.  We look forward to seeing you again soon...  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: Traveled here in both April and August to go to Disneyland.  Great pool, comfortable rooms (even the fold-out sofa was decent), perfect location (10 minute walk to Disney).  Never got a chance to try the hotel bar but it looked very swanky.  Great place to stay for Disney - walked back and took a nap on 2 days.  Can even see the fireworks at night!
Manager Response: Your comments are right on...  Thank you for your words and keep spreading the word about Hotel Menage.  Thank you for your continued repeat business and we look forward to seeing you again soon!  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: I booked this hotel even after reading negative reviews about it. And I'm glad I did. Its hard to please me...and these folks did just fine.  THE BEDS( And Rooms)- very firm. clean. comfy pillows. Smaller than we are used to. Its seems as though a queen is a double where I come from. Just to be safe, request a king room woth a pull out bed. The bed frames are pretty fancy and look really pretty. But watch out for your shins and toes, my husband was rolling around on the ground spitting out profanities a few times during our stay. The rooms we stayed in were large.  THE TV- great selection of channels. 42 inch plasma... Who can complain?  THE POOL AND HOT TUB- a little chilly... but whenever we got in, the polite maintanence man would come around and crank the heat for us. Also
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write such a detailed report.  We appreciate your tag line and agree, don't believe everything you read.  We do have our challenges, and the noise from the freeway is there, however as you mentioned with the door close it's really quite nice.  We took a lot of care to ensure that the needs of our customers were met, a good sleep, a good tv, a good pool, a good restaurant, value for price paid, and most importantly great service.  Thank you for all your words and keep spreading the word.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: First, this is not a hotel. It is a motel with a lot of street noise.  They advertise that they offer complimentary wifi internet.  The internet did not work in the room we were assigned. We could only pick up the connection for the sales office.  No ever offer to move our room or tried to get the problem solved outside of reseting the router once.  When I told them I wanted make other arrangements the told me that they would "take Care"  of me. When I left the hotel the follow day I was told that I needed to email hotels.com and they would authorize the refund.  Since I could not email them from the Menage I waited till I got to the next location and took care of it.  The Menage charged me for the hotel room and for $10 a night for parking for the nights that I did not stay and
Manager Response: I'm very sorry about your experience.  I don't know exactly what happened with the internet service in your room, but we have double checked and all systems look in order.  I know that some computers have issues connecting and could be a hardware issue.  As far as your refund is concerned, the booking channel that you booked your room through has to refund your money and unfortunately we cannot approve the refund for your room and tax.  Lastly, as far as parking is concerned, as with all full service hotels in the Anaheim area we offer both valet and self parking at the lowest fee in town.  We do hope you'll give us an opportunity to fix the issues...  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: The Hotel Menage is not what it seems, first of all the pictures on their website are not at all what you get when you actually arrive. It reallly is just a souped up Motel 6. What really bothered me about the hotel was their staff, in particular Tiffany. I have never been made to feel so insignificant in my life. We had a miscommunication with another employee and when asked to speak to a manager we got Tiffany.  I literally was shaking with anger after our encounter, would have defianltey left if not for the small children and baby along with us. Bathrooms are nasty, found someones flip flop under our bed. The only cool thing is the plasma tvs. The two days we were there we only saw the shuttle once that goes to Disneyland, by the way, its a good 15-20 minute walk to
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Couldn't have asked for a better hotel for the price
Summary: This hotel was the cheapest package and we were pleasently surprised by the reviews so we decided to book it.  We had a great time.  The rooms were clean, the staff was friendly, and the food was good.  Here are a few things that were not perfect and did not impact our stay but things that people may want to know  1. It is a little further from the park than most hotels but just for a little more you can get tickets for the ART shuttle and it picks you up right in front of the hotel and takes you directly to the park.  2. The coffee maker SUCKED!  I tried to make coffee the first day and it spilled everywhere.  We just went across the street to the Starbucks because we figured it was better coffee any way.  3. The walls are VERY thin.  We had 2 middle aged women (from a tour
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to be specific regarding your stay at Hotel Menage.  I assure you we take feedback seriously and will follow up with the team to make sure we get a 5 rating next time you visit us.  We do offer a great value for price paid and it seems you got a great rate during your stay.  We will make sure to review each of your points with our team and make address them as necessary.  The most concerning issue that I will address is your comment regarding the wait staff in the restaurant.  I assure you that we will follow up with our team and make sure that this is resolved immediately.  Again thank you for your review and we look forward to seeing you at Hotel Menage again soon.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: Great hotel but a bit removed from everything
Summary: We spent a week at the Menage, and loved it. The restaurant had interesting food concepts, and the wait staff were fantastic, as were all other staff members that we dealt with. They were friendly, helpful, courteous and responded instantly to any request. When we had a problem with our plumbing it was rectified immediately. The room was very comforrable and well-appointed, and the beds were sooooo comfortable. The location let us down a little - close to Disnetland, but we found it difficult to find our way around to other places (we tried the local bus service but it didn't quite meet our expectations) so we relied on taxis a lot. They have great facilities - pool, outdoor bar and garden, indoor bar, internet access (computers need upgrading though).
Manager Response: Thank you for your review on our hotel.  Our staff will be pleased to hear of your experience.  The small plates street fare at k'ya restaurant is definitely different than most hotel food concepts.  We focus on value and variety and as you noticed, you can go there 7 days a week and have something different everyday from $2 to $10, we are very glad you enjoyed the variety and service of our staff.  Lastly thank you for your business and we look forward to seeing you again soon...  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: My friends and I stayed here for just over a week earlier this month, and the hotel is amazing! Firstly, the staff are incredible - absolutely everyone - the valets, the front desk staff, the concierges, the dining staff in the restaurant, the bar tenders, the cleaners - EVERYONE was excessively helpful and friendly. They went above and beyond to make sure you had everything you needed and a relaxing and fantastic stay with them. Thank you to everyone who worked there, we ate breakfast there every day and dinner there most nights because it was so good. Dan at the front desk was amazing, as were all the restaurant staff, the valets and the front desk staff! Thank you to everyone who works there for all the hard work you do! Secondly, the hotel is beautiful! The lobby and
Manager Response: Thank you very much for all that you posted!  It is our wish that everyone that stays at Hotel Menage feels exactly like you.  We work extremely hard to ensure every team member, as you say, from valet to housekeeping is in touch with all our customers needs.  Thank you for you business and we look forward to seeing you again soon.  Please tell all your friends and family as well...  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: I WISH I COULD HAVE STAYED LONGER
Summary: We really enjoyed staying here. The service was excellent. The rooms are very clean. It is definitely worth staying in the suites. The fireworks show from Disney is spectacular from the pool. We had breakfast and dinner there, which was very good and not expensive at all. I know we will stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your compliments, and yes the suites in the hotel are great.  We are very happy that you enjoyed the food and beverage at the hotel as well...  Thank you again for your business and we look forward to seeing you again soon!  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: Overall nice hotel with everything needed on location.  Bar staff was realy cool and they have a live piano player on Fri and Sat  nights.  Good value and would stay here again....
Manager Response: Another comment about Jenny at the bar, thank you!  Obviously she's doing it right...  Thank you for your comments about our piano player as well, Ian plays every Friday and Saturday night...  We look forward to seeing you again soon...  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: Wonderful staff at the Hotel Menage--especially our server Jenny.  Made for a wonderful evening and very pleasant experience.  Thaks!
Manager Response: Thank you for your compliment about Jenny at our bar, I'll make sure she hears your words...  Most importantly thank you for your business and we look forward to seeing you again at Hotel Menage!  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: We stayed here on a bit of a chance. We have been to Anaheim a number of times and have stayed at the Howard Johnson and been very pleased, however, due to an overbooking issue we were asked to move to a different resort and we were given a range of choices. After consulting the almightly Trip Advisor we ended up choosing to stay at the Menage. We arrived exhausted after a long flight and upon check in we were offered 2 rooms. The first would have a pool view and be slightly noisy and the other had not a great view but further in towards the middle of the building and so not so noisy. Hubby said we will give the pool view a go and we  headed to the room. Well it was the very last room on the row and just about hung over the freeway. It was so noisy outside the room we could
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out to write a review about Hotel Menage.  We are close to the freeway and Disneyland giving us the great view of the fireworks.  I'm glad our team was able to accommodate you and when you are in the room the noise from outside does go away.  We pride ourselves on value for price paid an I'm glad all your meals were in our k'ya restaurant...  Thank you again for your review and most importantly your business and we look forward to seeing you again in Anaheim soon...  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary Heading: Upscale hotel in family resort area
Summary: A change from the normal family resort area hotels.  This hotel is trendy and upscale in the Disneyland Area.  It is an easy walk to the front gates of Disneyland.  The staff is friendly and the hotels lobby is very hip.  The pool is open 24 hours which is a nice change from the normal pool hours.  The rooms were nicely decorated with trendy, modern attire.  There are large flat screen televisions in each room.  The bathroom could have been more updated but everything was clean and well maintained.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Luxury in Mirror May Be -Farther- Than It Appears
Summary: PROS:  The room is clean, the TV is flat, the linens feel expensive, the furniture and art look chic... Ive stayed at this hotel twice now, once alone, and once with a group of friends.   When I was with the friends-- We had a fantastic time down at the pool in the wee hours of the morning, it never closes! (fear not...there is a security guard on hand to make sure the group doesnt get loud or rowdy, we didnt!) The bar and restuarant downstairs are quite exceptional and the lounge area feels hip and comfortable....  The room was large, all 8 of us were able to comfortably share the sleeping quarters, 2 to a bed, 1 on the chair, and 3 on the floor... (maybe it wasnt so comfortable on the floor, but they had plenty of room to stretch out!) The price for that stay was only 79
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a detailed report.  As far as the pro's are concerned, we agree that the rooms are spacious, the food and beverage operations of the hotel are exceptional and the 24 hour pool is a great feature.  As far as the shuttle service is concerned, the city of Anaheim runs the clean air shuttle and we will address the issue with them directly.  Lastly, all of our bartenders should have complete knowledge of how to make a Mai Tai, and I will follow up with our food and beverage team to ensure that they all have this knowledge...  Repeat customers are crucial to our business and we thank you for your loyalty to our hotel.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: This was an acceptional hotel stay experience.
Summary: From the minute I arrived at this hotel me and my daughters were treated better than I have ever been treated at any hotel I have stayed at in the world. Every single employee of this hotel went out of their way to make sure we were all three happy. That is, me and my two kids who are 5 and 7. We went because my five year old had a birthday and wanted to go to Disneyland. I was nervous going alone with two young children, but everyone was so nice here that it made it easy! The rooms were clean and decent decor. The tub/shower wasn't great, but acceptable. the pool was pretty cold. It was loud at night when the fireworks went off, but the kids managed to sleep through it. Believe me, the outstanding customer service of this hotel far outweighed any other issues. I would recommend
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words.  Our staff works very diligently, as you experienced, to ensure every guest has a pleasant stay.  I'm sure both Linda and Sylvia will be happy to hear their names mentioned in the review, thank you for taking the time to notice them.  We look forward to seeing you again soon and please tell all your friends...  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary Heading: Trendy and convenient, yet still had a bit of a motel feel
Summary: Conveniently located within a mile of Disneyland.  Great pool and pool bar with a nice happy hour.  The furnishings were new and trendy but the place still has a motel feel.  The rooms are small and the fixtures and walls need some upgrading.  Overall, a good spot for the location and price.
Manager Response: We are sorry you felt that it was a bit of a motel feel, however we do pride ourselves on our service and value for price paid...  We do hope you'll continue to visit us if you are in the Anaheim area...  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: I absolutely loved staying here. It was so nice with a great pool (open 24 hours which I lovedd) and tiki bar. The restaurant Kya is also delcious. The room is very modern looking with huge flatscreens and leather headboards - just loved the place. If I'm ever in the area again I will definately be staying there. The highway can be a little loud, but not noticeably in the room at night. Great place to lay out with friends by the palms :D
Manager Response: Thank you for your great words...  We do provide a value fo all our customers and want everyone to have an exceptional experience like yours.  Thank you for your continued business and we look forward to seeing you again soon at Hotel Menage...  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: Keep expectations mediocre and you'll have a pleasant stay.
Summary: I recommend this hotel mostly to young couples, a girlfriends trip or "single" travellers. Keep expectations mediocre and you'll have a pleasant stay. The value for a standard room is questionable since it's basically just a motel room with a plasma TV on the wall. The superior suites are much nicer, however, it's tough to justify the price when the rest of the hotel (read: motel) isn't equivalent in quality.   Pros: -Restaurant has a fun 'world street food' menu with good prices -An amazing view of Disney's fireworks can be watched from the pool each night -10 minute walk to Disneyland -Happy hour btwn 4-7pm for 1/2 price drinks & appys! -Pool/hot tub open 24 hrs -Outdoor bar a nice touch  Cons: -Interstate 5 hiway practically runs through the hotel -Maintenance does not seem
Manager Response: I am sorry that you felt it was a motel with a plasma.  We did spend quite a bit of money to renovate the hotel and give everyone a pleasant experience while staying at the hotel.  Your pro's are on the money, but we do work hard to create value for price paid.  I do hope you will give us another opportunity to enjoy our hotel.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: We came to Hotel Menage for a short trip to Disneyland and to go to Hunnington Beach. The staff was AMAZING! They were so nice and welcoming to us. They let us check in early, even found two rooms next to each other so our entire party was all together. She gave us room options and let us pick which ones we wanted. She let us know one option was by the freeway and that it might be a little noisy. But, we didnt hear a thing any of the nights we were there. The valet parking employees were our favorite. So polite and on the ball. The front desk took the time to print out directions all over the city for us. We walked to Disneyland every day. Its not a bad walk, probably harder with little ones. The pool is 24 hours!! But everyone was very polite when it came to noise control. Not
Manager Response: Our team will be very happy that you had a great experience...  They work very hard to ensure every guest has a exceptional visit.  As you mentioned the 24 hour pool and the freeway are not as bad once in the room, and the fireworks from Disneyland are priceless from the pool.  Thank you for your business and we look forward to seeing you again soon!  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: Island feel resort in the middle of the madness!!!
Summary: We booked this hotel after reading the great reviews on trip advisor and were not disappointed.  For the price this is a great value hotel with a very friendly feel to it. The pool is fantastic and the restaurant was relaxed with very cheap yummy meals. The only downer on this hotel which can't be fixed is the noise from the freeway but once in the rooms it isn't too bad. They play loud music by the pool to try and drown it out so although the resort has a great holiday feel, you are always reminded where you are...smack bang in the middle of freeways. Nice short walk to Disneyland and the rooms are clean and comfortable. I am a travel agent and although none of our wholesalers offer this hotel I would still highly recommend this hotel to my clients.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments about Hotel Menage.  We do offer value for price paid in all areas of the hotel and we are grateful that as a travel agent you can see the benefits of stay at Hotel Menage.  We do participate with a lot of wholesalers so we look forward to any business you can send our way.  Thank you again for your comments, but mostly thank you for your business.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: My family and I stopped over Disneyland after our Mexican cruise.We didn't stay at Hotel Menage but stopped by to ask for directions to the nearby church.There were 2 young men outside the hotel and they worked there  helped us get a cab to take us to the church and invited us to stay in the shade and called us when the cab arrived.There were so helpful and nice and we were not even guests of their hotel.Too bad that I didn't get their names.Would have liked to write to the hotel manager to let them know of these 2 employees and their outstanding service to non hotel guests.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words.  My only question is if the service was so good are we truly only a 2 rating?  We do hope you will stay with us next time you are in the area...  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: I love this place so much that I need to point out a few things.
Summary: HOTEL MENAGE  NOTE: I have been too busy to post this review until now, but I was there at the end of June. It's possible that this stuff has been fixed. If so, then book a rooom at Menage at once because it's spectacular. Don't even wait for a vacation; just go there right now and taste the wonderfulness.  If not, well...  So beautiful; I really want it to work. Sitting by the pool watching the Disneyland fireworks, then picking up a beverage at the tiki bar... magic. But they've got to get it together and remember that they're trying to be a boutique hotel. I'm actually returning for my next vacation, because I do love this place, but it's doomed if it doesn't fix the rough spots. And I want to be able to count on getting drinks from Andy the Bartender for many, many vacations
Manager Response: Thank you for your constructive criticism.  Let me address the issues that occurred.  Our coffee in k'ya is Seattle's best and I'm concerned if it's not coming out correctly.  I will have our food and beverage manager review the brewing process.  As far as the coffee in the rooms we will immediately look at other options.  Secondly, I will directly address the mug issues that occurred with our housekeeping staff.  Our valet/bellmen should have assisted with all your arrival and departure needs, and I apologize for them not assisting you.  The tv's should all work and our engineering department will be inspecting every room, in addition, our housekeeping staff turns on the tv's prior to finishing their duties.  The front desk staff should have written down the wireless password, so there was a lack of completion during your check in process.  We have already resolved the 11pm closer of the bar and trust me that will never happen again.  One of two bars will be open until the posted time.  As far as the shuttle service is concerned, it is run by the city of Anaheim and I will directly address your concerns to them immediately.  Again thank you for your comments and we look forward to seeing you back soon...    Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: Just returned from 5 days with our 5 year old daughter and we can't say enough great things about this hotel.  From the moment we walked in we were treated fantastic until the moment we left.  The staff is just amazing.  There is a certain energy that is felt when you walk through this hotel to get to your room, the staff have done an amazing job at making you feel like you are a million miles away.  The music, the lighting, the friendly staff....it was just a wonderful experience.  If you are thinking of travelling to Disneyland this hotel is a short walk (10 min) or a short cab ride ($7) to the park.  We walked the first two days then cabbed it the rest as it was cheaper for us to take two cabs a day rather than the shuttle which would have cost us around $25 a day.  For us
Manager Response: Thank you!  Our team will be delighted to hear of your great experience.  Our 24 hour pool and the view of the fireworks are the best in Anaheim and we continually strive to ensure 100% satisfaction from all our guests.  Thank you for your wonderful review but most importantly thank you for your business.  We look forward to seeing you many more years at Hotel Menage, and please tell your friends and family about our hotel...  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: Some Reviews On This Hotel Are Not Positive But Let Me Tell You This Hotel Is Amazing... Awesome Location About A 5-10 Minute Walk To Disneyland. Close To Lots Of Resturant. Very Nice Rooms, and People At The Front  Desk Were Very Helpful. Overall It Is An Awesome Hotel And If Your Traveling To Anaheim I Would Recommend This Hotel.
Manager Response: Our team and I thank you for your positive comments!  We do have a great location and although we cannot please everyone, we are glad we can please the majority of our customers...  Thank you for your business and we look forward to seeing you again the next time your travels bring you to the Anaheim area...  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: Outstanding experience-exceptional staff, service and value.
Summary: We have stayed here many times.  Outstanding service here!  Great location, fantastic food, unbelievable happy hour, 24 hour pool, the best place to watch the fireworks besides Disneyland, great atmosphere and a reasonable walk to the park (or you can take the shuttle).  The only complaint I would have is that the bathrooms are small.  Elizabeth and staff are doing a superb job......truly!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words!  Most importantly thank you for your business and we look forward to seeing you soon...  Keep these reviews coming!!!!  Thank you,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: Lovely hotel, 5 mins to disney to enjoy all the craziness of the theme park but then provides a peaceful & relaxed environment to wind down & chill.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments regarding Hotel Menage...  I'm glad you enjoyed our environment during your visit to the happiest place on earth, we look forward to seeing you again soon...  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for a total of three days. The location was quite close to Disneyland. Shuttle to Disney...$4.00/day per adult....$2.00/child. Not too bad...came around every 30-45 min. The hotel is right off the 5 freeway. Very noisy...First night did not notice the noise... too tired from a whole day at Disney...next two nights.... Noise level not as tolerable.  Small eatery Kya at hotel had a cool concept offering tapas...the salmon was terrific. The day of check out noticed my husband's toiletry bag missing. Brought the issue up with front desk, then management, they simply offered to help us fill out a police report. They "investigated" the issue  by asking the cleaning crew if they had seen it or misplaced it. Their answer, "No". Of course!! The front desk
Manager Response: I'm sorry about your experience at the hotel.  I know that our Management staff has tried to find your missing articles to no avail.  Our key lock audit also did not find anything out of the ordinary.  Lastly it is my understanding that they tried to get in touch with you.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: It was love at first sight.  We were blown away.  The decor and ambiance was amazing. Everything is very modern, from the lounge section to the restaurant to the poolside.   The rooms are beautiful. The staff was pleasant to work with and the on-site restaurant  was fabulous.  The bar and the happy hour food was excellent with a great price tag.  We had happy hour at the bar and also breakfast the next morning. I love that the pool is 24 hours.  There was nothing that we didnt love at this hotel.  We would definitely stay again!
Manager Response: Thank you for all your kind words...  I would have to agree that our decor is quite nice and I thank you for your compliments.  Our team is dedicated to ensuring that every guest is 100% satisfied and I'm very glad you experienced this...  Thank you for taking the time to write and most importantly thank you for your business.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: Good Idea...Bad Location and Cheap Décor! :(
Summary: I wanted to try something new.. It looked cool on the website. I used to be a Travel Agent for AAA and I have stayed at lots of hotels over the years. This hotel or should I say motel trying to be a hotel, was not good. The rooms seemed like motel rooms. They all face the street or freeway and are loud even with the window and door shut and loud a/c unit on. The rooms are poorly remodeled. It looked like someone went to Motel 6 and put a plasma TV on the wall and some fancy head board up. It looked very cheap. It smelled like a cheap motel room. The TV did not get ESPN which is a no no at the start of a football season for a man. The pool was ok except, they tried to make it "LOOK" fancy with wicker pool chairs and more than half of the chairs were broken. The pool also is right
Manager Response: I'm sorry you felt we did not meet your expectations.  We did spend a lot of money on our renovations and it seems it did not meet your level of quality.  As we all realize that decor and tastes are all subjective, I am truly sorry you did not give us an opportunity.  Once in the rooms the noise dissipates and our plasma tv's all have ESPN so I'm not sure what happened to the channel in your room, but we will look into this matter.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: Could not get a better hotel for the price, very now, nice to have a choice instead of family themed hotels in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comment...  Yes we do provide value for price paid, thank you for your business and we look forward to seeing you again soon...  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: I stayed at the Hotel Menage for the second time (first time was in September 2008) for 6 nights, September 3rd-10th. I stayed with my husband and then we had family meet us for the long weekend. We stayed in Las Vegas on the way there and on the way back and Hotel Menage was definitely on par with our Vegas hotel, I actually liked the Menage more.   Check in: There was a mixup between communication that I had with the Office Manager and the person who checked us in. I had emails to back up what I had been told but he wouldn't budge. It wasn't a huge deal because it was fixed, it was more of an inconvenience.   Room: We received a pool view room on the 2nd floor (same as last stay) without requesting that particular room so I was happy about that. The room was very clean upon
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had 2 rooms when we stayed, our family and another. Upon arrival the air in our room was broken and took 1 1/2 hours to fix, not any fun after a long drive in the summer and just wanted to relax, lucky for us we were able to relax and cool off in our friends room other wise I would have not been happy at all.  The desk chair was missing so I called and they did bring us one about 15 min later. The remote was broken (turns out it just needed new batteries) so they fixed that. Our friends remote was missing so they had to bring them one, the hair dryer was missing as well in our room so I use our friends in their room. I guess if you combined the 2 rooms we had what we needed...lol I also understand that no hotel is perfect and these things happen. I think the worse for me was
Manager Response: My sincere apologies for your experiences...  A chair and remote control should always be in the room, I'm shocked that this occurred during your visit...  I will personally address these issues with our team and ensure that your experience will NOT be repeated.  I don't know what happened with the AC unit, but again will follow up with our team...  The loud bang is a direct result from the great view of the fireworks and the front desk should have let you know upon checking in...  I do hope you enjoyed the view.  I do hope you'll give us another opportunity to serve you in the future...  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: My boyfriend and I stayed at Hotel Menage just last weekend for what was my very first Disneyland vacation, although I have lived in Los Angeles for 5 years. We were not just satisfied with the hotel, but thrilled! We thoroughly enjoyed the ambience of the lobby and specifically the piano player on Friday. The pool and surrounding area was so nice, including the tiki bar. The service from the moment we walked in at the front counter, to the restaurant, to the requests called down to the front desk was all fantastic. We'd like to especially pass on our compliments to the Chef and Restaurant. What a fabulous idea with their new menu! We tried about fifteen different options over the weekend and loved them all. I rarely write reviews like this. We will tell everyone about this
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words...  I know our piano entertainment and our Chef will be thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us.  The staycation from LA to the OC really does relieve tension and stress and I'm very glad you had an opportunity to enjoy our pool, tiki bar, and the food at k'ya street fare.  The new concept is so that everyone can enjoy a variety of food from around the globe and it seems to be a hit.  Thank you for your review, thank you for your business and thank you in advance for some repeat visits to Hotel Menage...  We look forward to seeing you soon...  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: We arrived late at on a Sunday night and were given a room at the back of the hotel, the night manager said that they were quieter but we could request a room change in the morning (as other guests were leaving).   We were not happy with the room, and it had a lot of freeway noise, and requested a new room the next morning. The front desk staff said that they would arrange it and would move our bags to the new room so we didn't have to waste our day waiting around. And the room that we were given was on the same floor, but overlooking the pool. The freeway not that much further away, but in the room there was almost no freeway noise.  To be honest, the hotel is not fancy, the renovation job is not the best, but the staff were really friendly and helpful. The front desk staff,
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments.  The majority of our rooms are really not loud, the visual of the freeway is, at times, worse then the noise itself...  I'm glad Dan was helpful during your visit...  He is perfect for the job and I know that he keeps on top of every guest to ensure 100% satisfaction.  We are not a 5 diamond hotel, we are a great 3.5 to 4 star hotel that offers great value and great service, so I am very excited to hear of your experience...  Thank you for your business and we look forward to seeing you again soon at Hotel Menage.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: Andrew and Elizabeth provided exceptional service to my friends and I and we look forward to returning soon!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  I know both Andrew and Elizabeth will be grateful for your kind words...  We look forward to seeing you again soon!  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary Heading: This was the worst place I have ever stayed in
Summary: What a joke this "hotel" was.  I had better accomodations at Best Western!.  There was no referigerator or microwave.  It took 4 phone calls and 2 days to FINALLY get a refer.  The day before we left, they delivered another one to our room!??  The pillow case on one bed was so ragged, I was saving it to show the manager, but the housekeeper found it where I had it set aside, and took it.  The bathroom looked like it was all patched up..pretty tacky.  Not enough towels, as we had a party of 5.   The freeway was very noisey as well as the pool area outside our room.  Our card "wore out" after the 2nd day and we couldn't get in.  No one apologized for the inconvenience that was caused  to us. I will not ever stay here again.  We were all very disappointed as we thought by paying
Manager Response: I am very sorry about your experiences at the hotel.  We definitely do not want to be considered a motel and I am very sorry you did not receive a refrigerator upon check in.  Our microwaves and refrigerators are all done upon availability and during high occupancy times all of them are reserved.  Again I do hope you will give us another opportunity to serve you and your family in the future.  Regards,  Hotel Menage

Summary: I've been reading other reviews on here for several days, many of which indicate Hotel Menage does not live up to the hype, the rooms are small, etc.  So I'd like to share my thoughts as well.  I am staying here (until Saturday) and am already quite impressed with the place.  I was lucky to be upgraded to a suite (full disclosure: I'm in the media and was granted a comp stay, but that's not swaying my review). It's room 323, the Euro Suite, and I can already tell you that upgrading to a suite is the way to go here. It's formerly two rooms combined into one, with the bathroom expanded, a seating area and bar added, and two LCD or plasma TVs (somewhere between 42-47 inches, I think) hung on one wall, each facing a different half of the room.  I thought this was fantastic.  For a
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great hotel with the best view of Disney fireworks
Summary: We have just returned home to the UK after a 17 night stay at the hotel. When we arrived we found this modern hotel to be fantastic.The rooms are as good as any 5 star hotels we have stayed in over the years and the flat screen TV just seems to make it that bit better (rather than an old square tv).The pool area is great and sunny all day round and the tiki bar was great for relaxing.Special mention to Jenny and Frank,thay make the bar feel extra inviting.The first night we arrived we went straight to bed at around 8pm due to the long travel from the UK.....be warned,when thay mention the fireworks are close....they mean close.The bangs from the fireworks exploding rattle your teeth.The view is even better than in the parks,as your so close to them.In the parks the fireworks are
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments about Hotel Menage.  I agree that the rooms are as good as any 5 diamond hotel and I agree that the 42" plasma has added that special touch to the the experience.  I'm so glad that you had a chance to experience our new and improved menu with really an unlimited variety of foods from different areas of the world.  We wanted to allow our guests to experience this from $2 to $10 providing value to every customer.  The new concept is considered street fare, and a great way for a family to share in this experience.  The pool is open 24-hours and for the most part we rarely get any complaints on noise and if our front desk knows about any loud noise we immediately make sure that they leave the area and or quiet down the noise, I am sorry that they did not nip this in the bud.  I am also very happy to hear that your stay in general was great and we do look forward to seeing you again soon, hopefully for 17 nights...  Thank you for your business...  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: Great hotel and service, but too close to the freeway.
Summary: Hotel Menage was a fab hotel with a great pool area and outdoor bar. The bartenders Jenny, Pablo and Frank took great care of us. Yummy drinks for the adults and slushies for the kids.The menus had alot to choose from and the food was great.  The hotel had a safe computer area for the teenagers that is visible from the pool area. The hotel rooms were a nice size and well decorated. We will definately stay again because the kids were very content.   The hotel is really close to the freeway but as long as the music is on in the pool area its not too bothersome.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments for Hotel Menage.  We appreciate your business and look forward to seeing you again soon.  I know the bartenders will be happy to hear you mention their names directly and I will make sure that I pass on your kind words to them.  As you noticed we are very family friendly and a good place for adults as well...  Although we are close to the freeway, once inside the room, the noise does dissipate.  We look forward to seeing you soon.   Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: Fantastic Time - Friendly Staff - Best view of Disney Fireworks
Summary: So the three of us went to Anaheim for a convention at the Anaheim Convention Center  (Blizzcon 2009) what a blast we had. I set up the reservations 6 months early and found the Menage to be a great value. I wasn't sure what to expect, I was just happy to be going to the convention.  Our goals for the trip were to go to the convention, play WoW (online PC Game), Drink and enjoy some the California perks.   When we arrived at the hotel about 3 hours before check-in and they were able to grab us a room right away.  The room was just fine 1 king and 1 queen. We had an issue right away. We could connect to their wireless internet but could not get a strong connection. Since one of our goals was to play online games in the evening we wanted to make sure we had a good connection. I
Manager Response: Thank you for your great comments about Hotel Menage.  We work hard to make sure each guest has a great experience and I'm glad to hear that we succeeded with your group.  Our front desk staff and our valet team will be glad to hear of your great experiences and that you had a great time during your convention...  Thank you for your business and we look forward to serving you again soon!  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary Heading: My stay at the Hotel Menage
Summary: I had a pleasant stay at the Hotel Menage.  The staff were cordial and helpful.  The parking attendants were also very friendly, especially Andrew and Paul.  One of them wears a name tag that says Nahum but that is not his name. They would open the door  and ask about our day and we did not have a car.  It is a nice hotel for the price. The bathroom needs some improvements. The pool was nice and we got a perfect view of the fireworks at Disneyland from the poolside. Overall my stay was nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for mentioning our Valets, Andrew and Paul, they will be happy to hear that you enjoyed your visit.  I wish that the rating was slightly better and hope that everything was good during your stay...  I hope you do come back and visit with us again soon.  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary Heading: After a poor start, it got better and better!
Summary: Our stay at the Menage came under recommendation from several agents in the UK.   We arrived early evening after along drive from Santa Barbara ready for our 8 night stay. They had no record of our reservation, however after 20 minutes this was rectified and we were given the keys to our room(#516), facing the car park.   The room appeared clean, but small, a lot smaller than they appear on the website, 2 adults and 2 young children would definitely find it a squeeze in there for more than a couple of days. The room had 2 Queen Sized beds, a table with plasma TV above and a sink area with open wardrobe and separate toilet/shower over bath room.. After a quick glance around the room, I noticed the toiler roll holder was falling out of the wall and the door to the toiler looked
Manager Response: Needless to say, I'm very glad all ended very well and that you enjoyed the visit to Hotel Menage.  I'm glad you got to try our new menu.  Our new concept is a street fare with everything from 3 to 12 dollars so a sampling of 5 or 6 items work well for everyone including families, couples, and the bar crowd...  Thank you for your great words and tell everyone in the UK about us, we would appreciate the business.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: Hotel room was good. Front desk Silvia and Karla were awesome . Valet was amazing.. Very helpful and friendly, made hotel stay worth every dime.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words for Silvia and Karla.  I appreciate you mentioning them specifically and will make sure they know you mentioned them...  They will be very happy to hear your words.  Thank you for your business and we look forward to seeing you back at Hotel Menage...  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary Heading: Great hotel, would stay again anytime!!!!
Summary: The staff was wonderful!!  Could not ask for better service.  I have stayed at many DISNEY locations and this was one of the best.  The restaurant was awesome and very well priced.  The pool mist bar was also very good and handy to have when lounging by the pool.  The only thing I would like to see is an improvement on the hotel room bathrooms, out dated and in need of repairs.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review our team will be very happy to hear your review.  We are bidding out our restroom project and hope to have most of the bathrooms complete by the fourth quarter.  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: Stayed three nights and never again!  I have never written a poor review in all my many years of travel, and to read all of the positive feedback makes me wonder if they stayed at a different hotel.  We booked an upgraded "loft room" with a pool view.  When we checked in we were told that the room was not ready since there were only a few of these "loft rooms" , and they were cleaned last.  This was at 2:25 and check-in is at 3:00 PM. Hmmm....I guess they can clean all of them in 35 minutes?  The front desk person offered no apology since we were early, but said she could get us into a "regular" room if we didn't wish to wait.  We did not want the regular room as we needed and payed for the additional space with no wall to wall carpet .  So, we patiently waited and checked in
Manager Response: I am very sorry that you felt this way...  Our customers, as you can notice from most of our reviews, really do enjoy the hotel for what it has, our 24hour pool, complimentary wireless, and our reggae music.  We do want to create value for price paid and again I'm very sorry you felt that this was not up to your standards...  I do hope you'll give us another chance during your next visit to Anaheim.  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary Heading: Lovely hotel; friendly, clean, accomodating; great suites!
Summary: My 7 year-old daughter and I stayed for 6 nights, from August 9th to 15th.  We go to Disneyland 4 times each year, staying a week each time. In all of the years we've been doing this, I've never even noticed the Hotel Menage.  I would say it is a hidden gem.  It's only 1/2 mile from Disneyland, and has a perfect view of the Disney fireworks from the pool and balconies.   My husband works with the Menage manager's brother (Dan), but I never mentioned this to any of the staff, and my husband didn't tell him we were going ahead of time, either.  Regardless, the staff bent over backwards to make us happy and accommodate our needs.  My daughter and I normally stay at the Hyatt Regency on Harbor, but my husband mentioned this hotel to us so we tried it and I'm very glad we did.  All
Manager Response: Wow... Thank you!  I don't know what else to say!  I'm so glad we are now your hotel of choice!  You really made my night by this glowing review...  We do pride ourselves on our service and you experienced what we strive to do...  We do look forward to seeing you soon!!!  Please come back and visit...  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: I see why it's in the top 10...
Summary: I traveled with my daughter's family  which included a three year old.  The Menage bent over backwards to accommodate our needs.  I found the place VERY clean. True, you can hear the freeway traffic, but the air conditioner fan blotted out pretty much all of that noise.  The half-price happy hour from 4-7 p.m. by the pool is very family friendly.  The premises are kept quite secure as well. We walked to Disneyland every day as it is only a ten minute walk.  Thank you for a lovely stay. Tips: Request a room away from the freeway; book directly with the hotel; take advantage of the half-price happy hour menu.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments regarding Hotel Menage...  We are very pleased to assist in any way we can, and I am very glad that everyone you encounter gave you top notch service...  thank you for taking the time to write a review and we look forward to seeing you again soon...  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: Don't purchase any food items there.
Summary: The hotel itself was fine, if not a little loud in the lobby where they have constant music playing.  Reminded me of a night club even in the daytime hours.  I was disturbed to find out that they wanted to charge me $15.38 for  two miniature boxes of kids cereals which was more than the two mochas I purchased the day before.  Needless to say I was soured by this.
Manager Response: After following up with our food and beverage manager, apparently they mis-charged you due to the button being hit twice.  We charge $7 for two boxes of cereal plus tax and apparently they had rectified the situation directly with you before you left the restaurant.  If this was not the case please let us know as the value for the cereal is actually very good...  It is also my understanding that the manager did speak with you directly.  As far as the music is concerned we play tropical reggae music throughout the day and most guests really don't mind it.  I am truly sorry for the misunderstanding and hope you give us another opportunity to earn your trust.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: Great atmosphere here at this hotel! Love the carribbean music and the Happy Hour menu along with the drinks. The room service here is quick, fast, and so good from their resturant K'ya! We stayed here for 4days and 3nights while visiting Disneyland. You can see the fireworks from this hotels pool. Best view in town. Would enjoy staying at this hotel again.
Manager Response: I love that we are fun, most importantly I love that you enjoyed the food and the hotel...  Thank you for your business and we hope you will continually spread the good word about Hotel Menage!  See you soon in Anaheim...  Hotel Menage...

Summary Heading: My new favorite hotel to stay at!
Summary: I took a chance and stayed at this hotel thanks to the reviews that others gave of it and i was impressed to say the least. The hotel was everything we wanted  and more! The rooms look exactly as they do on the website! The flat screen tv's are awesome. we requested a microwave and fridge and got it right away. Wifi worked great in rooms once we got the code with the exception of high internet traffic times. The pool and spa are 24 hours open and we utilized every minute of that. after leaving disneyland we joined others down at the spa to relax. everyone respected the quiet time policy so it was all good. the red velvet internet room was awesome and had use of printers for free too! The best was the happy hour at the pool mist bar. we got a huge pizza for 5 bucks! all bar menu
Manager Response: Your review is why we keep smiling!!!  Thank you for your great words, we love that we are your new favorite hotel and that you took a chance on staying with us.  As you may imagine we cannot please everyone, we try, but we do please the majority of our guests.  We look forward to continually business from you and all your friends and family...  Thank you and see you soon at Hotel Menage!  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: My family and booked online to stayed at The Menage Hotel for 7 nights during our trip to the USA from Australia.  From the moment we arrived we had great service.  The rooms were lovely and clean.  The pool had  a great atmosphere with the music playing until late in the evening.  The food at the Mist Bar was spot on and we enjoyed many happy hours by the pool.  Dan a the front desk organised our Theme Park tickets and anything else we needed promptly and bent over backwards to make sure our stay was fantastic. You can walk a short easy walk to Disneyland and many restaurants from the hotel which was very convenient...We loved everything...great place to stay with or without kids....we will definately be back.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: We came for fun.... and found it.
Summary: This has got to be the very first time that I have arrived early to check in at a hotel and was invited to wait by the pool in a spectacularly comfortable, round, cushioned lounger that would fit the whole family.  The barman kept our drinks fresh and cool and the other guests at the hotel were friendly and family oriented.  We met family coming from several different states here and stayed on the ground floor poolside.  Freeway noise was not a problem here and the sounds from other guests enjoying the pool were rather muted.   The bedding was firm and the linen was fresh and crisp.  The bathroom was small and the tub did need some freshening up, but with the volume of  guests I would hardly be surprised. The staff here bent over backwards to make our stay pleasant and in some
Manager Response: Thank you for your compliments about Hotel Menage.  I am so glad you enjoyed the pool and most importantly I know our team will be glad to hear their names listed on your review...  We appreciate your business and look forward to seeing you again when in the area...  As you mentioned most of the hotel is not loud and the environment is fun filled...  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: The Hotel for the price we paid for was a great value.  The rooms were clean but the bathroom were outdated with peeling paint coming off of the bath tub. We had to wear foot sandels when we took our showers.  However, the rest of the room was clean and the beds were very comfortable with plenty of pillows.  We were disappointed in the fact that we called a month before our arrival to arrange for the small refridgerator and microwave  and was told we would have one but upon arrival none was available.  We were told we could check in at 3pm but at 4pm the rooms were still not ready.  The staff was pleasant  during our entire stay so no gripe there.  Again, we got a really good deal on with the hotel and all n all I would stay there again but would probably get a suite. The
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review regarding Hotel Menage.  We value every piece of feedback and continually try to improve on our product and most importantly our service.  I am sorry that your room was not available at 3pm there are times when it is difficult to gauge when our customers check out, hence some later, making it difficult to get the room to our standards.  As far as the fridges are concerned we have over 150 and typically we do not run out, but there must have been a high demand during your stay...  We will look at your room and see about the tub as we are replacing the ones that need immediate attention.  Most importantly thank you for your business and we look forward to seeing you again soon at Hotel Menage...  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: We have stayed at Hotel Menage several times this summer.  The staff is always kind and accommodating.  The pool, bar and restaurant are wonderful. The view of the fireworks from Disneyland while floating in the pool; very romantic!!! All the best, Johnny & Tammy
Manager Response: Thank you...  We love the repeat business and look forward to your continued patronage!  Please come back soon!  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary Heading: Great hotel for Adults going to Disney
Summary: Booked this hotel at the last minute -- coming down highway 5 with no place to stay. And they could not have been nicer about it. Didn't know what to expect, but I was pleasantly surprised. The only reason we did not stay longer was that it was a bit far from Disney and they do not have a dedicated shuttle (they recommend using the City shuttle, which would take forever considering their location).  The Good: -Nice, modern design. Reminiscent of the boutique hotels where I stayed in at Union Square in SF -Very adult driven -- a change of pace from all the other hotels where I have stayed in at Disney -the room was clean and well furnished -the beds were very comfortable -- even the pull-out sofa bed  WARNING: the beds are low and sit on solid wood frame that juts out about 3
Manager Response: Thank you for your great rating for Hotel Menage...  You are right about the San Francisco boutique feel we shrived for value for price paid and we worked hard to ensure every guest is 100% satisfied.  To address the negatives on your review, all full service hotels in the Anaheim area charge for valet and self parking our charge is actually a lot less.  We charge for the service as we want to ensure that we have the quality staff for valet, bell and any assistance the guest may need.  I will personally look into the internet issue as I know that the wireless hubs have not had any recent issues.  With all Anaheim Resort Hotels, we participate in the ART (Anaheim Resort Transportation) which is a clean air shuttle service that runs every 20 minutes throughout the day until Disneyland closes.  Our restaurant is open from 630am till 1030pm and the prices very value oriented.  Although you felt it was not conducive to families, we do cater toward everyone an families have had great experiences like yours...  We look forward to seeing you again soon...  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: I was a little nervous about staying here with all the talk/reviews of this hotel being "to close to the freeway" and it was a "renovated Best Western".
