Okay I've stayed here now and who cares if it was a Best Western or if it is close to the freeway.  The place has obviously been renovated, the lobby was very nice, they upgraded and you feel like you could be in a W lobby.  The staff was awesome, very friendly and always said "hi" when you walked through.  The rooms were renovated, clean and large - how can you go wrong here?  When you are outside your room, yes you hear the roar of the freeway but during the day there is music playing throughout the property, nice touch and helped with the noise.  Once inside my room I could not hear the freeway at all.  The pool area was
Manager Response: Thank you for your words.  We did renovate the hotel and did it with a minimalistic approach, good service, good food, good sleep, and good atmosphere was what we tried to achieve.  I know we accomplished that for most, like yourself, so that makes us very happy to hear.  We never claim to be the 5 diamond hotel, but like you stated, if you want value for price paid and a great environment, Hotel Menage is the place for you!  Thank you for your review, but most importantly thank you for your business and your continued business, please tell all your friends about Hotel Menage!  Thank you,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: I stayed at the Hotel Menage in Anaheim, CA from Jun 26 - Jul 3, and my guests and I had an awesome experience.  Everything at the hotel was perfect, especially the 24-hr pool/hot tub.  All of the employees were extremely friendly and helpful when needed.  I stayed there with two other guests that were 25 or older, and the only negative thing anyone mentioned was that the pool bar closed early on some of the weekday evenings.  But once we found out that we could either bring a cooler down or go inside and get a drink (Frank was an awesome bartender), life was good.  The rooms were very nice (especially the TV) and always kept clean.  Also, I'm a cigarrette smoker and while we didn't reserve a smoking room, it was nice to be able to smoke by the pool/at the bar/and on the
Manager Response: Thank you!  Your compliments are greatly appreciated and we thank you for your business.  Frank is wonderful and we appreciate you mentioning his name, he will be very glad to hear your review!  You are right when you say the noise is not that bad from the rooms, the tv is a 42 inch plasma and the reggae music is great!  Thank you for your review and we look forward to seeing you again soon, hopefully before next year!  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: For the money, it's a nice hotel that is close to Disneyland. There is a 24 hr pool and the Ka restaurant has great food. The decor in the main area is very hip. There is an indoor and outdoor bar. The only thing average is the room itself. It has a lot of space and a very large flat screen TV. Free internet too. But, you can tell that this used to be a Holiday Inn and I think they tried to update the room the best they could, but it's still a little funky. Needs a new shower head too. And for some reason, the carpet was damp. But, it was a quick ride over to D Land. There is a trolley shuttle that picks up and drops off at D Land. It's a 4 dollar ticket  round trip. Also, I was on the 4th floor, so I had a perfect view of the D Land fireworks. Awesome!  All in all, a good value
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments.  I'm sorry you felt the room was not to your satisfaction.  All our shower heads were recently replaced so I did not understand that comment...  Thank you for your business and we look forward to seeing you again soon!  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: I went to Los Angeles to see colleges . When we got there it was 12 AM. We        stayed in a room along Interstate 5 which was very loud. We switched rooms every night.
Manager Response: I am sorry that you felt it was too loud in the room.  All our rooms are insulated and allow there is some noise, most of the traffic is not that noticeable...  We hope you will give us another opportunity to serve you again.  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: Just returned from Anaheim California and had a great vacation. We stayed at the Hotel Menage due to its location and price range. This hotel is an older hotel that has been remodeled with a funky vibe, from flowing sheers in sitting area, to blue ambiance lighting in bar area, with contrasting flickering red candles on bar counter. The tiki bar along side of the pool outdoors is a great spot to sit in the evenings and watch the Disneyland fireworks from next door. Our room was clean and spacious, with king size bed, and an air-conditioner that worked wonderfully. The K'Ya restaurant serves a great breakfast as well as a great main meal menu. Be sure to try the Calamari, it is very tasty. The lobby bar and the pool bar both serve happy hour menus from 4-7pm, with 1/2 price food
Manager Response: Thank you for your great compliments about Hotel Menage.  Your comment about the 5-star service will continue to inspire us to work that much harder to ensure every guest is completely satisfied.  I know Frank will be ecstatic to hear your comments.  He has been with the hotel since day one and always goes above and beyond for every customer.  Thank you for your review and most importantly thank you for your business and we look forward to seeing you at Hotel Menage soon...  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: Hotel is the best place to watch the fireworks without being at Disneyland.  We watched the fireworks in the pool after great day at the park.   Loved the food at the restaurant.!  Even my 3 picky teenagers loved it.  Bed was comfotable with soft sheets.  Really enjoyted the stay at the Hotel Menage.  We would stay there again next time we are in Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments about Hotel Menage...  Since we are next to Disneyland, the fireworks are the best view outside of the park...  Thank you for the business and we look forward to welcoming you back to Hotel Menage...  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary Heading: Save money on food and walk to Disneyland from here.
Summary: After endless searching I booked this hotel after reading about it on Trip Advisor . It appealed to me as I was a single parent travelling with a child and didn't want to be totally stuck in family land. Best things about the hotel.. the front staff are SO friendly and helpful. The lobby and bar are very stylish and modern. The pool is really lovely, better than the photo on their website. Disneyland is about a 10 minute walk straight down the road. You have to cross a couple of roads but they have pedestrian crossings so it's perfectly safe. It was great to be so close to Dland as we could easily come home and have a swim and food and go back on nights it was open to 12.00. We ate breakfast there every day and as kids eat free this worked out very reasonable. Big breakfasts and
Manager Response: Thank you for your great words!  I would agree with all your great compliments and we at Hotel Menage thank you very much for the good words...  Our front office staff works diligently to ensure each guest is 100 percent satisfied... I am sorry that the spa was closed during your visit.  We had some unforeseen issues that we had to immediately correct and now all is great with the spa and the pool heaters...  We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim and thank you again for your business to Hotel Menage....  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: Usually when we go to Disneyland we stay in Buena Park, but since I found a deal on this place for $25 more than we usually pay to stay in Buena Park, figured we'd give it a shot.  If you want to know what a boutique hotel looks like check out the Kimpton group which has locations all over the US, based out of San Francisco.   I read up on other reviews, this used to be a travelodge. Sure they cleaned the place up a bit, but you still have to be outside when you leave your room, thats a motel.  Got the place for about $70 via a hotels.com special they were running, which is lower than the hotel website($100) but not as low as others have gotten it($50 ish according to another reviewer)  Has asked for a room not on the freeway side so as to not be so noisy, but as we drove aroudn
Manager Response: I am sorry that you felt we were a motel.  The only motel style is that it used to be a Holiday Inn and we have exterior corridors, however the amenities and the decor are very hotel-like.  We offer value for price paid and we offer something for everyone.  As far as parking is concerned, every full service hotel in the area charges for parking, in addition, most hotels charge more for parking.  I wish we could have made you more pleased with your experience at Hotel Menage, and I hope that you would give us another opportunity to serve you and your family again.  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary Heading: The Hotel Menage in Anaheim is a great place to stay.
Summary: I was in Orange County on business but decided to stay near Disneyland because of the great restaurants in its vicinity.  The Hotel Menage, which is directly across the freeway from Disneyland, was the right price.  What a great decision it was to stay there. I had one of the suite rooms which was so big, it had 2 flat screen tv's. The atmosphere is that of a resort.  For dinner I walked to Downtown Disney and ate at the Napa Rose, which is one of the best restaurants that I have been to. I came back to the hotel for the biggest surprise.  While sitting outside enjoying a glass of wine, all of a sudden there was an explosion. The fireworks show at Disneyland had started and I had the perfect seat!
Manager Response: I am very happy to hear of your wonderful visit to Hotel Menage...  Whether for business or pleasure, we are here to serve our guests...  I do hope you can come back and try our k'ya restaurant instead of going off property for dinner.  I think you will find it's a very great experience.  Thank you for your business to Hotel Menage and we look forward to surprising you again soon!  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary Heading: Great weekend spent with my family!
Summary: We were treated very well during entire stay.  The friendliness of the staff is superb.  The room was clean with a very comfortable bed.  The shower heads are awesome, I probably took a longer shower due to this then I should have.  The big plasma TV in the room was great.  The mist bar near the pool is a great relaxing casual hangout with cool music, great place to hang out and meet people.  The lobby is inviting with comfortable chairs and music.  The food was excellent and reasonably priced.  The service is polite and fast.  The pool was very warm and clean.  The big circular chairs near the pool is very comfortable, big enough for 2.  I cannot say enough about the staff, the valet making sure we didn't get lost, the bar tender checking on me, the servers at K'ya restaurant
Manager Response: We look forward to seeing you and your family soon!  Thank you for your great words and I'm sure the team will be happy to hear of your wonderful stay...  We do hope you will drive up from San Diego soon to stay with us again!  Thank you again for your compliments and your business...  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary Heading: An undiscovered, reasonably priced gem of a hotel that has excellent service and is located close to Disney.
Summary: This hotel lives up to its advertising.   The staff was courteous, helpful and engaging.  The room accommodated  a king bed and sofa and both were quiet comfortable.  Having the TV on the wall opened up the space and the desk area is designed for computers and work.  The large size of the bath area was delightful.   This pool area and nightly fireworks from Disney made this place ideal.   It is close enough to Disney to walk, yet secluded from the noise and activity from the park.
Manager Response: Thank you for your compliments but most importantly thank you for your business.  Your comments are right on the money, we have wall hung all the 42 inch plasma's to give our 7 foot long work desk the functionality of actually work...  Our design was very simple, good sleep, good work, and good space...  We look forward to seeing you again at Hotel Menage soon!  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: We just returned from a 5 night stay at the Menage and thoroughly enjoyed our stay.  Linda at front desk was very helpful from the moment we checked in.  We originally  had 2 rooms next to each other and she suggested we change to one with a connecting door.  It worked out perfect for our group of 8 (4 adults, 4 kids), we had a fridge put in our room so we just had breakfast in our room. The pool area was very resort like, our kids spent hours swimming in the warm pool after a hard day at Disney.  The 1/2 price drinks and great bar food made our evening meals affordable  and relaxing. We had one evening at the restaurant and the food was very good there as well.  The rooms were totally fine, the bathroom was small, but the beds were really comfortable and clean.. Yes its noisy
Manager Response: Your comments are very much appreciated!  I know Linda will be very excited to hear that her service level exceeded your expectations and I know that she too will be thankful.  Although you and your family have tried other hotels in the area, we are different and very family oriented... and glad you gave us an opportunity to serve you!  Thank you for your business to Hotel Menage and we look forward to seeing you again soon...  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary Heading: Wonderful outdoor bar for happy hour
Summary: My husband and I had a wonderful experience at our stay at The Hotel Menage. The staff was excellent right from the start when we first checked in. The front desk ladies where so very helpful with information in regards to disneyland and for shuttle access information. We had drinks at the outdoor bar, which by the way is absolutely fantastic it has a hawaiian kind of vibe to it. The outdoor bar is so cute it's a little tiki hut right next to the pool and thanks to the bartender Jenny for letting us know about the happy hour prices and deals. If she hadn't have told us we probably would've went else where for drinks. Instead we hung out by the pool and enjoyed our 1/2 off drinks and appetizers. The drinks were very good along with the food, which are good size portions. The
Manager Response: We pride ourselves on our service and value for price paid.  I'm glad Jenny let you know about our happy hour.  The Palapa bar is a great way to either unwind after a long day at the park or just spend the day in the best weather in the US...  Thank you for your words and most importantly your business and we look forward to seeing you again soon!  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: We stayed at Hotel Menage June 27-July 1st, we have travelled very extensively but are not people that look for the negative. The staff was by far the most incredible we came across. We arrived early Louis & Tiffany were outstanding allowing us to use the hotel amenities, watch out luggage and have our room taken care of asap. They greeted us daily asking if they could help us with anythign at all. The rooms are gorgeous, the beds are extremely comfortable. The bathrooms are a bit small if you are looking for a spa or anything, but more than enough for the time we spent in it. The noise from the freeway is minimal with the door closed, only during rush hour do you hear it. The pool is beyond amazing, it is warm and open 24 hours!! It was great to have a hot tub whatever time we
Manager Response: Wow... thank you for your review...  I know the people that you directly specified will be honored to read your review.  I agree with you regarding the noise, it's really not bad for most of the day and when the door is closed the majority of the noise does go away.  We hope that you will tell all your friends and family about us as word of mouth is the most important part of our business.  We look forward to seeing you again at Hotel Menage...  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary Heading: Better than I expected based on the reviews.
Summary: We stayed at Hotel Menage for a wedding.  It was my husband and my 10 month old daughter.  The hotel was very accommodating by giving us a crib, a microwave, a fridge, and a quiet room for our baby.  The decor was nice - the bathroom was ok.  We ordered room service from Kya in the hotel and the food was tasty but not hot.  The appetizers were hot but our entrees were not.  Our friends stayed in a suite and those were phenomenal.  Very pretty.  They had 2 wall mounted televisions, and large sitting area, and tile floors - which are a plus to me as far as cleanliness is concerned.  The pool was nice (saltwater), but it was a little warm.  Great for night swimming, but not very refreshing for daytime.  I would stay here again, though I think they need to re-think their policy on
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful words and most importantly thank you for your business.  I'm glad the team could accommodate you during your stay, however I am truly sorry that your food was not warm.  I assure you that I will follow up with our food and beverage team and will correct the issues at hand.  In addition, I will have our engineers look at the temperature of the pool and ensure that it is different from morning and night.  Again thank you for your business and we look forward to seeing you again...  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: I wanted to give this hotel the credit it deserves.I have stayed at  a number of hotels in Anaheim and none of them come close to this hotel. The beds were beyond luxurious, the rooms were very clean, the plasma flat screen tv was amazing and the room was very  quiet! I traveled with my 4 year old niece and mother and we all slept well. We also enjoyed the 24 hour pool. It was so nice to be able to swim no matter what time we returned from Disneyland. We did not walk to Disneyland because of the age of my niece, but it was definitely close enough to walk and the hotel has  very easy access to Disney's parking structure. The staff was extremely nice from the valet parking attendants to the check in counter agents.  I would recommend this hotel to anyone!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review about Hotel Menage.  We appreciate your business and thank you for taking the time to write this.  Our team strives to make every guest and family feel welcomed and a part of the family.  I will make sure the valet team and the service team knows how you felt about your stay and we look forward to seeing you again soon!    Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: We were here for a week in mid june 2009 - I chose it on the basis of  reviews on Trip Advisor but was sorely disappointed when we got there.  The main problem is NOISE - the location of the hotel is between the interstate and a very busy main road in Anaheim.  When I asked for the quietest room available (and I am not normally someone who needs silence) we were given a room not facing the I-5 and told that this would be the quietest.  It was like sleeping next to the interstate most of the time as the walls are so thin, and really, how quiet can it be 25 yards from the busiest road in California -- to drown out the noise we used the equally noisy airconditioner - which at least was constant rather than the whoosh of cars and trucks.  this is a cheap property which has a veneer
Manager Response: I am truly sorry about your experience.  As you can tell most of our guests don't mind the noise from the street.  Our team does truly care about your stay and I'm not sure what happened at check out, but we do want to make every guest as happy as possible.  I do hope you will give us another opportunity to serve you...  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary Heading: Our Stay at Hotel Menage- June 7-15' 2009
Summary: We were on vacation to visit Disneyland and stayed at the Hotel Menage from June 7th to 15th, 2009.   Upon our arrival, we were greeted by the friendly staff.  We checked into our room with no problems.  In fact, we had asked upon check in to have a refrigerator in our room, and they had it there when we got to our room!   The hotel lobby area was well presented and laid out.  It was elegantly lit with candles and had a great ambiance.  Our room was also well presented and clean.  The washroom could use a little renovation, and we are confident that overtime, this will become a priority.  It was nice to see an air conditioning unit working properly and not like at some hotels where you require your room access card to power up the unit and /or lights in your room.   Our room was
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words...  I know the entire team will be thrilled to see their names listed on the review!  Being next to the freeway we do get the traffic noise, but as you experienced, once inside, the noise is not bad at all...  We are so glad you enjoyed every minute of your stay and look forward to seeing you again soon!  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary Heading: Awful service, awful room.  Needs more than a coat of paint.
Summary: Stayed from June 18-22, 2009.  Booked on Expedia, for what I thought was a decent rate (120CAD per night).  I travel to LA twice yearly, once on business, once with my wife.  Normally we stay at one of the Disney hotels, but since this was more of a business trip with a colleague of mine, this place seemed to be more of a "hot spot", or so their website led me to believe.  Upon arrival, the first thing I noticed was how nice the lobby and pool area were.  I was excited, and figured it was going to be great.  Check in was quick, though we were not directed as to where anything was, and were told it would be 10 dollars per day for parking.  The gate was broken and was not allowed to park in a valet stall.  Parked in one anyways, and the car was still there when I came back.
Manager Response: I don't really know how to respond other than I am sorry for your experiences.  We do try our best to please every customer and apparently we did not please you at all.  I don't know how we can even begin to redeem your experiences.

Summary: We stayed here 2 nights on a visit to Disneyland.  It is a 15 minute walk over I-5 to the park.  The hotel is in a noisy area right off the highway, but we had a relatively quiet room and with the a/c on, we slept well.  The rooms are spartan, but clean and the beds were fine.  The food in the hotel's restaurant was very good and very reasonable.  The staff were very courteous and helpful.  It was an excellent value for the price and we would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your good words for Hotel Menage!  Although we are situated next to the freeway, our rooms are quite nice and quiet.  I am very glad you had a chance to experience our food and beverage as well as our service and we look forward to seeing you again soon!  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: We left my 6 year old granddaughters favorite sleep toy ( a $50 Build a Bear) in the room for the day while we were at Disney only to return and have it missing. After having her cry for 2 days I called and talked to the Weekend Manager  about it and was told they would investigate and call me back. This never happened.  Other than the above mention problem the location was a bit far for us to walk to Disney. We perhaps could have walked in the am but after a long day at the park a walk would have been too much. Shuttle transportation to and from Disney is available for $4 adult and $3 child.  The hotel sits between two major roadways and the trafic noise was a big problem if you like a quite stay.  The hotel also charges guest $10.00 per day to park. I guess I am from the old
Manager Response: I truly am sorry that no one responded to you regarding your lost article.  I have followed up with all the managers today to see who took the call as they will be following up with you ASAP!  It is critical that you get a response from our team.  As far as the parking is concerned, like all full service hotels with Valet services, we do charge for this service, in fact our charges are much lower than other hotels in the area.  I do hope you will give us another chance...  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary Heading: The staff at the hotel were awsome!
Summary: I was a little aprehensive about the hotel and staff based on some of the reviews, but we had a very pleasant experience starting with the Valets and continuing through all facets of the hotel!    I believe Mark was the valet we met right off the bat and not only was he very helpful he engaged my kids right away and remembered their name our entire stay.    The front desk gals were very pleasant and even gave us discount coupons for Knott's.   At one point we inquired about adding an adjoining room to ours as we had a friend coming to stay with us and they were very accomodating!  We didn't end up going that route and instead went with the rollaway option which they had to our room in less than 5 minutes at no charge.  Lastly, I have to mention Andrew the Bartender - He is
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words...  Our team, from valet to the bar, strives to continually exceed our customers' expectations and I'm glad they all did!  Andrew will be thrilled to hear your kind words as he works diligently to ensure each guest has the best time during their stay.  We look forward to seeing you soon at Hotel Menage!  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: For the price, about $50 a night, this hotel is a good deal.  Very close to Disneyland, an easy 10 min walk.  This is where most of the positives of this hotel end!    As noted by others the restrooms don’t have fans so that’s a bit annoying but overall the room was standard.    If you do stay here request the 4th or 5th floor on the Harbor Blvd. side.  We had no issues with traffic noise but we could see how you could on the freeway side (it seemed rather noisy).  The restaurant is nothing special but it’s nice to have it available to you.    The staff left something to be desired but at the price I paid I wasn’t expecting very much.  As OneFrequentTraveler on 6/10/09 said we too had a few hairs found in the bathroom/bathtub, that was really off-putting.    Also because of
Manager Response: I am very sorry about your experience at our hotel.  I don't know where you received the $50 rate, but typically our rooms go from $99 to $169 depending on date and time of travel.  Most of our guests find both our service and our product exceptional, however I am sorry you did not feel we met your needs.  We do hope you will give us another opportunity to serve you.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: My wife and I stayed here the night we got married and it was a pretty nice experience. The beds were very comfortable and the blankets were incredibly soft! We purchased the suite; unfortunately, it didn't look like ones posted in the pictures for this place. That wasn't too big of deal though because it was still nice.   The next morning I began looking closer at the artwork framed to the wall and noticed that they were all pictures of naked women. I think that would have made my wife and I uncomfortable if we noticed that the night before.
Manager Response: Congratulations on your marriage!  And thank you for your review.  All four suites are different so I'm not surprised if you received a different type of room.  As far as the artwork is concerned I did not think they were as risque as you mentioned and apologize if you thought it was not appropriate.  We hope to see you again soon...  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: Couldn't ask for more.. Took a group of kids to Disneyland for Grandnight. They had there fun at the park I had my fun at the hotel.. The weather was terrible but having the Heated pool was perfect(hung out in the pool area for 6 hrs. ). I was in the pool all day and at night we didnt even have to leave the pool to watch the fireworks from the Disney park. Food was great and having Happy Hour made it even better. THe Pizza, Calamarie, Wings, Slidders you name it we had it and most of the plates under 5 bucks each. The Bartenders Esp Andrew made my stay even better. Drinks like everything else was perfect and He was very friendly. Our hotel room was really cool. The beds were very comfy. Staying at Hotel Menage was worth every penny.  IF and when I go to Disneyland or any area
Manager Response: Thank you for your great comments!  We are glad you had a chance to really experience the hotel and pool area while you sent out the group to Disneyland...  I will make sure Andrew hears of your great comments and assure you we will keep doing our best in our food and beverage area.  We look forward to seeing you again at Hotel Menage!  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: We recently spent 6 nights at the hotel, arriving on a Saturday.   The most memorable event at the hotel was our first morning.  I went to the restaurant, K'ya (which we had dined at the previous day), and asked if I could order two lattes to take up to the room.  The espresso machine and "to go" cups were plainly in view.  I was surprised when the hostess said she'd "check".  She came back a few minutes later, and said "No, I'm sorry, we can't get you any lattes, but how about two cups of regular coffee?"  When I asked her why no lattes, she said "They're too busy to make them  for you".  Wow.  I wondered what would have happened if I ordered them through room service, or had a seat, and ordered at the table.  But, instead I just walked across busy Harbor Ave to the local
Manager Response: I am appalled by your experience and assure you that I will personally talk with our food and beverage managers to ensure this does NOT get repeated!  I am truly sorry and cannot express my disappointment in the way you were treated.  The pool area had some issues with our gas line below and we did have to fix this immediately.  Again I am truly sorry and hope you will give us another opportunity...  Thank you,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: Renovated 25+ year old former Travel Lodge, Add $10 per night parking
Summary: Right next to the Interstate 5 freeway and noisy Harbor Blvd,  this horseshoe shaped hotel collects all the freeway noise it can.  The hotel, a renovated Travel Lodge, has been cleaned up and spruced up but doesn't live up to the pictures on their website.  Expect to be hit with a $10 per night parking fee.  If you want valet, that's $12.00 per day EXTRA.  There's really no reason, other than trying to make their room rates seem lower than other hotels, to charge for parking.  All you need is your room key to open the gate to the parking area.  We felt a little ripped off at the time but got over it in a few minutes. On balance, the hotel staff was friendly, the grounds clean and well kept.  We didn't eat at the restaurant but if the bar is any indicator of food quality, it is
Manager Response: I am truly sorry that you felt the hotel did not renovate well.  We did work hard to provide a great room at a great price with good furniture and environment...  We are improving our bathrooms this year and we hope that you will give us another opportunity to service your hotel needs.  As far as parking is concerned, almost all full service hotels do charge for parking and most hotels charge more than we do...  We do appreciate your business and hope you will give us another opportunity.  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: this place is only good if your going to disney. the photos make it look very posh, but its really just a travelodge.
Manager Response: We are sorry that you feel that we are not a boutique hotel, however we wish you would give us another opportunity to show you how we continually shine.  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: I would highly recommend this hotel to anybody looking for good value for the money.  The pool facilities were great and the pool bar has a great 1/2 price Happy Hour everyday.  The staff was extremely friendly and helpful from the Bell person to the cleaning staff.  A special Thank You goes out to a Front desk employee by the name of Sylvia who went way beyond the call of duty from time of check in until we checked out she took care of all our needs plus more becuse of her alone I would recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for all your great words!  We appreciate your compliments and I will make sure that Silvia hears about your review...  Value for price paid is exactly what we are, but our service will continue to go above and beyond!  We look forward to seeing you again soon!  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: I stayed at this hotel for a business trip.  It was a short walk to the convention center, along with many other options (shuttle, taxi, etc.).  The hotel staff went out of their way to make sure my stay was enjoyable.  The large tvs in the rooms are an added bonus.  I would definitely take my family there or stay there again for business.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments.  Our team will be happy to hear that you had a great customer experience!  Business or Pleasure, we are happy to exceed expectations!  Thank you for your business and we look forward to seeing you again soon!  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary Heading: Great location to Disneyland, nice room but a little rough around the edges.
Summary: The hotel itself is really more of a glorified Motel, though well appointed to be sure. They've taken a good sized motel and upgraded the lobby with a hip restaurant, cool looking bar and fixed the pool area up very nicely with a pool adjacent bar and really nice lounge furniture. The rooms have good sized TVs and ours was plenty spacious. The bathrooms were pretty basic and looked like legacies from this properties motel days. Being able to have a great view of the Disney fireworks from the hall ni front of our room was a nice bonus too. We opted for the King standard room with fold out couch and a pool view. The beds were comfortable and the location, about 3/4 mile walk to the Disneyland entrance was convenient as you never had to cross a major road on the way. Over all it
Manager Response: We are truly sorry that you had a mediocre experience.  Our pool and jacuzzi had to be repaired as the natural gas line was damaged.  We had to replace our gas lines hence the heat did not work in our pool area.  Everything is now back in order and we do apologize for any inconvenience...  Our windows are double paned and laminated, so most of the noise should be reduced.  We are happy that the issues were not a deal breaker and hope that you will come back again soon...  Hotel Menage...

Summary Heading: Hotel Menage will  exceed your expectations!
Summary: I am an Orange County local and I have have dinner events in several of their themed rooms and am staying there several nights in June...the customer service is above par...they will make you feel like a celebrity and the location and atmosphere is very island like. You are close to Disneyland and lots of other attractions and yet it feels like you are enjoying yourself on vacation on an island far away...and the food of course is excellent!!! You will not be disappointed!
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review.  We appreciate your business and agree that our service is top notch...  Please keep coming back and spreading the word...  Thank you again...  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: My boyfriend and I stayed here for 12 nights in September 2008. The staff here is AMAZING. They're incredibly helpful and friendly at any hour of the day or night. The room was very clean and the bed was super comfortable. We were on the 3rd floor and faced Harbor Blvd. The noise was minimal and half the time we didn't even notice.  The pool is by far the best feature of this hotel, as it is open 24 hours. We went in almost every night and it was always very clean and stocked with fresh towels. We never went in during the day though it did appear to always be busy. The poolside mist bar and music were also great.  The walk to Disneyland is a good 10-15 minutes and isn't bad at all. It was nice walking back to the hotel rather than waiting for a shuttle with the huge crowds of
Manager Response: Thank you for your review about Hotel Menage!  It seems you are due for another trip to Anaheim soon as you were her in 2008...  Trust that our service level continues to improve and we pride ourselves in making each and every guest feel like you!  Your twelve night stay is very much appreciated and we look forward to many more visits!  We are glad that we were the highlight of your trip and please come visit sooner than later!  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: We were extremely impressed with the hotel staff. We were  well taken care of from the moment we stepped out of our car until the moment we left.   The rooms were elegant but comfortable and very clean.  We will return to this property again.
Manager Response: Your short but sweet review is exactly what we like to hear!  Our team works very hard to ensure each guest receives the best service.  Our rooms are nicely appointed and we thank you for your recommendation!  We look forward to seeing you again soon at Hotel Menage!  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: I stayed at the Hotel Menage for six nights with my three children aged 6, 8 and 12 years.  I have to say that the Hotel Menage has the best service I have ever seen at any hotel.  Our family travels a lot and have stayed at a lot of different hotels.  I can honestly say that I have never seen such attentive staff at any hotel (many of them extremely expensive!).  Dan the concierge was extremely helpful and courteous and the doormen/bellmen were SO friendly!  I cannot say enough about the staff.  They really were amazing.  The rooms were average in size and design and the bathroom definitely needed some updating but they were clean and comfortable.  We did find the noise from the freeway a little loud when you opened the door and I cannot imagine spending a relaxing time at the
Manager Response: Thank you for your great comments about Dan our Concierge and our Valet Attendants, we are very proud that they are on our team, and our staff will be thrilled to read a great review like yours...  Although the entire hotel was renovated, we replaced the tile floor and changed out the fixtures in the bathroom.  This year we will be continuing to upgrade the bath areas and recently replaced all the toilets with environmentally friendly ones.  As you mentioned the noise from the freeway does go away once in the room and believe it or not the pool area is actually quiet due to the three story retaining wall from the freeway.  The fireworks show from Disneyland is NOT to be missed from the pool area...  We look forward to seeing you again soon and thank you for the business...  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: I had my Bridal Shower at Hotel menage with family and friends outside by the Mist Pool Bar.  The food was provided by K'YA Restaurant, located inside the Hotel....and it was FABULOUS.  We even booked a block of rooms to accommodate some of my guests (I got the "Safari Style" room).  All the staff was very friendly and accommodating throughout the entire stay.  I would definitely recommend Hotel Menage for a romantic or family getaway.  My guests are still taliking about how much fun they had.  Thank you Hotel Menage for making my special day so wonderful.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: This hotel has everything, and if friendly, helpful service is your #1, then this is the place for you.
Summary: I particularly wanted to write this review because this is the second time we have stayed with Hotel Menage and it impressed us both times, leaving a track record. Our first time we were so impressed with the friendliness and go-out-of-their-way attitude in every staff member that we decided to return again this year. (The first was 2 years ago.) I think it says a lot that in two years time, we saw the same results and now will definitely return again in the future. I personally work in the hospitality industry and have for years; I know what these people have to go through as service workers to the public. To have seen some familiar faces, still smiling from the last time we were there makes me happy. It lets me know that the company must do their best to keep them happy,
Manager Response: You are absolutely correct when you say it's difficult to continue to keep the best staff in Anaheim, however I believe we do truly have a great staff, from our Manager Elizabeth, bartender Frank, concierge, and our valet service, I am very pleased to read a review like yours.  We are very proud of our service levels and strive to ensure each and every guest feels that special something whenever and wherever they may be...  When I read good reviews of people in the hospitality business, I know that we are doing something right, thank you for the time, the words, but most importantly the business...  We look forward to seeing you sooner than later at Hotel Menage...  Please don't wait two years to see us again!  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: This was the perfect place to stay, attractions real close by. Room was good beds were fabulous lot's of pillows, very comfy. Happy hour food was very good and worth every penny. Service was great from check in to our departure. Very Friendly staff and helped with all our needs and concerns.  Thanks Menage we will be returning.
Manager Response: Our happy hour(s) and our food are really truly the best and I'm so glad you got to experience this, most importantly tell all your family and friends to stay with us at Hotel Menage!  We too enjoy sleep and the pillows add the benefit of a good nights slumber!  We look forward to seeing you again soon!  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary Heading: The most luxurious hotel I've stayed in for a dirt cheap price.
Summary: I cannot recommend this hotel enough! From the moment we checked in, I felt as if I was the only guest in the hotel with the extra special personal service we received. The rooms were very plush & luxurious, and the hotel facilities were top class. The pool/spa area is open 24 hours a day but we were not disturbed by this.  Proximity to Disneyland is approx. 5 mins on foot. There is also a bus direct from the hotel that will take you there if you prefer. We chose to walk as there were several restaurants on the way (McD's, Denny's, IHOP) so we could have our breakfast before we went into the Park.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great comment regarding the hotel.  We pride ourselves on value for price paid and although prices vary based on time of year and day of week, I'm very glad you got more than you expected...  I'm exceptionally happy that you felt the noise from the pool was not too much and with added features like complimentary internet, business center, and fitness center, we look forward to serving you again soon!  Thank you again for your comments about Hotel Menage!  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary Heading: Great Hotel! Excellent Service would definately reccommend
Summary: As a travel agent I am lucky enough to stay at many luxurious hotels. This particular trip to America was a personal one but based on the reviews of this hotel on trip advisor and personal reviews from my clients, I chose to stay at Menage.  From the moment we arrived the service was excellent. Doors were opened for us, a quick and straighforward check in and the room was ready before the required check in time. The decor in the large king room was very modern, combines with a very comfortable bed. This Hotel has a 24 hour pool and spa (pool is heated too which is great for late night swims). It is only a very short walk across the bridge to disneyland or there is a shuttle bus that can do unlimited transfers for $4 a day.  I will definately be recommending this hotel to my
Manager Response: Being in the travel industry for over 25 years it pleases me to no end to hear a great review like yours.  Your compliments on the hotel along with your experience in the industry validate our hard work and training!  We work very hard every day to ensure every guest is completely satisfied...  and we accomplished this with you...  Thank you first and foremost for your past business, but also thank you for the future business you will be giving us as well as the referrals to all your clients!  We look forward to serving you again soon at Hotel Menage!!!  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: stayed for 5 days while in LA based on reviews here, was noisy outside but found that inside the rooms was quiet. staff very helpful, rooms clean and comfortable. ART stops at the door. couldnt really fault anything... Complimentry internet access was good too!
Manager Response: We do pride ourselves on our service and appreciate your comments about Hotel Menage!  Thank you

Summary: We had the upgraded king room, and it looked like any other room that I've  been in - not any bigger. The walls are very thing, and the hotel is right next to the freeway, so we heard "freeway" noise all day/night. It's a 20 minute walk to Disneyland. The room, although newly renovated, was done sloppily. There were weird wires and tubes running across the ceiling. That being said, the room wasn't too expensive, so you definitely get what you pay for. This hotel had more of a "motel" feel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your response on our Studio Loft King room.  I'm sorry that you did not like the room, we have stained concrete floors and an art deco look with lofted ceilings on all our first floor rooms as you mentioned, to give it a New York style feel...  Most of our guests do enjoy it and I'm sad to hear you didn't like the decor...  We do have other types of accommodations and hope you can come see and stay in them soon.  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel, could improve a little
Summary: Overall this hotel is a great place. The decor is beautiful. It is nice to come from Disneyland to a place with a sleek, modern vibe. The rooms are large, the beds very comfortable.  The staff was very nice. It was a great 10 min walk from Disneyland, which is very convienient.  Don't miss Happy Hour, which is everyday from 4-7pm. 1/2 price drinks and food from the bar menu. The food was fantastic! It was a good break to enjoy good food, drinks and the pool before going back to Disneyland in the evening.  I did have a couple of issues. 1) Our room was on the first floor facing the pool, and the hotel played music (very loud) until 2am. 2) Housekeeping went door to door to check if anyone was in the rooms in the morning which interrupts you sleeping in after staying up until 2am
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments about Hotel Menage.  First and foremost, we do have a great environment for everyone and I'm glad you enjoyed the happy hour!  As far as the music is concerned it should have been shut off by 10pm and I'm shocked that it was on until 2am...  I'm very sorry about your experience with the music.  I will make sure that our housekeeping team knows to NOT bother guests that early they really should not be going into occupied rooms until 10am...  As far as the rates are concerned they do change from time to time, however I will address this with our reservations team...  Thank you again for your rating and most importantly thank you for your business and we look forward to seeing you again soon at Hotel Menage!  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: Incredible staff, very professional, friendly, and knowledgeable. Every encounter with one of them was a pleasure. Restaurant K' Ya - amazing food and service. Don't miss happpy hour 4 till 7pm half off all drinks and appetizers the BEST chicken nachos I've ever had ! Also enjoyed the location can't  beat the short walk to Disneyland or the quick shuttle. In addition,  you will not find a better place to watch Disney's fireworks than pool side, every night @ 9:30pm. After a two night stay, we wished we could've stayed a week longer, everything about this place says, Relax, Slow-down and Enjoy Yourself! Thank you, we really had a great experience, Mark L.
Manager Response: Howie,  Thank you for your kind words, we do want to continually give a 10+ experience to each and every customer...  We do have the best view of the fireworks and we have the best restaurant in Anaheim!!!  We look forward to seeing you again soon at Hotel Menage!  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: This hotel is very close to Disneyland, the entrance is about a 10 minute walk. The staff was extremely helpful and did everything in their power to make our stay a comfortable one. The rooms are nice although the bathrooms could use a retouch. The food at the pool bar and Kaya is delicious! They have happy hour from 4-7 each night. The gym was in great shape as well.The lounge area is very spacious and pretty and although we didnt get to dine in at Kaya it sure looked beautiful from outside. I would definitely come back but next time without the kids!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review of Hotel Menage...  Although our bathrooms are in need of some refresh, we are in the process of "re-doing" the rooms on a rotation and all new shower heads were purchased and will be installed.  Our facilities, including the fitness center is very nice and we thank you for your kind words....  We hope to see you again soon, and please try to dine with us in k'ya as you will enjoy the food with the great decor...  See you in Anaheim...  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary Heading: Good hotel choice for Disneyland visit, great service
Summary: Even though this is a little bit of a walk (15 mins) to the Disney entrance, we were very happy with our stay.  We were able to check in early, though the room we stayed in was a little noisy until they turned off the music at the pool.  My husband and daughter rated the pool as the "best ever".  Service was great and the adjoined restaurant had fabulous healthy and delicious food choices.
Manager Response: Thank you for your business to Hotel Menage!  We do have the best pool in the area and since it is open 24 hours, many get to enjoy it after Disneyland closes...  We agree with your husband and daughter!  We pride ourselves on service and the quality of food so thank you for your kind words and we look forward to seeing you again soon!  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: Our whole soccer team stayed here from the 16-21 of April.  There were 26 of us in total (15, 13 year old boys) and check in was a breeze!  The staff was very friendly and accommodated us all for breakfast every morning without a problem.  The pool area is beautiful and with the music playing and a great drink from the bar the highway in the background can actually sound like the surf!  Outside on the walkways the highway is very loud but as soon as you close your bedroom door you don't heart a thing.  The rooms are basic with very comfy beds and a separate vanity to get ready at.  The food in the restaurant is really good and reasonably priced.  All the staff was very friendly and helpful.  After a long day at Disney to come back to the beautiful pool, have a drink and relax
Manager Response: colbloc,  THANK YOU, THANK YOU, THANK YOU,  your kind words and compliments keep us going and keep us striving to make more people happy, more importantly thank you for your business to Hotel Menage!  We are glad that you could accommodate your requests and you are correct some areas of the hotel are a little noisy due to the freeway, however when you close the door it's pretty non-existent.  We look forward to servicing your hotel needs again in the Anaheim area...  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: From the start, the Hotel Menage staff was exceptionally welcoming and accomodating.  I stayed with 2 colleagues for a conference in Anaheim on a Thursday and Friday evening on 4-23. The rooms and hotel ambiance was fabulous.  Love the restaurant, Kya. There happened to be a charity event for abused children by the pool area on Friday evening that my colleagues and I happened to visit and thoroughly enjoyed.  The band was a wonderful surprise.  Too bad they quit early because we could have danced all night!
Manager Response: bmcount,  What a pleasure to read your review about Hotel Menage...  More importantly thank you for your participation for one of the many charities we assist, it's always a good cause to assist the local community with such worth while causes...  We pride ourselves on our service and food and beverage, so I'm very excited to hear you enjoyed both!  We look forward to the next time we see you at Hotel Menage!  Regards,  Hotel Menage!

Summary Heading: Finally Customer service at it's best
Summary: My Family and I are planning a vacation in August this year. We have booked through Walt Disney Travel and decided on the Hotel Ménage from the Good neighbors list. As always I wanted to read reviews on this hotel and as I read them it only raised more questions for me sooooo I called the hotel and was absolutely amazed at the level of customer service I received from Sylvia who answered the phone.  She was polite, friendly and answered ALL my questions with  knowledge and humor ( I asked quite a few question )  It has been quite some time since I have talked to anyone who remembers customer service but this phone call assured me that it does still exist at least at the Hotel Ménage.
Manager Response: Disney-on-a-dime,  First and foremost we will ensure that Silvia hears of your kind words, secondly thank you for your upcoming business to Hotel Menage and third it's great to see that you booked business with Walt Disney Travel as they are great partners for the hotel...  We look forward to seeing you at Hotel Menage in August and please call upon us if we can do anything for you!  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary Heading: Great stay at the Hotel Menage!
Summary: My husband, two teenagers & myself stayed at the Hotel Menage for three nights.  This was the final stop on our spring break vacation.  We had 3 day park hopper passes for Disneyland & California Adventure.  We walked to and from the parks all three days.  It didn't seem to be much more than 1/2 mile or so to Disneyland.  It took about 10 minutes to get there walking leisurely.  Our check-in was quick & easy.  The staff was very pleasant from check-in to check-out and everything in between.  Our room was clean & of average size for a hotel room.  The bed was super comfy!  We slept well all three nights & were not interrupted by freeway noise or noise of any kind for that matter.  The only issue we had was with the shower, the water pressure was weak, just a minor inconvienence.
Manager Response: Thank you for your business to Hotel Menage!  Secondly thank you for your great words and accolades!  We appreciate each and every customer and I'm happy to see that you enjoyed your visit to the Disneyland area.  The proximaty to the park is very good so I'm not surprised that your group walked to and from Disneyland and your correct when you mention that the noise from the freeway really is not that bad.  We do know the issue with the showerheads and we actually have ordered all new showerheads for each room and hope to have it all complete within the next four weeks (delivery will take two weeks)...  We look forward to seeing you again soon, and thank you for your business!!!  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at the Hotel Menage. All the staff were very professional, friendly and knowledgeable. Every encounter with any one of them was a pleasure and we really felt welcome and at home. The hotel was very clean and comfortable. The K'ya restaurant is very good, prices reasonable and service excellent.  The tours and attractions we booked at the hotel were also very well done and added immensely to our vacation. We  enjoyed being able to walk  to Disneyland and Downtown Disney whenever we liked. Thank you Menage, your professionalism is showing!
Manager Response: greattogetaway,  Thank you for your kind words.  We strive daily to ensure we give great service day in and day out!  Thank you for your accolades and we cannot thank you enough for your business.  We hope Hotel Menage continues to be your hotel of choice in the Disneyland/Anaheim area!  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: This hotel was certainly not a boutique hotel as advertised. Our room was very plain with an incredibly small bathroom. Shower pressure was barely adquate with a fairly rusty shower head. The "heated" pool was quite cold. On Friday night, the hotel hosted a charity casino event with a band directly under our room. No chance to sleep until they were finished. We did manage to drown out the highway noise on our other nights with the room fan. On the plus side, the beds were very comfortable and the big screen TV was very nice. The service at the front desk was great. Will probably stay at another property the next time.
Manager Response: We are sorry that you didn't feel that we were a boutique hotel.  I guess it's a matter of translation as many clients have coined us a boutique.  We are very glad you had a good experience with the service and the charity event and band was over at 10:30pm.  We did feel this was a decent time to stop the live music on a Friday night.  There were some good reviews regarding the charity and the cause that it support.  We do hope you'll give us another opportunity, however we understand if you want to give someone else an opportunity.  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary Heading: If You Miss This Experience You'll Never Forgive Yourself!
Summary: Incredible staff, service, food, rooms, pool and bar...You name it and they've got it. The easy access right off the freeway and only 1 mile from Disneyland made our stay that much easier. But, that's just the beginning. The food was not your average hotel garbage, but real exquisite food. The bartenders Frank and Andru were unlike any others I've met. Friendly, curtious, entertaining and provided awesome service. After a stay here, there's no doubt you'll want to come again because there's just nothing else better in the area.
Manager Response: krazykev00,  Your title says it all!  And we do agree with you and hope everyone has an opportunity to stay with us!  I will make sure to pass on your great comments about our two staff members and most importantly we thank you for your business!  We look forward to servicing you again soon and we will continue to strive to ensure everyone enjoys their stay at Hotel Menage!  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: We stayed here for 5 nights in April for the end of our honeymoon.    Good Points: *Rooms are large and modern with giant TV, large comfy beds. *Nice size pool and pool bar with great value happy hour with half price drinks and food. *Good location - walkind distance to Disneyland and accross street from convenience store and take away. *2 Sets of Towels each day. *Staff were friendly and courteous.  Not So Good Points: *Extra loud music from the pool area which made it impossible to relax in your room.  You could even hear it in the shower. (Music was played until at least 10pm) *Very small bathrooms. *One night a private event was held around the pool area - guests were not made aware of this prior to stay.  Extremely loud live music was played (Music was played til about
Manager Response: nzmonkee,  Well I guess I'm really not sure where to start.  Our pool is open 24 hours and the music is played at a 6 level (out of 10) from 11am till 10pm every night.  The pool is open 24 hours.  As far as the event is concerned, we do hold some charity events and this was one of those exceptions.  We actually raised over $15,000 for the homeless shelters within the Orange County Community so I do think it was well worth the time.  We did ensure the noise stopped at 1030pm and I apologize for any inconveninces this may have caused.  WE do hope you'll give us another opportunity as everything else during your stay seemed to be good...  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: We stayed here this weekend on a trip to Disneyland. My husband and I have season passes and this is by far our favorite hotel in the area. (we've stayed at over 6 different places). The staff was superb. The restaurant food was delicious (and well priced). Great happy hour! A pool & spa open 24 hours?! What more can you ask for?  We stayed in their European Suite: it is the best room I've ever stayed in (I've stayed in world renown hotels). It has 2 large flat screen TV's, modern furniture, comfy bed, immaculately clean (I'm picky).   Our two-day getaway felt like a true vacation. It was tropical on the grounds and just a 10-15 minute walk to Disney. I highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: slofergus,  Thank you for your compliments!  We do appreciate the business and look forward to seeing you again soon.  The team is here to service any of your needs and we want everyone to feel welcome in our home!!!  Thank you again,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: Well my family and I had planned our trip to disneyland.After arriving from our long trip all we wanted to do was take a shower and go to Disneyland. When we arrived at the hotel they told us check-in time was not until 3 pm! who would want to check in that late?! No where in our printed paper did it say that so we let them know.They were very rude and one guy even got in my husband's face telling him that he could show him where it said the check-in time! That was not necessary. Anyways we had to go all dirty to Disneyland because we were not going to wait there all day. Overall I did not like my stay here. They need to get new staff ASAP.
Manager Response: usedromance04,  I am truly sorry that you experienced this level of service.  Check in time at most hotels are at 3pm as we allow check out's to be at noon, we try our best to get the rooms ready sooner so we can check in early arrivals.  Having said that what you experienced is NOT the norm and I will make sure we address it personally with our front office team.  We do hope you will give us another opportunity to service you again...  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: Members of the hotel staff are so nice and helpful--it's truly a rare thing to find such great customer service.   The hotel pool is awesome and it's less than a 5 min drive to Disneyland and  Downtown Disney's restaurants and entertainment.   Seeing the Disneyland fireworks from the hotel was so fun too!!
Manager Response: hlemoine,  Thank you for you compliments about the Hotel Menage Team!  We do appreciate your business and thank you for your kind words!!!  We look forward to seeing you again in Anaheim...  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: My husband and I booked this hotel after learning it was within walking distance of Disneyland.  We called the hotel to find out how close, and they advised it was a 10 min. walk.  Its actually more like 20 min. at a good pace.  After walking all day at Disneyland, I probably would book a hotel a little closer to the park next time.  We chose this place based on the reviews, and that it had free WiFi, although the internet was very flaky.  It took about 20 min. to get online, each time we needed to use it.  At one point it took so long, they sent a technician to reboot the network, which took another 30 min.  I think the pictures of the hotel make it look much better than it appears in person.  I would also recommend booking a room further away from the freeway.  At one point in
Manager Response: travelgeek09,  Thank you for your comments about Hotel Menage.  We are sorry that your walk was longer than explained by our team, I think it really does depend on the pace to walk to the park.  In addition, I will personally look into the internet issues you experienced...  The outside company that provides our service might have had some technical issues during your stay.  Our team is here to provide great service and apologize for your inconvenience...  We hope that you will come back and visit us soon.  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary Heading: Visiting for Boston Red Sox and Disneyland.
Summary: Excellent location with great amenities and services.  Hotel has been redone into a boutique style for 30-somethings to enjoy with thier family yet not feel like they are staying at a theme park.
Manager Response: pdxballfans,  Thank you for compliments about Hotel Menage.  Although we root for the Angels, we love friendly competition!  We hope to see you again for many years to come, thank you for your business...  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: I'll start by saying I was a Candy Cane Inn devotee.  It's a wonderful place, but we have found our new favourite.  I found the Hotel Menage on Hotels.ca and decided to give it a try.  My daughter and I were going to Disneyland and I booked a room with 2 Queen beds.  Just before departure, my husband decided to come along, I emailed the hotel to inform them, and I received an almost immediate response saying "no problem, we look forward to seeing you."  When we pulled up, the bellman immediately helped us with our luggage, advised my husband where to park and ALWAYS opened and held doors for us.  I never opened the front door of the hotel during my stay.  I just want to comment on the bellmen.  They are wonderful.  They welcome you back everytime you return, exhausted from
Manager Response: dar1465,  Thank you, thank you, thank you!  I hope you realize that the details you mentioned are exactly what we hoped to create.  You are right that we need to do some additional work in our restrooms and we plan to do "re-vamp" it this year, however the noise is not bad from the location and the fireworks are quite loud as the view is tremendous from Disneyland.  I will make sure to personally address your compliments about our valet service and more importantly fix the issues you had about our room service.  The menu's are in the guest room directory and the team should all know about the location of the menu.  Most of all, thank you for your business and we look forward to seeing you again in November, in the meantime keep warm in Canada!  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: We are two couples in our thirties, one with two kids, one without - we stayed at the Menage for a week while we went to the parks and local beaches.  The hotel was amazingly friendly and helpful in meeting our requests - we had adjoining rooms (inside connecting door), refrigerators, tons of towels, rooms cleaned on our schedule (around kids naps) etc etc etc.  The pool open 24 hours, tons of towels down there to use, coin laundry, all made it so heavenly with the kids... but then downstairs - what a great mood for adults after a day at disney... great outdoor and indoor bars (you can smoke outside!), restaurant, lounge, candlelightf etc.  Perfect atmosphere for chill out time - great combination of spaces in this hotel. Rooms modern and clean - so much nicer than 1970's decor
Manager Response: jennyfromTO,  Thank you for your compliments about Hotel Menage!!!  We appreciate every guest and we are thrilled that you had a great experience with our hotel...  I will make sure both Tiffany and Abe hear of your great words and assure you that we strive to make everyone feel as you and your group did!  Tell all your friends in Canada, we would love to continue receiving business from our neighbors up north!  Thank you for booking Hotel Menage and we look forward to seeing you again soon!  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: The Hotel Menage was offered as a hotel option with the Northwest Airlines air/hotel package we booked for our April 2009 visit to Disneyland. I'm glad we selected the Menage! Just a 10-minute walk to the front gate of Disneyland/Disney California Adventure. The hotel used to be a Holiday Inn. It's been totally re-modeled by the new owners (Casa Resorts, Inc.). The decor is unique, artful and tasteful. The rooms feature excellent and very comfortable beds and large-screen TVs. The pool is large, and the pool area is well-maintained and landscaped. New, upscale patio furniture and a nice outside bar. The food is excellent, and reasonably priced. The 1/2 price happy hour menu (with a nice selection Pacific Rim cuisine appetizers and bistro menu items) makes the Menage a great
Manager Response: DavidA_Mpls,  Thank you for your ratings about Hotel Menage!  We just signed our contract with NW Airlines and are proud to be a partner with them.  Our value for price paid is exactly what we strive to provide and appreciate each and every customer!  Thank you for your comments and thank you more importantly for your business.  We look forward to seeing you soon at Hotel Menage!  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: We recently stayed at the Hotel Menage for three nights.  We have stayed at a Disney hotel the last few times we visited Disneyland.  However, this time, the primary purpose for our visit was a wedding and so paying the extra cost to stay at a Disney hotel didn't make sense.  We were pleasantly surprised with the Hotel Menage and will likely choose to stay here again in the future.  GOOD STUFF 1.) Great location right off the freeway.  We could actually walk to the park and not have to pay for parking at Disneyland or wait for a shuttle.  The walk takes about 10 minutes. 2.) Hotel has a nice combo for adults and kids.  I can imagine that parents would enjoy the adult bar atmosphere while the kids would love the pool. 3.) Room was a good size, clean and had a modern feel.  Great
Manager Response: laurafi,  Thank you for your great comments about Hotel Menage!  We appreciate your compliments but more importantly we appreciate your business!  Your points are valid and we do create a value for price paid.  Not only is our hotel great for kids, but we do also like to create a great place for adults as well...  In addition, we don't like to "nickel and dime" our customers.  As far as parking is concerned, we wanted to provide a full service valet and our parking is run by an outside company, hence we do have the minimal charge for the service.  We also wanted to create a great sensory experience, hence we play the pool music from 10am till 10pm and we will look to see if the volume is too loud.  Again thank you for both your constructive and complimentary feedback we take ever review to heart.  We look forward to seeing you again at Hotel Menage!  Thank you,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: Good points: nice pool area, ample parking, large room, free wifi, nice tv, location, bed decent Bad points: loud b/c of freeway and kids (door not sealed well), restaurant average food and poor service, leaky shower  I agree that you can tell they've remodeled most of the room, but the bathroom leaves something to be desired. Lighting is bad for makeup and tub is really shallow. But like most people on vacation, you don't spend that much time in the room. The common areas are nice and the pool area is enjoyable unless there is a 4yo screamer like I experienced. I'd recommend it for the price. Self parking is $10/day.
Manager Response: pajinski,  Thank you for your comments about Hotel Menage...  We definitely don't want to be known as "average"...  and it's thoroughly disappointing that you had a "average" experience at our hotel.  I will definitely make sure that I address your issues directly with the team about our k'ya restaurant.  In addition, we do get some rave reviews about our food and beverage service and quality so reading this review is not enjoyable for me...  I do hope you'll give us another opportunity to serve you again.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: Best hotel in Anaheim by FAR
Summary: Greeted by warm friendly staff, valet available but easy to self park.  The hotel atrium is something you would see in a movie and never expect in Anaheim.  Has a very trendy, young feel with great lighting & atmosphere that keeps you hooked before even getting to the room.  Large clean rooms with flat screen plasma TV's, lavish all-leather headboards, and overall a hotel feel that you would expect in Miami, not Anaheim - Disneyland area.  After staying at many hotels in the Anaheim - Disneyland area - This is by FAR the BEST.  6 stars for me.
Manager Response: rainmaker714,  6 STARS IS THE BEST RATING FOR US!  More importantly your loyalty to Hotel Menage is worth a life time of ratings...  Thank you for you kind words and we look forward to seeing you again!!!!  Regards,  Hotel Menage!

Summary Heading: Great stay - made travelling with kids easy!
Summary: My husband, myself and our two children (infant and toddler) travelled to Anaheim to go (where else?) to Disneyland.  We stayed at the hotel one night and could not have been more pleased with our stay and the restaurant.  We got two rooms for extra space (the front desk made some special arrangements so that we could have two adjoining rooms - one for us, the other for naps for the children).  The rooms were very nicely furnished with high quality bath amenities.  Rooms were very clean and quiet, the bed was super comfortable and the flat screen TV was a nice touch.  We also had a couch and small sitting area that were quite comfortable.  Room service was amazing - reasonable prices from their own restaurant (great food...more on that later), food arrived hot and very tasty in
Manager Response: LikesToTravel2006,  Although you and your family only had one night to spend with us, I am very glad you experienced what we strive to do at Hotel Menage!  Thank you for your accolades and I assure you the team will be very happy to hear of your experiences!  We love the fact that not only did you bring your kids to our Hotel, we are very glad you had some quality adult time to dine in our k'ya restaurant...  Thank you so much for your business and we look forward to seeing you again soon!  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: I just returned from my two night stay at the Hotel Menage, and wanted to compliment all of the staff.  Sylvia at the front desk discovered that I had forgotten my driver's license and credit card at the front desk, and immediately delivered them to my room within minutes of my check-in!  She was aIso very helpful at check-in, getting me a room close to the glass elevators. I was very happy with my room and the housekeeping staff, and did not find the freeway noise unacceptable at all, even though the room overlooked the pool and the I-5 freeway.  Once the door was closed, the noise was hardly noticeable.  The food at the restaraunt was excellent, and my bartender, Eileen, and cocktail watress, Elle, were both so friendly and personable, that it made my stay very enjoyable.  I
Manager Response: firedog13814,  Thank you for you comments about Hotel Menage!  Impressions are made special when people remember names of our staff that had the difference in everyone's visit to our hotel...  Thank you for pointing out specific people and trust me I will make sure to tell them personally of your great comments.  We pride ourselves on our service as anyone can build a palace, but unless the foundation of the team is there, you cannot continue to do business.  I appreciate your business and look forward to serving you again soon...  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary Heading: Nice ambiance, a bit on the loud side
Summary: The Hotel Menage must have at one point been a Days Inn or similar...it's a motel-style hotel, meaning the rooms face to the outside.  The rooms are all updated, nice flat screen TV's and spacious, simply decorated rooms.  It's definitely not the quietest hotel I've been in, as it's right on Harbour Blvd. and the 5 - great location but a lot of street noise.  They've also got two bars (one outside by the pool) and a very hoppin' restaurant which further elevated the noise level.  That said, the service was fantastic and we really enjoyed the restaurant and bar.  I would not call it a relaxing hotel, it's definitely geared toward a younger/family-free crowd.  We would stay again.
Manager Response: dm713,  Although the title of your review, at first sight, doesn't inspire a good visit, after reading your review, it seems you enjoyed your stay at Hotel Menage.  You are correct when you say we are close and convenient to the major roads and highway, but the majority of our rooms are not that noisy, so I'm sorry you experienced that in your room...   We do pride ourselves in being "family" friendly and as you may read in some of the other reviews, guests do bring the family for a vacation and enjoy the environment...  Thank you again for your compliments and we look forward to seeing you again soon at Hotel Menage!!!  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: We stayed here 4 nights.  Yes it is  between two major roadways and it is noisy.  The front desk people were fantastic.  Leo is a gift for any hotel company and Ashley was very willing to accomodate the internet rate.  We had a shower problem and a problem with the noise so Leo moved us twice.  The quietest area is room 258,358 area.  Leave the fan on and you mask the road noise.  For the rate we received I cannot complain.  It was clean, the staff was always willing to help.  It was within walking distance to Disneyland and we watched the fireworks from the hotel.    The internet photos are a little deceiving but usually they are.  The rooms are nice size and they will bring a frig to your room upon request.
Manager Response: sunshineTacoma_Wa,  Thank you for your comments about Hotel Menage...  Our team is here to accommodate whatever we need to and I'm happy that Ashley, Leo and the staff assisted you in any way they can.  As you notice on many reviews some people find the noise challenging, while others don't notice the noise.  Our "value" is what we strive to create and we hope that you will come visit us again soon...  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: I tried to book a reservation for two rooms directly with the hotel manager as I had read there were problems requesting an adjacent room online.  They would not honor the same rate that their DIRECT website offers.  I do not understand this as we were on the phone, had discussed the dates, and the rooms were available.  The manager said that their direct website was run by a third party.  Very confusing.  They also offered via another website a 3rd night free. Again, they would not do this when directly booking with the hotel manager. I don't like or appreciate the game of who you book with changes how much you pay.  I would have liked to stay here, and am disappointed in the "pricing war".  I will keep looking.  :(
Manager Response: OregonVisitor50,  First and foremost, I'm sorry that they did not accomodate you at our hotel with a "rate" I'm not sure exactly what happened, but if you can email me specifics at stay@casaresortsinc.com, I can assist you with this "issue" you may have had.  It may have been that the rate you originally saw online was no longer available and as occupancy dictates rates do increase.  I don't know why the review was posted as you did not even stay in our hotel  Please email me so I can assist you...  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: The First thing we noticed about the hotel, it smelled sooo good when we walked in the lobby from the valet center in front of the building, not soap or perfume just a light fresh fragrance that instantly changes your mood. The Staff was very attentive and polite, the valets were very nice young men.  The room was spotless and the only complaint I have was the freeway was noisy , NOT the hotel's fault.
