The young woman on duty Sunday morning was kind enough to get me a cup of coffee from the restaurant when I called to let her know I had made a mess of the coffee in my room, above the call of duty, I think her name was Linda (?) They also found my glasses and cell in my room, returned them immediately. Would recommend this place as a great romantic getaway
Manager Response: ejsmom2,  Thank you for your compliments and your business!  We at Hotel Menage pride ourselves on service and value and I am very happy that Linda assisted you as she did, I will make sure she get's the message...  Thank you for your comments and most importantly your business and we look forward to servicing you soon!!!  Regards,  Hotel Menage!

Summary Heading: Front Desk Staff Strive To Accomodate
Summary: This is the second year that we've stayed at Hotel Menage for our Disneyland / Legoland vacation. I must say that seeing Nick at the front desk for 2 years tells me that he likes his job and they must like him.  This year we had the new addition of our 6 month old daughter, but I forgot to ask about refrigerators and microwaves (which are not in the rooms). I envisioned running over to Chevron at 2:00am to warm up the baby's bottle. Carla and Tiffany from the front desk did everything they could to make sure we received a microwave for the week, and even when we had to extend our stay for one extra day, they took care of everything.   Folks, in the hospitality industry, it doesn't take much to mess up. It's how you handle the mess ups that DEFINE you, and Hotel Menage did what I
Manager Response: AAANorCal,  Thank you for your comments on Hotel Menage!  We appreciate your business and appreciate your compliments!!!  Thank you for being loyal to our hotel and we look forward to seeing you soon.  You are absolutely correct when you state this business is not rocket science and we work hard to please every customer every day...  Thank you again for staying at Hotel Menage...  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: The hotel is situated between multiple highways. Therefore, it is extremely noisy even when you close the door.  My shower didn't work the first morning I was there and they did not transfer me to another room. I had to shower in my co-workers room.  I went to check out and they didn't take anything off my bill even though my room didn't have a functioning shower!  I have been calling the hotel manager for 3 weeks now and she has failed to return my phone call. I spoke to her in person last week and she said she was going to call me back and she did not.  In addition to this issue, the overall stay was horrible. I would never recommend this hotel to anyone.
Manager Response: BizTravelMN,  I am truly sorry that this occured.  PLEASE EMAIL ME DIRECTLY AT stay@casaresortsinc.com and I will make sure to follow up with the manager!!!  Please email me ASAP...  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary Heading: Just Returned Great Service will stay again
Summary: We (Husband, Myself 2- 16 year old and 2- 18 year old girls) just returned froom our stay at hotel menage from 3/17-3/20.  After reading some of these reviews I was a bit concerned about the hotel's noise and cleanliness. I could not have been more pleased! The staff was professional, courteous and nice. From Ashley in reservations/front desk to Frank in the lobby bar it was all top notch.  The kids were also impressed, enjoyed using the computer center, pool and spa. The rooms: We had adjoining rooms, one king and two queens. The room was more spacious than the Grand Californian room, it was clean, the bathroom was not the big nightmare I keep reading over and over, it was quite simply a hotel bathroom, exact same layout as the Grand Californian room we stayed in last time.
Manager Response: Maleadanee,  I am so glad to read this review as it pleases us to no end that you and your family thoroughly enjoyed your stay at Hotel Menage!!!  Your review is what we need to keep alive in this type of economic environment and I assure you I'll pass on your accolades to both Ashley and Frank!!!  All that you said is exactly why we re-modeled Hotel Menage.  From the tropical pool to the comfortable beds we always strive to ensure every guest has a great experience.  Although the freeway is right next to the hotel I, like you believe the noise dissipates inside the room and your comment about it being like the sound of the "beach" from the pool is great!!!!  As far as our bathrooms are concerned, it is just that a bathroom, everything you need in a bathroom...  we spent more time focused on our guests sleep, food, and fun then we did the bathroom...  Thank you for your comments and we look forward to seeing you at Hotel Menage again soon!!!  Regards,  Hotel Menage....

Summary Heading: Not for families or young children!
Summary: I have seen a few reviews that give this hotel pretty good ratings, thus our reason for booking.  Upon arrival, the one lone bell person told us that he couldn't assist us with our bags because they were "slammed" earlier and he didn't have a cart available.  Mind you we were traveling with our 15 month old and had a lot of things.  When we got to our room there was no microwave as previously promised but we wanted to wait until morning because my husband expressed how "grouchy" the front desk guy was.  The room was decent sized, but lacked the amenities needed for a small child.  We were so tired from our drive we immediately went to bed.  Next morning we called about the microwave and someone named "Carla" kept giving us the run-a-round.  When I finally turned on the light to
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stayed here as part of a group attending the Natural Products Expo just one mile away.  I've never been on a business trip where I didn't need to leave the hotel at night for food, drinks, or to just have a good time.  The restaurant, bar, lounge, and outside tiki bar were great to come back to.  Great atmosphere!
Manager Response: BelmarkFun,  Thank you, thank you, thank you, we look forward to seeing you again soon!  Thanks for the comments and the business!!!  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: Recently attended a trade show at the Anaheim Convention Center - a quick cab ride from the Menage.  Front Desk, Sales & Catering and Bell Desk staff all excellent.  The proximity to Disneyland makes this an excellent hotel for business and family.  Hotel Lobby bar and meeting area is open and friendly.
Manager Response: Janesuez,  Thank you for your comments...  and we look forward to seeing you back again soon!!!  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary Heading: Yet another great experince at Hotel Menage
Summary: My husband and I made another stop at Hotel Menage for our honeymoon.  We were so impressed when the manager,   went above and beyond for us by upgrading us to the European suite.     When we arrived,  we went up to our room and were quite impressed,  the European suite is quite lovely,   double the size of the room we stayed in last time,  and probably larger than our urban apartment in Vancouver!  There was a lovely,  and comfy,  sittting area,  and the manager had left us a lovely bottle of Champagne chilling upon our arrival.   There was a king sized bed,  and a large bathroom,  with the largest shower I have been in to date.   There are these 2 huge televisions,  mounted on the wall in a unique way.   We really enjoyed our stay,  the staff were all incredibly friendly and
Manager Response: missusblackhart,  Thank you for your review for Hotel Menage!  We too are very happy with the way our suites turned out...  We actually have four different and unique suites North America, Africa, Europe and Asia, all very different and fun!  The European room has what is known as a "roll in" shower for wheel chair accessibility and the water flows downward to the drain.  I will make sure to follow up to see what we can do about the water spreading throughout the bathroom.  Congratulations again and thank you for your comments and business!  We too hope to see you soon!  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary Heading: Vegas meets the beach with style....
Summary: What a great hotel with a mixture of Las Vegas cool, meeting the warm tropics of Hawaii... The restaurant inside has great food and the name itself is catchy 'KYA'... I never knew being inland one could feel so close to the beach.... Thanks for a great stay and making my business trip that much better!
Manager Response: Jamo6342,  Thank you for your review and your absolutely right, being about 15 minutes from the beach we still have the "tropical" feel with our Hawaiian style Palapa bar and pool area!  Thank you for your business and please come visit us again soon!!!  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary Heading: Second Stay and Just as Great!
Summary: We went to Disneyland last year and stayed at the Hotel Menage and went back this year and stayed there again.  It's a great hotel, with great prices, great food and wonderful atmosphere.  Our kids just loved the pool at spa.  They were so excited to be able to swim in the pool in February.  The rooms are oversized and comfy!  It was also great to have free internet access.  We ate at K'ya restaurant in the hotel again and had a nice meal.  The food at K'ya is plentiful, tasty and reasonably priced.  We would definately stay there again for future Disneyland trips.  It's so close to the park you could walk or drive from there.  It is close the the freeway, so reserve early and ask for a room that is more 'soundproof''.  You can hear the freeway but we got used to it and got
Manager Response: PatriciaAZ,  Thank you for your comments and business...  We are very pleased to hear you and your family had the pleasure of enjoying our hotel not once, but twice!!!  We strive to create value for all, and although the hotel looks geared toward adults, we do have the 24 hour pool, and internet room for the kids too!  We look forward to seeing you again (for the third time!) soon!  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: Our experiance at the Hotel Menage was wonderful.  From the moment we pulled up to the entrance there was someone there waiting to help us with our bags, shows to our room and answer the many question we had. Everyone working there was very polite and helpful. The room was very clean and  very roomy.   The pool area was awsome and the food in the resturant and at the bar was deliouse.  It is only two blocks from Disney.  My family and I HIGHLY reccomend it!!
Manager Response: pamatori,  We pride ourselves on our customer service and I'm very glad you experienced this!  Thank you for your business and your comments and I will make sure all the team members read your compliments!!!  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: This was my second stay at the menange,my first in november of 2008. The staff is excellent,the hotel & grounds are awesome. The rooms are nice (ours smelled of fresh paint however),but the I-5  is close and it can be at times very noisy. They are about a 10 min walk to the parks,but I would recommend the resort transit  for the trip back after a long day.  We had dinner & breakfast in the K'YA restaraunt  and the service / food was very good. I recommend this hotel to others and its only drawback being that it is very close to the 5.
Manager Response: bigblue43,  Thank you for your repeat business to Hotel Menage!  We are glad you keep coming back and yes the team and food is our continually focus and I'm glad to hear you enjoyed them both!  Our proximity to Disneyland and their fireworks are both a plus and a minus....  the 5 freeway is adjacent the hotel and for the more sensitive ears, we have "quieter" rooms...  I hope this won't deter you from returning and we do hope to see you soon!!!  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: I stayed at the Menage during the week for a night. The main draws for me was the promise of comfortable beds and the "hip" factor. The hotel lobby is very cool. The bar was open pretty late, the beer selection could have been better. The room didn't disappoint. The mattres was very comfortable for a hotel mattress (Spring Air 4 Seasons) though it was pretty old judging by the double sided pillow top. Not only do they have plasmas in the room, but actual hi-def channels. We watched the grammys in hi-def and stereo. The service is top noch. Everyone was very freindly and helpful. Especially the night desk man who got me a fork from the kitchen when I wandered to the lobby drunk at 3am. As stated in previous posts, this is not the place to stay if you want to sleep in. At about 7
Manager Response: anotherlogan,  Thank you for your ratings for Hotel Menage!  We do pride ourselves on our service and value so I'm very pleased to hear that our Night Manager was able to assist you during a time of need...  The rooms are appointed very nicely and we appreciate that you enjoyed yourself.  All our pillow top beds were replaced about a year ago so I'm shocked that you thought the bed was old.  If you get a chance I would like to look at the beds specifically so please email me at stay@casaresortsinc.com and reference this review with the room number so I can correct the issue.  In addition, we are both "Hip" and family oriented so I'm sorry they awoke you during your slumber...  We hope you will visit with us again soon and thank you for your business!!!  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: I recently stayed at the Menage for a business convention.  The service was impeccable and the rooms were very comfortable with a nice modern flair.  The food was outstanding!  I enjoyed their incredible guava meatballs the most!   The owners are  very gregarious, fun, well informed and professional.  They make you feel like you are special guests in their own homes.  They also have another property in Laguna called the Casa Del Camino that is known for their incredible "Rooftop" restaurant and bar, where you can see some of the best views of the Pacific.
Manager Response: CTHOMASG,  Thank you for your review about Hotel Menage!!!  We appreciate your comments and we do have some great properties in Southern California!!!  Thank you for your business and we hope you'll come visit us again from LA soon!!!  Regards,  Hotel Menage!

Summary Heading: Sooooo noisy but nice decor and conveniently located
Summary: I read a review that said that this hotel, depsite being next to the freeway, was not noisy.  Wrong!!!  Our room was so loud, not just from the freeway noise and Harbor Blvd, but from the showers of the adjoining rooms and the people walking outside.  The freeway noise was obviously the loudest of all of the noises though.  What's humorous is that we asked the front desk whether the rooms were noisy and we were assured that they were "well insulated" and we'd be found "a good room."  I'm so glad our room was not on the back side of the hotel (where the majority of the rooms are located) because we'd have never gotten any sleep.  Our room faced Harbor and was plenty loud enough.  I would not stay here again as I value sleep too much.  That being said, the beds were very
Manager Response: ICULOOKTOO,  I'm very sorry you thought the rooms were too loud.  As you can see reviews are subjective, and many people do not really mind the location, rather they enjoy the proximity to the park as well as the freeway.  It is obviously close to traffic, but most guest don't experience what you did.  The rooms are well appointed and your room with the concrete are only on the 1st floor, the rest of the hotel has carpet throughout the room.  Hotel Menage is "pet friendly" hence we have the first floor with stained concrete.  The restaurant has won many accolades so I don't know what you ordered, but we do get many good compliments about our food...  We do hope you'll give us another try...  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: My girlfriend and I make our annual trip to Disneyland from Northern Califonia for our anniversary. We've been to Disneyland many times and have to say that this was the best trip yet. I have never stayed at a hotel that alone made our trip more exciting. The rooms were extravagant, clean and the best I've seen in So-Cal. The pool/spa area was relaxing and also open 24 hours which was great. The staff was friendly as well as fellow guests that were there (probably because they were as happy as we were.). I have to say though that the best part of this hotel was the bartender, Andrew. Out of all of the fancy restaurants and hotels I have ever been to, I have never experienced service like his. So thanks to Andrew and the hotel menage for our amazing anniversary and we can't wait
Manager Response: snowking123,  Thank you for your comments about Hotel Menage!  Why wouldn't anyone be happy to be at the "happiest place on earth?", it doesn't make any sense, especially these days and times!  We pride ourselves on great customer service and great value all of which you experienced!  We will make sure to pass on your wonderful comments about Andrew and yes, your right, he's a great bartender!!!  Thank you for your business and we look forward to seeing you soon!  Regards,  Hotel Menage!

Summary Heading: why is this not rated higher?
Summary: Hotel menage was wonderful.  The hotels were perfect sizes for 4 people with even a little extra room.   i went with 5 friends while staying at disneyland and it was a blast.  One nice feature about the hotel is that the pool and hottub are open 24 hours a day, so me and my friends could go whenever we wanted.  Also the vibe you get from the hotel is not kid-like at all, and is perfect if you want somewhere to stay that is not packed with kids and childish decor.  The walk to disneyland was great from the hotel which saved lots of money not having to drive all the time.  Also, the k'ya restaurant is definately something you have to check out when you go, amazing food, and people are not lying about the mac and cheese it is to die for.  The place does allow pets, but we got a
Manager Response: greenprincess20,  I think we need to us you as our new "Marketing Campaign"!!!  Your comments were fabulous!  Thank you for all your words, we too would like to be ranked higher!!!  Our service and food is great and most importantly we thrive on the value of what we give to every customer!!!  Thank you again and we look forward to seeing you sooner than later!!!!  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary Heading: great location if you don't mind the traffic
Summary: We stayed for a week to visit Disneyland etc.  I had emailed ahead to request a fridge and microwave for our rooms.  These were installed within a half hour of our arrival.  Similarly, I had asked for adjoining rooms away from the freeway - this was also arranged.  The rooms are spacious and, although the bathrooms are quite cramped and a little tired looking, the staff work hard to make the hotel run well.  Nothing was a problem, from sorting out internet access to ground transportation.  K'ya restaurant has tasty well presented food at reasonable prices, the pool area is well maintained and the gym clean and accessible.  Yes, the hotel sits between three major roads, so the road noise is constant, but it's a quick walk down to Disney and if you have a car and need to get on
Manager Response: ecossienne,  Although the roads are close to the hotel, the rooms are fairly well insulated so depending on the "sensitivity" it typically is not a huge issue...  I'm glad you experienced the great staff and the great food at Hotel Menage and we thank you for all your words, most importantly we thank you for your business and look forward to seeing you soon!!!  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: The room was wonderful, very spacious and great design.  The shower and bathroom met all of my needs and was very nice.  The restaurant k'ya was amazing. Great food, service, and atmosphere. Everyone I met working at the hotel was friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: courtneyfb,  Thank you for your comments about Hotel Menage!  We are very proud of the food and beverage quality as well as the service...  Thank you for your business and since you are so close, we look forward to seeing you again soon!!!  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary Heading: A Valentines Day I will never forget!
Summary: Hotel Menage was absolutely wonderful!!!! So modern and chic..everthing about my stay at this hotel was perfect! Our room was adorable, minimalist design but trendy at the same time. The staff is the friendliest staff I have ever encountered at such a trendy boutique hotel. I would highly recommend watching the Disneyland firework show by the pool which is breathtaking and romantic :) Not to mention the 24 hr pool/spa which is a BIG plus! I will defenitely be staying at this hotel again soon!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Beautiful hotel, loved it!! modern, loved the big tv in the room, huge comfy bed, nice pool-was a bit too cold out to enjoy it but still nice. I had room 312, facing Habor blvd-yeah its noisy when you step out of the room-but you don't hear a thing when you're in the room. The staff was awesome, Brenda from the front desk is very friendly and super helpful. They hooked me up with a shuttle to take me back to LAX, so that was great. The "Red room" was fun, big lava lamp, nice sofa. I'd say its not for people traveling with family BUT great location if your going to visit Disney! Its right down the street, you can literally walk there.   Overall-Super nice, modern, awesome hotel-WILL BE BACK AGAIN!!
Manager Response: Lisar211,  Thank you for your kind words about Hotel Menage!  We appreciate the business and look forward to seeing you again soon!  You are absolutely correct, the noise is obviously there, however once you get into the room, it's pretty non existent.  You are also correct about our team!  We are pleased Brenda (specifically) attended to your needs!  She will be happy to hear your comments!!!  Thank you again,  Hotel Menage...

Summary Heading: Very beautiful on the first floor. I wish I could say the same about our room.
Summary: My boyfriend and I stayed at Hotel Menage for our Anniversary/Valentines Day while visiting Disneyland.  We had a wonderful time at Disneyland, and decided to leave at 3:00 p.m. to check in, relax a bit, and then walk back to Disneyland until they close.  The walk is really close, just right over the freeway.  The lobby and bar area is amazing, very modern and impressive.  The pool was beautiful, too bad it was so cold out.  The staff was very nice and helpful.  We walked up to our room and it looked nice right off the bat, but then I started noticing things I wasn't so sure about.  It looked like a room at the Motel 6, only with new carpet, updated furniture and a plasma T.V.  It had this dark dingy feeling, It looked nothing like the pictures from the website.  The bed was
Manager Response: nisskittin,  First and foremost thank you for your comments regarding Hotel Menage.  Secondly, if you could email us at stay@casaresortsinc.com your room number we can look into all the "issues" you experienced.  Lastly I want to personally apologize for your experience.  As most of our guest have good things to say, I'm sad to hear of your troubles.  The hotel has been completely renovated.  We did change the tile, painted, changed all fixtures and all our toilets to "low-flow" environmentally friendly tanks...  We will be replacing some additional tubs as well.  I hope you will give us another opportunity to serve you in the near future.  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: We stayed here for our honeymoon and LOVED it!!!  but there is one thing that I will advise.  It is better to book through the actual hotel rather than other sites such as hotels.com.  I say this, because the actual hotel will know exactly what they have and what the rooms/suites are called.  When I found this hotel on the internet, I went to hotels.com and saw the pictures of the suite and it was exactly what we wanted.  When I called Hotels.com I told them that I wanted the king SUITE. The hotels.com rep said, "Oh that's great, we have a room with a king size bed and a sofa and a 42" plasma TV." I said, "Ok good, I want the king SUITE." So I went ahead and booked it (what I thought was the SUITE). We did think it was a really really good deal and didn't think anything else of
Manager Response: em020709,  First and foremost, I am very sorry that you were told that the Studio Room was a suite.  We have four suites that start at $350 per night and go up to $750 per night.  All our rooms are newly renovated and quite nice, as you experienced, so again I'm sorry that they told you that you were booking the "Suite"...  I am however very pleased to hear that our night manager upgraded you for the last night of your stay...  Congratulations on your marriage and we hope to see you again soon at Hotel Menage hopefully sooner than later!!!!  Thank you for your business!  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: We booked in here for three nights to take our four year old to Disneyland and ended up staying for six and used it as a base for exploring the rest of Orange County. Hotel location can't be bettered, a ten minute walk from Disneyland and right off the freeway network so really easy to find. The coastal beaches at Newport and Huntingdon are only a 20 minute drive. Staff were first class (especially the concierge) , rooms well laid out and spacious and the pool area with jacuzzi pool excellent. The bonus of free internet access was very helpful too.  The attached restaurant K'ya was fantastic, breakfasts were first class and the steaks to die for. It can be a little noisy in the room at night with the traffic, but we were so tired after walking all day it made no difference.  You
Manager Response: Shugsterhigs,  Thank you for your comments!  I will make sure to let the concierge know that you enjoyed their services...  We strive to make every guest experience perfect, and we are very glad we accomplished that with you!  We pride ourselves on value with complimentary wireless and a great food and beverage prices...  We hope you will be able to visit Hotel Menage again soon and please let the UK know about us!!!!  Thank you for your business...  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: Went to maui on our honeymoon and stayed here on the way back.  great location, just a 15 min walk to the park.  can see the fireworks from the pool.  supposed to be family oriented but seems more for a romantic getaway given the decor of the place.  good prices too.
Manager Response: Yvesrn,  Thank you for your compliments!  We appreciate your business and feedback and hope to see you at Hotel Menage again soon!!!!  Regards, Hotel Menage

Summary: We picked this hotel primarily because of its newly renovated rooms and the fact that it wasn't a family orientated hotel, therefore less likelihood of there being hundreds of kids!   As it turned out, I did not see one child at the hotel for the length of my stay. Great for those people who want to see Disneyland, but who are not travelling as a family.   We were in a standard room on the fifth floor, almost directly opposite the elevators. I initially thought that this would be a noise issue, but it wasn't at all. Yes, outside the room walking along the corridor to the elevator, the freeway is very noisy, but inside the rooms we did not hear one bit of it!  The walk to the disneyland entry gate was less than 10 minutes at a leisurely pace.   The rooms are decorated
Manager Response: Carmen88,  Thank you for your great compliments...  I will make sure to pass on your comments to both Andrew and Frank and I hope you had a great time in Anaheim... and of course Vegas for NYE!!!!  Thank you for your business and we look forward to seeing you again soon!  Take care of yourself in Perth!  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: Our group booked two rooms.  We had adults, teenagers and two younger children.  Everyone enjoyed their stay.  The rooms were great.  Comfy beds and a large flat screen tv.  Our only concern was that we took our laptop but could only use it in the lobby.  The cleaning staff were very friendly and didn't come into our rooms if we put the "do not disturb" signs on. The lobby staff were great also.  Very friendly and very helpful.  They helped organize a trip to Medieval times, a tour of L A and our taxi back to LAX.   Thanks!!! The restaurant had really good food with big portions.  When we were there they gave us our own heater because it was chilly.  They treated us very well.  We used the pool and hot tub everyday which was a nice way to end the evenings. Sometimes we walked to
Manager Response: Marthamorin,  Thank you very much for your kind words and compliments!!!  Yes we did have some issues with our internet throughout the hotel and for a short time only worked "right" in the lobby, luckily everything is working correctly and is fixed.  I will make sure that I pass on your accolades to our team!  We work hard to ensure value and service is the top priority and love hearing good things...  Thank you again and we hope to see you soon at Hotel Menage...  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: The staff at this hotel went above and beyond when it came to customer service, including management.  The grounds are very pretty, and the hotel is very clean.
Manager Response: ClovisDonna,  Thank you for your comments!  We appreciate all feedback and do enjoy hearing your positive thoughts as well!!!  We look forward to seeing back soon!!!!  Regards,  Hotel Menage!

Summary Heading: Close to disneyland but no cigar...
Summary: Menage was a mixed bag.  we loved:  - Location (just 15 minutes walk from Disneyland) - Lobby (very trendy and cool) - Service (I felt that staff did their best) - Parts of room (HDTV 42" LCD, Bed, furniture) - Actual HD signal on the HD TV, very nice~! - pool looked  nice but it was too cold to use because of weather  Lukewarm on: - setup of hotel (motel style outdoor hallways leading to rooms) - Parts of room (heater was a unit in the room, very loud motel heater)  didn't like:  - noise (hotel is in between 3 large roads) - bathroom door and wall was obviously very old and not well cleaned up. Seems like an old motel with a new coat of paint along with chips on bottom of door - room cleaning staff   we returned to the room at 1pm for a nap, the room had already been cleaned
Manager Response: TravelAddictCouple,  Thank you for writing your review on trip advisor.  I'm sorry that you felt we did not meet all of your expectations.  The team here prides itself on service, so I'm curious as to what you meant with "did their best"...  They are always focused on customer service so more detail would be beneficial so we can correct the situation.  As far as the AC units are concerned, we do not have central AC/Heat, however the units never really give us any issues, I will have our Engineering department look into your specific room.  In addition, or houskeeping supervisors do come back to inspect the room and that is probably what occure, however, they should be able to hear someone in the room and I will follow up with the houskeeping team.  We do hope that you will give us another opportunity and visit Hotel Menage soon...  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: I cannot tell you how incredible this hotel is. It has a great location, close to shopping and Disneyland. The Hotel looked like a beautiful resort and the hotel staff was so helpful! I will go back in a heart beat. My boyfriend and I could not have had a better stay! Thank you!
Manager Response: kdkr7,  Thank you for your comments!  We look forward to seeing you back at Hotel Menage!!!  I will make sure to pass on your gracious comments to the team!!!  Regards,  Hotel Menage!

Summary Heading: Wonderful hotel in a great location
Summary: We had a wonderful stay at the Hotel Menage.  The staff was wonderful and attentive from the bell boy to the front desk and the waiters in the restaurant.  Oh, the food at the restaurant was delicious and the portions were huge.  After the first meal, we order to share among ourselves as we could not finish a serving each.  It was value for money.  The rooms were modern and the beds were comfortable.  It was close to the pictures in their website.  We were worried the noise from the freeway as mentioned in several of the reviews but it was not a problem once we closed the door.  We had a problem with the air-conditioning unit which was very noisy and upon calling the front desk, they sent someone up to fix it almost immediately.  Although they could not rectify the problem, they
Manager Response: LibraGalSingapore,  Thank you for your comments regarding Hotel Menage!!!  We pride ourselves on value for price paid and service and I'm very glad that you experienced both!  Your "noise" comment is right on.  The perception of the freeway is worse than the actual noise and we are very glad you enjoyed the room.  Thank you for your business to Hotel Menage and we look forward to seeing you again soon in Anaheim!!!  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary Heading: A departure from ALL the subpar cookie cutter Anaheim hotels
Summary: I live about 1,000 miles away and have been to Anaheim 10+ times. I've stayed in many different hotels in the vicinity of Disneyland. While some were better than others, not by much. They're all mediocre at best and that's stretching it. Anaheim is full of cookie-cutter lodging. Where the difference between $100 a night and $300 is a continental breakfast. Prior to this stay I would of said to anyone to set their expectations super low as far as their hotel stay is concerned. Then came the Menage.   Price: I was super nervous to stay at this hotel because of the rate I got. Super cheap usually equals super run down. But, I figured that I've always been disappointed so why not pay less for it. I stumbled upon this hotel on Expedia and booked 2 double queen rooms for Dec 5-15th. I
Manager Response: Bulldogsnob,  What can I say....  WOW.... You should travel the world and review hotels professionally!   Thank you for your comments, specifically regarding Paul and Brenda.  I will make sure to pass on your accolades to them directly.  We pride ourselves on service and value and appreciate your feedback.  We agree with your comments about the hotels in the Anaheim area being all the same so we designed Hotel Menage with customers like you in mind who would enjoy the 42" plasma, a comfortable bed along with great service.  We look forward to seeing you and your family again soon, but most importantly we thank you for your business!!!!  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary Heading: Not the same old, same old
Summary: This hotel is different from anything you will find in the Disneyland area - what a relief! I highly recommend it for your next visit!
Manager Response: AXOHeritage,  Thank you for your kind words...  We hope you will come visit us again soon...  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: The Hotel was very hip and fun. I had a fabulous time and really enjoyed my stay. The staff was helpful and accomodating. The Restuarant was also delicious.
Manager Response: amj87,  Thank you for your business!  We hope you will come back and see us again soon!  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: great hotel as well as value
Summary: We found this hotel on line and were hoping the photos matched with reality. They not only matched but exceeded our expectations. The rooms were incredibly spacious and clean. All the staff from the front desk to housekeeping were courteous and helpful with information on how to navigate Disney most effectively. Restaurant excellent especially for breakfast to last while at Disney. Pool and outside bar fantastic. We were as sorry to leave the hotel as we were to leave Disney. Fantastic value.
Manager Response: fergisWisconsin,  Thank you for your comments about the food and most importantly the staff.  We work hard to exceed guest expectations and I'm very happy to hear your experiences...  In addition, you are correct that the hotel photo's are actually what you get when you arrive...  Thank you for your business and we look forward to seeing you again at Hotel Menage!e are glad.  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: I have spent a lot of time traveling, in LA, USA, and all over the world.  Every time I go to or through LA, I now always stay here.  It is simply the best.  The staff are exceptional, second to none! With customer service that is unheard of in LA.  The location is great, you can see and hear the fireworks at Disney, and the rooms are clean and very modern.  Tiffany and her staff are superb, I really can not recommended this hotel any higher!
Manager Response: dcm79,  I am so glad to hear you comments!  Specifically regarding Tiffany and the front office team!  We do pride ourselves on customer service and we thank you for your kind words!  We look forward to seeing you soon at Hotel Menage!!!  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: i rally enjoyed the ambiance of the hotel and the food was great at k'ya restaurant. Thank You hotel menage will only stay here for future anaheim trips
Manager Response: brandon08,  We look forward to seeing you soon!  Thank you for your business to Hotel Menage and your kind words....  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: I only spent one night at this hotel recently with 3 friends and it was very good value for money! The room was very nice,spacious and clean.No problems at all! I only had time to sleep here so i can't say anymore really-very good! Oh it was a very nice touch to have the front door entrance opened for us every time we came in and out :)
Manager Response: Marianne78,  Thank you for your business!  Altough a short stay we hope that next time you visit Anaheim you'll be able to come experience more of what Hotel Menage has to offer!   Thank you,  Hotel Menage...

Summary Heading: Great Hotel!!  The front desk was very accomodating and helpful.
Summary: Hotel was great!  Comfortable rooms and beds.  Nice pool and bar area.  For the the price you pay you are getting a really great value. The hotel staff was very accomodating and pleansant to deal with.  The hotel decor (rooms included) were sleek but not stuffy.  I would stay here again for sure!
Manager Response: dkruzer,  Thank you for your kind words about the hotel and the team!!!  We appreciate the business and look forward to seeing you again in Anaheim...    Thank you!!!  Hotel Menage...

Summary: This hotel was a visual delight.  The service was exceptional; staff went out of their way to meet our needs.  The beds were very comfortable and each had 4 perfect pillows.  It also has a lovely pool area. . .like a mini-resort.  Add to this it is less than half a mile from Disneyland and it was more than reasonably priced.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Just got back from the menage i have stayed at many hotels and by far this hotel has the best staff I think for the money you spend you are getting such a bargin we walked to down town disney and the garden walk not that far at all.The bed was very comfy also plenty of pillows I think 6 . plasma on the wall all was great everyone was great from the valet guys to the front desk staff  to the housekeeping all had smiles and said hello i have stayed at other big hotels in disney area but nothing compares to the staff you have at  this hotel and i didnt have to spend 400anight  thanks to all the staff nov 28,29th
Manager Response: capoworm,  Thank you for your kind words.  You are absolutely correct when you say the staff is "5 Diamond".  We pride ourselves on our service and more importantly we thank you for your business and your comments!  I will make sure the team hears your accolades!  We look forward to seeing you at Hotel Menage again soon...  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: Lovely hotel with excellent staff, the lobby and restaurant was furnished in a very artistic way.  Comfortable bed.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review! We can't wait for you to come back and visit us again!

Summary: We just left this hotel a few hours ago.  We weren't sure what to expect, as we booked it online, using previous guest comments as our guide - you never know...everyone's taste is a little bit different.  We have to say, however and in agreement with all the other comments, that the staff at this hotel went above and beyond in every way.  We felt so bad that we didn't tip the doorman more on our way out that we almost turned around and went back!  Our room was facing the pool and the freeway noise was not a problem, at all.  We all slept like babies.  The shuttle was quick and easy.  We will definately stay there again in the future.
Manager Response: MACJackDaddy,  Thank you for your word about the staff...  Our Team at Hotel Menage strives to make everyone feel like a part of the family and more importantly tries to deliver the highest quality of service possible.  I will make sure that the bell men at check in hears your words of praise...  Again thank you for your business to Hotel Menage and we look forward to seeing you in Anaheim again soon!  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: The staff at this hotel went out of their way to provide service, firstly by fast email responses to all my questions about disneyland, as they provide a free shuttle and we also walked it one night safely on sidewalks without crossing any streets. Plus MENAGE matched expedia's cost of $97 nightly, I stayed at a Marriott also during my stay and I certainly rate menage higher. The food was amazing and I recommend sharing meals as there is plenty of food, we received at 10% discount off our meals also. Our first night we got in late and even though the bar was closed they happily provide us with beer (oh yeah they also have a half price happy hour) As for the kids they loved the pool and hot tub and the kids watched the fireworks from the pool area while I sat at the outdoor bar
Manager Response: monikaCalgaryAlberta,  Thank you so much for your kind words!  We work hard to ensure all our customers are treated like family.  Although we will never be that "5 diamond hotel" we strive to ensure that service levels are the best in the Anaheim Area!!!  Thank you again for your words and most importantly your business!  We look forward to seeing you at Hotel Menage again soon!!!  Regards,  Hotel Menage!

Summary: We have just returned to Australia from an American holiday.  We stayed 6 days at Hotel Menage and found it to be excellent.  The staff were very friendly and helpful no  matter what we asked.  Our room was very comfortable.  We dined in the K'ya Restaurant and found the meals were delicious, very good value and presented attractively.  We only walked 15 minutes to Disneyland.  Public transport was at the front door.  A special thank you to the honest staff who found my handbag, which I had left in the restaurant.
Manager Response: shellales,  Thank you for your kind comments regarding Hotel Menage!  We do want every guest to experience your level of service, from the value of product to our customer service we continually strive to make everyone's stay perfect!  We look forward to seeing you again soon at Hotel Menage and thank you for your business!!!  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: Beautiful Lobby, Lackluster Rooms, Awful Bathrooms
Summary: My husband and I spent two nights (Friday/Saturday) at Hotel Menage last weekend.  While the lobby is absolutely gorgeous, the pool/spa area is wonderful, and the staff we encountered were friendly and knowledgeable, the room was a major disappointment.  I highly agree with the review of MollyRoger from 11/8/08.  It's very apparent, even from the road, that this is an old motel that received a somewhat unsuccessful makeover treatment.   First of all, the rooms all open to the outside. They aren't easy to access--the elevator is far from the lobby and requires backtracking even if your room is in the middle of the building (we stayed in Room 315). There are several gates from the building to the parking lot that require a key card to access--in general, we found navigating
Manager Response: BeachgalLaurie,  I am truly sorry about your experiences at Hotel Menage.  While we did finish the hotel renovations, and the bathrooms were finished as well, we are continually working on the issues you mentioned in your review.  Altough the size of the bathrooms will not be addressed, we will be enhancing the bathrooms next year and assure you that these enhancements will reflect better for the hotel.  I do hope you will give us another opportunity at Hotel Menage.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: A Stunningly Hip Property...Totally Different from the Old Humm Drumm
Summary: As a former flight attendant, I have stayed in many MANY hotels!! Hotel Menage is seductively different..  The hotel rivals that of a Las Vegas or Upscale Los Angeles resort retreat.  The staff is EXCELLENT... there's just no other words I can think of to describe them.  Dinner at K'ya reminded me of dinner at Tao ( Ceasars,Las Vegas).. Simply put..I LOVE THIS HOTEL.. No if's and's or but's about it.  It's been my choice twice in the past 2 months and my 3rd is rapidly approaching..  Mr. Ham, thank you so much for the option for the upgrade during my last stay. Unfortunately I didnt recieve your personal message until I returned to my room after an awesome night of "taking in the sights" Your hospitality is very refreshing and is why I know this hotel will be the success that I
Manager Response: Spinboy,  Thank you for all your kind words...  The team at Hotel Menage continually strives to exceed our customers expectations and we thank you for all your compliments!  Please let us know how we can assist in the future and we look forward to seeing you again soon!!!!  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: I highly recommend this hotel. I tour manage musicians and we've stayed at this hotel twice within the year and each experience has been incredible. The hotel staff especially the front desk staff took amazing care of us. The rooms were always ready when we checked in early, I was always greeted with a smile and the rooms are extremely comfortable. I love the design of the rooms as well. If you're looking for great food nearby, go no further. Their on-site restaurant is spectacular. I will always stay at Hotel Menage whenever I'm in that area.
Manager Response: tourmanager08,  Thank you for your continual business to Hotel Menage...  We appreciate your kind words and look forward to seeing you on your next "tour" to the Anaheim area.  I will make sure to pass on the great words/compliments to the staff at the front office and k'ya...  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: My wife and I stayed at Hotel Menage for our 2nd Anniversary vacation to Disneyland.  I mentioned this to Richard Ham, Hotel Manager and he arranged for an upgraded room (walk-in shower, two 42" plasma TV's, King Size bed, living room, and partial kitchen) and for a complimentary bottle of wine, cheese, and fruit to be waiting for us upon our arrival. The hotel is fully renovated with a reasonably priced upscale-looking dining room and a large patio and pool area.   The venue is within a 10-minute walk from Disneyland and there are also shuttles that take you there. I cannot say enough good things about this hotel and I was shocked at how reasonably priced it was for how great it is.
Manager Response: MJS_in_Victoria,  Thank you!  That's all, Just Thank YOU!!!  Happy Anniversary Again...  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary Heading: 3.5 star lobby; 2 star rooms-- at best
Summary: This is the most BIZARRE hotel in which I have ever stayed. No lie.  I've stayed in many, many hotels and motels ranging from the ultra- luxurious to the basic Motel 6, and I'm still trying to puzzle this one out.  This was once a straight up motel-- a Holiday Inn, I believe-- until it was purchased and reworked into a "luxury boutique hotel." It appears to have been designed by people who had seen a luxury hotel on TV and maybe even walked through the lobby of one once, but clearly had never stayed in anything even remotely approaching a luxury hotel.  Lemme break it down: The lobby, restaurant, bars, and pool area, are, for the most part, gorgeous, very hip, and upscale. You can tell they dumped a ton of money in here. The rooms themselves, however, are disappointing at best.
Manager Response: MollyRoger,  I'm sorry that you felt the way you did.  We do strive to make every guest feel at home.  Obviously design is very subjective and unfortunately you did not feel the hotel met your standards.  We do try to create a great value for Hotel Menage to ensure guests feel like they are getting value for price paid and a good ambiance on top of that.  We are truly sorry the hotel did not meet your expecations, but we did spend quite a bit of money on not only the lobby and public spaces, but the room as well.  We are working on a better solution for the bathrooms as you mentioned.  Most of our customers are quite happy with the product and especially the food and beverage.  Our coffee is a well known brand and again am sorry that it did not meet your expectations.  We do hope you will give us another opportunity.  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: Oct 27 thru Nov 1, 2008. We booked a room for my husband and myself, for our 22nd anniversay. This room was INCREDABLE! Out stay was perfect. Hotel is within walking distance to Disneyland, but there is also a shuttle service. All was good, would stay here again.
Manager Response: burgerbaby50,  Thank you for your great words!  We strive to make everyone's experience at Hotel Menage wonderful and I'm so glad you experienced just that, especially on your 22nd wedding anniversary...CONGRATULATIONS!  Please come visit us again soon!!!!  Regards,  Hotel Menage

Summary: The rooms were clean and modern. The service in every way was excellent and people really wantted to help you.  The pool was great at night and you could see the Disneyland fireworks every night.  I would come back again for sure.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel Menage was one of the best mid ranged hotels we have stayed at in a very long time. Since my family is healthy and active, we had no problem hiking the 3/4 mile to the main gate. The pool and hot tub were very warm and relaxing, escpecially when watching the firewarks with a Daquiri in hand! The entire staff was very friendly. Food was superb. Happy hour and Panini bar is the way to go for dinner when you have kids. The only problems were with the speed of the drain in tub. Everything else made up for that. We als enjoyed the cheap and prompt shuttles. Seems like everyone in the area knew of the hotel. THere was a wedding event one night, but it did not interfere with us playing in the 24 hour pool.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My partner and I had a wonderful vacation partially due to the fantastic service at Hotel Menage. EVERYONE we came in contact with was extremely helpful and nice. Food was good at the resturant, the room was very nice, the valet guys were awesome and everyone at the front desk was great. I would definetly stay here again.
Manager Response: Jennerator77,  Thank you for all your kind words!!!!  We will definately pass on the comments to the team as they will definately be pleased to hear of your great experience at Hotel Menage!  We look forward to seeing you soon in Anaheim!!!  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: My family and I stayed at Hotel Menage during our trip to Disneyland for Miley's bday party.  We will undoubtedly return to this hotel on our next visit.  The staff is absolutely the best with regard to service and hospitality. I had an opportunity to speak with the owner and discuss some of his vision for the hotel.  The only area that needed improvement, through our opinion, were the bathroom areas in the rooms.  He has already begun the renovation on certain rooms and what has been done is excellent.  The grounds were fabulous...with the pool, hot tub, outdoor music, tiki bar and more.  If you have a chance to stay here..do so...you won't regret it.
Manager Response: freightwest1,  Thank you so much for your positive comments!  Yes we know that the bathrooms need some work and we will be doing some of the renovations begining next year!  We look forward to seeing you at Hotel Menage on your next trip to the Anaheim / Southern Californian!!!  Regards,  Hotel Menage!

Summary Heading: The Only Place To Stay In Orange County
Summary: We recently had a girl’s night out and stayed at Hotel Ménage and loved it. The k’ya restaurant was phenomenal with an amazing wine list. The rooms are luxurious and make you feel like you’re staying at a five star hotel. We loved the pool and the fireworks are better at Hotel Ménage than being at Disneyland. We will definitely go back and stay at other Casa Resorts. If you are staying in Anaheim or Orange County it is the BEST place to stay and dine.
Manager Response: llima00127,  Thank you for your words and yes the fireworks are better at Hotel Menage as we have a "front row" seat from our pool deck.  I'm glad you liked our food and beverage operations and we look forward to seeing you again at Hotel Menage or any of our sister properties!  Thank you again,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: An upscale trendy hotel next to Disneyland.
Summary: I recently stayed at Hotel Menage for a girls weekend get away.  This hotel is very close to Disneyland so I was pretty sure it was going to have that similiar Disneyland atmosphere.  To my pleasent surprise, it had a very relaxing lounge type atmosphere catered towards adults yet kid friendly.  We had dinner at their K'ya Restaurant.  The service, food and wine list was excellent.    I have been trying to convince my husband to stay at a Hotel  by Disneyland for the weekend with the kids but, he is not one to surround himself with Disney and neither am I.  Now that I found this Hotel, we are looking forward to going to Disneyland in the day and escaping to the Menage at night were we will watch the Disneyland firework show after dinner poolside.  I am also in the process of
Manager Response: Bobcatt,  Thank you for your great review!  We continually try to exceed our customers expectations and I'm so glad the "girls" weekend worked out for you at Hotel Menage!  Altough we are a little trendy, as you may have noticed, the kids enjoy the ambiance as well!  We look forward to seeing you and your family in the future!  Thank you,  Hotel Menage!

Summary: We stayed at the hotel for 1 night and enjoyed everything: clean room, comfortable beds, large plasma TV, very nice pool, etc.  The location is great.  The hotel staff is very nice, especially their front desk manager.  She is super nice and friendly!  We highly recommend the Hotel Menage.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Not sure why people complain so much, this hotel was great!  Sure it is next to the freeway....who cares, but the time you get back to your room after a long day at Disenyland all you want is a comfortable bed to sleep in, and that is what you get.  The staff was great, the pool looked awesome..didnt get a chance to use it...and the rooms were clean, very very nice...except for the bathrooms which are in need of a facelift,  that would be my only complaint.   We had a great stay and think you would too.
Manager Response: Jam25,  Thank you for your compliments!  We will pass along your comments to our team, they really enjoy making everyone feel at home at Hotel Menage!  Yes you are correct the bathrooms need some more work, we are planning on doing them again next year and assure you, you'll be very happy...  Thank you again for your comments and we look forward to seeing you again at Hotel Menage!  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: My family and I just returned from our vacation in LA. And we stayed @ the Menage Hotel. I didn’t even look at the reviews till after I had already booked and paid for our room. I just followed my instincts and booked it. From the details on the hotels website, the hotel looked very comfy and it was very affordable. After booking our room, I read most of the reviews and became very afraid and debated on canceling, but I decided to just stick it out - after all, I figured that we wouldn’t be in the room that much, besides just to sleep.   Upon our arrival @ the Menage, the staff welcomed us with open arms and they were very friendly and helpful. There were no lines upon check in which made it much more easier for us, since we have an 11yr who was ready to sleep. We were assigned
Manager Response: GreatfulHawaii,  Thank you for your comments on trip advisor regarding Hotel Menage!  We do want everyone to feel like a part of the family and it looks like we suceeded with you and yours...  Unfortunately parking is run by an outside company and the rates just cover the costs of payroll and as you may know all full service hotels in the Anaheim area charge for parking (most charge more than we do).  As far as the deposit, we will review this with our team and look at revising the daily charge...  Thank you again and we look forward to seeing you soon at Hotel Menage!  Regards,  Management...

Summary: We stayed at the hotel Menage in June we were a bit worried at first because of the highways but didnt really hear the noise. We arrived early so i wasnt sure if we would be able to check in i asked the girl at the front desk and although our room wasnt ready she gave us one that was. Our room was straight past the front desk down a path  in front of the pool the room was nice but one night we had loud noise and music from the pool area until 2am i phoned the front desk shortly after the noise died down and had no more problems with that. The rooms were clean. The location is fantastic so close to disneyland with shuttle service every 20mins or so. The tour desk was convenient and the tour desk operator was very helpful. The restaurant was nice and the food was good. Overall we
Manager Response: Brian_Lani_Pattos,  Thank you for your kind words about Hotel Menage!  We continually pride ourselves on making everyone a part of the family!  I apologize about the music, yes at times, people do tend to get spirited out by the pool and I am glad they controled the noise...  Our Chef in k'ya is one of the best in town and we pride ourselves on not only the quality of the food, but the value of the dining experience.  We look forward to seeing you and your family again soon at Hotel Menage!!!!  Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: We stayed 10 nights at Menage and loved every minute of our stay. There were seven of us with 2 rooms. 4 adults and 3 children. The pool was lovely and clean and a delight to swim in. The happy hour at the Pool bar was well used particularly the meals. We were on a budget because there were 7 of us and if we ate at happy hour we well and truly came in below budget. The fireworks from Disneyland could be seen really well. (And of course heard!!) Yes the free way was noisy but certainly didnt interupt our sleep at all. The hotel staff particulary the bell boys and the concierege went out of there way to help us with anything we needed. The walk to Disneyland was an easy 10 minute stroll but we took the shuttle on a few occaions because of the heat. It cost us $3 for an all day
Manager Response: Kiwihookedontravel,  Thank you for your comments regarding Hotel Menage!  We appreciate your business and your thoughts regarding your stay.  As you mentioned the freeway is close, however we have "re-sealed" all the doorways and the noise has been considerably reduced...  I will make sure I pass on your feedback to the guest service staff and assure you that our Food and Beverage Manager will investigate what happened with the charges.  The kids eat free program should include the beverage...  We hope that your travels bring you back to Hotel Menage soon!  Thank you,  Management...

Summary: I booked my deal through expedia, and read the reviews after I did so. I was really worried about staying here, but it was okay. I was pleased that upon arriving early, the friendly staff was able to check us in right away. There is a lot of noise from the freeway, but when you close your door it's really not too bad. I think the pool music is louder then the freeway noise. They really blast that. Maybe in part to drown out the freeway noise,  it woke us up several times during naps through out our stay. I didn't call to complain. They lowered it a tad after our first day. Maybe someone else said something.  The pool wasn't heated as stated in the hotel book. But my kids ages 11 and 13 loved it even at night when it was cold out. They could easily jump in the very hot hot tub
Manager Response: ctells,  Thank you for your comments regarding Hotel Menage.  We read all reviews and assure you that we will look into all the comments you had made regarding your visit.  Our food at k'ya is quite good as we continually receive great comments regarding the quality.  I will pass on your great comments regarding the team members.  We do have laundry soap at the front desk and provide refridgerators and microwaves on request.  The 1400 steps to Disneyland will help us continue marketing Hotel Menage as the one of the closest hotels to the park...  Thank you for that information...  We look forward to seeing you soon!  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: We had the extremely unfortunate experience of staying at this hotel in July.  Firstly, a hotel maid entered our daughter's room without knocking while she was present.  Secondly, our signed visa bill disappeared from the pool bar.  While at Disneyland on our last day, an unauthorized key was used to gain access to our room.  Cash was stolen from two purses, and cash and a valuable necklace was taken from a leather case which was inside a bureau.  Hotel staff was less than cooperative and we were forced to call 911 and have the police attend.  The hotel is refusing to answer our questions regarding this theft and the issue of an unauthorized room key.  When we tried to get a safety deposit box at the front desk, we were advised that there were none available, and the manager had
Manager Response: Dee1717,  I am truly sorry for the incidents that occured at Hotel Menage.  I know that this issue was resolved amicabliy...  and assure you and your family that the hotel is safe and secure.  I know that it's too late to "write" a retraction, however I do know that everything was handled to your satisfaction and that you mentioned that you will be back to Hotel Menage.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: I had high hopes for our stay, we really got a great deal thru hotwire so that was good. The real problem is noise, this hotel is right in the middle of very busy streets and on one side I-5. Don't get a room on the Harbor Blvd side because you will be awakened by the garbage truck playing pinball with the dumpsters behind the restaurant at 0650 in the morning. My wife found gang graffiti in the hotel directory and one night while looking for the ice machine "which I didn't find" I came across 2 rather scantly clad "ladies" standing outside of a room smoking pot. The room directly behind us had the door open for 2 nights until I closed it, I guess the cleaning staff didn't bother to look into that. I would not stay here again. Someone has put alot of money into this hotel I hope
Manager Response: FXWG1980,  I am truly sorry about your experience with Hotel Menage.  I assure you that this is NOT at all acceptable and indicative of our Team!  We did not notice any reports regarding the smoking in the hallway's, however we would NOT permit that by any stretch of our imagination.  I am hopeful you will give us another opportunity to show you a "better experience"...    regards,  Hotel Menage

Summary Heading: A hidden treasure, with GREAT staff
Summary: Well let me just start by saying that we simply LOVED this place. My partner and I didn't want to leave.  Where to begin. We checked in really quickly, and were greeted at the desk by the lovely staff. (more on them in a moment) And straight on up to the fifth floor! (top floor)  Uh-oh! we exited the elevator and my fears sank in, 2 freeways, lots of noise!! I was worried, but we walked to our room and entered.   Wow! as soon as the door was closed, all the freeway noise was basically gone, we co uld still hear it, but only just, the TV or the Aircon would get rid of this noise VERY quickly.  When we entered the room, it was beautiful. Clean, crisp and looked a lot like the pictures on their website. The HUGE TV was awesome with so many Hi Def channels and the bed was just
Manager Response: darvian22,  Thank you for your great comments about Hotel Menage!!!!  I assure you the team here will see this and smile with encouragement!  Your comments made me smile as I sit here reading your words, all I have to say is Thank You!  The food is quite good and we tried to put value into quality and top the experience off with a great staff!  As far as the bathrooms are concerned, unfortunately we could not do much with the size, but you'll be happy to know that we will start "re-doing" the bathrooms first quarter of next year...  We definately look forward to seeing you again at Hotel Menage, and again thank you for making us your choice in Anaheim!  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: We stayed at the Menage for a little four day-three night Disneyland getaway in September.  We stayed here many years back when it was a Holiday Inn.  We had a third floor room which was LOUD.  The AC drown out some of the road noise, but the hotel is surrounded by busy roads.  Obviously, this can't be changed, but just be warned.  The room was cleaned well on a daily basis.  Linens were nice, but the bed was uncomfortable and lumpy.  On the plus side, the pool area is nice and the hotel very graciously offers free internet access, which is very handy for checking emails, et cetera.  The hotel bar and restaurant LOOK good, but because we didn't eat/drink at either location, I can't comment.  We are reasonably fit 40-somethings and we'd walk to Disneyland daily, though the hotel
Manager Response: crystal63,  I am sorry that you feel that it's just okay.  We pride ourselves on our service and value orientation.  I assure you that I will look into the "bed" issue you had, but this truly is the first complaint I have received...  Again we hope that you will give us another opportunity...    Regards,  Hotel Menage...

Summary: I just returned from the Menage and the trip exceeded our expectations! I booked 4 rooms for a group of 8 that were going to Disneyland for a weekend get away. Based on the some of the reviews I read that were not favorable, I almost cancelled the reservations. I'm SO glad I didn't! We had the best time! Check in is 3PM however, when our group arrived at 9AM (our intent was to drop off our luggage while we went to the park then come back to check in and take a nap around 3PM) the woman at the front desk happily said, I can check to see if we have rooms available now so you don't have to come back... Needless to say she not only checked our group in early, she gave us 4 rooms practically next door to each other on the 5th floor. I've read a couple of reviews complaining about the
Manager Response: Carla086,  Thank you for your kind words on Hotel Menage!  We strive to make every experience like yours and truly want every guest to feel like a part of the family!  I assure you that your comments will NOT go un-noticed and will make sure our entire team hears the great comments about the staff...  We look forward to serving you soon, hopefully sooner than later!...  Regards,  Hotel Menage!

Summary Heading: An enjoyable stay, except for some drawbacks.
Summary: My husband, three children ages (10, 5, and 2) stayed at the Hotel Menage for three days and nights.  We traveled about 12 hours from El Paso, Texas.  When we got there we were charged for parking, (which we felt was unreasonable) after paying over $100 a night for the room.  The first night we requested a wake-up call for the next morning. We were'nt called.  We did not use wake-up call again. The fireworks in the evening were awesome to watch. The location of the hotel was very close to Disneyland, and was an overall enjoyable stay, except for some drawbacks.
Manager Response: bdezired,  First and foremost, thank you for the business to Hotel Menage.  The fireworks are spectacular from our pool, some people say even better than Disneyland!...  As far as the parking is concerned, about 90% of all Anaheim Hotels (full service) provide and charge for parking, in fact, our rates are much lower than most.  The parking is operated by an outside company, and most of the charge really just goes to payroll to run the parking.  I apologize that you did not realize that there was a charge.  We hope that you give us another opportunity to "impress" you...  Thank you and again and please let us know if we can resolve any other issues you may have had...  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: We had a reasonably nice time. The pool is nice, but there is little opportunity for shade at midday. We didn't mind the rooms, but had to call about a large black rodent outside of our room door. My biggest complaint was the lack of responsiveness from management when I left a credit card at the pool bar. I repeatedly left messages with the manager (Tiffany) who refused to return them. When I would appeal to the staff for help, they always referred me to Tiffany (who was either too busy to come to the phone or was not at work). To this day, I have not received a return call or my credit card. This is unacceptable.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to post a review. I apologize for the situation with your credit card. Unfortunately, I have not received a message regarding this... Please feel free to contact me directly at 714-400-9090 or by email at tiffany@casaresortsinc.com. I would be more than happy to do all I can to help rectify this!  Hotel Menage

Summary Heading: so-so... get what you pay for
Summary: Hotel Menage is a good value hotel.... you get what you pay for... in my case, that was $100 per night.  It is clean, close to Disneyland and relatively quiet.  Room 419 was away from the freeway noise and we heard no noise coming from any other rooms, unlike a previous review.    it seemed to have a very young crowd, not many families or older persons and the bar/pool scene was very fun and lively.  Great place to stay if you don't need much room in the bathroom and if you aren't staying in your room  other than to sleep.  No refriedgerators, no balconies, no real room to spread out.    It was fine for what we wanted... certainly not luxurious or special.
Manager Response: beachtravel,  Thank you for your review.  We do try our best to keep the bugs away from the rooms and we have addressed it with our exterminating company, however being that Hotel Menage primarily sits outside to enjoy the sunny California weather, it's difficult to keep all "pests" at bay.  Our apologies for your experience and we hope that you will come visit us again soon...  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary: We took our first long haul trip as a family at the beginning of August.    From the UK to Anaheim is a long 14 hours of travelling so we were looking forward to getting to our hotel.  We were very impressed!  I had read the reviews here about the traffic noise, and I have to admit it did worry me, however, it was something that didn't affect any of us.  If anything the noise of the morning Freeway traffic was a nice reminder that we were waking up in another country!  The hotel itself was spotlessly clean, my children especially appreciated the internet room where they could email friends to tell of their adventures.  Our room was lovely, the bathroom was small but by English standards for hotels it was a pretty average size.  The pool was great, and very quiet.  Relaxing
Manager Response: pulliptears,  Thank you for your great review about Hotel Menage!  We appreciate any and all feedback, and love to hear great experience like yours...  I will make sure we pass on the great comments to our team!  Please come visit us again soon as you know the weather here is much nicer than that of England!!!  Look forward to your future business...  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: As long as you get a cheap rate on hotwire
Summary: We stayed there for 4 days in late August while we moved our daughter into college. General review...as long as you don't pay over $80-90 per night it is acceptable. Anything more and you are paying too much for the quality.  The Good: Staff very friendly, free business area. Lobby area very nice. TV is great.  The not so good-  Rooms don't go with the decor. Nice amenities in what appears to be an old inexpensive hotel. Bathrooms are tiny, paint peels on tiles and around the drain. Same small dead bug remained behind the bathroom door everyday. I left it to see if it would be cleaned. My guess is they can't get in the bathroom enough to clean behind the door.  Also, upon arrival, the bathroom had an extremely strong chlorine smell that stayed the whole time. It matched the
Manager Response: fluffqueen01,  Thank you for your comments.  We do strive to ensure every guest is happy with there stay.  As with some customers, the noise is an issue and our solution is in the works!  We are re-sealing all the guest door frames and the decibal levels have dropped significantly.  I will pass on your comments to our designers regarding the decor and the good comments regarding the staff...  We hope that you will give us another opportunity in the near future...  regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: What a great hotel at a great price!
Summary: Wow!  I almost hate to give away this place because I want it to stay my secret.  But I got the room through my entertainment guide (did it through their website).  We travel to Anaheim/LA annually and try new places all the time.  It was myself, my husband and my two kids (both under 5).  It was less than 1 block from Disneyland, you could even see their fireworks right on top of the hotel every night at 9:20.  THey had a 1/2 price drink and appetizer happy hour from 4-7 nightly, great restaurant and nice pool and hot tub.  The rooms were more like a standard Days Inn only upgraded with flat screen mounted TV, and granite bathroom.  But I would definitely recommend, esp for couples or kids.  We will certainly be there again.
Manager Response: nawlins95,  Thank you for your kind words about Hotel Menage...  Please don't keep it a secret as we need great families like you staying at the hotel and enjoying all that it has to offer.  We consider ourselves a great value and strive to continually exceed our customers expectations...  We look forward to seeing you back at Hotel Menage...  Hotel Menage

Summary Heading: Great Stay and the Best Staff
Summary: We stay here twice a year for two weeks at a time. The room was great and it's nice upgrade with the LG plasma on the wall.We enjoy the staff here as much as we do the location even the owner Richard is at his hotel making sure every one is taken care of. The valet parking guys are very fast and very helpful,Dan in the conceares deck is always friendly and ready to help out he has some of the best priced packages for the family.The front deck staff will help with every thing.When staying here Brenda always helps us with any of our family needs.This hotel has the best pool in town and open 24 hours if you want a late night swim.
Manager Response: Goodtimes08Tacoma,  Great to see you back!  We look forward to seeing you again soon, hopefully sooner than later...  thank you for your continual business and your kind words...  We will make sure our Team reads your accolades!  Regards,  Hotel Menage!

Summary Heading: It Is What Your Pay For ....
Summary: My boyfriend and I just got back from a 5 day stay at the Hotel Menage, here are our thoughts .....   The Good: 1. Awesome Staff - The entire crew of staff was really friendly and accomodating (one of the frond desk employees warmed our pizza in the staff microwave, which was awesome!) 2. Quick check in/out 3. Pool/hot tub open 24 hrs./day - Really convenient after a long day at Disneyland. 4. 10 minute walk to Disneyland. 5. As per all the other reviews - the tv's/furniture upgrades to the room quite nice. 6. The Mango Mojito at the hotel bar is really good.  The Bad: 1. REALLY thin walls betweens rooms - We could clearly hear conversations in the room next to ours, as well as other activities which took place in the room next to ours. 2. $10.00 parking  - We thought this was a
Manager Response: InnaRo1234,  Thank your for your feedback on Hotel Menage.  We appreciate comments from all guests.  As far as your comments on the "drainage" for the property the city will be will be "increasing" the the main pipeline in the fourth quarter of this year and it should "alleviate" most of the issues.  As far as the noise from the walls are concerned, this is the first I've read about this and we will look into additional insulation and padding.  I apologize for the towels NOT being replaced and delivered on a timely manner.  I assure you that we will follow up with the Housekeeping staff.  Thank you for your comments...  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: Stranded for a month in the Hotel Menage
Summary: I was on a 35-day motorcycle cross country adventure from Canada, attempting to do 11,000 miles across the whole US and back home.  I broke down near Anaheim, CA, and checked into the Hotel Menage on July 14th, 2008, on the advice of my brother who just visited a few months prior.  My repetative bike repair failures kept me in the hotel for almost a full month until Aug 8, 2008, when I had to fly home after the local dealership screwed up my repairs for the last time.  The location is beautiful...quick access to everything, both in and out of the hotel.  You are only about 4 blocks from Disneyland, and there is a shuttle service at the front door / valet parking stand.  The staff were AMAZING.  I became like family after a stay that long, and everyone there went above and beyond
Manager Response: Lifeguard_Mike,  Mike,  Thank you for you kind words. We enjoyed having you as a part of the family and the team already misses you.  I will make sure everyone you noted on the review will be told about your kind words...  be safe and we hope everything works out with you bike.  Regards,  Hotel Menage.

Summary Heading: Please, please, please, don't go to this????
Summary: On the day of check in, we arrived at 2pm. The girl at the front desk, very briskly said, "checkin is at 3. You'll have to come back later"  We roamed around for an hour and went back. Again, they were not accommadating, telling me only 1 of our 3 rooms were ready. We asked to put all of our luggage in the 1 room so that we could go to Knott's Berry Farm. We took our luggage up to the room and they were still cleaning it. Had to wait outside the room another 20 minutes. Got back from Knott's Berry around 9pm and got the other 2 rooms.  The freewqay noise is horrible!! You have to keep the air conditioner going to try and drown out some of the noise.  The day before we were to leave, we went to Disneyland at 8 in the morning. I kept my wallet in the room (in the drawers in
Manager Response: kaysvault,  We are currently investigating the money that appeared missing and we are awaiting a response from both the police department and the insurance company.  We apologize for this incident.  Your report did not speak about all of the other issues, our understanding was that everything else during your stay was good.
